11.content:
Nikki changed the channel of the T.V.

"I can't believe it. 100 channels and not one with something i like."

She rubbed her big belly. She was heavy for her age. Her arms and legs were kind of plump and she had a cute puffy face.

Her mother was at the other end of the room sewing. Nikki turned of the T.V.

"Mom i'm hungry."

Her mother (Linda) looked up and heave a deep sigh.

"Nikki you're alway's hungry!"

Nikki was still sitting on the couch and looked at her mother with an innocent face. She knew her mother was right. She was always hungry. She alway's kept on eating until all the food was gone. But she never really had enough.

Her mother looked worried at her. She did't want to feed her daughter more since she already was fatter then an average kid her age but she did't want Nikki to cry and she looked so cute.

"You're really hungry?"

"Yes mommy."

Linda stood up and walked to the kitchen.

"I don't know what it is with her. That girl is alway's hungry. Now what do i have for her?"

She returned with a big bag of chips. Nikki happy started to eat them.

"Nikki please promise me you go outside today."

"But mooom... "

"No but's young lady. You're spending way to much time in front of the T.V. It would be good for you if you go outside once in a while."

"I'm feeling fine inside."

"I know something. when your father is done we can go for a walk in the forest."

"Oh. Woopty doo." Nikki said totally not excited.

"You know what Nikki it's nice weather so i guess we can also take a picnic there. How is that?"

The word picnic cheered her up.

"Well all right then." Nikki said knowing that they would go anyway if she liked it or not."

"Great. Now let's see what shall we take."

Nikki's mother fast filled a basket with some things for the picnic.

"Nikki could you go upstairs and see if your dad is almost ready?"

Nikki stroke through her long brown hair and walked upstairs and knocked on her father's door.

"Come in." He said.

"Hello my nice daughter. what is it?"

"Mom wanted to go on a picnic. Are you almost ready?"

"A Picnic. That sounds great. Well i'm done so let's go."

Nikki walked downstairs. It was really warm and nice weather so she did't need to were a jacket. Good thing also because she was recently gotten too fat too fasten the zipper of her old jacket.

Nikki's mother came out of the kitchen with a big basket full of food since she knew that Nikki would have an even bigger appetite after a walk.

"All right." Nikki's father (Bram) said. "Let's go!"

They went out. Nikki looked around. It was really nice weather. Maybe it was't so bad to go outside.

"Let's go to the big forest." Bram said.

"That's a good idea." Linda agreed.

"I suppose." Robin said. still not really excited.

"Come on Nikki. what's wrong? we go on a picnic."

"Well i'm still hungry."

"Nikki you can't be hungry! You just eat a whole bag of chips!"

"I know."

"So you can't be hungry then." Her father said.

Nikki did't answer but rubbed her big tummy and was thinking: "I'm always hungry."

When they go in the forest Nikki got a little sidetracked. Then she saw something she liked.

"Blackberries!"

Fast she walked over to them and plucked them and put them in her mouth so fast she almost did't have time to chew them. She plucked more careful for the thorn's.

"So Nikki your enjoying yourself?"

Nikki hands were purple because of all the berries. Her parents walked over to her.

"Don't eat to much or els you wont have room for the picnic." Linda said. Not that it made any sense. Nikki was always hungry. With or without some blackberries in her tummy.

When most or the blackberries where vanished in her tummy she and her parent's walked further.

"Where do you want to have a picnic?" Linda asked.

"By the grass field in the center of the forest."

Nikki heave a deep sigh. That would mean she would have to walk even further. But the grass field was a nice place. And there were standing some picnic tables and there were a lot places for children to play. The place was very familiar and there was a good chance they would't be the only ones there. A lot of people came there. Especially on such a nice day like today.

111212212111211111222111.content:
Back home, Nikki lay down on the sofa, her mother telling her to keep out of the kitchen for a while.
She was frightened and hungry. Now that this diet had come into her life, what was going to happen? Was she going to starve? Get thinner and thinner till she was invisible?
She didn't understand it. She loved being big and wanted to grow. Why wouldn't her mother see that?
Her round stomach grumbled. She gave a little sigh and rubbed it, trying to calm it down.
She could only imagine all the gross food her mother would give her, and how disgusting it would taste. No more chocolate, or pizza, or burgers, or ice cream.
Her poor tummy only rumbled louder at the thought of all she wants in life being taken away.

Eventually she heard the kitchen door click open and her mother poking her head out.
"Nikki, come in here, sweetheart." She said softly.
Nikki rolled off the sofa and waddled sombrely towards the kitchen. She wasn't looking forward to this.



"Now sweetie, I know you really don't like the sound of dieting," Nikki's mother explained, kneeling down to her daughter and speaking softly to her sorrowful face, "but it won't be as bad as you think. In fact it could be fun!"
"What's fun about doing jumping jacks and eating carrots all the time?" Nikki mumbled, blinking her big watery eyes.
"That's not true," her mother shook her head, "well, what do you like to do all day?"
"Eat," Nikki answered bluntly.
Her mother sighed. "Besides that?"
"Sleep."
"And that?"
"Watch TV."
She sighed again. She wasn't getting anywhere. "Don't you wanna play outside?"
"Uh uh," Nikki shook her head, "it's boring, nothing to play."
Her mother looked up in thought, then blinked as she had an idea.

"How about you go to a sports club?" She suggested with a smile, "That way you'll have other kids to play with and you'll lose weight!"
If Nikki could frown any more than she was frowning now she would have done just that. "I don't like sports."
"Nothing too big," she explained, then started to think again, "hmmmm...how about swimming? That's always fun!"
"But I dunno how to swim," Nikki admitted.
"They'll teach you," her mother nodded, smiling, "it's not hard at all. In fact the water makes your body really light so it's easy!"

Nikki tilted her head, giving this some thought.

Linda suddenly stopped and pulled over and looked at Nikki with a worried look.

"Nikki i need to tell you something."
111212212111211122.title: Clothes

11121221211122.content:
In her dream, she wakes up in her casual form, just being the fat butterball that she is. She waddles downstairs and into the kitchen. There, she sees her mother making pancakes. Although to Nikki, the stack wasn't big enough; about 6 pieces in the stack. Well, Nikki just ate them by the cake, but unbeknownst to her, the pancakes were making her body deflate.
As she finished the pancakes, she tried to rub her belly, but noticed that it wasn't as close as she thought. She looked down to see that her large belly turned into a small bump on her body. She screamed in fear, as she looked at herself in terror, as most of her fat had been dissolved.

"Mommy, what happened," she asked in concern.

Her mother turned to her with an evil grin, replying, "You're too fat, Nikki. The doctor came over earlier and injected a serum into your system. So, whenever you eat something, you'll lose weight."

Nikki couldn't believe it. She can't believe it. She went to the cupboard, grabbed the box of cookies, and started to eat them. She lost more weight because of it.

"No matter how much you lose, you're still too fat," her mother said, chuckling evilly.

She searched all around the house to eat something, while her mother chanted "You're still too fat", but to no avail did she gain any weight.

Pound by pound, inch by inch was dissolving as every time she was eating. After a moment, she was reduced to less than skin and bones. She literally looked like a stick figure. She was too weak to try and reach for a lone potato chip. She almost had it, until a chubby hand grabbed it before she did. She looked up to see that it was her mother, over 500 pounds, taking the chip and eating it to mock her. She walked over to the fridge to grab a large chocolate cake, big enough to feed a family of 6. She placed it on the kitchen table and began to eat it, while Nikki watched her, teary-eyed.

"Well, I never thought you would be so skinny that you can't eat what's right in front of you anymore," said Linda, as she gobbles down 1/4 of the cake.

Bram walks in with 4 bags of food from McDonald's, weighing over 400 pounds. He placed them on the dining room table and shoved each and every burger down his mouth.

"We were hoping to get you to lose some weight, because you always ate out of house and home while we were STARVING," he exclaimed as he drank a large chocolate milkshake.

She was so sad to see herself as a useless beanpole, while her brother and mother were growing fatter as they ate her most favorite fatty foods. They grew bigger and bigger as they ate, getting fatter with each bite. After eating all the food, Linda was over 1000 pounds, hitting her head against the ceiling, while Bram was over 850 pounds, as he could almost reach for the ceiling. Linda's stomach growled like a lion, as she was salivating in hunger.

"I'm still a bit hungry," she said, as she looked at the small form that is Nikki, then grinned evilly, "But I think one small fry will fill me up until dinner."

With that, she towered over Nikki, grabbing her with a pinch, and raised her against her giant mouth.


Nikki gasped in terror as she woke up from the nightmare. She looked down to see her belly was slightly lower, due to that she digested her meal earlier, which made her gain weight in every other part of the body. She got out of bed, proclaiming, "I don't care what she says. I'm not losing this weight. Even if I weigh 10 kajillion pounds, I'll eat whatever I want, whenever I want."

With that, she crept downstairs and...
11121221211122.title: Terrible Nightmare

choices: Skip a few months until the birth of her baby sister or brother
111212212111221.content:
...walked too the kitchen. She then heard a sound. someone was downstairs. Nikki froze. She was just a little five year old girl who was scared to death for burglars. Slowly she hold in her breath and did a few steps forward. The door was a bit open. Nikki looked inside and let out a sigh of relief when she saw her mother.
Then the door opened. Her mother looked at her. Nikki walked in the kitchen.

"What are you doing here?"

"Eh i was hungry. I wanted a little snack."

For you is a little snack something five people can eat from."

But she took two pizza's out of the freezer and put them in the oven. Nikki was surprised but decided too enjoy it. She then saw a gallon of ice cream on the table and a jar of pickles.

"Mommy. why are you up and eating?"

Nikki looked at her mother and now she noticed her mothers belly was also kind of round and looked a bit fatter.

"Mommy are you also getting fat?" Nikki asked.

"No honey. I'm not getting fat."

"Then why is your belly so big and round?"

Linda sighed and took another pickle. She decided she might as well tell Nikki. She needed to know sooner or later.

"All right listen Nikki. I'm pregnant. You're gonna have a brother or sister and i well... i eat a bit more. Not only for myself but also for the baby."

Nikki looked at her mother and one moment she remembered the dream where her own mother was at the point to eat her but she fast forget that thought. She slowly started to realize she would have a brother or sister.
She picked a spoon and climbed on a chair next to her mother too also eat some ice until the pizza's were done.

"So then i'm the big sister?"

"Yes Nikki. I hope you be nice to you sibling."

"I will be nice to my little sister. I promise."

"It can also be a brother Nikki."

"Or two. Maybe a boy and a girl." Nikki added.

"Eh i don't think so Nikki but who knows. Now you're gonna be the bigger sister."

"Nikki started too think how she was gonna be the bigger sister. Mary-kate the girl next door was an older sister and she said it was sometimes hard but sometimes also very funny.
Linda put one of the pizza's in front of Nikki. Fast she started too eat it but her thoughts were still with the baby.

"Well Nikki are you ready for the checkup tomorrow?"

This did Nikki remember about the dream and she started to shiver almost crying.

"Nikki what is it? Did something happened?"

"I... i don't... want too... go too... c... checkup. Please mommy please?"

"Linda did't know what too do. She knew that Nikki did't want too go but she really seemed to be scared half too death now."

"Well Nikki you don't have too be scared. He's not gonna do anything too you."

"He... he's not gonna make me skinny?"

"No honey. He would say some things when you too heavy but he himself won't do anything about it. He could tell us what we can do. So tell us which things we can't eat."

Nikki lifted her shoulders. She did't really understood it but it did't seemed like it would be in the dream and started too eat the second pizza. After she had eaten the second pizza her mother took her by the hand and said come on let's go back too bed.
Nikki was still hungry but she was always hungry so she ignored it. The thought of a little sister or brother made her think less off her hunger. She crawled fast in bed and fell in a deep dreamless sleep.
111212212111221.title: you're gonna be the big sister

1112122121112212.content: Skip a few months eh? And Linda gave birth to.......
1112122121112212.title: Skip a few months until the birth of her baby s...

choices: Nikki ask her mom about the diet
Nikki don't ask and goes home with Tanja
11121221212.content:
"I don't want to go!" Nikki said the next day while her mother drove her to the doctor.

"Come on Nikki. It's just a check up. If there is nothing wrong with you you don't have to worry."

"But he has those sharp needles he stick in... "

"Nikki he does't do that. Not today. Or at least not with you today."

Nikki slowly started to relax while her mother parked.
They walked through the hall too the waiting room. Linda and Nikki both took a seat. Nikki grabbed a comic and started to look at the pictures(she can't read yet).
Suddenly someone pulled at her leg. She looked and saw a small girl. While she looked at the face she suddenly recognized the little girl.

"Little bit?"

The little girl waved.

Nikki looked through the room and saw Tanja. Also looking at pictures in a book.

"Hee Tanja!"

Tanja looked up from her book and recognized Nikki. Fast she got up from her seat and walked to Nikki.

"Hello Nikki was it right. The girl that was always hungry."

Like if Nikki's stomach heard it it made growling sounds.

"Were is Robbie?"

"Playing at a friend. Little bit needs to get a check up. My mother also wanted to give me a check up while we're here. I had one three months ago."

"I'm also here for a check up. My mother thinks i'm too heavy."

Tanja looked at her new friends love handles. She also thought that Nikki looked a bit on the heavy side but was smart enough not too say it.

"Hee we can ask our mothers if you can come over after the check up."

"Good idea." Nikki said.

Nikki pulled her mother at her sleeve and Tanja did the same and their mothers both asked what was wrong.

"Mom this is Tanja. I met her yesterday at the grass field. Can i come over after the check up? Please?"

Linda stood up and shook hands with Tanja's mother. Both mothers started to talk and finally Linda said:"Well you can come over after the check up."

"Yeah!" Both girls said and hugged each other what was kind of hard for Tanja thanks to Nikki's big belly.

Suddenly the door opened and Nikki and her mother were called in. The doctor did some tests looked in her ears and her eyes and finally he wanted to weigh her. Nikki slowly stepped on the scale. The doctor looked surprised at the number and returned to the desk.

"Miss you have a lovely little girl. You said you were worried about her weight. Is that right?"

"Yes."

"Well i'm afraid i must tell you that you're right about her weight. She is much too heavy for her age. Does she get enough exercise?"

"Well she does't do any exercise, But what i'm worried about is that she is hungry all the time. She seems to never be full."

"Hm well i once met a little girl from china. She was adopted and was also used to eat non stop since that was what she did in china. Is it possible that she was also forced to eat much when she was little."

"No. Not as far if i know."

"Well then i don't know what it is. Here i have a diet and some activity groups. If she keeps to the diet and do some activity i'm sure she'll lose weight."

Nikki did't really understand what they said but it did't sound to good. She got scared.
Linda took her by the hand and walked back to the waiting room.

"We'll wait here until you're ready with your check up." Linda said too Tanja's mom while she and her two daughter's were called to the doctor's office.

Nikki looked scared at the diet book her mom was reading.
11121221212.title: Diet

choices: Be a good girl and follow your mom
111212212121.content:
"Mom...what are you reading...?" asked Nikki, scared.

"A book about diet and exercise, you need to lose about", she placed her pointer finger and her thumb on the side of Nikki's belly about an inch away from each other "this much of this belly of yours."

"BUT MOM!" shouted Nikki.

"No 'buts'" said Linda.

On the way home, Nikki brought up the subject again.
"Why are you doing this? I thought you loved me. I thought you wanted to make me happy!" Nikki said.

"Nikki, I'm doing this because I do love you. If I didn't, I'd let you stuff yourself with food until you, pop, or become immobile. And I do want to make you happy. You can still eat a lot of food, just healthy food, and you'll be exercising. Like I said, you really need to lose some weight".

"Mom. I like eating. I like eating junk food. I don't like exercising. I like this belly. I like being fat!"

"Fine, you can be fat, just not as much as you are now"

"Come on Mom"

"No daughter of mine is going to turn into a ball of fat"

"Why Mom? WHY CAN'T I BE WHAT I WANT TO BE?!"

"BECAUSE IT'S DANGEROUS!"

They finally arrived at the house.

"We'll discuss this in your room."
111212212121.title: Nikki ask her mom about the diet

choices: Linda decides to forget about putting Nikki on a diet
Linda still puts Nikki on a diet
1112122121211.content:
They entered Nikki's bedroom. Linda locked the door and sat in a chair in front of Nikki, who was on her bed.

"Nikki, it's not healthy to be fat."

"Why not?"

"Well, being fat makes it difficult to move, makes it difficult to breathe, and can lead to serious health risks"

"Why?"

"I don't know...It's just the way it is"

"But I can move just fine, I can breathe just fine, and I never felt sick before from being fat"

"But you will later in your life."

"Well, why can't I be fat now?"

"Because you might never lose the weight later. Also, the average weight for a 5 year old is around 40 pounds. Nikki, do you remember the number on the scale during your check-up?"

"Yeah, 108" Nikki said proudly.

"That's not good..."

"It's not?"

"Of course not, you're way over double the average weight for a 5 year old."

"I know but..."

"But what?"

"It feels great being fat. Have you ever been fat before?"

"Yeah. Around your age. I knew that it was a bad thing, which wasn't helped by the fact that kids made fun of me"

"But you must've liked being fat. You must have liked having a big, soft belly", Nikki said as she patted her belly, "hanging over your waistband."

Linda was silent. Nikki was right, it did feel good...
1112122121211.title: The discussion

choices: Do something other than sitting around
11121221212111.content:
Linda thought for a while. Nikki really did have a point; she did like being fat. She finally came to her conclusion.

"You're right Nikki. I did like being fat and I really shouldn't take that good feeling away from you".

Nikki looked up at her mother, excited at what she might say.

"So I'm not gonna put you on a di-"

"THANK YOU!!!" Nikki jumped off the bed and hugged Linda with more glee than she ever had. This had to be the happiest day of her life.

"Ok ok. Let go of me please"

Nikki let go of her and was bouncing of the walls (not litterally) with joy.

"Calm down!" Linda said. Nikki stopped. "Now I won't put you on this diet, but on one condition. Either you cut back on how much you eat, or you start doing something other than just sitting around eating. I'm not saying you should exercise -although I would prefer that-, you just need to be at the very least active"

"Ok..."

"So, what do you want?"

Nikki was thinking. She was always hungry and without eating all the time she would be even more hungry but she hated exercise. This was hard. But she knew it would be this or the diet and diet would be even worse. She was thinking and finally decided that cutting back on food was worse then exercise and besides her mother only said she had to be active. But she knew she still needed to find a way to be active and she refused to do exercise.

"Maybe you can do something with one of your classmates? That girl eh... Susan. She did horse riding."

"All right so not her. Maybe eeeeh... Jolein. That red haired girl."

"She's even a bigger fashion doll then my Barbie's. At least my Barbie dolls has more brains then her."

Nikki never really liked Barbie. She found she was way too skinny. Just like all her the other dolls. But for one strange reason her grandparents still gave her presents like this for her birthday(and St Nicholas and Christmas but Nikki still thought that St Nicholas and Santa Claus really exist).

"That's not a very nice thing to say Nikki."

"That was the point mom."

"Well if you don't find a way to be active i will put you on a exercise group. I believe your school had some pretty good..."

"No please mom no exercise. Give me at least until to tomorrow night to think of a sport!"

"Well i guess that's fair. You did't do anything active except learning to crawl and how to walk and even that did take some time. But i want to hear something tomorrow before you go too bed or i pick some activity for you!"

"Deal!" Nikki said and jumped on bed what caused the bed to make a loud squeaking noise. "But mom can i have some food now. I'm hungry."

"You always hungry but i guess all right then!"

While the two walked downstairs Nikki was busy thinking of some activity that was't tiring. For someone like her that was hard too do. She put her soft behind on a chair and started to think.
Her mother took a pizza out the freezer and put it in the microwave. She knew Nikki could eat the entire thing and still be hungry for dinner and it would take her some time too finish the pizza.

"When you read or watch T.V you also sit. This is gonna be hard. Wait maybe dancing. Or i can play pretend with some friends."
111212212121112.title: Do what?

11121221212112.content:
She shook her head to forget how good her big belly felt and came back to reality.

"I don't care you're still on a diet! I don't care if you like it or not! You need to lose weight!"

This was too much for the fat five year old girl. She tarted too cry long and loud. She rolled her belly hitting the bed with her plump hands.

"I do Nikki and that's why i put you on a diet. From now no candy or junk food or Mc Donalds..."

Nikki was still crying . But she almost cried herself dry by now. She could't believe that her mother just took the biggest joy in her life away.
Suddenly she went sitting up straight. She would't do it. She would't follow the diet. Quietly she walked out her room and walked downstairs. She could hear her parents talk in their bed room. She fast walked to the kitchen and opened the cupboard and started to eat every kind of food she could get. Chips, cookies, cupcakes. It all vanished in her greedy mouth. She saw no reason in stopping and was eating until the last crumb of food was in her belly. After that she opened the refrigerator and took out all the food and pushed it in her mouth . Weenies almost drowned in some mayonnaise and ketchup. A piece of roast and some salad. Of course together with a lot of dressing. And also a bowl of baked potatoes. She also drank the last liter of Cola and belched loudly. Then she opened the freezer and took out one gallon of ice cream and started to eat it with her hands. When she saw the empty boxes wrappers and jars she knew exactly what happened.

No yelling

1112122121221.content:
Nikki looked around and saw that there were two beds.

"Why do you have two beds?" asked Nikki.

"I share this room with Robbie. So anyway what do you want to die?" asked Tanja.

But before Nikki could answer her belly growled.

"I'm hungry" said Nikki.

"Well we usually eat dinner at 6:00 pm. Until then do you want to play guess who with me?" asked Tanja.

"Sure" said Nikki.

They played guess who for a dozen minutes with Nikki winning the most rounds. Every now and then her belly would let out a growl. Tanja was curious about how someone could live with being hungry all the time.

"So Nikki you're always hungry?"

"Yup"

"Is it annoying to never be full?"

"Sometimes, but on the bright side I get to eat as much delicious food as I can"

Tanja giggled at that last statement

"I guess that's a good thing"

Then the door opened and Robbie came in and noticed Nikki there.

"Hey aren't you the fat girl we met at the park yesterday?" asked Robbie casually.

"Robbie! Don't just call people fat like that!" said Tanja worried that Robbie hurt Nikki's feelings." Now say you're sorry".

"Alright alright I'm sorry" said Robbie.

"It's okay guys I know i'm fat and i like it and if other people don't like it it's their problem not mine" said Nikki.

Tanja was relived that her new friend wasn't offended and actually admired her for how proud she was for being fat. After that Nikki played guess who with Robbie and won the most rounds.

Then Tanja and Robbie's mother called them down for dinner. They were having spaghetti and meatballs and Nikki had two plates of it. Even though she wasn't even close to full from those servings she didn't want to be rude so she didn't ask for more. When Julie (the mom) asked Nikki if she wanted a piece of pie she said yes and ate it and it was the most delicious pie she had ever tasted and wanted more but again she didn't want to be rude so she just had that one piece.

After dinner Nikki, Tanja and Robbie went back to Tanja's room and Nikki saw a small t.v and next to it a Wii. They played Kirby's Return to Dream Land with Nikki playing as Kirby, Tanja as Waddle Dee and Robbie as Meta Knight. They played until it was bedtime but Nikki forgot to bring her pajamas. She asked Tanja if she could borrow her pajamas but obviously they didn't fit so they asked Julie if she could borrow hers. She said yes and while they did fit it was still a little tight. The kids then brushed their teeth and Robbie went to the guess bedroom since Nikki would be sleeping in Tanja's room. Don (Tanja's dad) then came in the room to tell them good night.

"Dad" said Tanja in a almost panicking tone. Don then came back and closed the door but left a crack. Nikki looked at Tanja with a confused look on her face.

"I'm scared of the dark" said Tanja embarrassingly.

"Me too. I ask my dad to leave a crack in the door too" said Nikki.

After that they both went to sleep.
1112122121221.title: "I'm hungry"

11121221212211.content:
Tanja was sleeping soundly until she was woken up by a noise. She looked around to see that the bed Nikki was sleeping in was empty and the door was open. She thought nothing of it since she just assumed that Nikki went to the bathroom or something. But then she heard another noise only this time it came from downstairs. Wanting to know what was making that sound she got out of bed and walked to the stairs when the guest bedroom door opened.

"Tanja? Were you woken up by the noise too?" asked Robbie.

"Yeah I'm going downstairs to see what it is. You coming?" asked Tanja.

"Well since I'm awake now I might as well" said Robbie.

They made their way downstairs and heard that the noise was coming from the kitchen. They went to the kitchen and saw Nikki eating food from the fridge, she was making the noise all along.

"Phew for a second there I thought it was a burglar or worse, good thing it was just you Nikki" said Robbie.

But Nikki didn't respond to him.

"Hey Nikki are you alright?" asked Tanja.

Again Nikki didn't respond.

Tanja and Robbie then approach Nikki to look at her eye to eye. But when they saw her face her eyes were closed. They then realized that Nikki was sleepwalking or sleepeating in her case.

Indeed Nikki was eating everything that was edible, from the leftover spaghetti, too the rest of the pie, too even the ketchup and mustard. Tanja and Robbie tried to wake her up but no matter what they did she wouldn't wake up. After she was done eating food from the fridge she fell down on her back apparently satisfied.

Tanja and Robbie looked at the mess Nikki made.

"Oh man mom is going to freak out when she sees this mess" said Tanja.

"Don't worry Tanja we can fix this" said Robbie.

"How?" asked Tanja.

"Simple we'll just clean this mess and mom and dad won't be the wiser" said Robbie.

They took some paper towels and immediately started to clean everything and even wiped some stains from Nikki's face. But now came the hard part moving Nikki back to bed. They both took an arm each and began pulling and only managed to move her a few inches before getting tired.

"Man she's way too heavy for both of us. How are we going to be able to bring her upstairs?" asked Robbie.

Suddenly Tanja got an idea. She went to the kitchen and got a cookie out of the jar and hung it in front of Nikki's face and just as she was hoping for Nikki tried to take the cookie but Tanja pulled it away. Robbie then understood her plan to bring Nikki into her room bye luring her with the cookie.

The plan worked and Nikki was back in Tanja's room on her bed where she locked the door so that she wouldn't be sleepeating anymore tonight.

After that incident Tanja went back to sleep.

Tanja woke up and looked to see Nikki who was still asleep with her enormous belly rising and falling gently with her every breath. Tanja noticed that Nikki's belly was bigger no doubt because of her sleepeating last night. For whatever reason she decided to touch Nikki's belly and started to rub it. It was soft and warm. "Oh dear we seem to be out of Mapple syrup" said Julie. "But don't worry I'm sure we have more in the fridge"

Tanja and Robbie both froze in fear. While they were able too clean up the mess Nikki made during her sleepeating binge it would be hard not too notice missing food. But their mom was always a little ditzy so hopefully she won't notice.

"What's wrong with you two?" asked Nikki as she was eating her pancakes.

Robbie and Tanja both looked at each other and wondered if they should tell Nikki that she was sleepeating last night.

"You know this actually explains a lot" said Nikki.

"What do you mean?" asked Robbie.

"Well you see when I go to bed I go to bed hungry, but when I wake up I wake up less hungry than I was the night before and when I go downstairs to eat breakfast it always feel like we have less food" said Nikki.

"After all that sleepeating and those pancakes you must be pretty full right now" said Tanja as she patted Nikki's belly.

"Actually not really, I've never been full a day in my life" said Nikki.

"Really? You've never been full?" asked Robbie.

"No, no matter how much food I eat I never get full. Although I would like to know what it feels like" said Nikki as she was rubbing her belly.

"We can help you get full" said Tanja.

"Really" said Nikki.

"Yeah and I think I know how you can get full" said Tanja.

"How?" asked Nikki.

"I won't tell yet but trust me it should do the job. But first let's put our normal clothes on" said Tanja.

After they put their clothes on they went to go see Julie

"Hey mom can we play outside?" asked Tanja.

"Of course you can, just be back by 11:30 am" said Julie

After that they went outside and followed Tanja and after a half hour of walking they stopped with Nikki sweating and gasping the most.

"Are we 'gasp' there 'gasp' yet?" asked Nikki.

"Yeah we are" said Tanja.

And they were at.
11121221212211121.title: Tell her

111212212122111211.content:
It was an all you can eat buffet that specifically served breakfast food such as pancakes, waffles, French toast, eggs, bacon, sausages and hash browns. Nikki was ecstatic about this place and was about to enter but was stopped by Robbie.

"Hold on a minute, how are we going to pay for this without any money?" asked Robbie.

"I have that all figured out" said Tanja as she pointed to a poster. The poster showed five pancakes that were 50 cm in diameter and 2.5 cm deep and the text read 'introducing the pancakes tower if you can eat all five of these pancakes you get free food for the rest of a year'.

"How did you know what the poster says?" asked Nikki.

"One day when me and my mom were walking I saw this poster and asked my mom what it said and she told me what it said" said Tanja.

"So you really think that Nikki can eat those huge pancakes" said Robbie.

Nikki's belly suddenly growled as if it was answering him.

"I know it" said Tanja.

They entered the restaurant and took a table next too a window. A nice looking man walked over to them.

"Hello there what can I get you?" asked the man.

"Yeah I would like to have the pancakes tower" said Nikki.

The man had a shocked expression on his face " A-a-are you sure you want that little girl?".

"Yup now hurry up I'm hungry" said Nikki.

After a dozen minutes the man came back with the pancakes tower and set on the table. The people in the restaurant were shocked that a little girl (granted a fat little girl but still) would order such a colossal meal. As Nikki was eating everybody stopped eating their own meal and watched just too see if Nikki could finish it.
111212212122111211.title: An all you can eat restaurant

1112122121221112111.content:
"Mmm that was good, now I want seconds" said Nikki as she was rubbing her big belly.

"Y-you want seconds?!" said the waiter.

Everyone in the restaurant was shocked because not only did Nikki finished the pancakes tower but she still had room for seconds.

Nikki ordered everything they had since she just won free food from the restaurant. She gobbled down plate after plate after plate of waffles, French toast, hash browns, etc, etc. She didn’t even slow down as the shocked waitress brought her a 7th helping.

Soon more and more staff were called in to her help feed the fat little girl who didn’t want to stop eating. Both the men and woman of the restaurant were bringing her heaping platefuls of food and an incredible rate.

Nikki just gleefully ate them down as fast as she could. Her tummy at this point was almost beach ball in size and was even resting a good 3-4 inches on the table top.

Everyone in the restaurant was starring at her in amazement. Tanja and Robbie most of all, completely taken with just how much she was eating. Both were happily watching this girl grow larger and larger with every bite she took. They were greatly enjoying this show.

However, they were soon aproched by the manager who informed them that they had runout of food. With that news they left with the manager silently crying because Nikki had eaten him out of business.

"Wow I can't believe you ate every food they had" said Robbie.

"Yeah after all of that you must be really full" said Tanja.
1112122121221112111.title: She finishes it

choices: Denvert wants to see how much Nikki can eat
1112122121222.content:
Nikki looked and saw a small t.v and next to it a Wii.

"What is this?" she asked.

"Oh that's the Wii. You can play computer games with it. Wait i'll show you."

Tanja turned on the T.V and Wii.

"What do you want? We have the Sims 2, Spiderwick chronicles i think that one is a bit scary, Ben 10 that's Robbie's favorite. He likes that cartoon so much. Oh and of course Wii sports."

"I don't like sports. I hate exercise."

"Really. When i'm older i want too become a cheerleader. Just like Kim Possible. Do you know that cartoon?"

"Yes i know it."

"My mother bought the Wii so we could do some exercise. It's not so good like a real sport but at least you get some exercise. I can show you."

Nikki was doubtful. She liked computer games a lot but hated exercise. She decided to first look at Tanja and after that she would decide.
Tanja started to tennis. In the meantime little bit crawled on Nikki's belly and fell asleep on it using it as a pillow.
Nikki looked how Tanja's wild moves were real on the screen but she did't want to do it herself. It seemed way to tiring.

"I don't think i like it. What's that other game?"

Tanja paused the game and looked at Nikki and smiled one moment when she saw her little sister sleeping on Nikki's belly.

"You don't like any kind of exercise. My mom says if i don't do any exercise i will become fat... Oops!"

Tanja realized a bit too late that she maybe could have hurt her new friends feelings. She looked at Nikki with some guilt on her face but Nikki did't seem to care about what Tanja had said.

"So if you do become fat? What then? It's not a crime!"

"My mother don't want us to be fat."

"Well i'm fat and i like it and i seems you little sister likes it also."

Little bit was still using Nikki's belly like a pillow.

"I wonder how it feels to be fat." Tanja said.

"Well you can find out. Just stuff your clothes with pillows."

Tanja took the pillow of her bed and two from a chair in her room and stuffed them in her shirt. She seemed a lot like Nikki now. Tanja also started to push her blanket in her clothes and now looked like a great ball of fat even bigger than Nikki. She slowly waddled a few steps before she fell for over landing soft thanks to the pillows and blanket.
She giggled.
Then the door opened and Robbie and another boy came in.

"Tanja do you know were...." When he saw his sister on the ground looking like an obese girl he started to laugh and his friend also. After they were done laughing he noticed Nikki.

"Oh it's you. Nice too see you again. Denvert this is the girl i told you about."

"So you're the girl that's always hungry?"

"Yes i am."
1112122121222.title: Nikki sees a Wii.

11121221212222.content:
Denvert, or Den as was more commonly know, grinned at this. He didn’t know why, but he had always liked to see girls who could eat lots and lots of food. So it was no surprise that Den was more than a little happy to meet this little girl, the puppy love crush he was quickly developing showing on his now red cheeks.

Nikki blushed back. The boy before her was also pretty cute in her eyes too. He had short cut brown hair, green eyes, and sported a dark blue short sleeve shirt and blue jeans. She also couldn’t help note he was also a bit on the chubby side as well, not nearly as big as her of course, but she could see this boy was no stranger to food.

Feeding himself was the last thing on Den’s mind though. He wanted to see how much this tubby toddler could pack away. He kept his grin and said “Cool. How much can you eat?” He asked a little excitedly.

Nikki grinned slightly, happy to see SOMEONE wasn’t being mean about her “ability”. “A lot, I’ve never been full.” She said a bit proudly as she gave her tummy a slight pat. Little Bit didn’t wake up from this but stretched slightly and repositioned herself on the large tummy.

Den grinned even more seeing she wasn’t mad about him asking about her appetite. “Cool! I wanna see how much you can eat.” He said very excitedly. Nikki giggled a bit at this. As usual, she was hungry and was more than willing to show him just how much she could put away. “Okay. But you gotta find me something nice and tasty for me to eat.” She said.

Den grinned like a boy who had just gotten a new present. He quickly ran out of the room, with Robbie in tow, also wanting to see just how much Nikki could eat to. After a few moments, they both returned with
11121221212222.title: Denvert wants to see how much Nikki can eat

111212212122221.content:
A few bags of sweets. Nikki grinned widely as she knew this would't be enough for her.

"Can you eat all this?" Denvert asked.

"She can." Robbie answered. I saw her eating candy yesterday... "

"You eat it too Robbie." Tanja said flatly.

Tanja raised her arm and let it down hitting the tennis ball on the screen to the other end of the field.

"Out? What. Come in that was't out. It was miles in!"

"So what sis. I also eat some of the candy but not as much if her. You know that."

"Not really. I was looking around while you were stuffing your face. Remember?"

Denvert lifted his shoulders and opened a bag of wine gums. Little bit was still sleeping. She looked kind of sweet on Nikki's belly.
Tanja put off the Wii. Also a bit interesting at Nikki's appetite.

"Oke Nikki open wide!" Denvert said and took the bag of wine gums.

Nikki did as was told and Denvert let poured a handful of the wine gums in her mouth. Nikki chewed a few times powerful before swallowing it all.
Denvert got even more excited. Seeing how fast this girl was eating and he continued giving her wine gums. It did't take long for Nikki to finish the complete bag of wine gums.
Robbie stood up with a bag of licorice. Just like Denvert he poured by handfuls licorice in her mouth. Nikki had the time of her life.
Tanja looked interesting at Nikki. She had a strange smile on her face. She did't knew why but she liked this. She liked this very much.
Robbie and Denvert continued to feed her all kinds of candy. Haribo kinds of candy, mixed candy and more licorice. finally all bags were empty.

"Was that all. I'm not full. Not even close."

"Just wait we get some more." Denvert said while he and Robbie ran downstairs.

"Is't it a bit strange to never feel full?"

"Well i'm used too it. I always felt hungry."

"Do you think they can get enough food to get you full?"

"No. Not really but they can try right!"

A few minutes later the two boys came back with three bags of chips, two bags of cookies and five bars of chocolate. Tanja shivered a bit from joy.

"We already put two pizza's in the oven." Denvert said.

"You sure that's smart Denvert. I mean suppose she get's full then what do we do wit the pizza's?"

"Then we can eat them. Right?"

"Come on lets keep feeding her." Tanja said with a big smile.

Robbie took one look at his sister. He did't understood why his sister looked so happy suddenly. But it did't really matter. He was curious or this girl would be happy after eating this all and two pizza's.
Denvert already opened the first bag of chips and poured them in her mouth. Halfway the first bag Nikki said: "Wait a sec. hold it."

"You're full?" Tanja asked a bit disappointed.

"No way. But all those chips made me thirsty. Could you also give me something to drink while eating?"

"Sure. I'll be right back!" Robbie said while he ran downstairs.

In the meantime Denvert poured some more chips in Nikki's hungry mouth. When Robbie returned he had one bottle of Cola, one bottle of Sprite and one Cassis. Robbie unscrewed the first bottle and walked too Nikki.

"Open wide!" He said and put the bottle upside down in her mouth.

After about one third of the bottle was gone Robbie pulled the bottle out and Denvert continued feeding her. Soon the first bag of chips were empty.
Robbie ripped open the first box of cookies and pushed them by three in a time in her mouth.
Tanja walked over to the boys and took the bottles to give Nikki something to drink every now and then.
Soon the cookies and Chips were all gone in the huge gut of the girl. After that the chocolate disappeared just as fast. Tanja finished it by giving Nikki a few last sips of Sprite. Nikki burped loudly.
The others giggled. Denvert looked at his watch.

"Well those Pizza's are almost done. Come on Robbie. Let's go take them. Or do you have enough?" He asked and looked at Nikki.

"Not yet boys. Oh and also take something too drink."

The boys returned later with two Pizza's and another bottle of Cola. Nikki happy opened her mouth while the boys shoved pizza in it. After each slice Tanja poured some Cola in Nikki's mouth. Nikki was very happy. Being fed by her new friends.

"You already finished one whole pizza!" Denvert said.

"Well don't keep me waiting. I'm still a hungry girl that needs to be fed."

"Of course we do. Here we go." Tanja said.

Denvert put on slice over another and let Nikki eat it fast this way.
Slowly he smiled seeing how this five year old girl eat more then an average adult. After the last slice was done and Tanja poured the last of the bottle inside Nikki belched long and loud. The others laughed.
Little bit was still sleeping with her thumb in her mouth. Curled up like a little kitten.
111212212122221.title: Big feeding

1112122121222211.content:
Den grinned as he watched the bloated little one greedily eat down the slice that was offered to her even after all she had eaten already. He quickly grabbed two more, sandwiching them together and letting her eat it down that way. Very soon the second big pizza was resting inside the overly wide little girl’s belly.

Nikki let out a massive burp and placed a food stained hand on her big belly. Her shirt had long ago been pushed up by the large pale dome. It looked like Nikki had swallowed a big creamy white beach ball. The stuffed little one couldn’t help but grin in bliss. She had never eaten down so much in one sitting before. Her mother or someone else had always been there to stop her. However, her almost unbelievable gluttony seemed fantastic to her. Not only did everything taste great, but the feeling she got from having such a tight and round tummy was amazing. To top it off, her appetite and bulging tummy seemed to make her very popular and even bring her a cute little boy who, as far as she could tell, liked her piggy eating. She had to have more, and said so to the group.

“*URRRRP* More! More! I’m still hungry!” She shouted blissfully.

Everyone’s jaws dropped. None of them had ever seen anyone THIS hungry before. Even though in shock, they were still more than happy to see how much more they could feed her.

Robbie looked around for the next item to feed the hungry little bottomless pit before realizing that she had eaten everything. “You already ate everything we brought you.” “But I don’t wanna wait so long for my food.” Nikka said as her tummy let out a low growl, she wasn’t lying about her hunger.

Den thought for a moment as he said. “Maybe we should take you to the kitchen and feed you more there so you won’t have to wait.”

Nikki replied…
1112122121222211.title: They continue stuffing Nikki

choices: Time for Nikki to go home
11121221212222112.content:
"Nah i don't want too move."

"Besides i don't think little bit would like it if she moved." Tanja said.

"Well i don't wanna wake her. I'm glad when she sleeps. At least then she keeps her mouth shut and does't walk before our feet!"

"Come on Robbie we did the same thing when we were her age!" Tanja said.

"Eh guys. We forget we have a hungry girl here we need to feed!" Denvert said.

"Oh yeah. Well we get some food and something to drink."

The two boys ran downstairs again. Tanja went sitting on the ground with her legs crossed under her.

"I never have seen anyone ever eaten so much. Well except in cartoons maybe. But my parents normally eat one pizza for dinner. You eat two entire pizza's and some chips cookies and candy. Do you maybe have a second stomach?"

"Is that possible?" Nikki asked.

"My uncle lives on a farm and he told me that a cow has four."

"Well i believe i have one. But for some reason it never get's full."

"Well little bit likes your big belly. I guess it feels kind of soft."

She pinched Nikki's belly gentle. The next moment Robbie and Denvert walked back inside.

"Well what we have left are some jars of jelly, one jar of peanut butter and a few sticks of just butter and three jars of pasta sauce and some Spa orange. Of course we have still some pasta in the pantry but we first need to boil that before you can eat it."

"Please feed me?" Nikki asked with her sweetest voice.

Denvert already unscrewed the first jar of jelly and poured it in Nikki's mouth. Niki made a sound of pleasure when the sticky sweet stuff was poured in her mouth. Fast she started to swallow it. After a few times swallow the jar was empty.

"Now it's my time!" Robbie said.

He pushed a stick of butter in Nikki's mouth. Nikki liked Butter. She found it having a special taste. Of course her parents did't let her eat butter normally. But now she got the chance she took it.
Tanja already unscrewed the other jars of jelly. After Nikki swallowed the first stick of butter Tanja started to pour another jar of jelly in the mouth of the fat girl.

"Thirsty! " Nikki yelled.

Tanja unscrewed the bottle and poured some of the spa in nikki's mouth and continued pouring jar after jar in the mouth of her new friend. Giving her a few sips of spa after every jar.
For the peanut butter Denvert used a spoon since you could't really pour it. But Nikki licked every spoon full of the stuff clean.
After that Robbie pushed in the other two sticks of butter one by one. Tanja made sure she poured some spa in Nikki's mouth after every few bites of butter.

"All right Now for the pasta sauce! Or are you full Nikki?"

"Nope!"

Tanja could't believe Nikki still was't full but she felt a strange feeling hearing Nikki still was't full. She liked the strange feeling.
Suddenly her shirt ripped right through the middle. Nikki felt kind of relieved not feeling the pressure of her shirt anymore. In the past time her shirt had rode up making it look more like a bra then a shirt.
Tanja took the first jar of pasta sauce and poured it in Nikki's waiting mouth.

"Eh Robbie you do know that if she is still hungry after this... well we have't much food left."

"Well if she's still hungry after this i give up. She has eaten more then a whole family."

"But i hoped too get her full."

"Well you can't have everything."

Tanja emptied the last jar of sauce and after that poured in the last of the spa. Nikki opened her mouth

"BUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRP! Oops! Excuse me. That was great."

"Finally full?" Tanja asked patting Nikki's bloated belly.

"To be honest... no. But i must admit i feel more close to full then normal. That feels great. Thanks you guys."

"All right i guess we're done now. That was about the last food we had."

"Wanna play on the Wii?" Robbie asked. "I think you like Ben 10."

"After i've done on area you can. All right? Do you also want one time Nikki?"

"No thanks. I rather watch while digesting this food."

The two boys went playing while the girls watched and The little kid was still asleep.
11121221212222112.title: End of the feeding

choices: A teen from next door to babysit them
Their mother, shocked at the sight of Nikki
111212212122221121.content:
As the boys played their game, Nikki did her best to watch them. However she was finding it very difficult to keep her attention on the two as her big belly kept making her mind wonder back it. The feeling the large dome gave her was indescribable. She LOVED having her tummy this large. She watched as the white “balloon” of little girl belly moved up and down as she took in every breath.

Her tummy was extremely sensitive in this state but in a good way. She could almost feel every molecule of air wafting past her big, near beach ball sized, belly. She could feel the strands of her shirt that ripped open, exposing her belly but still keeping her chest covered, as she took each breath. And most of all, she could feel the weight of little bit as she snoozed on the soft and warm tummy. The weight of the little one was a bit much but she gave Nikki much more pleasure than anything else. She closed her eyes, the boys were just finishing off the level of their game. She didn’t see how this could get any better…

It was then the answer to her thought happened. Denvert had just finished and let Tanja take over for him. He was more than happy to as he himself was having a hard time focusing on the game. One of his greatest fantasies had just come true. As far back as he could remember he had fantasized about watching girls and women getting fatter and eating excessive amounts of food. So it was no wonder why the boy slowly walked over to where Nikki was laying and sat down by her big belly. He looked the stuffed little girl’s belly over and grinned. He could only hold back for a second or two before he consciously placed his hand on her soft tummy.

Nikki opened her eyes to see what had just touched her and blushed. She looked up to see Denvert with his hand on her tummy. The boy quickly pulled his hand back

“I’m sorry, Nikki, I…”

Nikki shook her head “No, it’s okay. I like it when people play with my tummy, especially when it’s big. Just be careful okay.”

Nikki said happily. Den nodded and slowly began to rub and explore the fat little girl’s belly, being sure not to hurt Nikki or wake Little Bit.

Nikki grinned and closed her eyes again. She was loving the feeling of this little boy’s hands on her stuffed gut. Granted she would have loved anyone’s hands on her tummy right now, but there was something about Denvert. She liked everyone there, but she really liked him, starting to really form a bit of a crush on the boy. Her thoughts were interrupted though as his hands stopped.

She opened her eyes and looked up at him, wondering why he stopped. She was even more puzzled by the fact that he was blushing.

“What’s wrong Denvert?” She asked concerned.

“It’s your tummy…” He said meekly.

Nikki raised an eyebrow “My tummy?” He paused for a moment, blushing harder, before continuing

“It makes you look....” “Yes?” Nikki said not seeing where he was going with this.

“I-it makes you look…very pretty.” He finally said very quietly as he blushed more red than he had ever blushed before.

Nikki grinned as her own cheeks turned red as well.

“Thanks. I think you look very hansom too.”

She said quietly, but also very excitedly. She was so happy to hear he liked her and how round she was getting. Denvent just blushed and went back to rubbing her belly again. However he couldn’t help but slowly stop and wrap his arms around the large dome of Nikki’s tummy, giving her a big hug. “Pretty girl” he said as he nuzzled her fat against his face.

“What are you doing?”

Robbie asked as he and Tanja looked back from their game. Denvert looked up with a big smile on her face.

“I’m rubbing Nikki’s tummy. It’s so soft and warm…you gotta come feel this.” He said happily.

Both came over and slowly began to feel Nikki’s belly.

“He’s right.”

Tanja said as she began to lightly rub and poke Nikki’s tummy. Soon all three of them were rubbing, poking, and lightly pinching Nikki’s stuffed tummy. Nikki was in heaven with all the attention her sensitive tummy was getting.

However all four of them froze as the door opened to revile…
111212212122221121.title: Someone comes in

choices: "Would you like to play a game?"
1112122121222211211.content:
Tina, the 16 year old from next door. She had dark red hair done up in a pony tail and blue eyes. She wore a dark pink t-shirt and blue jeans. She was a good friend of the family and often came over to babysit the kids.

She was currently shocked at the sight of everyone playing with the massive belly of Nikki. Her shocked expression however quickly turned to a grin. She had never told anyone, but she LOVED fat/to fatten children. Of course she would only ever do such a thing if she knew the child actually wanted to be fattened. She hadn’t found such a kid yet, but the sight of such a massive belly gave her a bit of hope.

Tina quickly hid her grin as she moved over to the group surrounding Nikki. All the other children quickly moved their hands off of Nikki’s belly and blushed a bit embarrassed to have been “caught” like this.

Tina couldn’t help but giggle at them a bit as she sat down next to Nikki.

“Hi guys. Your mom got called into work so I get to babysit you tonight.” She looked down at Nikki.

The poor girl looked more frightened rather embarrassed, unsure of what this teen would think of her binged out belly. She knew most adults didn’t like how much she ate.

Nikki was a bit relieved as Tina smiled at her warmly.

“You must be Nikki, right?” She said friendily to her.

Nikki nodded. Even this little motion sent a bit of a ripple through her stuffed tummy, something that wasn’t unnoticed by Tina.

“Well it’s very nice to meet you Nikki.”

She then turned to the others and asked…
1112122121222211211.title: A teen from next door to babysit them

choices: Switch too Robbie, Tanja and Tina
Some of the food is ready
11121221212222112112.content:
"Would you like it too play a game?"

"What kind of game is it?" Tanja asked.

"It's called eh... the feeder game." Tina said. She looked down at the faces of the kids. "One kid is being fed and fattened by the other kids. Only if that kid of course is fine by being fed and fattened by the others."

"Im fine with that!" Nikki yelled. "Please feed me!"

"We already did that." Said Denvert. "It's too bad but we can't continue since there is't any food left."

"Well that's not completely true. We do have some pasta left and some raw potatoes. I guess we also have some canned food."

"Maybe we also have something in the freezer." Tanja added.

"But we're not supposed to use the cooker so we can't make any of the pasta or potatoes."

"And i'm not able to open a can." Tanja said. "That stuff in the freezer of course also need to be cooked."

"You're not able to use a cooker... but i am, and i can open a can without any trouble. So i guess who is in for a feeder game?"

"If Nikki is the one who's being fed i'm in!" Denvert said.

"Me too." Said Tanja.

"Me too." Robbie said.

"Well i'm still hungry so go ahead feed me!"

"Don't worry i will make some food as fast if i can." Tina said.

"Robbie and i will help you." Tanja said.

"We will?" Robbie asked confused.

"Yes we will!" Tanja said and pulled her brother out of the room.

Denvert looked at Nikki. Nikki looked at him with a bit of mean smile.

"So you think my belly is pretty? Is that really what you think? Because my parents don't like it i eat that much and am a bit fat. They think about putting me on a diet."

"What? Are they crazy? Your fat is great! I like it!"

Denvert suddenly realized he maybe had said something he better could't had said. His face looked as red as a tomato.

"What? So really like that i'm fat and eat so much?" Nikki asked.

"So i do. I think your fat belly makes you very attractive."

"Well then you can help making it bigger if the food is ready."

"Do you think you can finally feel full?"

"I don't know. We can try right?"

Little bit made soft noises in her sleep. Niki's stomach started to rumble a bit.

"I can't believe your still hungry after all you eat."

"Like i said i never get full. I wish i could eat all day long. From when i wake up until i went too bed."

"Well then you would be soon a very fat girl."

"I would like that and i think you too."

"Yeah and you know what... I think Tina too. Did you see how she tried to get us too feed you."

"That's the first adult that likes my weight." She giggled. "This is gonna get fun."
11121221212222112112.title: Would you like too play the feeder game?

choices: They start brining the food up
She waits until it’s all done
111212212122221121121.content:
Meanwhile, in the kitchen. Everything was a buzz as just about every last scrap of food in the house was being prepared to feed Nikki. Tina was watching over the pots boiling on the stove. While Tanja was opening cans after Tina showed her how to do it, making sure she wouldn’t get hurt with the manual can opener. Finally, Robbie was washing and preparing the potatoes.

Tina grinned more than she ever had before. Now this may have seemed a bit much for someone making food, but for Tina this was a dream come true. She couldn’t wait to cook all this food up and watch it expand the little girl upstairs even more. Finally, she found a nice hungry girl who wanted to get bigger.

She also grinned at how egar to feed everyone seemed to be. She could already tell that Tanja was showing the feeder “spark” in her, and she knew Robbie at least didn’t mind watching Nikki get bigger. And who knew, maybe Tanja would start wanting to gain too. She looked over at Robbie and Tanja and asked

“Now, are you kids sure Tina will be able to eat all this?”

She wanted to feed all of it to her but knew that there was no point in making up all this food if Nikki wasn’t really up for it. She had to admit, the size of the little one’s tummy, already seemed pretty full. Both nodded in response to her question

“Yep, She’s still hungry.” Robbie said

“Ya. She can eat a LOT. ‘Sides she said she’s never been full before.” Tanja added happily.

Tina just grinned as she grabbed the first big pot of cooked potatoes. She really did hope they were right.
111212212122221121121.title: Switch too Robbie, Tanja and Tina

1112122121222211211211.content:
"So let's take some food to her already." Tina said.

"But it's not all done yet." Tanja said.

"I know. We first feed this to her and after that we continue making more food."

Nikki woke up from a 'Beep!' sound and hit her alarm clock. The beeping stopped. She stretched herself and walked downstairs if quietly if a kid of her size could. She just wore Her pj's but that was probably better since it was stretchy. She hoped her parents would't wake up. But if they did she knew some perfect hiding places in the house.
Her belly growled. Not so strange since she had just one piece of rye bread with cheese and one apple and some potatoes with just a small piece of meat without gravy or sauce but a lot of carrots.

"I'm almost starving."

She walked into the hall and waited. She would go too the hall and Tina would knock on the door when they were there so her parents would't hear it since they would probably hear the doorbell.
Nikki waited. She almost started to think they forget her when she suddenly heard a knock and opened the door.

"Here we are." Tina whispered.

"Sorry we're late. Tanja had trouble waking up." Denvert said.

Tina and Denvert wore normal clothes But Tanja seemed to still were her nightie. But she put some shoes on and it was't that cold.

They all got together in the hall. Tina had a big bag and opened it. It was filled with food.

"Well we can't stuff you so much if last time since your parents would notice that for sure. But we can feed you some food."

"Please just feed me. I'm almost starving."

"Find that hard to believe!" Tanja said while she ripped open the box of cookies.

One by one she pushed the cookies in the mouth of the young feedee. Denvert looked jealous but he saw that Tanja also had a smile on her face. He wanted to feed Nikki but there was no reason why he would't let Tanja feed her if she liked it too.
When the cookies were gone Nikki looked very happy.
Denvert saw his chance and ripped open the first bag of chips and started to stuff the little girls face. Nikki worked pretty well with him and opened her mouth wide every time. The bag was empty to fast for Denvert.
Tina already noticed how much this boy liked Nikki. She had a gift too know what kids wanted. She decided to let Denvert feed Nikki some more.

"What would you like to eat now my plump princess?" Denvert asked.

Nikki giggled with this new nickname.

"I'm really thirsty right now!"

Tina expected that and pulled out a bottle of coke and Denvert unscrewed to cap of it and turned the bottle upside down in Nikki's mouth. The cola was poured so fast in Nikki's throat she almost choke but fast she swallowed it and Denvert stopped.

"I'm fine! Feed me more! More! More!"

Tina reached in the bag and handed Tanja and denvert a cake. Both broke of lumps and pushed it in the mouth of the young girl. Nikki loved it and so did the two kids. The upper part of Nikki's pj's was started to rode up but no one cared.
Tina the took out a pie.

"Tina you're the best." Nikki said.

"I know." She said smiling.

Denvert careful shove the pie in Nikki's mouth. He almost lost his fingers so fast was Nikki chewing.
Then Tina reached deep in her bag and pulled out...
1112122121222211211211112211212212.title: Midnight feeding

choices: They successfully feed her the candy
11121221212222112112111122112122121.content:
Tina grinned as she pulled out a nice bag of candy. The bag had a nice big assortment of different candies both hard and soft. Tina grinned as she motioned for Tanja and Denvert to come over to her. Both grinned as she did so and obeyed.

“How about we play another feeder game?” She asked the group.

Everyone almost shouted out excited yeses and head nods until Tina shushed them. She looked up the stairs to make sure the parents hadn’t awoken. She grinned again and looked back at the children, who were holding their mouths and such but still beaming with joy at the idea of another game.

“It’s called “throw the candy in the chubby clown’s mouth.” What you do is unwrap your candy quietly then, gently, toss it into the hungry clown, or this case, girl’s mouth and see how big you can make her tummy.” She explained with a beaming smile of her own.

The three children grinned at the idea, especially Nikki. She couldn’t wait to be fed by all three of them at once. She could tell the other’s were just as happy to feed her as she watched them hurriedly unwrap the candies that needed to be unwrapped.

Tina grinned slyly as she was about to put her latest “game” into motion. She slowly walked over to Nikki.

“Now open your mouth REALLY wide…”

She said showing her how big she wanted Nikki to do it with her own mouth. She then rolled up her shirt a little bit so her already fattened little girl tummy could be seen by everyone.

“Now, if it’s okay with Nikki, we should all feel exactly how big and soft her tummy is right now so we know how big we make it.” She said, looking at Nikki for approval.

For the fat little one, there was no need to pause. She smiled proudly and nodded as she pushed out her tummy a bit. The others soon came over to get a good feel. Denvert seemed to do the most though, followed by Tina, Then Tanja. They really wanting to get a good feel of how fat she was. Nikki really enjoyed all the attention her fat tummy was getting. Especially from Denvert, loving her young crush’s touch.

Soon Tina pulled back and grabbed the bag infornt of her and opened it so it was large enough for everyone to get their hands inside it. The others quickly came over, not wanting to miss any of the game, and Nikki quickly opened her mouth expectantly. Tina beamed happily as she said quietly,

“On your marks, get set, GO!”
11121221212222112112111122112122121.title: More food

111212212122221121121111221121221211.content:
Denvert and Tanja threw the candy in Nikki's waiting mouth. Both enjoyed it seeing how the fat girl swallowed all the candy. Nikki herself felt like she was in heaven. This was the best. It felt even better since she nearly had eaten anything good that day and what she had eaten was't much.

"I like this game." Tanja said.

"Yeah me too." Denvert said.

"And me too." Tina said.

She smiled widely and enjoyed seeing the fat girls tummy grow. This was the kid she always wanted too babysit. She had babysit so many kids but none of them really wanted to get fat. Except for Nikki. Tina saw how much Tanja also enjoyed it and wondered if she also wanted to get fatter. She decided to think about that next week.

"How you're doing Nikki?" Denvert asked.

"Oh fine. Thanks for asking."

"This is so fun." Denvert said.

"Yeah. But i'm afraid the fun is over." Tanja said.

"Why's that?" Nikki asked.

"We're out of food. The bag is empty!"

"What already now. Wow Nikki you're a fast eater." Denvert said.

"Not really Denvert. We're just fast feeders and the're three of us." Tanja said.

"True but you must admit you could never eat what she ate in the same time."

"I guess not. I would already have thrown up."

"I'm still hungry. Do you have more?" Nikki asked.

"I'm so sorry Nikki but this is all the food i had for you. Today that is. Besides if we feed you too much you parents will notice."

Tanja and Denvert were feeling how much bigger Nikki's belly was and she smiled.

"It is bigger. Right Tanja? You should know."

"I think so. Why am i supposed to know?"

"Well you're a girl. My big sister and her friends are always focused about their weight and notice if the gain the smallest amount of weight. So i guess girls know if someone gained."

"Well that your sister and friend wanted to look like toothpicks doen't want too say any girl want. Right Nikki?"

"You bet. I don't want to look like a toothpick. I want to be the fattest girl that ever lived!"

"Well it will take some time until we're there." Tina said. It's better you three go back too bed. Oh and try to go too bed earlier. If i continue doing this you three will get so exhausted you can't keep your eyes open."

"All right. Bye Nikki." Denvert said.

"Yeah bye!" Tanja said.

"We see you tomorrow same time same place." Tina said.

Nikki waddled upstairs as fast if her fattened up legs could carry her and crawled back in bed. She listened carefully but did't hear a sound from her parents so they were probably still asleep.
Nikki closed her eyes and fell asleep with a big grin on her chubby face.

Nikki slowly opened her eyes as the sunlight streamed in from her window and creaped up to her face. She let out a big yawn, which was interrupted as it went to a nice big burp. She smiled as she remembered what happened last night.

She slowly lifted the covers up and peeked inside. She smiled as she seen just how much bigger her tummy was from her feeding. She could see clearly she had put on a good inch of blubbler around her midsection. True it wasn’t as much as she had gained from the group with her first feeding, but she was still happy to see her big little kid belly getting even larger.

She then realized it was fairly early in the morning. She could tell no one else was up. She grinned slyly as she knew she could probably get a nice big snack before breakfast was cooked.

She rolled out of bed and quietly, well as quietly as her fattened tummy would let her, and waddled down the stairs. She headed for the kitchen and soon she was standing in her favorite room in the house, almost drooling at the thought of having two breakfasts.

She opened the pantry and frowned. Her mother had given most of the good food to Tanja, Robbie and little Bit. She couldn’t help but make a momentary grin as she knew that most of that “given” food would probably end up being fed to her anyway.

Her big tummy brought her back to her current situation as it let out a nice big growl. She sighed a bit and rubbed her gut. Even with Tina’s feedings, she was still so unhappy that her family was doing everything in their power to stop her from stuffing her face.

She looked through the pantry until she found something yummy to eat. She reached in and pulled out…

1112122121222211211211112211212212111112.content:
They stood there in a circle around Nikki admiring the hard work that was put into getting down to this much smaller weight. Some clapped and cheered at the smaller Nikki, it made her happy to be liked for her smaller size. Not that is was bad to be big or anything, it was just getting hard to do things, simple things and that was becoming less fun to try to deal with as a young girl.

Slowly the cheers died down as a bag of chips was open from the back of the group, unseen from the triumphant, and much smaller Nikki. Nikki knew exactly what kind of chips it was from the opening of that bad, due to her little fat girl senses, and it sparked something in her something she thought she left back in the gym with all that belly fat she used to support. She felt her mouth salivate a bit hoping that she could devour that bag and maybe two or three more, then if she is lucky two big whooper meals and a quart sized super deluxe sundae milkshake from Spoons, the local ice creamery. she soon shook her self out of her small trance while she was trying so hard to keep to her diet and become a much more normal sized girl. That is when little plump Kimberly stepped up to Nikki shoving her slowly forming sausage fingers into the bag and shoving big handfuls of 'Papa Browns all natural kettle cooked potato chips' into her yearning maw. Kimberly, or Kim by her friend's accounts, was not much shorter then Nikki ad their ages were close enough, Kim being only a half year younger then her now much smaller friend; but though a few weeks ago Kim was skinny by comparison, she was now the little cute fatty of the group.

"Nikki, I don't mind that you wanted to be smaller, and you do look great," she took another hand full and downed it before continuing "With you being small, does that mean I'm the group fat girl?" she asked sincerely with a small greasy smile showing off her cute little braces as she took her hand and pushed up her round frame glasses swaying her hips gently causing her dress to swish back and forth a bit. Nikki looked at little Kim with gently happy and accepting eyes as she put her hand on her shoulder.

"Well as much as I wish that was how groups work," she paused to attempt to frame her next words properly "We don't have set 'rolls' so there is not just one person that can be fat." Nikki's smile got bigger with the finishing of her statement.

"Yeah but; you were the biggest, now you are not," She placed her currently free hand on the large spherical shape that sat round and tight under her soft dress "so does that mean I'm the new fat on?" she finished her question with a huge smile and a soft few circular rubs of her belly.

...What will Nikki answer?...

She was in her own little world now. The only thing she seemed to know were hunger, a desire to get fatter than she already was, and the fact that food was in front of her. Fairly fatty food, and quite a lot of it for that matter.

Linda was right about worrying about Nikki's shirt. And when she finished her fries and about half of the croquettes, it looked like it was strangling her body. When Nikki finished her croquettes and just barely started on her hot-dogs, she caused mild embarrassment to her mother. She ate a hot-dog, and the sound of about 3 sheets of construction paper being violently ripped if half sounded. A few other customers in the resturant looked around for what could have caused the noise. All of their eyes stopped on the fat butterball of a five year old, Nikki. Nikki looked back at everyone, then looked at herself. She looked at her belly in shock. It was uncovered, visible for all to see. Nikki smiled, proud that she had ripped a shirt, for the first time ever.

Linda looked completely embarrassed. She picked up all the trash and threw it in a trash can, came back to the table, and picked up the rest of Nikki's food.

"Come on", said Linda, "You can eat on the way home". She walked fast outside of the resturant and into her car.

Nikki got out of her seat, trying to not stop eating for anything. She followed her mother outside to the car, her fat belly making small jiggles in between steps, and big jiggles on steps.

Nikki sat down in the car and closed the door. She lowered the chair so she can lay flat on her back.

"Here", Linda said, setting the food she took on Nikki's belly.

"Thanks mom", Nikki said, patting her belly. A hot dog fell off her belly, but it was still in its wrapper, luckily.

"I really didn't see that coming", said Linda, pulling out of the parking lot.

"Neither did I", said Nikki, mouth of hotdog.

"Chew and swallow before you talk", said Linda.

Nikki finished chewing and swallowed. "I didn't see it coming neither. I'm still suprised I did that, ripping out of a shirt"

"That was the first time ever", said Linda.

"Yeah!", Nikki exclaimed, "I feel so proud of myself". She shoved a croquette in her mouth and chewed and swallowed it seconds.

"But we need to get you new clothes too", said Linda, "I don't think those pan-". She was cut off by the button on Nikki's pants popping off and hitting the ceiling. It fell back down after a few seconds.

Nikki smiled wide. On top of ripping a shirt, she popped a button too. It felt good that her belly was basically free now. She ate the last croquette.

"Exactly", said Linda.

"So where are we going?", Nikki asked, unwrapping a hotdog.

"Home", said Linda, "I know you probably like your belly being uncovered, but I'm not walking into a store with you looking this way, especially after what just happened"

"Ok", said Nikki, after swallowing the hotdog. She picked up the one that fell and unwrapped it.

"But I think we're gonna have some trouble", said Linda, "I'm fine with a shirt riding up a bit, it's pants I'm worried about. All of your pants are the same size"

"What are you saying?", Nikki asked. She ate some of the hotdog.

"I'm saying that we might not have any pants at home that fit you anymore", said Linda.

They arrived home. Nikki finished her last hotdog and licked her fingers. She rubbed her belly in delight.

"Come one, let's get you some clothes that barely fit so we can get clothes that do fit", said Linda.
