1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Perfect life

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Nikki sat there slowly rubbing her belly. Sure it wasn’t as good as when Denvert played with her tummy, but it still felt nice to have some attention going to the ever hungry dome.

She sighed a bit as she thought about her boyfriend. She couldn’t wait to see him again. She was so happy he stopped by and was even more thrilled at how good it felt when he played with her tummy. She had to get together with him again and soon. Hopefully with a feeding this time as well as some more “belly play”

Of course there was also someone else in her thoughts too. She was a bit taken with Nicole as well. She had to admit, she thought she looked extra cute being so large at such a young age. Sure she wasn’t as big as Nikki, but she was a pretty chunky. She wondered just how much that little plumper could eat….

Her thoughts were cut short as her mom called her to dinner. Nikki didn’t need to be told twice and got up as fast as she could, which wasn’t very fast with such a big belly. It sloshed forward and jiggled a bit as it bumped against her knee.

Nikki grinned as she waddled fairly fast into the kitchen, her massive belly sloshing about as she moved. She grinned as she seen the nice fattening meal of burgers and fries set out for the family.

She quickly took her seat and instantly began to dig in. She grabbed massive fistfuls of fries and shoveled them into her face. It didn’t take her all that long to demolish the large helping of the greasy fries her mom had given her. With out missing a beat, she began to gobble down the burger in massive bitefulls. She only paused to let out a “Mmmm” from the taste and a cute little burp, before licking her fingers clean from the ketchup and mayonies that had dripped on to them.

“More please mommy.” She said cutely, burping the word “More”.

Nikki’s mom didn’t look so pleased at this sight. She was hoping that the plateful would have been enough for her, but wasn’t so surprised when it wasn’t. She sighed and filled up her plate again, this time giving her two burgers.

As her mom was doing that, Nikki asked.

“Mommy, can I go over to see Denvert and Nicole tomorrow?” She asked very sweatly.

This caused her mom her mother’s mood to pick up a bit. She was happy that her tubby pre-school daughter wanted to spend time with the “sporty” chubby boy. Of course, if she had known just what the boy wanted to do with her daughter she might have had second thoughts about sending her to see him.

“Sure we can Nikki.” She said as she set the heaping plate infront of Nikki.

“Of course we have to make sure it’s alright with Denverts mom, Okay?” She said expecting her daughter’s attention.

However, Nikki was too hungry to care about her mother’s words. She was back at feeding her blimping belly even more food.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Dinner time

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
The next day her mother drove to Denvert's house. Nikki had a big breakfast and she hoped that Nikki would't eat too much at Denvert's house.

"I'm glad you like Denvert. I heard he does't have many friends around here yet. Except from Robbie, Tanja and you."

"Why is that?" Nikki asked wondered.

"They just moved two weeks ago. Denvert is new and... well it takes some time to make new friends when you're the new kid. I'm so glad you have a new friend."

They stopped for a big house. Her mother whistled. There was a yard around the house as big if a football field and behind that a small forest and she even saw a swimming pool in a corner of the yard with a fence around it. There were't many house around.

"Well that's nice. When it's warmer weather you might swim here."

Nikki waved around on her legs. She did like swimming. Swimming in the water made her body less heavier. They walked too the front door and she rang the bell. Denvert's mother opened.

"Ah come inside. Do you want some tea or coffee?"

"Well sure why not."

"Denvert is in that room." She said and pointed to a door. "Careful he his dad and a friend of his dad are training."

She opened the door. Behind it was a training room. The floor was soft. She guessed for when someone fell. Am long man with short hair the same color like Denvert walked over to her. He, Denvert and the other man wore some kind of wide white robs.

"Denvert train some with him." `he pointed to the other man. "You must be Nikki. I heard much about you. Hmm he was right."

"About what?"

"Oh well... just that you were a bit... eh..."

"Fat right. Say it i don't mind. I love the fact i'm fat."

The next moment Denvert kicked the friend of his father too the ground.

"Denvert!" His father said surprised.

"What?" Denvert asked.

"Nice kick. Some time and you're even better then i am. Now better go. You girlfriend is here. Never keep a girl waiting." He said with a smile.

"Cool." Nikki said.

"It's not. Let's go to my room."

When they walked upstairs she saw a door opened a bit and a small figure looked at her and after that fast closed the door. The next moment Denvert pulled her into his room.

"My sister Nicole." He said while he nodded to the the door.

Nikki looked around. The room was pretty big for a toddler. He had a bunk beds and a big desk with chair and a computer. A lot of toys were in the room. She also saw a radio, CD player and tape player in one. The most music seemed to be from Disney movies but she also saw a CD from Weird All Yankovich. There were posters from Disney and cartoon figures on the wall.

"Nice room you have." She said

"Thanks." He pulled some pants and a sweater.

Nikki turned around so he could get dressed.

"How's Nicole?"

"What do you mean. Good i guess."

"Well she i also pretty chunky. I wonder how much she can eat."

"Well you right. A bit more then a normal kid her age. Not even near how much you can eat but yeah she has an healthy appetite."
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: At Denvert's house

Nikki grinned at that a bit. She was happy to not only hear that Nicole loved to eat, but also that she was the biggest eater between the two of them.

It was then she sneakily turned around to see if it was okay for her too look at Denvert again. She was close, but off. The boy had his pants on, but his shirt was still off. The little girl could clealy see from his plump boy belly that Nicole wasn’t the only one who food enjoyed her. Sure he was the skinniest out of the 3, but was not the smallest child. It was then Denvert noticed Nikki stairing at him. He blushed and quickly covered his plump tummy with his arms. However, he slowly moved them away. For some reason that was beyond him, he actually didn’t mind Nikki looking at him like this.

Nikki too blushed at him. However, she didn’t look away. She didn’t know why, but she couldn’t take her eyes off her young boyfriend’s body.

“It’s okay. I-I don’t mind…” He said as he quickly put on his sweater.

“S-so what do you wanna do?” He asked, already knowing what her answer was, but trying to relieve both their embaresment.

Nikki grinned and was about to reply, however her big belly spoke up for her. The large dome let out a massive grumble for food. She grinned a bit and gave the big little girl belly a soothing rub.

She grinned even more, now a bit more slyly.

“….and could you…feed me and…maybe…rub my tummy?” she asked a bit lower than before, making sure no one else could hear them.

Denvert grinned at this. He was always happy to accomidate her in these areas. He nodded back at Nikki with a grin of a child that was about to do his favorite thing.

“Sure. Now what would you like to eat…”

Denvert lifted his shoulders. He did't really want to feed his sister. He liked Nikki and also liked it to feed her and he also liked her fat and her big belly. He liked it if Nikki would be even fatter but that did't mend he also wanted his sister fatter.

She had some posters from kids series like strawberry shortcake.

"Fine. Now go lying on your bed and open..."

She ran out as fast in her chubby legs could carry her and returned a few seconds later wit a CD from Weird All Yankovich. She put it in her CD player and turned it on and went on her bed and opened her mouth.
Nikki first heard some gong noises then the music started while she unwrapped the chocolate bars. Then the text started. Nikki started to feed Nicole the chocolate and listened to the music and understand why Nicole liked the music so much.

"Eat it. Just eat it! Eat it! Just eat it!"

Nicole liked this very much it was clearly to see while she fast worked down the chocolate bars.

He liked the song and must admit i was perfect with what they were doing and also filled Nicole's mouth with the food. Nicole proofed she was a fast eater. The dorrito's were gone in record time. Denvert didn’t have to think too long about what he wanted to do. He looked over at Nikki and grinned at her a bit slightly.

“Are you still hungry?” He asked her with the same sly tone in his voice.

Nikki just giggled a bit, not at all surprised he wanted to feed her some more. She nodded her head at him.

“Yep, I’m always hungry.” She replied playfully as she gave her belly a slap for his benefit.

Denvert just staired at the big dome as it shook back and forth. He was almost drooling at the sight of so much pretty little toddler blubber. He almost moved over to start playing with her already bloated kid tummy. The only thing that was able to keep him from doing so was making her big belly even bigger.

He took Nikki by the hand, something she enjoyed, and led the little one down the stairs to the kitchen. After checking to make sure the cost was clear, he began to load up with the last of the house’s snack foods. Handing her a bag of popcorn, a few more king sized chocolate bars, and an entire pie.

Nikki herself was drooling as she was led back up to Denvert’s room by the egar boy. She waddled as quickly as she could up to the bed and laid back down like Nicole had earlier. She simply opened her mouth and waited for the first of the candy stash to be fed to her.

Within a few seconds, she tasted a sweet choclate bar enter her mouth. She almost sucked it down whole as she piggily took in the coco treat in in a few seconds flat. She let out a nice big burp and simply said “More” to her pre-school feeder.

She wasn’t disappointed either as Denvert began to feed her the second tasty bar of chocolate. This one went down slightly slower as Nikki wanted to taste it a bit more. Of course her feeding didn’t stop there as the instant she swallowed down the choclate bar, she ws greated with even better tasting apple pie. She gobbled that down in only a minute or so, her face being covered in sticky apple goodness.

At this point, Nikki’s belly was massive. Both “small snacks” had caused her big toddler tummy to push out a good 2 feet from her pudgy body. However, both Denvert and Nikki wanted it bigger. He ripped open the pre-popped bag of pop corn and began to poor it into the chunky young poker’s mouth. Nikki just happily “drank” it down, feeling her belly slowly pushing out forward with every second she greedily ate down the massive feast of snacks.

Too soon, the flow ended. Nikki grinned ear to ear from her stuffing and let out a nice big loud belch, happy to have her hungry kid tummy so fat and full.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Feeding...part 2

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Denvert looked at Nikki's body. Her shirt rode up reveling most of her big belly. Denvert pushed his hands in her fat and loved it. Pulling and pushing at it. It was an amazing feeling.

"Eh Nikki?" He slowly asked.

"Hm hmmm."

"Can i lay on your belly?" He asked carefully.

"Of course you can." She said happy.

Denvert got up and crawled on the big ball of blubber that was Nikki's tummy. He slowly sank a bit in her fat and he loved the feeling and so did Nikki. It felt so soft and warm. Nikki slowly closed her eyes and so did Denvert and both fell asleep


"What are you two doing?" Nicole asked waking the two up.

"Nicole. You promised to leave us alone!"

"Yeah. Two hours ago! Besides mom send me over here too call you two. It's lunchtime."

"Two hours. Did we sleep that long."

"So it seems." Nikki said.

That was the best two hours sleep of my entire life. Denvert thought to himself but he did't said it loud. Afraid what the two girls might think.

"Lunch sounds good." Nikki said. "I'm hungry."

"You're really always hungry. Did you really never felt full?"

"Nope." Nikki said.

"That sounds terrible." Nicole said.

"It's fine i'm used too it."

"I wonder how it's like to be when you would be a princess and people will feed you until you're full." Nicole said.

"You and Denvert can join me at the table then. Together with Robbie, Tanja, little bit and Tina."

"I think Tina finds it more fun to feed you then be fed herself. Me too. I'm not sure about Tanja. She's not a real big eater but i think she likes it too until she's full. Maybe she wants to be a bit fatter. I think Robbie also loves it more to feed you."

"I they do, they may do that as long if they like. That's what the princess demands." Nikki said and giggled.

The three kids walked in the kitchen.
The mother of Denvert and Nicole was sitting at the table. Next to her was a very fat old woman.

"Grandma!" Nicole yelled and ran at the fat woman and hugged her.

"Hello grandma. This is my girlfriend Nikki." Denvert said.

"Really and what a beautiful girls she is i can see that!" Their grandmother said. "Come closer please?"

She looked interested at Nikki.

"What a nice young girl you are. It seems like you have a good appetite. I appreciate girls who don't care about their weight." She said with a smile.

"She does care about her weight." Nicole said.

"But she wants to gain weight instead of losing it." Denvert said.

"A great. I wish there were more girls like you." She said.

Nikki blushed.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Grandma

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Nikki blushed a bit. She was embarrassed about her eatings to this woman. She knew most adults she ran into weren’t very accepting of her gaining weight, especially if they knew she was trying to get a bigger belly on purpose.

However, that wasn’t the only thing she was blushing about. This was the first time Denvert had called her his girlfriend in front of anyone else. She was more than happy to hear this, but didn’t know how everyone would react to it. Fortiently, it seemed they were taking it okay.

The grandmother grinned at the three kids. She was happy to see her grandson was interested in a girl who wasn’t a stick thin anorex like most of the models she had seen. She wasn’t a gainer, or a “feeder” for that matter. She just held the belief, like many from her generation, that kids needed to eat as much as they could to grow up big and strong. She knew just the way to do it too.

She looked down at the three and “hmmmmmed” at them for a moment.

“How would you kids like to go out for a very special lunch with your grandma?” she asked them.

All three looked excited. Like most kids their age, they loved going out to eat. Of course the one more excited out of anyone was Nikki. She couldn’t wait to fill her fat little girl gut up with even more food, despite all she had eaten just a few short hours ago.

The older woman giggled a bit at their responses. Seeing their looks of joy was always fun for her. She loved spoiling her grandkids aand oftened gave them everything they wanted when she was around.

“Okay, well go out to eat…” she said looking over at Denvert and Nichole’s mom to make sure she wasn’t overstepping her bounds.

The mother gave her a look that it was okay as she looked through the pantry, puzzeled as to where all the food had gone.

The children cried out a “yay!” and ran over to get their shoes and jackets on, all three plump tummies jiggling as they did so. Their grandmother giggled again at this as she followed after them.

“Where are we going to eat grandma?” Nichole ask as she put on her shoes

“There’s a new big buffet that just opened with lots of food for growing kids.” She said patting Nikki’s head as she led them out the door.

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
They got in the car. Grandma started the car and looked at the three kids happy on a row at the backseat.

"So Nikki. Your Denvert's girlfriend. Fine to hear he finally has one."

"I like her too!" Nicole said happy. "You won't believe how much she can eat grandma! She can eat eh... a whole lot of food and she's always hungry!"

"Really? You're always hungry?"

Nikki rubbed her fat belly and said: "Yep. I'm always hungry."

"When i was young i also had a great appetite. Not endless but still pretty big. So i eat a lot everyday."

"I also do. But the hunger never disappears."

"What that's new place called grandma?" Denvert asked.

"The big belly buffet." She said.

"Well my belly will be even bigger then." Nikki said.

"Mine too!" Nicole said.

Nikki looked wondered at her. From just fat girl this morning she changed in a real gainer that wanted nothing more then too get fatter. Nikki liked the little girl. She was a bit worried if Nicole would maybe eat herself to the point of throwing up.

"Here we are." Grandma said.

She stopped for a nice house with in big letters said: 'The Big Belly Buffet' with a drawing of a boy and a girl with big bellies.
Nicole grinned widely while she looked around. There were't many people. Probably since it was a new place.
They took a table next too a window.
A nice looking man walked over to them.

"Do you want a menu?"

"Yes please." Grandma said.

The man gave each of them a menu card. The three kids looked wondered at it. Denvert and Nicole could only read a few words and Nicole could't read more then her own name.
Grandma smiled at them.

"Don't worry. I will tell you what they have. Oh Nicole this is something for you. Shrimps on a skewer."

Nicole looked happy. Since her mother once ordered a shrimp cocktail for her she was addicted to shrimps.

"For you Denvert they have also spare ribs!"

"Yummy." Denvert said.

"And what do you like Nikki?"

"Eh junk food. I like meat more then fish and i love greasy things."

"A here are small pieces of meat with greasy gravy and fries, And ill take the steak with fries." Grandma said.

Grandma ordered for them of course all were an all you can eat buffet.
Nicole showed she loved shrimps. She stuffed them with three on a time in her mouth. She ate just as much as an adult before the little girl was stuffed.
Denvert cleaned rib after rib but he was full even before his little sister.
But Nikki kept cleaning plate after plate and she was still hungry.

choices: Nikki can’t move on her own
She can move alright and leaves
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Everyone happily dug into their food. It all tasted great and because it was a buffet, they could get as many helpings they wanted. Granted, it wasn’t like a normal buffet where you were able to choose what you wanted from the rows at the middle of the restaurant and server yourself, they were still able to eat a great deal of food.

Their grandma had the least, only having 2 ½ servings of a seniors meal they offered. To her, this was a pretty big meal as she wasn’t the biggest eater anymore. Still she was happy with the quality of the food.

Denvert came in “second” as he was able to clear away a good 4 ¾ plates of the ribs. He was pretty hungry and loved the taste of the ribs he was serverd. He sat back and patted his slightly larger tummy. He wasn’t a gainer like Nikki, but he was still a fat and hungry little boy, especially after the work out he did today. He wasn’t a very active or athletic kid by nature and hated it when his dad forced him to move about.

Nicole was able to eat a bit more than her brother. She was a true shrimp addict and gobbled up plate after plate of the tasty food. She was almost eating them down at the same rate her new found inspertion was. However, she just wasn’t able to come close to matching Nikki and had to stop after just starting her 6th. She sighed as she sat back and happily rubbed over her slightly gurgling tummy. She was more than proud to have eaten so much and gained such a stuffed looking little tummy, her dress clinging to her fattened frame.

However, as piggy as both kids were, they were no match for the little ever gluttonous Nikki. She gobbled down plate after plate after plate of greasy gravy covered food. She didn’t even slow down as the shocked waitress brought her a 7th helping.

Soon more and more staff were called in to her help feed the fat little girl who didn’t want to stop eating. Both the men and woman of the restaurant were bringing her heaping platefuls of food and an incredible rate.

Nikki just gleefully ate them down as fast as she could. Her tummy at this point was almost beach ball in size and was even resting a good 3-4 inches on the table top.

Everyone in the restaurant was starring at her in amazement. Their grandmother most of all, completleny taken with just how much she was eating. Both Nicole and Denvert were happily watching this girl grow larger and larger with every bite she took. They were greatly enjoying this show.

However, they were soon aproched by someone who wasn’t so thrilled by it. The manager of the store angerly walked over to Nikki, who was just downing her 30th plateful of food. He did his best to keep his anger in check but it seeped through his voice as he addressed the table of hungry patrons.

“I think it’s time you left!” He said sternly, not thrilled this little fat girl had eaten him nearly out of business.

The grandmother nodded and Nichole and Denvert got up quickly, still coverd in souse from their food.

"I like you anyway." Denvert said.

"Yeah me too!" Nicole said.

They tried to hug each other what was a bit hard since the were on a backseat an thanks too Nikki's big belly. Nicole leaned against Nikki's belly closed her eyes and slowly she fell asleep using Nikki's fat like a pillow.

"Ah little sisters are the sweetest when they sleep." Denvert said.

"Without a doubt." Nikki said.

She looked a Nicole's belly that slowly moved as she breathed.

When the got home a car was parked in front of their house. Nicole woke up.

"Hey it looks like you have some visitors." Grandma said.

"Does Nikki have too go already?" Nicole whined.

"That's not the car from my parents." Nikki said.

The tree fast walked out curious who was visiting. they ran through the front door too the kitchen.

"Ah there you are."

"It was...

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Both Nikki and Denvert grinned happily as they seen who it was.

There standing in her baker’s uniform was Tina. She grinned as she checked the time on the oven. She had been preparing a snack (well more like a feast) for Nikki and Denvert. However, she was more than thrilled as the 3 children ran into the house. She loved how stuffed all of them looked. She was also more than happy to see the little sister she was told about was not only as plump as her little brother, but was even fatter!

Both Devnert and Nikki ran over to her and hugged the teen, happy to see their favorite babysitter had come over. Nichole was a bit more uneasy, as was her grandmother, neither having seen this girl before.
Tina grinned happily as she hugged both tubby toddlers back, secretly feeling up both fatty tummies as she did so. This caused both Nikki and Denvert to grin a knowing smile before they broke their hug.

“Hi…Judy (Denvert’s mother) never told me someone else was coming over” The grandmother asked, confused at her presence.

Tina giggled a bit at her reaction and expained that both parents had to leave on a work emergency and knew that the grandmother needed to get going soon. So they gave Tina a call to come over and babysit the children, after hearing all the good reviews from the naborhood parents, and Tina had rushed over straight from her baker’s job to do it. Tina then handed a note Judy had left to prove what she was saying.

Their grandmother nodded and said her goodbyes to the kids, giving Tina the same set of instructions about emergency numbers and such that the parents had before. Soon it was just the teenage feeder and the fat kids.

Tina bent over to the shy little girl before her. She grinned warmly and began.

“I guess this cute chubby girl is Nichole.” She said happily to the child.

Nichole blushed at her words, especially chubby, and nodded. Her shyness was already beginning to break down though around such a nice lady, especially since Nikki and Denvert were so happy to see her.

“We just came from a buffet.” Denvert said proudly to Tina.

Tina grinned back and replied.

“I can see that. I hope you’re not too full, because I got a nice big snack for you all.” She said more to Denvert and Nichole, knowing Nikki was going to be hungry enough for it.

Nikki drooled at this news and rubbed her tummy in anticipation.

“Nope I’m still hungry.” She said happily, knowing no one else would object to her enjoyment of being so fat and such a piggy eater.

She wasn’t the only one though, Nichole also was starting to get a bit hungier as well. Something that Tina’s feeder eye didn’t miss.

This way she fast was asked like a babysitter and every kid she babysat loved her and she liked every one of them. Even some of the most difficult kids seemed to act nicer around her.

This new child. She was't like Niki and surely would have a maximum space in her tummy but still... she was kind of fat. Something Tina liked.

It sounded like if she really felt sorry and Denvert anger got less.

"They're in love i think!" Nicole whispered too Tina.

"So? What's wrong with that i think it's really sweet. It's just calf love but still. Who knows."

"Calf love?" Nicole repeated not understanding what Tina mend with calf love.

"That means when two young kids are in love."

Nicole looked at the her brother and Nikki. Denvert called Nikki his girlfriend. She hoped Nikki stayed his girlfriend since she really liked Nikki. She even adored her and she wanted to become just like her. Very fat. With rubbing thighs, a huge belly with fat upper arms and some fat on her chest and bowl round pink cheeks. She wanted it all.

All 3 kids grinned happily at this araingement. Especially Nikki and Denvert, who wanted to feed/be fed by each other greatly, being in their puppy love relationship

Linda. Nikki's mother.

"Well not much. I only gave her one and a half pizza and half a pie, but..."

"I got nothing to do with it. The grandma from Denvert and Nicole took them out for lunch even before i got here. I did't feed her more then that one and a half pizza and that half pie. Really."

Linda looked at Tina who seemed to be telling the truth. She then remembered that Denvert's mother told her yesterday that Tina was very honest. When she accidentally gave her some extra money for babysitting Tina told her instead of taking it like most others would have. Anyway she let her keep the extra money as reward for being honest.

"All right i believe you. Where is she?"

"In the kitchen with the others."

Linda remembered how Nikki looked like when she picked her up by Tanja and Robbie so she was prepared so she was't so shocked when she saw Nikki but she was still wondered how Nikki was able to get so fat in just such a little time.

"We had a great time. We would like it to play again."

Nikki smiled. She was a bit lazy and hated most sports but not swimming... at least swimming just for fun was about the only kind of sport she liked. Nikki's body was very heavy but in the water her body was less heavy and so it was easy to move for her, and she could swim already.

It was then though her mother, with a hopeless sigh, brought out the tall glasses. Nikki knew exactly what they were going to have. Extra thick, extra fixin' filled, extra fattening ice cream sundaes. She was almost drooling as her mother set out everything for the family members to make their own.

Linda must admit that image Nikki in such a ballet suit it would be unbelievable skimpy and fat would be pealing out everywhere. Nikki finished her food but knew that however her mother would start the topic again and she probably would need to do some exercise. Without talking she finished her food.

The walked (in Nikki's case waddled) out too the car.

The rest of the day went on like most of late. Nikki pretty well did nothing but watch TV, eat, play with her big belly or some combination of the three. She was more than thrilled with this as those were by far her favorite things to do.

However, Linda was far less than thrilled with this. She spent the rest of the day trying to suggest more active things Nikki could do around the house to help “loose some weight.” The woman hoped that maybe her daughter would do something that would help slow the expansion of her young waist line.

Nikki wasn’t about to let that happen though, and made sure to avoid anything strenuous. She had worked hard to grow her big pot belly out and didn’t want her mom’s hatred of her blubber to ruin it. She knew she looked so much cuter with the extra pounds she put on and knew Denvert would agree with her. She could picture how her young crushes face would light up at the sight of her big stuffed little girl belly.

This mood carried over into dinner where the little kindergartner practically demolished the large meal Linda cooked for the family. She made sure no was getting seconds tonight and even snuck a few things off her father’s plate. She must have eaten a good 3-4 servings of food when you factor in the tasty chocolate cake she ate.

Soon, though, the little poker was in bed rubbing over her small beach ball sized belly. Tomorrow she’d go and see her grandmother. She grinned at this as she knew she’d be VERY well fed by her. She slowly closed her eyes and drifted off to sleep for the night.

This cheered Nikki up. She got a happy smile on her face and tried to get dressed a fast if possible.

"I already packed your bag. Some music, books, movies, paper and drawing stuff. That should be enough for as long if you there. Right?"

"Uh-huh." Nikki answered while she pulled up her pants. Since they went shopping yesterday the clothes still fit.

Nikki grabbed her bag and waddled downstairs followed by Linda. They just took Nikki's Jacket and went in the car. Nikki got on the back seat and put her bag next too her and after that they drove off.

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Dammit Julliet

choices: Hours later, Julliet talks to Nikki
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Julliet walked into her room, sat on her bed, and turned her tv on. Her room was fairly small, containing enough for only a bed and two desks - one for her computer and the other for the tv - which was appropriate, considering she was the only person who'd stay in it.

She held onto the remote, flipping aimlessly through the channels. She sighed; she could not get Nikki's weight off of her mind.

'It needs to stop.' she thought, 'She eats like she's never been fed in weeks, yet looks like all she ever did was eat. It's easily her parents fault. I bet they spoiled her enough as an infant and toddler that she thought eating a lot was a good thing. I mean, sure eating is good, but not in the excess that SHE eats in. It wasn't a problem at all last time she was her. Sure, she was overweight; had a bit of a belly, but it was no biggy. But now, she's huge. I was thinking she would just grow up more than she'd grow out, not the other way around. She doesn't set a good example as a kid or for who she makes her parents look like; it makes them look like they neglect putting a cap over what she can eat, and just let her stuff herself to sleep. It's just sad.'

She turned the tv off, seeing no point in keeping it on.

'Yet, Nikki looks so happy.' she continued thinking, 'Not the typical happy-go-lucky happy that all kids should have, but happy...that she's being fed so much, as if she likes it. But that can't be right, cause no kid likes being fat, especially THAT fat! I think I should talk to her about it.'

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Talk with Julliet

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:

She waddled into the room and sat on the chair by the desk, the quietly gasped at what she saw on the screen.

On the monitor screen was an open webpage; an internet article. The headliner was all that Nikki needed to see to keep herself from closing the page. The article was about people who wanted to gain weight.

Nikki did not like reading, probably because she always thought she had better things to do (like eating), but she was too interested in reading this article. Her eyes skimmed through the text, making sure she got every word; from the part about obtaining the desire down to the part about feeders and feedees, which really caught her attention.

"So..." Nikki mumbled to herself, "I am not alone? There are many more people who like being fat and getting fatter? I mean, I do have a friend who does, but I think she only wanted to get fat because I did. Denvert must be my feeder, and I must be his feedee, since he always was the first one to bring me food." Nikki continued reading, each sentance making her feel better about herself and her weight.

Nikki wasn't sure what to say to her, "I...I'm- I'm sor-"

"You don't have to be." said Juliet, "Besides, I think you needed to read that too."

Nikki turned her head back to the computer screen.

"Nikki...I'm sorry for questioning what you want..." said Juliet.

"Thank you..." Nikki quietly said, tears starting to swell in her eyes.

"I had no idea that there actually are people who like gaining weight..." said Juliet.

Nikki threw herself off the chair and rushed to Juliet, wrapping her fat arms around her legs.

"Thank you." said Nikki, "Thank you for understanding me!"

Nikki let go of Juliet and wiped her face with her arm, "Ok...is dinner ready?"

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Linda's car pulled up to the driveway of the house. Shortly afterwards, she and her rather large daughter got out of the car and walked to their home. Linda glanced at Nikki, wincing slightly at how much bigger her daughter's belly was. It wasn't by much, but if anyone could tell there was growth, it was definetly Linda.

As she opened the door, Linda turned to Nikki and said, "Well Nikki, do you think you might have a boyfriend?"

Nikki looked up to her mother and smiled, "Might? I think we'll be together forever!"

Linda smiled as she walked into the house, "I sure hope so." Upon stepping into the living room, she announced "Bram! We're home!"

From the other side of the house, Bram could be heard responding with "Ok!"

Nikki sighed, "What do we do now?"

Linda turned to Nikki, "What do you mean 'what do we do'? We just got home."

"Yeah but," said Nikki, "I meant some time later. Like next week or something."

Linda eyed Nikki's waistline, or what could be seen of it. Nikki's belly hung over her waist and made it almost impossible to see it from the front. Judging by what could be seen, the pants seemed quite constrictive (but of course, when DIDN'T they look that way?), and it didn't look like it would be long before some of Nikki's belly could be seen under her shirt, which also seemed pretty tight itself.

Linda sighed and muttered, "I swear we're gonna go poor over her clothes..."

"Hm?" asked Nikki.

"Oh, nothing." said Linda, "It's just that you seem to be filling out of your clothes again."

Nikki patted the side of her belly, "So we're going clothes shopping?"

"Some time tomorrow." said Linda, "Only this time, we're going one step ahead. We're buying clothes that are meant for kids that are older than you."

"For big kids?" Nikki asked.

"Well, no offense," said Linda, "but you're definetly a big kid."

Nikki smiled.

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Linda eyed a clock that hung on a wall in the room. 6:37PM.

'Hmm,' Linda thought, 'It's almost dinner time. Nikki already had dinner, and I really don't want her to eat much more than what she already has, but I don't want to leave her out neither if I cook.'

Nikki waddled to the couch and plopped on to it, causing it to shift backwards slightly. She picked up a nearby remote and turned the tv on.

"Bram!" Linda called out, "Did you already get something to eat?"

From the other side of the house, Bram called "Yeah honey, I did."

Linda sighed in relief; that meant that she only had to make something for herself. She walked into the kitchen and opened the fridge.

Nikki slumped on the couch, her boredom almost as massive as her body. She held the remote up in the air, pressing the up button constantly, flipping through the channels. Not one show she even recognized or thought was good. She sighed and gave her belly a soft little pat.

'Look at you,' she thought, 'getting bigger by the day. Mommy even said that I'm in need of some bigger clothes. I really wish we wouldn't go clothes shopping so often; I like wearing and tearing shirts that are too small to cover you.'

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
"Nikki, it's 8:30," said Linda as she walked into her room, "time for bed."

Nikki layzilly lifted the TV remote and turned of the TV. She had barely moved an inch for the two hours she sat on that couch. Actually, she seemed to have slumped even lower than before; she was now almost flat on her back. With notable effort, she stood up and walked out of the room and into the hallway, towards her own bedroom.




Linda walked into her bedroom. Bram was sitting on the bed.

"I don't know what I'm going to do Bram..." said Linda.

"What is it this time?" Bram asked.

"I'm getting very worried about Nikki."

Bram groaned, "You're always worrying about Nikki."

"I know," said Linda, "and I know that the doctor we went to said she was healthy, but that was weeks ago. Nikki's gotten so much bigger since then. I mean, look at her, she's growing everyday."

Bram sighed, "I know."

"It's just not natural." said Linda.

"Well, her eating habits aren't really the best neither," said Bram.

"It's not a matter of what she eats," said Linda, "it's how much and how often. She's always hungry and is never full, and on top of that, she'll eat almost anything she's given. I'm scared for her life, Bram, and I don't know what to do."

Bram looked at his wife, and saw tears swelling up in her eyes.

"I don't want to hurt her," said Linda, her voice starting to shake, "but I don't want her to hurt herself."

Bram stood up and stepped towards Linda, giving her a hug.

"I know," Bram whispered, "but sometimes, you have to do things you don't want to do. I think the reason she can eat so much is because you allowed her to, and now her stomach can stretch extremely. I think the best thing that can be done is to put a cap on how much she eats now."





Nikki stood in the center of her bedroom, wearing her pajamas. The shirt didn't cover much of her belly; the bottom button sat directly above her belly buttom. The shirt also didn't have any slack at all, it was perfectly skin tight. It's a wonder how none of the buttons popped off yet, though that bottom one didn't even look attached. The pants didn't fair much better. Nikki didn't even bother trying to tighten them; her large waist and thighs filled out the pants almost too much.

Nikki couldn't help but grin at this. She certainly wasn't going to tell her mother about this; she wants to see her body when she's about to go to sleep, end the day on a good note. She got into her bed and pulled the covers over her body. She raised a hand at the lightswitch and shut the lights off. She then turned onto her back and closed her eyes, blissfully rubbing her massive belly as she drifted off into sleep.

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Linda stoppd. She turned to Nikki, "Actually, I have a bit of a better idea. This is going to be my big apology to you Nikki." Nikki's ears perked. "You want nothing more than to be full. You're little friends like to feed you, and you're birthday is coming up. I could ask Denvert's parents to help fund you a special party. It will be all food. Pizzas, snacks, pies, pastries, McDonalds, as much food as we can get get, and it'll be all for you. Tina will be there to help out, hopefully she can bring some goods from the bakery, and we'll empty out our fridges for you. Once I put things in perspective for them they'll understand. Sweetykins, your going to be full! You're mommy promises!"

Nikki didn't know what to say. So she burst out crying. Crying tears of joy. The prospect of so much food was delightful, but what that wasn't why. Her mother, who had always done nothing but complain about her weight and eating habits, was finally supporting it, and for the first time in quite a while, she seemed genuinely happy. Linda unbuckled herself and Nikki and picked her daughter up, embracing her in a hug.

"There, there Nikki. Momma's gonna teach that mean old belly not to mess with her little girl!" She pretended to throw a few punches at the doughy gut, like a superhero on TV. Nikki's tears began to dry up as she and her mother forgot about the hunger pains and began to play Momwoman.

Bram was just serving dinner as Linda and Nikki arrived home. It was very surprising to see his wife holding up their several hundred pound daughter and fly her into the room like she did when she was younger (and lighter).

"Wow, you two seem happy."

"Oh we are, Daddy. Me and Momwoman fought the evil Dog Planet!"

"Dog Planet?"

"Yeah, it's a planet shaped like a dog full of evil cockroaches who drive giant dog robots! But Momwoman tied them all up!"

"Really?" He picked his daughter up, struggling all the while, as he looked at Linda with sheer surprise. "What's all this about, Linda?"

"Bram, I finally saw things from Nikki's point of view. I have never been so happy to be a mother! It's like up until now I've been babysitting. Nikki is our daughter and by god, I'm gonna make up for all the cruel diets I tried to put her through!"

"How?"

"I have this idea. It's a little crazy, and it'll probably get us and our friends in some financial trouble but it's for Nikki. You ready to hear it?"

"Of course. Nikki sweetheart, do you want to start dinner without Mommy and Daddy?"

"Okay dad."

"Be with you in a second, swety. Well Bram, it goes kinda like this..."

Linda spent a few minutes explaining to Bram her plan to help Nikki's suffering. He seemed somewhat concerned. Linda was surprised at this, he had always been so mellow about Nikki's eating. But then again,never before had it threatened their lives financially.

"I really want to do it for her. She deserves it Bram, after all my insensitivity about it."

"Well Linda, that is an interesting idea. Are you sure you think we can recover from it?"

"With some extra work, yes. I do."

"Well then, I have no choice. Nikki is getting a Banquet for her Birthday."

Nikki was sneakily eating her dad's steak when she heard this. She instantly ran out screaming in delight. "REALLY! HOLY COW! THANK YOU DADDY! THANK YOU!"

She gave him a tackling hug, and almost pushed him over. "It's no problem sweety. But you're birthday isn't for a few more days. Mom and dad will have to set things up first. Maybe Denvert's parents don't want to spend money feeding you so much." Nikki's eyes almost changed to a sad look, so he quickly recovered, "But it's no matter, because if they don't, we'll just put in some extra effort."

Nikki was so excited, she almost (almost) forgot to go back and finish her dad's steak. Linda and Bram gave each other a look. Both had different layers of emotion on them, but both knew one thing was for sure. Nikki would never be quite the same after this birthday.
