1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Was happy being so fat. She looked friendly at the girl. When she noticed Nikki looking at her she smiled friendly.

"Well hello. Who are you?"

"Eh... my name is Nikki and eh... i'm always hungry." The reason she told this was since she could see that the girl liked it to be fat.

"I can see that. You're pretty fat! No hard feelings."

"Well i like being fat! Besides you're also pretty fat so... "

The girl started to laugh and looked smiling at her.

"Well you're not the only one. I know i'm fat but i like it to be fat. I just hated that my clothes are so tight and rip of so fast. That's hard about being fat. By the way my name is Sandy. The also nicknamed me: Sumo Sandy."

Nikki remembered seeing sumo wrestling once on T.V. Not that she liked sport or watching sport so much but seeing so fat people was something that interested her.
She looked smiling at the girl. It was strange that in her entire class she never even met one kid that liked fat and since that lucky day they went for a pick nick and met people who liked it. First Tanya and Robbie and thanks to that Denvert and through him Nicole and thanks to all of them Tina. Well she did't really knew if you could call Tina a friend. It was a big difference in age but anyway they liked each other. Now she met again someone who liked it to be fat.

Linda in the meantime looked for some clothes. Maybe it was better that Nikki sat down. Taking Nikki with her could become difficult if she did't want too. Besides it did't hurt anyone if she sat down. She had some clothes for Nikki. But she still looked for some nice clothes for the party. Even while she knew they would rip during the party. Not that it was that big of a problem. She was good at sewing. Thanks to her mother. Always handy If you can repair you own clothes she told her, and she must admit she was right. Even without Nikki's expanding body that ripped of clothes and popped off buttons every now and then she and Bram also had some clothes that need some repairing and even Nikki had some clothes that needed to be repaired that had nothing to do with her girth. Mostly it did but not always.

"I'm glad my mother learned me sewing... " She stopped when she remembered something.

Why not asked her mother and father for help at the party? She had't seen them in a long time. That was partly because they lived very far away.
But they loved Nikki. Their first grandchild. They had never seen a problem with Nikki's weight. Her mother was really a grandmother with the idea of a child need to be well fed. They visit them sometimes. Maybe she could ask them too come over for the party.

Suddenly she bumped against another woman.

"Oh i'm so sorry. I was lost in thoughts."

"You too. Well me too. It's no problem. I'm Maxime."

Linda suddenly saw a nice dress with flowers and picked it up for Nikki.

""Eh... I'mLinda. Good! Well Nice to meet you. I need to get back to my daughter."

Then she saw Nikki with the other girl.

"Well. It seems our daughter's also met the other. At least I assume that's your daughter."

"Eh yes she is. What a nice daughter you have."

"Yeah. Sandy even has her own job. Her weight helps her with that."

"Really what is it?"
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Sumo Sandy

choices: Nikki asks if Sandy can come to her party
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
“Well Sandy’s a model.” Maxine replied, pointing back at her daughter.

Linda couldn’t help but let out a little laugh, before quickly stifling herself as not to be rude. She thought there was no way this child could be a model! All the children she had ever seen in ads or on TV were always thin and acted very cutely. She could see that Sandy looked cute but she was possibly one of the fattest girls she had ever seen.

Maxine frowned a little bit at the woman’s reaction to what she had said. She quickly relied to Linda,

“She’s models plus size kids clothes. It wasn’t meant to be a joke.” She said a bit miffed at other mother.

Linda frowned a bit herself. She wasn’t trying to make Maxine feel bad. It’s just she had never seen a child so big do ANY sort of modeling, unless it was for the before picture for a fat camp.

“I’m sorry. I’ve just never seen a child that size do any sort of modeling.” She said, trying to apologize for her comments before.

Maxine nodded, willing to forgive the mother for her earlier mistake. However, she had met the mothers of a lot of overweight children before and could tell that Linda was the type who wasn’t overly thrilled by how large her daughter was.

However, she could tell something else as she looked back at the two tubby little girls while she prepared her own pile of clothes for Sandy. She could see by the way Nikki was smiling and “showing off” her weight to Sandy, that Nikki did enjoy being so big.

However, both mothers put this out of their minds for a moment as they both had finally gotten enough clothes for their obese little girls. Together, the two mothers headed back to see Nikki and Sandy who, from the looks of it, were becoming fast friends.

As they arrived…
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: She's a model

choices: Ask if Nikki can become a model
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
"Mommy! Can Sandy come too my party?"

"Eh well. If she can sure. I don't see why not. Eh Nikki has her birthday party in a few days.

"Oh I bet Sandy would love too come. Won't you Sandy?"

"Yeah. She's always hungry mommy. So on her birthday we're gonna stuff her until she's full." She said with a grin.

"Yeah Sandy likes it to see people eat and get fatter. She always liked it. Since she was little. Well she makes a lot of money with her work."

Suddenly Linda felt like someone put on a light in her head.

"Say how much money does she make with her work as a model?"

"Oh well that's different. But the maximal money you get is $50,000 for every shoot. Of course she don't get that money with every shoot but still you can get a lot of money with just a few shoots."

"Say I was wondering could my daughter also model for eh... plus size clothes?"

Linda would not be very happy with Mary like a large size model but at the other hand she would become obese. Linda did't liked it but she already accepted that. If she could get money with her size by being a model. Nikki was't shy or anything. She would't mind showing her clothes to other people. Besides the extra money would be nice for after the party. At least then they still would have some money.

"Your daughter. As a model. Well i think she can. She looks good and they're always looking for young model's. For some reason not many mother's want their child to be a plus size model. But they do buy the magazines too find nice clothes for their kids. Hypocrit's."

"So you could give her a job as a model?"

"No not me. But my boss could. I sure think he will be very interested in her. How fatter the kid is how better. You know... big is beautiful or bigger is better. That's how he thinks. I could of course advice my boss to take you but i don't think i have too. I'm sure my boss will love your daughter."

"Really well thank you. It would be nice to get some extra money."

"Here is a card were i work. I'm sure you get a job there and here is my card. Then you can tell me when the birthday party exactly is."

They looked back to were Nikki and Sandy were and saw how they were playing with the other's fat. Both were giggling and seemed to enjoy it.

"That's so nice. They look so cute together. Maybe they can make a shoot together. If my boss takes you you could ask him. I'm sure he likes it."

"Yeah thank you for everything. I call you too tell you when the party is."

"Good. I see you soon. Come on Sandy we need to go."

It was obvious that Sandy rather stayed with Nikki but with a disappointed face she said goodbye and waddled away with her mother.
Linda at the other hand was thinking what to do now. It was still pretty early. She could try too already ask if Nikki could become a model but at the other hand who knew how big and fat Nikki would be after her birthday. Maybe she could better wait until after. At the other hand maybe he would't mind her being fatter.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Can Nikki become a model

choices: Nikki talks her mom into stoping for food
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Linda was pounding the question of exactly what to do about the modeling situation as Nikki was trying on her clothes. She could take her bloated little girl in now and make some quick cash. However, she could make more if she waited until her little girl was fatter.

As the woman pondered this, her mind interrupted with an important fact: she wasn’t getting a netting with Maxine’s boss until they met at the birthday party anyways. It was pretty well settled then. She would let Nikki fatten up a bit more before she brought her in.

The poor woman sighed at this thought. She liked the idea of collecting a check for Nikki taking a few photos for the ads, but hated that it was for her daughter being so fat. She desperately wanted her child to loose the awful weight, but promised to be a little more understanding of her love of food and fat. Besides, she wasn’t going to loose all her weight in 3 days…or any weight knowing Nikki. She decided just to go along with the idea and get the money, knowing her tubby little girl would be more than happy to show off her fattened body to the camera.

After about an hour of trying on clothes and finding only two things that actually fit Nikki’s frame, they paid for garments and were heading home, despite Nikki’s badgering to stop for a “little” snack at the food court.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Go home

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
"Well that was fun." Linda mumbled while she drove home.

"Mommy? What where you and that woman talking about?" Nikki asked curious.

Linda thought for a moment and decided she might tell Nikki as well. In fact they would take pictures of her. Then she also got time to think about it.

"Well you know that Sandy is a model. A model for clothes for fat kids. Well she makes good money with it so i was thinking. Modeling for fat kid clothes, and you're fat and don't mind, you like it if people take pictures of you so what do you think? Would you like becoming a model?"

"But i thought models need to be thin like in those magazines."

"Well you're right normally they do. But i told you it was showing clothes for FAT kids. Kids like you and Sandy. Because you're fat. I did't knew there were models for that or else i would have made you a model a long time ago."

"So am i model now then?" Nikki asked.

"No not yet. I want to wait until after the party since after that you might be way fatter. You know that."

Nikki smiled happy. Normally she could't wait until her birthday but now even less. She knew she would't get any other presents but being full for once was enough for her. However she wondered how much she could eat. She knew it would be a lot. There was one other big difference. At this birthday Denvert would come with Nicole, also Tanja and Robbie and Tina and Sandy. Before she met them she did't had any friends. Now she thought about it she noticed how lonely she had been. This was her first birthday with friends who were't family.

"What is it Nikki. You're looking so strange suddenly."

"Well i was thinking this is my first birthday with friends."

"Yeah. I'm glad you finally have some. I thought that that maybe could have something to do with it. You know eat because you have no friends to play with and eat because you feel lonely and want to fill it up."

"That never was the reason. I was just hungry. I mean if your kid is hungry you feed it. Right?"

"Of course but normally those children Don't eat enough for a whole playground." Linda said, but now on a friendly tone with a laugh.

It made a huge different for Nikki if her mother said it angry on a tone like if she did nothing then eating food or a friendly tone like she ate more but that was just how she was. Nikki liked this new change in her mother.

"All right Nikki we're home. Oh and Nikki."

"Yeah mommy."

"Try to still fit those new clothes at your birthday please."

"Nikki looked at her mother. She was very nice for her lately. Besides she could try to eat a bit less so she would't outgrow her new clothes. Besides she also would't like it if she would be naked at her birthday

"Don't worry mom. I won't. Oh and Mommy... I would like to become a fat model."
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: How it was, and how it has changed

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Nikki grinned as she got out of the car, watching the fat on her frame jiggle and bounce as she did so. Of course this was mostly in her belly, since 95% of her fat was in her big round belly. Of course she did have a nice big layer of flab over the rest of her body as well, and was delighted to see how it moved as she got out the vehicle with the clothes she just bought. She was so happy to see how big she, the soon to be pretty model, had become.

However, she was the only person out of the two who was joyful about this. Linda frowned at how much her big bellied fat daughter was getting. She might have acted happy on the outside, but she was far less than thrilled on the inside. She had to find a way to get Nikki’s weight down. I mean, she was becoming so big that even the fattest fat little girl clothes weren’t really fitting her anymore. She had to think of something and soon.

As they walked into the house, Nikki instantly looked up at her mother with a big smile on her face. It wasn’t just from her thinking about becoming a model or her upcoming birthday. It was from the fact that she knew it was time for lunch. Her belly also helped to indicate this fact by letting out a loud growl in anticipation of the upcoming meal.

Linda got the hint Nikki was giving her, and nodded at Nikki. Even though Linda was trying to be more supportive, she couldn’t help but let out a saddened sigh as she lead the tubby little girl into the kitchen.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Something else

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Linda pulled a pizza out of the freezer and put it in the microwave. She then looked at Nikki.

"It's almost time for your birthday. Then you will get stuffed."

"Mommy I'm really happy you do this for me. I hope i can finally feel full. I would like it to feel that for once. How does it feel?"

"It feels like you can't eat another bite. You feel completely satisfied and i personally can think of food at those moments. Everyone has that. It depends of how much they can eat. But finally they feel full."

"Everyone except me. Well at my birthday that will hopefully change. Then i can finally feel full for once. After that i can become a model."

"I hope that after feeling full you could try too cut back a bit." I would like it that you could also try too lose a bit weight after that. Will you try to do that for me?" Linda asked friendly.

This was a bit of a dilemma for Nikki. She was't planning on losing any weight. But at the other hand her mother would feed her at her birthday until she felt full and she asked so friendly she could't say no.

"Well... maybe... I can... but..." Nikki looked painful at Linda.

Linda smiled friendly and walked out the room. Nikki was glad she did so she did't need to finish her answer. She also did't really lied. She did't said she would lose weight only that she could try, maybe.

Linda walked upstairs. Fine Nikki never felt full and that she did't liked that and that she never thought of that before still it gave her a bit of a guilt feel that kept nagging on her. Anyway Nikki would feel full at her birthday. She promised herself that. But after that. Nikki always told her she liked being fat. But she could't really accept that. Fat was unhealthy. At the other hand that doctor said she was healthy.

"Do i let my own daughter get fat yes or no?" She asked herself.

Sure she loved Nikki. It was her own daughter. Her little girl. Suddenly she remembered when Nikki was born. A healthy girl with a weight that was about two or three pounds higher then normal but still a healthy weight. How Nikki was born and how cute she was. No one except she was allowed hold her. Else she started too cry. She drank awfully lot of milk. Other mother's were surprised since some of them not even finished their bottle. After she started to eat solid food she really started too pack on the pounds.

She remembered once seeing a report about a woman who loved her son and her son became so fat he was immobile. He died before he even turned thirty. She did't want that too happen too Nikki. Nikki was her only child.
Now she thought about that maybe she also needed to start thinking about taking a second child. Of course not to replace Nikki but a second child would be nice.

"But what do i do with Nikki. She wants too become fat and i want her too be happy, but i don't want her to be fat since i don't want her too die at young age. It's so complicated."

She wondered how it would be if Nikki was't always hungry. Maybe then she did't became fat. Who knew.
She realized she need too think about this again. She never thought about let Nikki become fat but as she was happy that way... but then she also would be unhealthy.

"I need to talk with Nikki about this again."
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Happy or healthy

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Linda slowly opened the door and peeked into Nikki's room. Nikki was lying on her back on her bed, with her shirt rolled up a bit so she could see all there was to see with her round belly with which she played with and jiggled. Linda sighed and opened the door enough to walk in, and Nikki noticed her.

"Nikki," Linda softly said, closing the door, "we need to talk."

Nikki sat up pulled her shirt over her large stomach and hugged it as if to protect it.

"Look Nikki, I don't want to hurt you. You're the only child I have and I want you to be as happy as you can be, that's all that matters to me. But you need to understand, I know you love being fat, I know you love all there is to love about it, but you must understand Nikki that you can't keep getting bigger and bigger like this."

Nikki's face turned into a very worried expression, "Why not?"

"It's...It's just not healthy. I know the doctor said you were healthy, but that was almost a month ago. You've gotten much larger since then."

When Nikki said nothing, Linda continued, "And to be honest Nikki, even if you're still healthy now, even if you're still healthy after your birthday, there's no way you'll stay healthy for much longer...In fact, I read a report about a mother who spoiled her son so much that he became immobile; he couldn't move. He didn't even live to become thirty years old. Nikki, I don't want that to happen to you, I can't have that happen to you. It just bites me whenever I remember that report, because when I do, I can't help but imagine that the same thing will probably happen to you one day Nikki..."

Tears began to well up into Linda's eyes. Seeing her mom on the verge of crying put Nikki into a similar position.

"But I...I like being fat." Nikki said, nearly sobbing.

"I know but do you really need to be this fat?" Said Linda, "You're obese Nikki. Even if you like being fat, you don't need to be this fat."

"But...I like being this fat...I want to get fatter..." Nikki softly said.

"Do you want to end up like that boy?" Linda asked. Nikki's eyes widened. Within the next few seconds, Nikki began crying. Linda sat on Nikki's bed and hugged her.

"Nikki, it's ok it's ok." Linda softly said, trying to comfort Nikki, "We can find a decent medium where you can be fat and still healthy. You will need to lose quite a bit of this belly here, but Nikki, I swear, you will not be skinny. You can still be fat, just not as fat as now."

"Can I..." Nikki started, starting to calm down, "Can I still get stuffed full on my birthday?"

"Of course Nikki of course." Said Linda, "I'll make sure your full before we start making you lose weight ok?"

"But I don't know if I can..." Said Nikki.

"Me and daddy can. We'll just cut off some of your food intake and keep you from sitting around all day. I know you don't like exercise, but it's not much, you can handle it."

"I will still be fat right?" Nikki asked.

"Oh Nikki, I know you love being fat too much. I will make sure you don't loose too much. I swear Nikki, you will still be fat. You will never be skinny."

"But...how much weight do I have to lose?"

Linda put a finger onto her chin in thought, "Stand up."

Nikki did as she was told and stood up on the floor. Linda took a good look at Nikki's belly and reached for it.

"I think enough weight for your belly to shrink..." Linda said, poking her finger into the side of Nikki's belly, about an inch and a half away from front, but still a good several inches from her back, "to here. That's quite a bit of weight to lose, but you'll still have some fat there. Like I said, you won't be skinny, I promise."

Nikki cringed when she realized how much weight she had to lose, how thinner she needed to get. Like her mother said, she wasn't going to be skinny; she would still be far from it. It just saddened Nikki to know that she's not going to get any fatter. But the more Nikki thought about it, the more fair it seemed to her. Most importantly, hearing that story about that boy did scare her. She wanted to get fatter, but she didn't want to die.

Chubby will have to do.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: She talks now with Nikki

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
The rest of the day Nikki did't eat. Strange. Normally she could only think about food but she lost all interest now. She just watched T.V. She also felt very calm.

"Nikki Your father and i need to go for a while. We'll be back late."

"Am i home alone?"

"No. Tina promised she would come in less then a half hour. Dinner is in the microwave. Love you Nikki."

Nikki continued watching cartoons. But soon she heard the doorbell and opened it. She smiled when she saw Tina.

"Hello. How's my favorite gaining girl?" She said happy.

Her smile faded when she saw a painful look at Nikki's face. She slowly stroke about her head.

"Oh don't tell me you had a fight with your mom again about your weight. I really hate it when that happens. But hey she will still stuff you at your birthday right."

Nikki lead Tina to the living room and both went sitting on the couch.

"Well it was't really a fight, and yeah she will still stuff me at my birthday. But it was't a fight but... a talk. You know ever since i told her i don't like being hungry all the time she really changed. At least she seems to accept it more. Anyway today she talked with me about that I like being fat. She agreed that i could be fat but not as fat if I am now. She once saw a story about a mother who fed her son so much he was immobile and he died before he was thirty. She doesn't want that too happen too me, and too be honest i also don't want to."

Tina remembered that report. She followed every report and talk show about overweight people. She looked sad at Nikki. afraid that she might lose her favorite gaining girl.

"So what do you mean? Do you want to stop gaining and lose weight and become thin?"

"Don't be silly. I will never ever become thin. I will always be a fat girl but i'm afraid that i will be not as fat if i am now."

"Do you wanna really lose weight?" Tina asked in disbelief.

"No but i don't wanna die before I'm thirty! I wanna become a bit older then that."

Tina looked at Nikki. A bit confused. Everything that Nikki told was the same for her. Both wanted Nikki fat but both did't want Nikki to die at a young age. Tina loved feeding little kids but also knew enough that to much weight could lead too death. She forget that part with Nikki a bit.

"I understand. I also don't want you or Nicole to die at young age."

"Well i don't need to reach the age of hundred but at least about seventy so i can see my kids and grand kids. Well guess they will also become fat. I like being fat and become fatter but my mommy was right in one way. I'm healthy for now but once my weight will become so high that it becomes unhealthy. I don't want that."

"Yeah i understand. I liked fattening you but i also don't want you unhealthy."

"What will Denvert think? And Nicole?"

"They both love you. They rather have you alive and thinner then fatter and death, and as long if you still stay fat he will still think you're attractive. Your mother said you would still be fat but not as fat if you're now.

"That's right. So I guess everything's all right. Oh besides. I'm gonna model for clothes for fat kids."

"I would like to see that!" Tina said.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Talk too Tina

choices: A little over half way through, she says her belly hurts
She eats all of the food, but feels like she's gonna explode
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Bram drove up to his house. Nikki was in the car with him, in the back seat. The seat belt rested under her belly, which had to be done to get it to fasten; it couldn't reach around Nikki's massive belly. Nikki smiled upon seeing her home, because she knew the party was being hosted at her house, and that her birthday was today. This was the day that she would eat more at once than ever in her life. This was the day she would be able to freely eat and eat and eat without having to worry about being hounded on about it. But most importantly, this was the day she was going to be stuffed, stuffed full. Stuffed until not a bite could possibly fit. Stuffed until her belly became as tight as a drum. Stuffed until she would reach her limit. She was finally going to be full.

The two of them had left to get Nikki a shirt and a pair of pants just for the party, as both Bram and Linda knew that Nikki would probably tear through her regular clothes by the time the party was over. This new outfit consisted of a baige pair of shorts that where just big enough to actually hold itself around her waist without constricting it. The shirt was black, so stains wouldn't be obvious, and was so much larger than her that it practically made her look smaller. Not to mention, when Nikki tried it, she felt like she was sort of swimming in it. Nikki wasn't wearing this outfit now - she was going to change into them when it was time for her big feast.

Being excited to see all her friends and the food, Nikki quickly unbuckled her seat belt and got out of the car the instant Bram pulled his keys out of the ignition and picked up her new outfit. Nikki ran, or whatever you would call it, straight to the front door and knocked it. Within a few seconds, the door was opened by a rather familiar boy - Denvert. Nikki gasped and lunged at Denvert, wrapping her chunky arms around him in the warm and loving embrace known as a hug. Nikki was caught in such a wave of happiness just from seeing Denvert that she didn't even notice everyone else screaming "Happy birthday" at her. Eventually the two love birds ended their hug and Denvert whispered "Happy Birthday" to Nikki. Nikki thanked him and looked past him to see everyone else. Her mother, grandmother, Tina, Denvert's mother and siblings, but unfortunately, not Sandy.

Nikki's smile looked like it would explode off of her face, "Thank you!" She cried. She then finally noticed that the table had been covered in cloth, and it looked like there were several things under the cloth. Nikki sarcastically wondered to herself what they were covering, knowing exactly what was under the cloth.

Nikki waddled towards the table as Bram finally walked in. Seeing Nikki closing in on the table, he verbally stopped her.

"Hold up Nikki." Said Bram as he pulled the large shirt and pants up so everyone could see, "Gotta put these on first."

Nikki turned to her father, "Oh yeah, that's right." She took the outfit from her dad and walked towards the bathroom to change.

Bram turned to the table, "So what all is here anyway?"

"Food." Said Linda, "Lot's and lot's of food."

"Nikki can't possibly eat all of it can she." Bram half-questioned, pulling the cloth off. The entire table was covered in plates of various food, several of which were sandwhiches, chickens, soft candy, and more other types of food than what could be counted. There were also several drinks of soda on a chair near an empty chair, which would be Nikki's chair.

"Nu-uh." Bram concluded, "All of this food put together would be bigger than her."

"That's the idea." Said Linda, "She wants to finally feel full. Since she can eat incredible amounts of food, at least for her age, without getting full, we had to kick it up a notch. There is no possible way she could finish this, but I wouldn't be surprised if she got at least half way through."

"Oh my gosh!" Screamed Nikki. Everyone turned and saw her just walking back in with her new clothes on, the shirt looking incredibly oversized on her.

"That's...I've never seen so much food!" She screamed.

"Well it's going to take a lot of food before you finally get full, so we got a lot of food. All for you." Said Tina.

Nikki grinned as she slapped her belly, "Well let's hope It's enough. I'm ready to see how much I can hold!"

Denvert walked to Nikki and she turned to him. He looked her in the eyes and whispered, "I heard what your mom is going to make you do...lose weight."

"I know." Nikki whispered back, "After she told me about the story about the boy who got so fat that he couldn't move and died...I got scared...I love being fat, but I don't want to die...I don't want to be without you."

"I know...I don't know if I can survive without you...but whatever, it won't happen, I know it. For now, you have a lot of food and a belly to fill. Start eating."

"I will." Nikki said out loud, "I will eat until I feel like I'm gonna pop!" With that, she immedietly sat onto the empty chair, tore off the leg of a chicken, and started her feast.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Fast forward too the party

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Nikki ate and had the time of her life. She was't the only one. Tina had taken a video camera and was taping every second of this. How the fat little girl would stuff her face and get fatter. Linda was't too happy about this. It seemed like Tina had some sort of sick fetish in overweight girls. But since it was Nikki's birthday she acted like she did't see it.
At the other end f the table were her friends each with their own piece of pie. Tina had taken some food from the bakery for Nikki and a few extra pies for the guests so everyone could have a piece. Except for Nicole who got an entire pie.

"Can she eat all that?" Robbie asked.

"With any other person i would say no but with Nikki you don't know." Tanja said.

"Too bad Nikki needs to lose weight after this." Denvert said.

"Well i also don't like it but her mother is right. Being too fat is unhealthy and can lead too... death. I don't want that too happen too her and I'm sure you also won't since we all like Nikki." Tina said

"Hey but what about me?" Nicole asked who stopped eating her pie.

"Don't worry. Your weight is't high enough to be unhealthy. I'll keep an eye on you." Tina said friendly

Nikki was happy stuffing her face. and she slowly got fatter and fatter. Mainly around her belly but also the rest of her body fattened up while another piece of food went past her lips. There was no sign of stopping or that she was getting full. But there was still a lot of food.

"Honey i was wondering... I mean it seems impossible but just image that Nikki eat's all the food then what?" Bram asked Linda.

"Nothing. Then she has eaten all the food. Listen I promised our little girl that today she would feel full for one and i keeping my promise. After that we will see."

She eats so fast. I wonder if she even taste it."

Tina heard this and without stopping filming she walked over too Linda.

"If she's gotta lose weight you could feed her extra fruit or vegetables. You don't gain from that. Or at least not much."

Linda looked up surprised. Nikki normally ate bread with a lot f chocolate spread or a lot of butter with chocolate sprinkles or sugar. Suppose she gave Nikki also some fruit. She was sure she could find a way too make it tasty. During lunch she could also gave some fruit and during dinner she could use some extra vegetables. Then Nikki would be at least less hungry.
She saw how Nikki slowly gained but did't do anything. This was her day. Besides she always ha been negative about Nikki's eating or the fact she liked being fat so maybe this was her punishment.

Nikki was halfway through the table. People were now getting the food from her and some times feeding her. The black baggy clothes she wore were getting tight.
Her belly bulged out further then ever over the edge of her chair and hung between her fat legs. Her huge butt hung of the seat of the chair at both sides. Her arms got slowly more flabby another chin was coming and Linda was a bit worried that Nikki at her young age already had enough fat on her chest to gave the impression of some boobs.
Tina kept filming. This was gonna become her favorite movie.

"I never knew Nikki could eat like this." Her grandma mumbled.

"She really does have a big appetite." Robbie said.

"Big? You can say huge." Tanja said.

"I hope it also has an end." Linda said.

Nikki was in heaven. She was't hungry anymore but also was't full. The food of the table was almost gone and she could see some guests stare in disbelief.
Suddenly her black clothes ripped and Nikki was left in tatters but kept eating. The last piece of food was a pie. Fast she grabbed it and ate it. Then she opened her mouth and let out a huge belch and finally for the first time in her life she felt... full. She felt like she would gonna explode. At least she was sure she would if she ate one more bite. Nikki thought a lot of her time about food but now she could't stand the thought of food. She must admit that even with the feeling she was gonna explode she liked the feeling of finally being full for once.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Finally full

choices: Nikki wakes up at dinner time, but doesn't have room for dinner
Nikki wakes up at dinner time, and does have room for dinner
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Silence fell upon every single person in the room after that impressive burp. No one knew what to think. Is Nikki full? Did she really just eat nearly twice as much as she has ever eaten? Could she eat more? Could her belly really hold more food, or has it finally reached its limit?

Well if Nikki could conjure up the power, she would certainly tell you. She ran her hands across her massive belly in an attempt to sooth it, even if it did feel incredibly tight.

"My belly hurts..." Nikki quietly moaned, "Please tell me there's no more food..."

That statement was all that everyone needed to hear. If Nikki's belly was hurting, while that was a horrible thing since no one wants to see her in pain, that meant that she was definitely full. Finally, the bloated girl received the greatest birthday present she could ask for - being full.

Appropriately enough, everyone in the room congratulated Nikki for not only having an inhuman appetite, but for also finally feeling the one thing she wanted.

Nikki hiccuped, "Did I eat all of it?"

"Yes Nikki, all of it." Said Linda, trying to sound happy.

Nikki moaned in pain, "Good...I can't eat another bite..."

Linda smiled. She thought she would never hear her daughter say that. After several months of always being hungry and trying to satisfy her hunger, Nikki finally said it. She couldn't eat another bite.

"Guys..." Nikki moaned, "I'm gonna pop."

Denvert walked towards Nikki, "Do you want me to rub your belly and make it feel better?"

Nikki looked at Denvert, "Please don't touch my belly...it's..." She yawned, "I don't want to explode."

"So Nikki do you like being full?" Linda asked.

Nikki looked up at her mother. "No..."

"Curiosity kills the cat."

Nikki shrugged, "It was worth it. Oooohhh, but it hurts so much..."

Linda walked to Nikki and grabbed her hand, "Come on, I think you need some rest after that feast. You did good."

Nikki slowly got out of the chair, "I do feel...sleepy..."

"Ok, let's go." Said Linda as she and Nikki walked towards Nikki's room.

"Uhh, can I talk to her for a bit though?" Denvert asked.

Linda stopped and turned to Denvert, "Alright, but only for a few minutes - Nikki's tired."

"I know." Said Denvert.





"Nikki, you were amazing." Said Denvert. Linda had just walked out of the room a few seconds ago, and Nikki laid on her back on her bed, still occasionally moaning in pain.

Nikki turned to Denvert, "Thanks...I just wish being full didn't hurt so much."

"Well you're probably never going to eat that much food ever again. But still, you did great Nikki. I honestly didn't think you had it in you."

"Well it's in me now...and my belly hurts." Said Nikki.

Denvert rubbed Nikki's belly slowly, trying his best to sooth his bloated girlfriend. Despite Nikki's plead earlier, she made no protest to this and gladly enjoyed the rubbing, as it made her belly hurt a little less. Just a little.

"Nikki..." Said Denvert, "About your weight...is your mom going to make you skinny?"

Nikki opened her eyes slowly and quietly answered "No. I'll still be fat...just not this fat."

"Well as long you don't die from being so fat then I'm happy. I can't live without you. If you have to loose weight to be safe, then do it."

"I just want to stay fat. I'm so glad mommy won't make me skinny."

"Same here." Said Denvert, "Well, you need to sleep, so I'll leave. Please feel better soon."

"I will...but I may have to skip dinner." Nikki softly said.

Denvert smiled. He leaned over and kissed Nikki on her chubby cheek and walked towards the door.

"Will you still be here when I wake up?" Nikki asked.

"Your mom and my mom are talking about letting me spend the night here, so I'll maybe." Said Denvert, "Anyway, have a nice rest."
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: The guests congratulate Nikki

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Nikki's eyes lazily opened as she gained back her conscienceness from her deep yet somewhat short sleep. She had only slept for a few hours, but that was all the rest that Nikki needed, and plenty of time for her body to digest the massive amounts of food that it was stuffed with.

Nikki yawned and stretched, then threw her bed covers off her oversized body. The black shirt was torn, but not too bad; just enough so that the belly was visible and nothing else. The shorts were still doing their job perfectly find, but they only appeared that way. The button looked like it would beg to differ. As Nikki got out of bed, she noticed something - her belly was jiggling again. It was tight as a drum and and ready to explode just hours later. Now it was lax and soft, like it always is, though Nikki could still feel some food in her belly that was still digesting or haven't even started digesting.

Nikki yawned as she slowly walked to the door, wobbling and shaking as she did snow. Not only did she just wake up, but she also felt heavier. Of course she would always be a bit heavier after every large me, but she just had more than what could be considered an ultra-large meal, so naturally she was going to become significantly heavier than she normally would, and significantly bigger.

Nikki opened the door and waddled through the hallway. She walked into the living room and much to her happiness saw Denvert sitting on the couch watching TV. It took Denvert a few moments to notice Nikki was there, but when he did, he granted her with a huge smile.

"Did you sleep good?" Denvert asked.

"Yeah, and I don't feel as full!" Nikki exclaimed.

"Good thing." Linda pointed out from the kitchen, "I'm almost done making dinner. You sure you have some room?"

"My tummy isn't empty, but I am NOT full anymore." Said Nikki, "And thank goodness I'm not."

"But I thought you wanted to be full." Said Denvert.

"I did...and I hope it doesn't happen again; I might actually pop next time." Said Nikki.

"Nikki with the way you were eating I honestly thought you were going to pop." Denvert pointed out.

"Well what's important is, she got her wish." Said Linda, walking into the living room, "She wanted to feel full, she got full."

"Is dinner ready?" Nikki asked.

Linda nodded with a smirk, "Even after a feast like today's it's still always food with you. No, dinner's not ready; I have to wait on the oven to finish cooking and then dinner will be ready."

"Ok." Said Nikki. Linda walked back into the kitchen.

"That shirt looks bigger than your others." Denvert pointed out.

"It is. Me and my dad got this shirt and these pants just for the feast."

Denvert chuckled, "Looks like the shirt didn't do so good."

"True, but hey, at least you can see this." Said Nikki. With that, she shoved her belly into Denvert's face soft enough for it to not hurt but hard enough for his face to sink in about an inch. Nikki recoiled back as Denvert became lost for words.

'That was...that felt good."

"Ok, dinner's ready!" Linda called out from the kitchen.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Some room has been made

choices: Later, Nikki and Denvert are watching TV
When sleeping, Nikki dreams about her and Denvert
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Linda walked towards the table with a pan full of sandwiches with chicken patties. As she placed the pan on the table, Denvert walked towards the table, and Nikki waddled. Nikki sat in the same chair she was in when she had her feast, and Denvert sat in one of the chairs next to her. He couldn't help but notice the creaks and squeaks that Nikki's chair made.

Linda sat down in the chair across from the young couple. The chicken sandwiches weren't anything big, but not small, just roughly the size of the palm of an adult's hand. There wasn't many of them neither, mainly because Linda new she couldn't eat more than one and maybe a half, Bram had to go back to work, Denvert's appetite probably wasn't much, and Nikki couldn't possibly have an empty stomach now. Nikki's belly made a few noises.

"Still digesting huh?" Linda asked.

"Yeah." Nikki confirmed as she placed a hand on the top of her belly, "But I can eat a few of these."

Linda shrugged as she took one of the sandwiches, almost on time with Denvert and Nikki reaching for one. Denvert wasted no time in taking a bite of his sandwich, but Nikki was almost halfway done by the time he did.

"Nikki, please try to eat a little slower." Said Linda.

"Why?" Nikki asked with a full mouth.

"First off, chew and swallow before talking." Linda commanded. Nikki did so and swallowed, then spoke up, "Why?"

"You always finish before me and daddy, no matter how much you eat, right?"

Nikki nodded. It was the truth; regardless of whether she ate as much as both her parents did or maybe even more, she would always eat fast enough to finish before both of them.

"I'm sure Denvert here would like to eat with you, and on the subject of Denvert, I don't want you eating these sandwiches so fast that you clean this whole pan before he can have the chance to have another."

Nikki nodded, "Ok." She went back to eating, although this time, she would chew a little more slowly.

"That's better." Said Linda before finally taking her first bite. The three of them ate for about a minute without talking. Within this time, Nikki started on another sandwich, despite eating slower. Denvert wasn't far behind, however.

"So uhh Nikki." Linda said, breaking the silence, "I talked with Denvert while you were sleeping. You want to know what he said about you?"

Nikki stopped eating and looked at Denvert with a blushing smile.

"He said that you are very pretty. He said that you have a cute face and that your belly looks cute on you too." Linda explained, "He also said that he wants you to lose some weight, because he doesn't want you to die of obesity. He said that he can't live without you."

Nikki put her sandwich down, got out of her chair, and gestured to Denvert to get out of his chair. He put his sandwich on his plate and he got out of his chair, the was suddenly greeted by flabby arms wrapping around him, an enormous belly pressing upon his torso, and a chubby face touching his cheek. Denvert quickly realized what this little surprise was and completed the hug by wrapping his arms around Nikki.

Linda smiled at this scenario. For some reason she thought it would be a long time before that loving embrace between the two of them would break.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Linda cooked several chicken sandwiches.

choices: Nikki wakes up in the morning - tells Denvert her dream
Skip to when Denvert has to leave
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Nikki laid in her bed in a deep sleep that had lasted for quite a while by now. Her feet were uncovered, mainly because her belly was like a mountain to the bed covers. Nikki's eating for today had left her very sleepy, even after her somewhat small dinner and the cat-nap earlier. This didn't stop her and Denvert playing with her enormous belly for a little bit after dinner. Unfortunately, her belly didn't sway or jiggle as much as it looked like it would, mostly because it was stuffed to its absolute max. Even when Nikki managed to digest some of the food during her cat-nap, the chicken patties she ate only filled the gap. It would take an entire night's rest before she would become empty again.

Luckily for her, she was sleeping. Genuinely this time. Denvert wasn't with her; he had taken a spare room that was right next to Nikki's room, but that's besides the point. Nikki's mind was flourishing with a fantastic dream, probably the best that Nikki would ever have.





"Would you like some more my big bellied babe?" Asked Denvert, "My fat fiance? My voluptuous vixen? My gigantic girlfriend?"

These questions and somewhat cute names were responded with a giggle from none other than Nikki, albeit a bit...ok, A LOT fatter than she ever had been. She sat on a stool, but because of her enormous butt, only the legs of the stool could be seen. There was another stool that was under her incredible belly. This stool was there to hold it up, so that Nikki wouldn't fall over, and so it could be used as a makeshift table, because there's no way she could sit at a table - her belly could reach farther than her arms could. Her head was practically glued to her chest, because of how fat her neck was. Her arms were so big that it almost seemed impossible for her to lift them, and her legs looked like they weighed as much as Denvert, each.

"Of course I want more." Said Nikki with a smile, "I'm a growing girl, and my belly is only getting hungrier." She gave her belly a loud slap to emphasize her statement, and Denvert placed a plate on top of Nikki's belly. If one was lucky enough, they could see that the plate was loaded with a tower of cookies, but because Nikki wanted to eat them, they were gone in seconds.

Upon finishing the cookies, Nikki licked her lips and said, "More."

Denvert smiled and placed a plate loaded with chocolate candy. Needless to say, Nikki inhaled them and repeated, "More".

"More? Do you want more my sweet butterball?" Denver asked.

"Yes yes! More!" Nikki exclaimed.

"More what? More candy? More cookies?"

"Everything!" Nikki cried. Denvert smiled and snapped his fingers. Suddenly, all sorts of candy, sweets, sandwiches, platters, just all kinds of food came raining down. From breakfast food to Hershey's candy to ice cream to pizzas to every single bit of food imaginable. Except fruit and vegetables - they aren't fattening.

Nikki's face formed into a smile so big it looked like it was going to rip apart. She dove off of her stool and landed on her belly in front of the food around her, and wasted no time shoving any handful she could get into her maw and into her belly. Every couple of swallows, one could see Nikki rising a bit. With each passing swallow, Nikki's belly got bigger, and bigger, and bigger, pushing Nikki up higher, and higher, and higher. Everything went on in a blur, but eventually Nikki managed to eat every single crumb before her belly had become longer than Denvert was tall.

Nikki rocked back and forth before she finally rolled down to her butt. Unfortunately, her belly was so big that it was all she could see - it was the only thing she could see unless she looked left or right. Suddenly, she felt like someone was pulling onto her monolith of an abdomen, but then she quickly found out what the cause was - Denvert was climbing her belly. She was able to confirm this because Denvert was looking at her from the tip-top of her belly.

Denvert smiled at Nikki, who quickly smiled back. Denvert then slapped Nikki's belly with both hands several times and said, "I know a cute girl with a big fat belly...Can you guess who it is?"

"ME!" Nikki exclaimed before giggling.

"You're so fat." Denvert said with an obvious joking overtone, "You're such a fatty Nikki. Look at you, you're made of fat. You're getting fatter and fatter and fatter. I've never seen such a fatty."

Nikki giggled, "I'm the fattest. Look at me, I'm a mountain of fat!"

Denvert giggled and slapped Nikki's belly, then chanted, "Fatty fat fat fatty fat fat fatty.."

"Denny, can I have some more food?" Nikki asked, giving him a "puppy dog eyes" look.

"Sure my sweet fatty, let me just get down from WOAH!!!" Denvert said before sliding down Nikki's belly. Nikki giggled, but then broke into utter laughter when she felt Denvert blowing a rasberry on her belly.

"Stop it!" Nikki pleaded between laughs, "That tickles!"

Denvert did not do as he was asked and continued blowing onto her belly. After a few seconds, however, he finally stopped, then got a somewhat dark look from Nikki.

"Denvert, would you please come back up here?" Nikki asked. Denvert look scared, but did as asked and climbed back up his girlfriends belly. Nikki then grabbed his shoulders and shoved his face towards hers, planting their lips together. The two proceeded to smooch and smooch for what felt like an eternity. An eternity of utter joy.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: The boy and his girlfriend, the "mountain of fat"

choices: Fast forward to when Denvert leaves
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Nikki sat up in her bed stretched, yawning as she did so. Her stretching made her pajama shirt ride up rather high; in fact, she had to pull the shirt back down when she was done stretching, and even then, it didn't even touch her belly button. Normally this would mean that Nikki was in need of new pajamas, but since she is going to start losing weight, the necessity of new pajamas wasn't as big an issue anymore. Nikki rubbed her eyes and got out of bed. Her pajama pants did no better than the pajama shirt, but that wasn't particularly obvious because Nikki's belly and "love handles" practically covered the entire waistline of the pants, but rest assured, they were in terrible shape. Nikki walked outside of her room and into the hallway, heading towards the living room and kitchen, she was stopped when she saw a door open on her right, about midway through the hallway. Denvert walked out of the bathroom, and smiled upon seeing Nikki.

"Morning." Denvert greeted.

"Morning." Said Nikki with a huge smile, "Den, you wouldn't believe the dream I had last night! I had a dream, where I was super-duper fat! I mean, HUGE!!! And then you fed me with cookies and candy, and then you made food fall down and I ate it all! And then, you climbed on my belly and called me fat, then you fell down and blew raspberries on my belly, and then we kissed!"

"Awww..." Denvert verbalized. He hugged Nikki and kissed her on the cheek, "Your pajamas look good on you."

Nikki blushed and sarcastically asked, "Den, does this outfit make me look fat?"

Denvert chuckled and grabbed Nikki's "love handles", "Outfit? I think THIS makes you look fat!" He sarcastically confirmed.

Nikki giggled, "Oh no, it can't be! It must be the outfit!"

Denvert tried his hardest to not laugh and carry along, "I'm sorry, but you are fat."

Nikki pretended to be sad, "Nooooooo!"

Denvert smiled and crouched so could hug Nikki's belly, pressing his cheek against the soft mass, "Don't worry; I think you looked cute this way."

Nikki pretended to be crying, "Really?"

"Really." Said Denvert. Suddenly, Nikki busted into laughter and fell onto her back, taking Denvert down with her, landing with his face planted on her belly. He quickly got up, but not without sharing the contagious laughter coming from his obese girlfriend.

Eventually the laughter stopped, and the two just looked at eachother, still sitting on the floor.

After a somewhat lovely silence, Denvert asked, "Your belly empty yet?"

Nikki rubbed her stomach, "Yeah, there's no food in my tummy now...and I'm hungry."

Denvert laughed, "Where have I heard that before?"
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Nikki wakes up in the morning - tells Denvert h...

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
"Bye!" Denvert called as he waved his hand at Nikki, getting in the passenger seat of his mother's car. Nikki stood just outside the front door of her house, waving back at him, her chubby arm wobbling with the movement. Her mother stood next to her and waved goodbye as well, both of them smiling.

When the car drove out and vanished from eyesight and eventually earshot, Nikki sighed. She didn't like being away from Denvert.

Linda looked down at Nikki, "Well, I guess we can start now."

Nikki looked up at her mother, "Start what?"

Linda crouched and patted Nikki's belly, "You know what I mean."

Nikki looked down at her belly and held it with her hands. Even though she was plump everywhere, her hands looked very small right next to the massive blob of body fat that occupied her frontal midsection. Sticking out about a foot and a half, and hanging over her waistline, covering a good few inches of her large thighs. Between her obviously oversized frame, and the difficulty her clothing had to cover it, anyone could see that this child known as Nikki was an embodiment of Childhood Obesity.

And she was standing outside for all to see in broad daylight.

"Wait." Nikki finally said, "What about me being a model?"

Linda thought about it for a second and softly asked, "What about it?" Nikki sighed, and Linda spoke again, "Let's go back inside." With the command, Nikki followed her back into the house.

The two sat on the living room couch to have the ultimate discussion on Nikki's weight.

Linda sighed, "Nikki, look, I don't think you should become a model."

"Why?" Nikki asked.

"Because...well...you're so young. You're not even in school yet. I don't feel that it would be good for you. And even worse, you'll be encouraged to get even fatter than you are now. Nikki, if I let you keep eating like you've always been, you would probably become immobile by the end of the month. You're too fat already, and I don't want to lose you to it."

Nikki said nothing and looked down. Linda motioned towards Nikki and gave her a hug.

She lowered her voice to a whisper and said, "Besides, school's starting for you next month. It would be illegal for me to keep you out of it. And even worse, there's one thing I won't be able to keep you from in school."

"What?" Nikki asked.

"Even if you lost a good fifty or so of your extra pounds, you'll still be fat, and you will be made fun of. Kids will laugh at you, be mean to you, and if you were to go to school at this size, I couldn't even imagine how bad it would be."

"Ok." Nikki softly said as she broke the hug, "So what will I eat now?"

"Healthier food. Less sweets and sodas." Said Linda, "And you'll have to move around more. Walk laps around in the back yard."

Nikki sighed, prompting a frown from her mother.

"Nikki, I'm sorry, but I have to do this." Said Linda, "If being fat wasn't unhealthy, I'd let you get fat until your heart's content. Unfortunately, it is, especially when you're this size, so I have to do what I must do as a parent. I hope you understand."

Nikki nodded.

"Ok." Said Linda, "I'm glad you do. Now that we have this cleared up, we can start trimming you down a little. There's a scale in the bathroom, let's see how much you weigh."
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: The beginning of losing

choices: Nikki plays with her belly to kill time
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Nikki slowly stepped on the digital scale in the bathroom. From Linda's point of view, she could see the entire scale, aside from it being under Nikki's feet. From Nikki's point of view, there was no scale to see - her belly obstructed her vision enough to hide the scale, and therefore, the numbers, from her.

The screen of the scale, just inches away from Nikki's toes, flashed with a solitary black line moving from one side to the other. It did this several times, until the screen flashed one final time and gave the result of its calculations. One would expect this number on a somewhat overweight adult, but when Nikki stepped on the scale, the scale responded with a whopping and frightening 252.4 pounds. The only possible way that such a number would be healthy for even a middle aged man would be if he was at least six feet tall and if the extra 50 or so pounds were muscle. This obviously wasn't the case for Nikki, as the extra 200 plus pounds were all pure, sloshy, heavy, body fat.

Linda cringed at the sight of such a high number, but wasn't particularly surprised. The only relief she had from the number was the fact that it wasn't any higher; she was expecting her daughter to be at least 260. Nikki stepped off the scale and was able to see her weight for a brief moment before the scale erased it. Unfortunately, she didn't know what the numbers meant.

"So what did that say?" Nikki asked.

Linda sighed, "Right now, you weigh two hundred and fifty two pounds. That's...that's much heavier than your father."

Nikki wasn't surprised - she knew she was heavier than both of her parents. Separately at least.

"That's very heavy Nikki, heavier than most adults." Said Linda, "It's all my fault to."

Nikki's face turned to sorrow, "Why?"

"I...I deliberately let you eat as much as you wanted whenever you wanted." Linda explained, "I blindly let you stuff your face whenever you could. Not once made you eat any healthy foods - just pizzas and burgers and junk food."

"And...Denvert, Tanja, and Robbie uh...fed me a lot too." Nikki added.

"That too." Linda sighed, "Your eating has been out of control for such a long time, and your has been increasing and your body has been expanding and..." she sighed again, "You were so spoiled that I can barely comprehend it. You were so fat - are so fat, actually - and happy; that was the only reason I didn't do anything - you were happy."

Nikki nodded.

"But it's in the past now. Your weight is getting out of hand." Said Linda, "Just look at how slowly you walked through the house. You weren't too slow, but you walked with much more ease weeks ago. It's come to that time Nikki, your weight is starting to get the best of you. We can't let that happen."

Nikki nodded and smiled.

"And don't worry, I already promised that you can still be fat." Linda assured. She knelt down and gave Nikki's belly a soft pinch, "You can still be my tubby little angel, just not a walking blob. Ok?"

Linda's playing made Nikki giggle for a few seconds. In between her giggles she said, "Ok."

"Alright. It's almost time for lunch, so I'll get right to cooking." Said Linda, "You just do whatever until I'm done."
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: A whopping two and a half hundred

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Nikki went sitting on the couch. She looked at her huge belly. She really liked it. She was sad she would lose it but knew she would lose it. If she would't do it on her own her mother would force her else in one way or another. But at least her mother only did it too help her and she still would let her be fat. That did made her feel a bit better.

"Well if i'm gonna lose it... I could just play with it. Before I can't do it anymore."

She lifted her shirt and started to play with her belly. It was so huge that it felt so good. So soft and warm. She liked the pushing, rubbing and pulling it.
She was so lost in it she did't even heard the doorbell. When she heard someone coming into the room she lowered her shirt and looked up.
A man with a white beard and a friendly smiled walked in. Followed by sumo Sandy and her mother and Linda behind them.

"Well i'm not sure..." Linda was saying.

But the man ignored what she said and looked interested at Nikki. His smile got wider.

"Well she's perfect. I wish you had told about her earlier."

"Hello Linda." Sumo Sandy's mother said. "Sorry we could't come at the party something important came between it but i did recommended you by the big boss. He even wanted to see Nikki for himself and since he had a free afternoon he decided too come. I tried to call you but the number i got must have been wrong."

"Well i thought again about this modeling... I'm not sure i want to do this. I want that Nikki is gonna lose weight and you want her to be fat. Besides school is starting and I don't want her to miss school because of a photo shoot."

'Miss you have nothing too worry about. I understand you concern but don't worry. I don't need your daughter to become bigger. She's big enough all ready. But listen I know what your thinking. It's normal you're thinking those things. But i have models of all sizes. Some are chubby, some fat, some obese or even bigger. If Nikki does lose weight like you say don't worry. I can use smaller clothes on her. It will take a long time until she becomes too thin for my clothes."

"I never gonna be thin! I'm gonna stay fat. Maybe not obese but I'm gonna stay fat!" Nikki said.

"You also don't have to worry about school. We can have photo shoots after school or in weekends or vacations and it's not like we have a photo shoot every day."

"Well I'm still not sure about it." Linda said.

She did say no too Nikki but now those reasons did't matter anymore. But still she did't know if she wanted to let everyone see she had a hugely fat daughter.

"Of course we pay you. I already have some ideas for great photo's."

"How much is that?" Susan asked still not sure.

"Well that depends on the shoot of course and experience. Since she's new i think $30,000. For the first shoot."

Linda who just took a sip of her energy drink started to cough. She looked with wide open eyes at the man. She was shocked. If Nikki could made such much money with one shoot.

"You don't seem too pleased . All right we make it $35,000 then. How's that."

"Well... " Linda said.

Linda was thinking fast. Fine she was unsure about this modeling but Nikki could still lose weight, would't miss school and would make a lot of money. Whatever would happen too Nikki that money would be very handy. Maybe for college if Nikki ever went too college of course. But even if she did't so much money was always welcome. Too buy a house or a car and who knew what else. Especially if she put it on the bank until Nikki would be eighteen.

"So she does't need to gain. She can lose weight."

"Sure miss. Besides before she's too skinny for my clothes she needs too lose a lot of weight. If she does starts too lose too much i will let you know."

"Tell me when she can and when not and I will make sure she won't miss a second of school. So what do you say. Can you daughter become a model?"
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: You don't need to worry

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Linda thought long and hard about it. She honestly didn't like the idea of Nikki becoming a model, but she was given several reasons as to why it would be a good idea, and Nikki seemed to like it anyway. Besides, with the money, she'll be able to pay Denvert's parents back for making them spend so much money on food - and even then, she'll have lots of money left over.

"Are you sure that she won't miss a day of school?" Linda asked, looking for a confirmation.

"She's your daughter, so you tell us when we can work or not." Said the man.

"And Nikki, are you sure you want to do this?" Linda asked, turning to Nikki. Nikki gave a big smile and nodded. Linda turned back to the man and sighed, "Then it's a deal."

The man smiled, "Good, good." He pulled a card from his pocket, "There's a phone number and address here. We should have everything ready by tomorrow, but if you want to wait then it's fine. Give us a call when you two are ready."

Linda tried her hardest to smile, bringing up a half smirk, "Ok. Nice to meet you...eh..."

"Mr. Mason." Said the man, sticking out his hand for a handshake that Linda accepted, "Nice to meet you too Mrs...Glemcer right?"

Linda nodded.

The handshake between them broke, "Well I hope we can see you and your daughter again very soon Mrs. Glemcer" He turned and walked towards the door, leaving the house.

Sandy looked at her mom excitedly, "Mommy, can I stay here with Nikki?"

Sandy's mother smiled, "Well first you have to ask her mother. Linda, is it ok?"

"Of course," Said Linda, "we could really use the company. Especially Nikki, she usually is the visitor rather than the visited."

"Alright." Said Sandy's mom, "I'll pick you up tomorrow morning ok honey?" She asked her daughter.

"Ok!" Said Sandy. She then happily waddled quickly to Nikki, who wore a rather wide smile, "This is going to be so much fun!" Sandy whispered, "We'll play together, sumo wrestle together, and eat lots of food together too!"

"Uhh..." Nikki verbalized, "Come with me, I'll tell you." She got up and walked down the hallway to her room, but Sandy stayed behind for a few seconds to say goodbye to her mother.





"I'm going to lose weight." Said Nikki. She and Sandy sat on the floor of her room, and due to Nikki's statement, Sandy looked sad.

"Why?" She asked.

"My mom's scared. She thinks that I'll get too fat to move and that I'll.....well...die." Nikki explained.

"You're going to be skinny?" Sandy asked.

"Oh no!" Said Nikki, "I will never be skinny!" She pulled up her shirt and grabbed her massive belly, "See this? It would take me years to get skinny."

Sandy laughed and pulled up her shirt to grab her own belly, "Same here, I hate skinny! So bony and small! Big and soft is where it's at!"

"Yeah!" Said Nikki as she and Sandy gave eachother high fives.

Besides it's not so famous in America. But if i move too Japan i could make a lot of money. I'm already fat and i'm just a little kid so i have a head start but I'm not sure. But I still have a lot of time to decide."

In the meantime Nikki undressed and was just in her underpants. She did't think she need a T-shirt yet. However she was so fat she had some small boobs but Nikki did't really cared about them. Besides she was only here with Sandy. She was just a girl around her age that also was so fat she had some small boobs. Both knew it was only fat and not really boobs yet but still.

Both girls friendly bowed.

But Nikki also grabbed her around her middle. Sandy pushed but Nikki did't moved a inch. Sandy knew it would be hard to win this.

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Linda was getting worried. She didn’t want anything to happen to her little girl. I mean sure Nikki liked being fat, but she didn’t want to have what happened to the fat boy in the report she had seen happen to her daughter. However, she did remember that the boy kept on gaining, even after the doctor told him he was in bad health and Nikki was in good health. However, she knew being fat was always unhealthy. I mean you couldn’t REALLY be healthy and fat right?

It was at this moment the phone rang. She quickly answered it and was surprised to hear that it was Maxine.

“Hi, Linda. I’m just calling to let you know that I talked to my boss about Nikki and he said he’d be more than happy to meet with her.” Maxine said.

“That’s good to hear. Did he happen to mention when?” Linda asked

“He said he could see her on the 23rd. Now, just letting you know, Nikki will have to get a physical by the company doctor. It’s required to make sure she’s healthy enough before she can be hired as a plus sized kids model. He’ll meet with you after that.” Maxine said, hoping Linda wouldn’t mind the formality.

Susan grinned as she heard this. The 23rd was next day after the birthday party. The doctor was SURE to say she wouldn’t be healthy and she’d have the perfect excuse to put Nikki on a diet. Sure she really didn’t want her daughter to be unhealthy or jepordize her chance to be a model, but the woman figured that she already knew her daughter had to slim down. At least this would give her a chance to finally put her obese child on a diet. I mean, there was no way a girl so big could actually be healthy.

“Oh that’s fine. I’ll see you both there.” Linda said as she hung up the phone, a bit happier now that her “plan” was formulated.

"Don't worry Nicole. I took a few pies from my work for the guests and one whole pie especially for you." Tina said with a smile.

Finally Nikki heard her mother calling. She and her friends walked in and looked around surprised. The whole table was full of food. A lot of different kinds what did't matter really since there was hardly food Nikki did't liked. Everyone looked excited.

"Well we all know Nikki is always hungry." Linda said. "I never was too happy with that. But It seemed Nikki herself also did't was happy with it. She did't liked she never got full so for this one time I made a lot of food only for you Nikki. Well eat Nikki until you're full. Go ahead."

Nikki went sitting in a huge chair and looked at the table full of food and started her feast.

On top of this, everyone around her loved how much she could pack away and were so happy to see her even bigger. She knew most of the kids here and knew they had some experience with this, but a she had only a few of them today and wasn’t sure how good they would be at this.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: End of the party

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
All kids got together on the couch. All were gently rubbing Nikki's belly.
Nicole suddenly smiled and lifted her shirt showing her own big belly that was getting bigger each day. Slowly she brought her bare belly to Nikki and started to give rubs and rub her belly against Nikki's belly at the same time.
Nikki noticed the trick and smiled since it felt really nice. Sandy saw it too and also started to rub with her belly.
Tanja rolled with her eyes. She noticed what Sandy and Nicole did but knew the other's could't do that since their bellies were too small for that.

"Yeah rub some more. Oh I like your belly rubs." Nikki moaned in pleasure.

"Well there is a lot of you to rub. This might take a while." Robbie said.

Tina smiled. Sure she loved children but with every family she was a babysitter she was a bit disappointed with how skinny the kids were. Sure she still liked the kids and for some reason the kids always loved her. She saw it like a gift and used it. But Nikki became some sort of her head prize. All those years of babysitting finally gave her Nikki. The child she always wanted to babysit.
If there was one thing she wanted more then be Nikki's babysitter then it was being Nikki's mother. She knew of course that that would never gonna happen but that could't keep her from wanting it.
She knew that century's ago when dad's were gone like a sailor the mother or other relative took care of the children and if they died then someone needed to take the child in house. At least until the father returned. Mostly they of course wanted a christen to take care of the child.
Tina knew the bible but did't really was praying for each meal or before bedtime. But She wanted to do it if it mend she could take care of Nikki.

"Everything all right Tina?" Nicole's voice wake up Tina from her daydreaming."

"Yeah yeah. I'm fine. I was just lost in thoughts."

Well I maybe can't get Nikki but I'm still young. Tina thought I don't look that bad. I can easily get a boyfriend and get pregnant and get a kid and fatten her up. Or him. It did't really matter to her. But she was a bit sad that the child most likely no matter how much she tried to fatten it up would reach Nikki's size.

The kids kept rubbing for some more time but Finally Nikki was fine and they went back too watching the movie. However except for Robbie most kids had enjoyed the rubbing much more then the movie.

But finally the prince and princess kissed and returned back the human form and opened a restaurant and lived happily ever after. At least for now since they would probably made a sequel of it. Like Disney almost always did.

"All right Tanja, Robbie I think It's time for you two to go home." Their mother said.

"We need to go to Sandy. But you probably see her tomorrow." Sandy's mother said.

"Nicole, Devert you also need to say bye too Nikki." Their mother said.

Nicole and Denvert did't wanna go but finally their mother dragged them to the car. Tina stayed some longer helping Linda cleaning a bit from Nikki'sfeast hoping the woman would like her a bit more.

Nikki was very happy. The party was a success She was fat and happy. Finally she had been full but she was a bit worried what would happen now since she knew for sure her mother would't be to happy with this
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: The party aftermath

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
As the guests left, group by group, Nikki just sat on the couch and watched T.V. There wasn’t much more the bloated child could do. Her belly had grown far to large to let her move on her own will anymore.

Both Bram and Linda noticed this. Both parents were a bit concerened about there daughter’s weight. Even Nikki’s father was starting to see her gorged state as something to be anxious about. However, he still wasn’t that upset over his daughter’s tubby frame. He didn’t mind her fat, just wanted to make sure she was healthy.

This wasn’t the case with Linda though. She couldn’t wait to take Nikki to the doctors tomorrow. She’d finally be put on a diet and the woman would finally have the excuse to make her daughter loose weight. She knew it would be tough on Nikki, but also knew that Nikki would be happier as a skinny girl.

Yes, the portly girl might think she was enjoying being fat, but Linda couldn’t believe that. Deep down she knew all girls wanted to be skinny and “pretty”. I mean, that’s what every girl she had met had told her, plus what all the magazines and T.V shows said. Her daughter was just too young to understand the “proper” way to be.

Tina helped out with the clean up. She was hoping to score some brownie points with Linda. She felt so sorry for Nikki to have to put up with this woman. I mean she wasn’t overly mean or anything, but Tina really wanted Nikki to be around people who would accept her size and her love of it. Of course the teen made sure to bite her tounge about this around both parents, not wanting to upset the woman she was trying to get in good with.

To a degree Tina’s plan was working. Linda was beginning to warm up to her a little bit, although she was still not all that happy with the teen. I mean she knew if Tina had her way, Nikki would be fed non-stop and be the size of a house! Still, the teen was very helpful and Nikki seemed to enjoy her, feeding or no feeding.

It was then Linda noticed the time and quickly walked into the living room.

“It’s time for bed.” She told Nikki as the little girl’s show ended.

"I'm so excited!" Nikki said while they were driving.

Linda looked a moment at her huge doctor. Fat was pealing everywhere out of her way to tight clothes. But soon she would lose this all. Just after the doctor told her how unhealthy she was.

"But mommy I don't have the right outfit for the gym. So I can't go then."
