It also felt a bit painful being so... eh full. But it was also pleasant. Both a bit. But not something I needed to feel again anytime soon. Guess I won't."

"Maybe you ate a bit to much. Then it hurts. Well we're here."

Nikki looked with big eyes at the building while they walked inside. Linda walked straight to a blond, chubby woman in her twenties.

"Hello I have an appointment with my daughter."

"I see. May I have your names?"

"Linda and Nikki Glemcer."

"Right." She looked at her computer. "Right you first have an appointment whit the doctor and after that with the big boss." She said with a smile. "Third floor first door right with the word doctor. He can see you right away."

"Thank you. come on Nikki."

Nikki was getting pretty tired. Even short distances were getting difficult to walk for the highly obese kid. She was happy they used the elevator. But she was also afraid what the doctor would say.

Linda knocked on the door.

"Come in." A friendly voice said.

They walked in and Nikki saw the doctor was a woman. She relaxed a bit. She normally liked woman more then man when she had a doctors appointment. Linda noticed that several times.

"So you're Nikki. Sandy told you about me. I'm doctor Dear. Well If you strip down we can start to see if you're healthy enough to work here."

"Linda chuckled. There was no way Nikki was healthy.
She was weighed on a special scale. The doctor measured her and did a lot of tests even in a strange thing to measure the BMI and what condition her body was.
After that she looked between all information she had collected.
Linda and Nikki both waited excited. wondering what would happen.

"Well Nikki your weight is pretty high. But that's just what we want here. This is about your health."

"So finally tell us!" Linda said loudly.

"Well Nikki is...
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Doctor Dear

choices: Linda argues with the doctor some more
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Doctor Dear leafed through her notes checking the results. She wanted to be sure she gave the pair the correct news about her most recent patient’s health. She then looked up at the two and grinned happily.

“Nikki’s as healthy as a horse even if she’s as big as one.” The woman announced happily.

She wasn’t the only one happy with this news. Nikki was ecstatic! Not only from the fact she wasn’t in any danger, but that she didn’t have to lose any weight or diet. The chunky child quickly lifted her hands and shouted a “Yes!” in triumph.

The doctor giggled at her reaction and was happy to see the child so glad. She was however a little puzzled by the reaction Nikki’s mother gave. She would have thought the woman would have been just as thrilled as her daughter at this news. She could see the lithe mother relived, but she wasn’t happy.

Linda was indeed not pleased. She was relieved to hear that her daughter wasn’t in any danger, but she had now lost her last excuse to get her fat child on a diet. She looked over at the doctor and quickly asked,

“B-But she’s so….large. I mean how could she possibly be h…”

“Healthy? Well despite what most people think Mrs. Glemcer, you can be perfectly healthy and large at the same time. I don’t think you have to worry either. It seems that Nikki was almost built to be very large. She could probably even stand to put on a great deal more weight and still have no health problems.” The doctor told Linda as she shifted her focus from the woman to her daughter by the end, poking Nikki’s belly lovingly.

The obese child giggled happily as the doctor played with her belly. She really liked Dr. Dear. She was far more pleasant than most doctors she had been taken to.

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Linda looked like someone hit her on the head. She gasped for air. Nikki was healthy. Nikki was so large and still was healthy. She could't believe it. She suddenly remembered what her mother told her. She had been right. Be prepared at everything she might say. But she never thought Nikki could be healthy.
Nikki seemed very happy with this news. She had a wide smile.

Linda was thinking what she needed to do. She would have liked it to drag Nikki out the building no matter what and put her on a diet right away. But she just told Nikki that if the doctor said she was healthy they could go see the boss. But that was before she heard Nikki was healthy. I need to listen to my mother next time she told herself. I can't walk away right now. Not after I told Nikki we could go if she was healthy.

"Mommy can we go nooooow?" Nikki asked.

"I told the boss you two can go. He will see you right away. He's on the tenth floor. The big door in the middle.

Linda sighed and pulled herself together and stood up. She had no choice and needed to take Nikki to see the boss. She wondered what he was like.
Slowly the two took the elevator to the tenth floor and walked to the big door. It could't miss. Linda knocked.

"Come in!" A friendly voice answered.

Linda and Nikki opened the door and walked in. Linda saw the man made good money. The office was big and very nice. You could see big covers of some special editions of his magazine. The boss himself was chubby but surely not fat. He had a wide smile and gray hair. He stood up and stuck out his hand.

"You must mrs. Glemcer and your daughter Nikki. How do you do?"

Linda shook the hand and mumbled: "Fine."

"Good to hear that. I got some information from the doctor's office. Well you're a big girl Nikki." He said friendly with a smile.

"Yeah I sure am!" Nikki yelled and clapped her belly.

"Well I must say I'm very happy to meet you. You're perfect for some clothing we wanted to show. I'm sure you'll fit right in here."

"Eh there are a few things Nikki is going to school soon. I don't want her to miss school because she needs to come here."

"Don't worry. Nikki is't the only kid here. We always make sure that our photo shoots are after school or in weekends or during vacations. We also call a few days before the shoot because you might have something planned that day. It's a nice job and she's perfect for it. I wished I had heard about her earlier. It also pays pretty good."

"Really how much are we talking about then?"

Well It depends on several things and Nikki is new so I think it will be around $30,000."

Linda gasped for air. Nikki would get so much money for just one shoot. That money would be very handy. Surely after Nikki's birthday. She could also put a lot of it at the bank for when Nikki went to college. If she went to college of course. Even if she did extra money was always welcome.
The boss understood Linda's gasp for air wrong.

"Not enough? Well all right then we make $35,000. But Nikki just started. After few shots she will receive more money. Oh a little extra you can have some clothes from each shoot."

Linda looked up surprised. If Nikki needed to show those clothes they should fit her and she always had trouble finding clothes for Nikki.
Linda decided she might as well give up. Nikki would't miss school, seemed to be healthy, would receive a lot of money and would like it to be a model. A plus-plus-plus-plus-plus size model she thought to herself.

"All right then."

"Great here I have the papers. Now just sign here, here and here."

Linda read it all and signed it with a sigh.

Denvert nodded, grinned, and raced to the kitchen. The two girls waited several minutes, until he returned bearing food—a tray of brownies, some cookies, a few bags of candy, two 2-liter soda bottles, and two pies. "Look good?" he asked.

"For now," Nikki replied, patting her round belly and causing the layers of fat covering it to shake. "Feed me first?"

The boy smiled. "Sure!"

Nikki lay back, grinning, and Denvert laid the tray of brownies on her prodigous belly. She began to wolf them down, digging into the tray with fat fingers and stuffing hunks of brownie into her mouth. Denvert and Nicole looked on, happy and smiling. Nikki paused about halfway through the tray, put a hand on her stomach, and gave a loud belch right in Nicole's face. "Nice one," the other girl replied.

Nikki moaned in pleasure as she stuffed herself, her plump face covered in brownie crumbs. Her double chin jiggled as she chewed. She finished the tray and asked Denvert, "Can I get something to drink?"

Quickly, he uncapped one of the soda bottles, and began pouring it down her throat. She gulped it down, and she could feel her massive stomach begin to fill with liquid, a full sensation growing and growing. Finally, the bottle was empty. The fullness swelled to a crescendo. Nikki laid both hands on her belly and belched loud and long.

"UUUUUUUURRRRRRRPPPPPPP!!!"

Nicole laid her hands on her friend's belly and giggled. "It's all sloshy," she said, kneading her fingers into the fat and listening as Nikki's tomach emitted glopping and sloshing noises. Nikki moaned in pleasure, and burped again as the motions caused the soda to rise.

"Oh, I feel so —" she belched deeply—"UUUUURRRRRRPPPPPPP—big!" She motioned for Denvert to bring over one of the pies. He did so, and the fat girl happily buried her face in it.

Minutes later, she was done. Nikki smiled and hiccuped, and the button popped off her shorts.

Nicole asked, "Nikki, can I feel your belly again? It's so nice and soft."

Nikki collapsed onto the couch. "Sure. Go ahead."

Nicole moved over, and lay down on top of Nikki, whose massivebelly enveloped the other girl. The fat was so nice and soft, and Nicole could both hear and feel the food and soda sloshing around inside her friend's tummy. She smiled, and laid her hands on the soft flesh. "I wanna be fat like you," she said, grinning.

Nikki opened her mouth to answer, and felt gas once again rise from her belly. She belched resoundingly in Nicole's face, then smiled. "Well then, let's feed you next. I've had enough for now. UUUUUUURRRRRRRRPPPPPPP!"

"Not really. But I noticed your daughter is well... gaining a lot of weight lately."

"Yeah. I noticed that to. Nicole always had a big appetite but lately her appetite really went through the roof." She said with a laugh. "But as long if she's happy and is fine with it I'm not worried. I think it has partly to do with Nikki. You know your daughter."

"Well Nikki is pretty big herself... nothing wrong with that, don't get me wrong but it seems like Nicole want to be like her. It seems like she made Nikki her roll model. Her hero. And she want to be just like her. Just as fat. I think that's the reason why she gains so much. But it will take a lot of time before she reaches the size of your daughter."

She must admit it looked a bit like that. She remembered that when she was a kid herself she also had some roll models. First as a little kid characters from cartoons and comics and later from stars like Madonna and Jodie Foster. But that were't roll models that in dangered your health. At the other hand she heard enough stories about girls who starved themselves just to look like those super models. That was't healthy either so what was so wrong about wanting to be like Nikki.

"I don't really see a problem with a fat kid. It's most important they are happy. If you don't have fun in your life because you want to stay healthy you did't really life at all."

"Well I guess that's true. Besides.... Nikki became a plus size model. A Model for clothes for fat kids. Maybe that's something for Nicole. Then she can earn some money for later."

"Really. That's a good idea."

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
As their mother walked over, Denvert and Nichole gave a sad look to Nikki. Neither child really wanted to leave their girlfriend/friend respectively. Still, they knew it was time and all 3 knew they couldn't stall any longer.

Sure enough, Denvert and Nichole's mom walked into the room with a smiling Linda. It wasn't that Linda was so glad they were leaving because they were bad kids. Heck, she was glad that Nikki knew them and had these friends. It was just that once they were gone, Nikki would have less of an excuse to eat so much.

"Come on kids. It's time to go." The woman said to her portly offspring.

Both the chubby boy and fat girl nodded at their mother, looking almost defeated. Denvert got up and, taking a big chance, gave Nikki a hug as he said goodbye. Hoping his real reasons for doing so wouldn`t be found out by either mother.

"Bye Nikki. Maybe you can come over soon." He said a bit sad but also a little hopefully as well.

Fortunately, his cover was aided as Nichole waddled over and happily hugged as much of Nikki's tummy as she could as well. Smiling happily at the feel of so much warm and snuggly fat.

"Ya, I wanna play with you more and eat lots of snacks with you too." She replied happily at the idea of them gorging again.

Both Linda and Nichole's mother couldn't help but go "Awww" at the sight, despite how little Linda was thrilled with that last part. Still, it was time for both kids to go and their mother said her goodbyes and took both her children home.

Nikki sighed a little as her friend and boyfriend had to leave. Of course there was an upside to this though: they had just left her with the last 2 burgers!

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Nikki looked at the last two burgers. Without a further thought she wolfed them down. Linda was't too happy about it. She could see a good part of her daughters huge belly since her way too small shirt rode up looking more like a bra then a shirt.
Nikki liked the crumbs from her lips and let out a soft belch.

"Mommy can we go visit Denvert and Nicole again soon?"

"Sure. I don't see why not. Maybe we can also buy school supplies together. Soon you're going to school."

Nikki still was't sure about school. She of course heard about it. Enough kids said they hate it but at the other hand you also met a lot of other kids there. She hoped Denvert and she would be on the same school and her other friends too. But she was't sure what she needed to do at school.

"I like Denvert and Nicole a lot." Nikki said.

"Yeah I like them too. It are nice kids. But I just would like it a bit more if you three would't eat so much!" Linda said.

"We like eating, or being fed. That's what we like to do for fun. It's playing for us."

"No playing is what I and my friends did when we were little. Playing tag, hide and seek, football, that is playing. Were you need to move and run with your friends. You should try it once."

"But then you need to move a lot. I don't like running, and I bet Nicole does't like it either. I also think Denvert also does't like running and moving a lot."

"Well maybe you would like it more if you were't so fat! So you could look a bit more like a normal child!" Linda screamed.

"I like being fat and I don't want to lose weight ever!" Nikki screamed back at her mother.

"Being so grossly fat is't healthy!" Linda screamed back.

"I like it and I'm perfectly healthy! They told you that!" Nikki screamed.

"They told me that!" Linda screamed and she was now really angry. "But i doubting if that is the truth. Anyway it would be unhealthy to let you lose some of this disgusting fat!"

By the last word she slapped a part of Nikki's bare belly so hard it left a red hand print. Nikki got tears in her eyes since it hurt really bad. Linda did a step back. She was shocked at what she had done. She never liked it that Nikki was fat or liked being fat but really hurting her was something she never had done and she could believe she had done it and she was scared that she let her anger take control for a second. She could't believe what she had done but there was still a clear red hand print were she slapped Nikki.
Nikki started to cry. Linda fast walked over to her and hugged her.

"Oh I'm sorry Nikki. I'm really sorry. I never wanted to do this. I was a accident. Really I did't mean to do it."

After a few minutes Nikki's crying stopped and she looked with wet eyes at her mother. She looked sad at Nikki.

"I... I just lost my temper for a second. I never mend to hurt you. You know I would never really hurt you on purpose."

Nikki nodded. Even while she and her other never agreed about her weight Linda was her mother and she loved her just as she loved Nikki.

"I still need to do something upstairs. You're sure you're all right?" Linda said.

"Yeah mommy."

Linda went upstairs but when she was upstairs she still had trouble to understood what she had done. She did't understood. You don't slap your kids. Not even if your angry. At least not so hard it leaves a hand print. She felt really bad.

"Maybe I should't keep complaining about her weight. That's what caused it. But it stays unhealthy. At the other hand they said she was healthy. Maybe I should really stop?"

Linda was indeed frightened. I mean she didn't want to hurt her child. Of course she really didn't mean to hurt her, it was an honest mistake. However, it was an honest mistake that she wasn't going to make again. Especially after what had just happened. She did really love her daughter and NEVER wanted to hurt her.

There was still the lingering question about what to do about her overly plump little girl's weight. She wasn't going to hurt her but she knew she couldn't except the fat. She could easily except Nikki. After all she was her little girl and she loved her with all her heart, even if she wasn't the littlest little girl. However, being so fat couldn't really be all that healthy. She didn't care what that quack doctor told her or Nikki. She had to keep trying to get her daughter to see things correctly about her weight.

Of course what Linda wasn't getting was that she was the one not seeing things correctly. She had been stuck in the "skinny is the only healthy" idea that she had been brainwashed in since she herself was just a little girl. Nikki, despite her size, was healthy and very happy.

Even now, despite what had just happened, Nikki was smiling happily as she tended to her lap covering round belly. You see the fat 5 year old had started out just trying to sooth the area Linda had slapped. Soon though the sting from the slap had disappeared, as well as the hand print Linda had made. Now all that was left was lots of beautiful fat little girl blubber for Nikki to rub, explore and love and she was doing all three of those as much as she could.

Of course, this was the very scene that Linda noticed as she walked back into the room. She instantly frowned but wasn't going to go after Nikki again, with her words or hands. The poor child had been through enough already.

Her mother came over to her and....

"Of course mommy. It's fine. It does't hurt that much anymore. Maybe if I would have been skinny it would have hurt more." Nikki said with a wide grin.

even while she was a plus size model her mother was't happy with it. She wondered how other children there looked like. Then she remembered something Bram once told her. You can find anything on the Internet.

"Eh mommy I'm going on the Internet. Is that all right?"

"Sure. Go ahead." Linda said.

She sighed when she saw all Nikki's fat jiggle while she walked out the room. She took the remote and flicked through some channels. Not really looking what was on.

"Why am I not able to let that girl lose weight. I mean I'm her mother and I want her to stay... No to become thin... and maybe a bit sportive. But she keeps gaining weight and for some reason I'm not able to let her lose weight. What Is needed for her to lose weight. Take her to Jenny Jones? Or Dr. Phil? Or Jerry Springer?"

To be honest Linda hated Jerry Springer. It was always about one man or woman slept with someone else. always the same thing. And the guest to beat up the other. She wondered if they maybe reversed that. You're not going to fight anytime. Of course it could be that someone once loses his patience but that every guest start to fight.
Jenny Jones and Dr. Phil at least tried to help people. She had seen some talk shows with kids with weight problems. At the end there was always a dietian and some advice how your kid could lose weight. She wondered if it would help if she would take Nikki to such a show.

"Hey wait a sec. What was that?"

She went back to the other channel. She saw some fat and obese children running. Some were sweating and moaning.

She took her laptop and looked for fat camp. Soon she founds a lot of sites about fat camps slowly she went from site to site. Tales about what they did, way's to lose weight and kids who tried it. Sure had been once to her grandma a week but a few weeks without someone she knew. But maybe it was the best way for her to lose weight.

Linda entered the room. Nikki was so occupied watching that she did't notice until Linda put a hand on her shoulder. Nikki looked up and saw her mother. Linda looked at the screen.

"See Nikki. Being fat is very unhealthy." Linda said and looked at her obese daughter.

Nikki nodded. She did't put any attention to the bad thing the man said about being fat but Linda thought she looked it up to see how unhealthy being fat was, and Nikki knew it was wiser to let her mother think that.

"Anyway get downstairs. I got a little surprise for you."

Nikki was surprised. She wondered what her mother mend. The next moment she got suspicious. She knew how much her mother wanted her to lose weight and if she thought of a new way she assumed Nikki would like it also. Now we know Nikki never did but her mother still tried.
Her mother took her to the computer.

"Ever heard about fat camp?"

"No." Nikki said telling the truth, she understood the word fat and camp apart but not together.

"Well fat camp is a place were overweight kids and teens go to to lose weight. Since these kids ares sick and tired of being fat. The want too become thin. Well I thought it was a perfect way to send you a few weeks to fat camp."

Nikki felt terrible. She did't want too. She was thinking what to do . Crying, stamping with her feet screaming: "I'm not going", Or maybe both. But before she could decide Linda continued.

"But you're too young for fat camp. They think it's unhealthy losing so much weight at such a young age and that your a bit young to be away from your parents so long. But I found a link to a day camp that is special for toddlers age 4-6 for losing weight. Is't that good news?"

Nikki was closer too the point of crying then laughing. She did't want to go to any stupid day camp with a bunch of kids she did't know and she especially did't want to lose weight. She thought she made that clear by now to her mother. Why was it so hard for her to understand.

"Eh but mom I don't really want too..."

"Listen Nikki this is very expensive. But I'm willing to do it just for you so you become healthy. Do you understand?"

Nikki nodded slowly.

I allowed you to be full at your birthday, I allow that Tina is your babysitter and I even allowed you to become a plus size model so please try to lose weight at this camp."

Nikki did't know. She was't planning to lose weight no matter if she did or did not went to the day camp but she did't want to make her mother angry again. She was tired of all the fights she had.

"I saw you also looked at the computer a way to lose weight and this is it."

Nikki looked scared. The only way she looked at it was because she could see fat kids. Not because she wanted to lose weight.
Linda finally saw her chance. All this time maybe this was the way. It did't cared to her If Nikki wanted it or not. She fast filled in a forum.
Since Nikki could't read yet she did't knew what her mother was doing but she had a bad feeling about it.

"What are you doing?" Nikki asked.

"Filling in a form so you can go to the day camp." Linda said well she filled the last things in and clicked on send. "So that was all. This is gonna cost us a lot of money but if it helps you lose weight I'm willing to pay it."

Nikki nodded with a empty expression at her face.

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Nikki might have said she'd do her best, but she knew that was a lie. True, she didn't want to make her mom unhappy or get in another fight, but she also didn't want to lose weight.

The poor portly little girl didn't have much time to think as a super thin blonde woman in her early 20s came over to her in blue shorts and a white t-shirt with the camp logo on it.

"Hi. You must be Nikki." She said enthusiastically to the fat little girl as she jogged over to her.

"I'm Tanya. Welcome to camp Off-With-It." She added as she finally reached the less than thrilled child.

Nikki was, well, less than thrilled with the woman. Of course she wasn't all that happy about being here all together. Still Tanya did seem nice enough and Nikki wasn't going to be rude to her right off the bat. She nodded at her and replied,

"N-nice to meet you Tanya..." She said, still a little distracted with taking in the camp and the other day campers.

Nothing anyone was doing looked all that fun and despite what she had thought from her first look around, a lot of the tubby kids didn't look that happy to be here. Nikki gulped a little bit, fearing the worst.

"Awww...don't worry. I promise you you'll lose some weight, even if it takes some work." Tanya said, trying to reassure her as she led Nikki along the main path into the day camp.

Of course the idea of losing weigh only made the fat loving child even more unnerved. She didn't know how but she had to find away to stop this from happening. She just had to!

The first girl had long blond hair till half way her back and had a big belly, butt and thighs. While Nikki looked at her she blow a pink chewing gum ball.
Then there was a black haired girl who was fat all over. She wore a way too short shirt that clearly showed her big belly.
The third girl was tanned with long black hair shiny hair till even over her middle, and was also fat all over. She wore some short army clothes but smiled friendly and played a bit with her hair.

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Tanya walked in surprised seeing them.

"Ah there you six are I've been looking all over..."

She stopped when she saw the empty trays and all the crumbs the six young kids had around their mouth. She closed her mouth. It was just a very thin stripe. Those who knew her it was a clear sign she was very angry. Slowly Tanya's face turned red.

"WHAT DID YOU SIX DO!!!" She screamed. "DID YOU SIX EAT ALL THE WAFFLES? THAT WAS A MORNING SNACK FOR THE ENTIRE CAMP AND THE SIX OF YOU ATE IT ALL BY YOURSELF!!!"

"Well we were just hungry." Nikki mumbled.

"What's going on here?"

A tall muscled man walked in and looked around.

"Well I found those six kids here. They ate all the waffles that need to be a morning snack for the entire camp." Tanya said.

"Tanya, I want you to buy some waffles for the kids. As for the six of you... come with me."

The kids followed like a bunch of hypnotized bunnies. The man had a voice you just need to obey. Slowly in a line they followed him too his office.

"Go sit!" He said.

All kids grabbed a chair and went sitting in front of the desk well the man stood behind it.

"I'm the leader of this day camp." He started. "I did this to help our nation. Obesity is a growing problem in our nation. Most fat kids LIKE YOU SIX are likely to become fat adults."

"Yeah I know those lines out of my head by now. My mom said them all the time." Kelly whispered.

"I just could't bear to see our nation to be filled with fat people. So to help them and our nation I decided to do something about it. I started to think and decided to start at the bottom. A weight lose camp for young kids. But for young kids it's hard being away from their parents so long so I decided to make a day camp from it. So young kids could lose weight."

"What if we don't want to?" Sasha asked.

"What a stupid question. Everyone here wants to lose weight. You all six agree with me. Right?"

"No!" All kids answered.

"Wait a second. Did I understand this right. The six of you don't wanna lose weight. You happy with your size. You want to stay this size."

"Well maybe gain more weight." Kelly mumbled while she played with her hair.

"You know I don't care. You gonna lose weight but I see it's important someone keeps an eye at you and not just any leader. A special trained leader."

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
"I'll do it myself." He said forcefully as he got up out of the chair.

The 6 fat kids instinctually leaned back in their chairs, away from this man. Unfortunately for the 6 plumpers, this only further showed off their fat tummies to the muscled man. Thanks to their little waffle binge before, they looked as big as ever too.

The man let out a partially disappointed, partially frustrated, sigh before he told them,

"I know it might sound mean, but being fat is unhealthy and let's face, it makes you look far less...pretty." He told them, a bit nicer than before.

It took Nikki a few seconds to even fully wrap her mind around what was going on. Trying to be nicer or not, this man scared her quite a bit. Still, that wasn't going to stop her from setting him straight. It took all her courage and it only came out a bit more than a mumble.

"B-but m-my doctor said I'm healthy...and I'm really pretty. I even got a boyfriend." Nikki bravely retorted back to the camp leader.

The other kids looked a little more hopeful, most even nodding their heads at that last part. However, the camp owner didn't look to pleased with her.

"Well I don't know what doctor would ever tell you that and you're too young to have a real boyfriend." He told Nikki, his patents with all of this beginning to wear thin.

But did you know what could have happened?"

"But mom that man was really unfriendly. He told us we were't pretty if we were fat and that it was unattractive. But when I sad I had a boyfriend he said it was't real love. I love Denvert for real and He loves me for real."

"I know that. But walking home. You could have had a accident. Jammie found her way home and Kelly was picked up by someone who knew her. Jack also found his way home. She said flatly.

"What about Sasha and Gordo?" Nikki asked worried.

"I don't know. They did't turned up dead so that's a good point. What were you thinking. What do I need to do with you. Give you such a necklace that explodes if you are 100 yards away from the camp like in that movie?"

"Just don't take me back to the camp again." Nikki mumbled.

"Nikki I can't do that. You know that. You need to lose weight."

I know that I don't have to lose weight and I don't wanna go to that stupid camp!"

"Nikki I warn you! I'm already very angry at you and one more word from you and I really lose my temper and then I might do something I regret."

While Linda though about this she must admit that t was a bit ironic that is started with something she regret. After she hit Nikki so hard you could see a red hand print.

"You know what, mom? "I'm fed up with you and that dumb camp!" Nikki said furiously.

"You hit me mom, you just don't care what i want to be." "Of all this time you always wanted me to lose my weight." "I know it's not healthy, but i want to remain fat."

After that big arguement Nikki went upstairs to her room. This time she wasn't crying, but she was really upset and angry. Nikki was starting to get more mature.

Linda realized that she herself made a very big mistake.

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: She let her skip day camp and told about that s...

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Linda softly knocked on Nikki's door.

"Come in." She heard Nikki saying followed by: "Like if you would't if I said otherwise."

Linda slowly opened the door and walked inside and looked around a good time and picked up a toy. Nikki was lying in bed. Linda went sitting in the desk chair and softly drove it to Nikki.

"I was always at your side." She said again.

"Stop saying that. You were never at my side. You never wanted me to get fat. You always wanted me to lose weight or go on a diet and exercise you never cared what I wanted. The only time you did it was on my birthday. That one time and the only reason you did that was because you hoped I needed to loose weight after it. Yeah mom I heard you talking."

"Maybe I did push you a bit. I apologize. I'm sorry for everything I did. But it was only with the best interest. I only wanted to help you become healthy."

"I don't wanna. Not if I need to lose weight. Besides you heard those doctor. I'm healthy, and she has studied for it."

"Nikki there's something else I need to tell you. Maybe you noticed my belly got a bit rounder too... I'm gonna have a baby. A little girl. just like you once were."

Nikki did't say anything. She did't know what to think. Other kids at daycare sometimes had younger brothers or sisters who came with their parents to pick his or her older brother or sister up. Did this mean that mommy and daddy wanna replace her? Would something else happen?

"You are now gonna be the bigger sister. Is't that great?"

"How do you know it's a girl?"

"I checked it at the hospital. It was the only way to know if I need to paint the baby room blue or pink. Also the answer if could use your old dresses. So what do you think?"

"I don't know." Nikki answered telling the truth. "But what about me. If she's here instead of me?"

"Oh Nikki don't be silly." Linda said and hugged Nikki. "She's not here to replace you or something. She's gonna be a part of the family. I will love her just as much as I love you. Love is't a bottle Nikki. It's not that I need to share it over two girls. I love you both equal."

"Maybe it can be fun." Nikki mumbled.

"Since you're the oldest I expect you help a bit taking care of your little sister. Believe me they're much more fun then dolls. Besides you also like Nicole. That little sister of Denvert."

Nikki looked up. She did't thought about that. She must admit she really liked Nicole. So maybe a new sister would also be all right.

I only hope she does't eat so much like you. Linda thought but did't said it. When Nikki was born she was glad and expected that she could exercise with her with whatever she would do. Football, base ball, gymnastics or even ballet. But she soon discovered that Nikki would't do any of those things. With Nikki's size the only sport that she would be good in would be sumo wrestling. She was't planning to let Nikki do that.
But maybe she could do something like that with her new child. Who knew maybe Nikki would join.

"I guess It's no use is it?"

"What?" Nikki asked.

"Letting you lose weight. I tried about a dozen of things the past time and not one of them came even close to letting you lose weight. I want you to lose weight so you be healthy. So what am I doing wrong."

"That's the point. What you said. You said: I want you to lose weight. Is't it about what I want? It's my body after all."

"I don't know Nikki. I really don't know. It's like fate does't want you to become thin. I tried so much and so many people were against it. I don't know. Maybe I should accept it but I don't want that you have serious health problems before the age of ten."

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Fast forward to (your choice)

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
About two months went by and Nikki gained some more pounds. However Linda finally found a way not to let Nikki lose weight but slow down her gain a bit. She bought a lot of fruit. Nikki ate about everything what was edible. Of course she liked chips and cookies more then fruit but that did't want to say she did't liked fruit and food was food so she replaced some of her food intake with fruit. It at least took away a part of her hunger but never entirely.
Linda's belly also got rounder each month. Nikki was still a bit worried sometimes, but she must admit thinking about a little sister like Nicole seemed pretty good. She was a bit excited and did't liked it she need to wait several months. Her parents were slowly started to make lists and think about several names and stuff they needed to buy.
For Nikki came something important too. Her mother took her too school. Sure Nikki knew it was going too happen but still it was all a bit suddenly for her.

"Mommy do I really need to go to school?" Nikki asked a bit scared.

"Of course Nikki. You do need to learn how to write and read. It's all very important. You know that."

"Yeah but... it's my first day."

"Honey it's every ones first day. Not only yours. Besides look at the bright side. Tanja, Robbie and Denvert also go to your school. Is't that nice?"

Nikki looked up surprised. She did't expected that but she must admit that did make her feel a lot better. At least she would have some people to talk to.

"All right we're here." Linda said and stopped the car.

She took Nikki by her risk and between all other children she walked to Nikki's class. She was a bit worried. There were kids of all shapes and sizes some were also fat but even the fattest were't near so fat if Nikki. he would probably be teased a lot. But maybe that would make Nikki wanna lose weight.
She opened the door and saw the teacher there were already some other kids and parents that kissed their kids goodbye.
The teacher was a young slender woman who seemed to get really along with children. She walked over to the teacher and introduced herself and Nikki.

"Ah. So this is Nikki. We're glad to have you hear Nikki. I'm your teacher Miss Tatcher."

She was surprised since she had never seen a kid Nikki's size but she was used to not show it when a kid was a bit different in any way. She talked a bit with Linda while Nikki looked around a saw Tanja and Robbie and waddled over to them.

"Hi Nikki. Is't it cool we're all in the same school now?" Tanja said. "I heard Denvert would also soon be here. We can put our desks together."

Nikki went sitting on a chair and miss Tatcher noticed that Nikki's rear was too wide for the normal chairs for kids in first grade and she promised to take a bigger chair for her during recess. She already saw some other children staring and pointing at Nikki and whispering. She knew this girl would probably have a hard time at school. If kids were a bit different like in her case very fat other kids would tease her with it. She would try to stop that as much if she could but knew she would't be able to totally stop it.

"I'm so excited to learn how to write!" Tanja said.

"Nikki!" She heard suddenly someone.

She turned her head and Denvert running towards her and he started hugging her. over her shoulder she saw his mom holding Nicole tight by her risk. She waved at her and she waved back. After all parents left the teacher said all students could make groups. Nikki and Denvert shove their desks next to each other against Tanja and Robbie's desks.

"All right." Miss Tatcher said. "Welcome to our school. I hope we all have a fun time here. This year I'm gonna teach you how to write, read and how to count. I hope we can have a fun first year."
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: First schoolday

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Nikki did her best to listen to the lesson as the teacher began about the letter A. It wasn't the most interesting thing the girl had heard, but she understood what was going on. However, this wasn't what made the lesson so hard for her to follow.

As the teacher went on in her happy kindergartner voice about the first letter alphabet, Nikki and the rest at their little grouping of desks noticed a number of other kids staring at "little" Nikki. Some were shocked, most were simply curious and more than a few looked a little too mischievous for Nikki's own good.

Nikki wasn't at all thrill with those eyes. She didn't mind the extra attention she was getting. Heck some of it was kind of nice for the obese little girl. However, she knew more than a few looking at her weren't fond of the little butterball.

She looked over at her friends for some support. She got it from everyone there. Even from Robbie who wasn't overly into her blubber or gaining gave her some much need encouragement, even if it was only in his eyes. However, the overly portly little 5 year old could also see the worried looks in everyone's eyes too.

All too soon, the teacher finished her lesson and the class was let outside for recess. Nikki instantly stood up but was a little unsure about following everyone else outside. It was only when Denvert grabbed her hand did she feel okay enough to go with him, well after grabbing her recess snack of course.

She slowly let her boyfriend lead her outside where most of the other children were playing some sort of game, or talking with their friends. Of course Nikki only wanted to sit and eat her snack, which she did at the first tree with adequate shade for her and Denvert.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Fast forward to recess

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
"Are you feeling all right?" Denvert asked a bit worried.

"Well it's all a bit new for me. But it's new for all of us. Is't it? But I noticed I'm the fattest kid in my class. Not just by a few pounds but by a lot of pounds!"

"So? That never stopped you from gaining before. Or do you wanna stop."

"Not really. It's just how the others were looking at me. Not everyone looked so friendly. Some even looked a bit mean. Don't tell me you did't see it. I like being fat and gaining and eating of course it's one of my hobbies. But I'm a bit afraid how some would react."

Denver looked at his girlfriend. Nikki was right of course. She was obvious the fattest kid in class. Probably the heaviest kid in school. He was't sure since he knew obesity in children was a growing problem. Nikki of course was an easy target for other kids. But he would't let that happen. Not if he could stop it. Then he could at least used all the training he had from his father.

Suddenly he saw two girls walking over too them. One was a bitchy girl with a big curl in her yellow blond hair and fire red lips. A short skirt that left her flat belly bare and some sunglasses on her forehead.
The other seemed kind of muscular especially at her young age. She had dark brown, straight her that fell around her face. She wore black pants and a dark blue sweater and had a mean grin that showed her teeth and braces.

"Well well. If that is't the queen of flab." The blond girl said.

"I have a name. It's Nikki or are to stupid to remind that." Nikki reacted snappish.

"You should go too the Zoo. We have no place for a hippo in our class!"

"We seem to have room for dogs. A bitch like you is also in the class." Nikki said back.

"So it seems like the fatso has something to say. Guess when you stand on the scale it says: people please one at a time." The dark haired girl said.

"Why don't you two go bother someone else?" Denvert asked.

"Well it because of that wide load there. We have trouble getting around her." The blond one said

"I bet you're the fattest kid in class. You're even heavier then our teacher and she's an adult." The dark haired girl said.

"Wow did you found that out all on your own? I know I am the fattest girl in our class. Perhaps on the entire school but a least I'm nice an I look good."

"Do you really think that you look good? You are a disgusting fat pig. I'm a beautiful girl.My mother told me that." The blond one said.

"Really? Well I work like a model." Nikki said confident.

Denvert was cooking from anger from what the girls said against his girlfriend. Suddenly he saw Robbie and Tanja walk so innocent in their direction. They could better stop teasing Nikki.

"You? A model? Act normal. Which magazine would want you to become a model? You're way too fat to become a model."

"Stop teasing or else..." Denvert said.

"Or else what." The blond girl sneered.

"Well I would stop teasing if I were you." Tanja said with a voice as cold as ice.

"Or else? What can you do?"

Tanja was fast. She bend through her legs stuck on leg out and waved it over the ground and knocked the girl legs away and in less the a second she stood right up again while the blond fell on the ground.

"I do ballet. It's not only a fun way of dancing."

The blond girl stood up and snapped with her finger and the two of them walked away.
Nikki smiled happy now she knew that even if life would be hard she could count on her friends.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: First recess

choices: She's nice and wants to be friends
She's mean or just plain curious
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Nikki didn't know quite what to do at this point. She was torn between thanking her friends for coming to her rescue and crying over what just happened. It was a real possibility. She hadn't ever been bullied like that before.

In the end, Nikki chose the former and tried her best to keep the tears down. She did sniffle at her group of friends as she said,

"Thanks guys. I don't know what...what I would have done without you." She told them as she got out her snack: a large slice...well an entire half of a German chocolate cake.

Tanja, Robbie and Denvert all smiled back at her. They could see she was in pain, but they did just win a victory and couldn't help but be happy.

"We weren't going to let them get away with that." Tanja said.

"Ya. Don't worry Nikki. We're not going to let anyone pick on you." Denvert told her, giving her a brief kiss on the cheek as she ate her cake.

Nikki grinned happily at hearing this and was just about to thank them again when she noticed someone else coming over to her. She instantly got afraid and the others could see this. All of them turned to look at this new person.

This new person was a little girl from class. She had long brown hair and wore a nice warm red dress that just covered her knees. The blue eyed child had one other feature that everyone instantly noticed: she was pretty chubby. True she wasn't Nikki chubby, or even Nichole chubby, but she had a nice layer of baby fat on her and cute pot belly.

choices: Try to friendly say no to her
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
"Ehm... eh... hello." She said softly with a voice that sounded like little bells.

"Hello. Who are you?" Denvert asked careful.

Nikki looked suspicious at the little girl. She did't seemed mean or like she wanted to tease her but you never knew. At the other hand, Denvert, Robbie and Tanja were sitting around her. If she wanted to do something mean to her she would't succeed.

"I? Uhm me? My name is Rue. What are your names?"

"I'm Denvert. This lovely girl here is Nikki and that are Tanja and Denvert." Denvert introduced them.

The girl went sitting next to them with her legs crossed under her. She did't said anything but looked a lot at Nikki's belly. Nikki wondered what this girl wanted. Her blue eyes were very bright and very noticeable.
Finally Nikki could't stand it anymore.

"Why did you came here?" She asked trying her best to keep the anger out of her voice since this girl seemed a bit sensitive."

"Well... you seemed kind of nice. I thought maybe we could be friends." She said softly.

"Why were you looking at my belly?" Nikki asked.

"Well I can hardly miss it." she mumbled softly. "But I like big bellies. My big sister is very fat. She looks fantastic. It jiggles with every step..." She suddenly stopped talking and looked at them.

"You're kind of little." Robbie suddenly said.

"I was kind of smart for my age." Rue said. "They said I could already go to first grade while I still was a bit young. I also can read and write some words."

The others looked at Rue. She seemed kind of nice but they did't knew her. The question or they could be friends was still in the air. They did't really knew Rue well enough to know if she could be a friend.

"Don't you know anyone here?" Tanja asked friendly.

"No. Not really. My dad got a new job and we just moved a few weeks ago. I don't know anyone here yet."

The others looked at Rue not really knowing what to do. They did't want to hurt the girls feeling by saying: no, and who knew maybe she was very nice, and fun too hang out with. But they did't knew for sure.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Rue

choices: Rue makes a comment about Nikki
Rue likes how big Nikki is
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Nikki and the rest were still unsure. True, had she come to them before class started she probably would have been more easily accepted. However, after what just happened, the kids were less than enthusiastic to take a chance.

Rue wasn't doing much at the moment. This internal conflict Nikki and the others were having wasn't something she noticed. To her, they just seemed like nice kids who could be her friends. The only real thing she noticed with this group was just how fat Nikki was. I mean, it was really hard not to notice it. To her that didn't matter. I mean she looked more cute with so much blubber on her, like a big warm teddy to cuddle up with, not that she wanted to actually do that with Nikki.

In the end it wasn't Nikki, Robbie or Tanja who decided she was okay. It was Denvert who really noticed this chubby young girl wasn't here to cause trouble. Besides, he had to admit she did look pretty cute with so much fat on her. True, his young heart belonged to Nikki, but that didn't mean he hadn't noticed her pudge. After all, he did like fat girls.

"Well maybe you can play with us..." He said as he finally took a seat between her and Nikki.

The others thought for a moment, before accepting his proposal. They too could see this girl probably wasn't going to be mean to Nikki about her weight. In fact, Nikki decided it would be okay to actually start on her cake.

The obese girl took out the slice and happily licked her lips at it. Her plump middle couldn't help but give off a loud grumble. It hadn't been fed since this morning and all the stress of the day had made her extra hungry. Without a second thought she dug in with both her hands, wanting to waste no time adding this fattening treat to her waist.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Give her a chance

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Rue looked interesting at Nikki's hue belly. She liked it. She always liked big bellies. She did't really knew why but since she liked it so much she tried to eat a lot and it gave her a fat belly and a big appetite.

"Why are you looking at her belly?" Denvert asked sharp.

"What? Oh... I just like it how big her belly is."

Nikki even stopped eating for a moment to take another look at Rue. Rue friendly smiled at her showing her white teeth.

"Do you really like my huge belly?" Nikki asked friendly looking at Rue.

"I really do. I always liked big bellies, and lets be honest your belly is so big. You can't really miss it."

"Well I must admit that's true. You can't really miss that belly of yours." Denvert said too Nikki.

"Guess it's because of my mom. Short after I was born she started to get really fat. Maybe that's why I like big bellies so much. That fat was so warm and soft and I always liked it to sink a bit in it." Rue said. "But she died about one and a half year ago. Hart attack. I cried for about a week. I was a complete wreck after that. But slowly together with my dad and grandparents I could live on. But I still miss her and I still like big bellies. Is there a special reason why your belly is so big?"

"Oh well. That's easy. I'm always hungry." Nikki said. "I can eat huge amounts of food without getting full. I only once felt full but that time I really ate a lot that time."

"A lot?" Tanja asked. "You ate enough to feed an entire playground that day."

Denvert grinned. He reminded that day and loved it. Seeing his girlfriend eat so much.

"Say I was wondering can I become part of your group. I mean in the class room. Can I put my desk by your desks?"

"Well it's fine with me if the others are okay with it." Nikki said.

"Well if Nikki is fine with it I'm fine with it." Denvert said.

"Sure why not." Robbie said.

"It does't matter what I vote." Tanja said. "But I'm not sure if our teacher is fine with it."

"I think so. She seems pretty nice." Nikki said. "But what's wrong with your own group?"

"They're mean to me. They tease me. Because I'm also a bit overweight." Rue said sadly.

"Well if the teacher is fine with it... I have no problem with it if you want to join our group." Tanja said.

The next moment they heard the school bell.

"Is this recces? That's kind of short." Nikki said.

"Well Tina told me that at school you first have a short recces. That's this one,and in the afternoon we have a longer recces." Tanja said.

"Let's get back to class." Denvert said.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: I like big bellies

choices: One of the parents brings in a snack
It's gym time: playing a game with exercise
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Everyone there was not thrilled by the idea of having to go back to class. However, Nikki was the least thrilled. She really didn't want to have all the leering eyes on her again. Besides, going that long without food seemed just as horrible to the ever hungry little girl.

However, things were made a little better for her now that she found a new friend who liked her. Whatever mistrust she might have had for this cute plump kid was now gone and she was starting to get really glad that she had met this child. Even with her normal group of friends, she was feeling a little lonely with no one else coming over to talk with her....at least not nicely anyway.

Her thoughts were temporarily put on hold as she was forced to get up, her big round belly sloshing as she did so, and waddle back to class. She hated doing this, but knew she would at least get to sit down once she got back.

Nikki couldn't help but grin a little as she noticed her chubby new playmate having the same problems with getting up too. Even though she wasn't nearly as big as Nikki, Rue didn't want to have to get up either. However, she was too preoccupied by her own thoughts to care about this as much as Nikki did. She really hoped she could sit with her new friends. She didn't want to be made fun of by the others at her table again.

After what seemed like way too long, Nikki and the group had reached the classroom. The obese little girl and her friends took their seats at the table and watched from a distance as Rue talked with the teacher. It took a few moments, but the nice lady walked over with Rue.

"Hello kids." The adult said in her friendly kindergarten voice.

"This is Rue. Would it be okay if she sat with at your table?" She asked, unaware that they had met before.

Everyone grinned and nodded happily to the teacher before Rue almost ran to get her stuff. Being lighter than Nikki, she was able to do it without much trouble. She beamed ear to ear as she sat down next to Nikki and Tanja.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Rue asks the teacher if she can sit with Nikki ...

choices: But I was planning doing a team sport anyway
Try and if you get tired you can sit on the bench to rest
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
All kids were talking with each other until the teacher clapped three times in her hands to get every ones attention. The talking stopped and all kids looked curious.

"Are you all listening.Good. All right. It's gym time."

Nikki moaned. Even while it was her first school day... she knew exactly what gym time mend and she also knew she would hate it. She hated any form of exercise except maybe swimming but even in the swimming pool she was more floating than swimming so she did't do hat much exercise.

"Kids all follow me. In a line two by two. Easy no pushing."

She took them too a gym full of stuff used for gym time. A few kids already wanted to go inside but the teacher stopped them.

"Hold on... Before you enter you need to wear gym shoes. That shoes are made to be only used in here and not for outside. Further you just wear loose gym clothing.

"But we don't... A boy started but the teacher raised her hand and he stopped talking.

"You parents already bought shoes and clothing. You see those two doors there. Behind each one is a room and inside is closet wit a sign 1st grade. Each drawer has a name on it. In the drawer with your name on it you can find your own gym clothes and shoes. Boys can change the left room girls in the right room."

Nikki was glad That Tanja and Rue where also here. She never really minded being fat and he liked being fat but it was obvious some others here were against it, or maybe they were against her for some reason and they used the fact she was fat. She would have felt a bit unconformtable to change with people who did't liked her fat. But with Rue and Tanja it felt easier to chance since she knew they did't mind fat. But she saw two other girls making a sign of disgust and some girls put on big eyes seeing how fat she really was.

A few minutes later all kids walked into the gym. Nikki waddled over to the teacher and pulled her sleeve.

"Yeah eh... Nikki right?"

"That's correct. Eh well listen up I'm not good at gym. Do I really need to also do gym?"

"Eh yeah Nikki. Except when you have a note from the doctor or your parents that there is a reason you can't gym you just need to gym with the others."

She looked one moment at Nikki's huge belly and said:
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Gym time

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
The teacher frowned as she looked at Nikki's belly. She knew it wasn't her fault that she was so fat. Still, she hated seeing how large kids kept getting. She didn't hate fat children, but she wasn't a big fan of anyone getting so obese.

"Listen Nikki. You just try and do your best. If you get too tired you can rest on the bench okay?" She told Nikki to reassure her.

The overly well fed kid wasn't too reassured. She knew this was not going to be fun for her. Heck, she didn't even like walking, or in her case waddling, all that much. She didn't know exactly what game they would be playing, but she knew it would take a lot more than just walking. Still she nodded and went over to join Tanja, Denvert and Rue.

Soon the teacher was in front of the group of mostly eager kindergartners and began to explain what they would be doing.

"Okay class we're going to be playing What Time Is It Mr. Wolf? In this game one of you is the wolf who stands at the middle of the room. The rest of you will stand over there...." She pointing to the wall furthest away.

"The rest of you will ask 'What time is it Mr. wolf?' to the wolf and he/she will give you a number. You then take that many steps. If you take more of than that, or move when the wolf hasn't told you a number, or if the wolf says 'It's lunch time!' then the wolf gets to chase you and tag you. If you get tagged, you get 'eaten' and get to help the wolf after that. Does everyone understand?" She asked the class.

Everyone nodded their heads but Nikki was still unsure of this game. It seemed like WAY to much exercise to her.

"Okay for this first game our wolf will be..."
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Try and if you get tired you can sit on the ben...

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Mrs Tatcher scanned the line of children, trying to decide who would be first wolf. Perhaps it would be a good idea to get Nikki's turn out of the way early...
She made up her mind.
"Nikki, you're up first. Come on!"
The lazy girl groaned, but waddled to the center of the hall nonetheless. She could feel all the other kid's eyes on her, and she pulled her gym shirt down self-consciously, but it quickly rode back up. Apparently her mom hadn't bought quite large enough a size...
"Okay children. Repeat after me; 'what's the time, Mr Wolf?'
The children chanted the phrase, and Nikki picked a number at random.
"Four."
All the other children took four steps towards her, then chanted again.
"What's the time, Mr Wolf?"
"Er, three!"
They took another three steps forwards, but this time when they all sang out the phrase, Mrs Tatcher whispered loudly to Nikki; "Say Lunchtime!"
"It-it's lunchtime!" said Nikki, and the kids scattered. She did her best to run after them, feeling her body jiggle as she tried desperately to tag anyone. However, she never got closer than a few meters to even the chubbiest other children, her feeble muscles letting her down again.
In less than half a minute she was completely exhausted, her legs failing and sending her stumbling to the floor, trying desperately to provide her lungs with air. The other kids danced around her, laughing and throwing crude comments.
"Fatty!"
"You're too fat to even catch Rue!"
"Lazybones!"
Though their insults were childish, they were harsh to Nikki's young ears, and tears bloomed in her eyes. Suddenly Mrs Tatcher was there.
"That's enough! Nikki, are you alright?" she turned to the young girl, who was still on the floor. She nodded, trying to blink the tears away. "Come on, you can sit on the bench whilst the other's finish the game.
With a great heave, she managed to pull Nikki to her feet and led her to the bench at the side of the hall, while the other children giggled at her. She hated being teased, especially about her weight, and their comments had hurt her feelings badly.
While she got her breath back, the others began playing Mr Wolf again. Nikki was glad she could sit out now; if she'd still been playing, she'd be caught first every time! However, eventually Mrs Tatcher declared that game was over.
"Nikki, come and join in the next activity." the teacher called, and reluctantly she heaved herself to her feet. Her knees were aching already.
"Okay kids. Now we're going to do some..."
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Nikki cries wolf.

choices: Nothing happens and they return to normal lessons.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
"We're going to try some press-ups and sit-ups. Nathan and Collin, help me with the mats."
Quickly, cushioning mats were lain out across the hall's wooden floor and after some minor squabbling everyone managed to get one each. Mrs Tatcher stood at the front, where everyone could see her, and the activity began.
"First, everyone lie down on your mats, feet towards me. Now bend your knees and put your feet flat on the mat." She looked around, pleased at how the class was following her instructions. "Now, just sit up!"
The kids all started sitting up, and Nikki tried to follow suit. However, despite giving it a better effort than she had given anything (except eating) in a long time, she hadn't a chance. The moment she got her shoulders off the ground her swollen belly prevented her going any higher, and quickly her completely unused stomach muscles were screaming in pain. She fell back on the mat, and watched as practically everyone else managed to do at least one or two. Raiza in particular managed several before stopping, looking smugly over at the far larger girl between each one.
Nikki jabbed angrily at her midriff with her finger. For one of the first times ever, she was beginning to resent her flabby form, especially when compared to other, fitter girls in her class.
"Now, children, let's see if you can do a press-up." Nikki peered around the soft mound of her stomach, trying to get a view of Mrs Tatcher's demonstration. It didn't look too hard; you got to keep your knees on the floor, and she thought her arms weren't too weak to manage at least one or two. She followed the rest of the class in adopting the position, but her stomach practically scraped the floor even before she bent her arms! Red in the face, she tried to pull her shirt down to prevent her belly hanging out, but it sprang back up again.
Determined to succeed at least once, she resumed the position and tried to do a press-up, but the moment her arms bent they collapsed under her considerable weight and she fell onto her stomach, knocking the wind out of herself. By the time she'd got her breath back, everyone else had done at least four and Mrs Tatcher had given the order to pack away the mats. The young teacher was looking worriedly at Nikki.
As they leave the hall...
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Nikki and the horrors of the sit-up.

choices: Some kids start to tease Nikki in the dressing room

Nikki happy waddled over to her since she thought Miss Tatcher would do something so she did't have to go to gym anymore.

choices: She puts the letter away and goes to eat.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
After Nikki had changed back into her ill-fitting regular clothes, all the children returned to normal lessons. After an hour of times tables, everyone was allowed outside to play on the playground and eat their lunch. Nikki rushed after the others, eager to get at some food. However, as she was about to leave, Mrs Thatcher stepped into her way.
"Nikki. How you acted and spoke to me earlier was not acceptable behaviour towards a teacher. Now, I'm willing to be leniant this time, but I'm here to help you, and that includes teaching you basic manners and respect. Now, I've written this letter for your parents to see. Don't worry, it's not about how you spoke to me." Her eyes took on a dangerous glint. "But Nikki; make sure it goes home, okay?"
Edgily, Nikki nodded, and tried to shuffle past her teacher. She really needed some food; her oversized stomach was growling discontentedly.
Mrs Thatcher reluctantly stepped out of the way and allowed Nikki to waddle as fast as she could after her friends. She looked discomfortedly after the obese child, and shook her head.
As soon as Nikki got outside...
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: A mysterious letter...

choices: She saw that Nikki really was fat.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
The rest of the day passed quickly and uneventfully for Nikki, the letter sitting forgotten in her pocket. Whilst she had felt slightly abashed in Mrs Tatcher's presence, she quickly forgot all about their disagreement and went on with her day, having fun with Rue and her other friends.
When her mother eventually arrived to pick her up, Nikki was bubbly and happy. It would seem the events of the gym class had amounted to nothing after all.
Or at least; that was how it seemed until a gust of plot-convenient wind caught Nikki's jacket as she was lifted from the car and the letter Mrs Tatcher had given her fell out her pocket, landing on the gravel of their driveway. Linda picked it up and frowned at it.
"Nikki? Why didn't you tell me about this?" She asked her plump daughter, who was trying to pry open the front door of their house; she was hungry!
"I dunno." Mumbled the girl. "Forgot."
Linda took out her keys and opened the door to their house, allowing Nikki to push past and waddle at top speed towards the kitchen. Following behind, Linda peeled open the envelope and unfolded the letter within. Laying it up to the light, she squinted at Mrs Tatcher's looping calligraphy.
'Dear Nikki's mother/father. I am Nikki's teacher, Mrs Tatcher, and I am writing to inform you that I am infortunately rather worried about your daughter's health. Not only does she appear to see considerably overweight, she is extraordinarily unfit, completely exhausted by even the lightest of physical exercise. As a result, she has already suffered some teasing from her classmates, and to prevent this negatively impacting her school and social life, I recommend you schedule a checkup either with Nikki's doctor or the school nurse.
Please note: I'm not trying to insult your daughter or offend you; I just want what is the best for Nikki.
Yours sincerely, Jobie Tatcher.'
Linda let the letter drop from her hands, shocked. It fluttered to the carpet, landing next to an old food stain. She looked up at her daughter, sitting in a chair at the other side of the room, her face still slightly red from the walk in from the car.
Suddenly...
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Mystery unveiled.

choices: Try to get her somewhat fit
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Well... that wasn't entirely it. Rather it was that Nikki was Ridiculously fat for her age. And yet despite all that she did have friends that supported her choice
of being well, being fat. How much did she weigh? Surely in the triple digits, considering the amount of blubber that had been packed onto her daughter's small
frame. How fat did she want to be? Considering the evidence before her and Nikki's ravenous hunger, she worried that Nikki would be immobile by the end of the year,
if not sooner. But it's not like she can force her to exercise, all her previous attempts to get her to lose weight failed. Nikki had friends to help her, and God
knows that you should not separate a child from their friends without a really good reason. And she had no real good reason to move out of town.

Linda sighed and started to prepare dinner for her ravenous daughter. What can she do? She can't really save Nikki from herself, she's so bull-headed that it'd be
near-impossible to do so and possibly not worth it in the end. Since she want's to be fat or, God forbid, the fattest, what could Linda do to help Nikki?
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: She saw that Nikki really was fat.

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Linda sighed. No matter what she she could do to get Nikki to exercise, it would probably end badly and strain their Mother/Daughter relationship more. Letting her eat what she wants, while dangerous to them financially, would repair their relationship a bit. And maybe, in due time, she could goad Nikki to exercise, even just a bit. But sadly, as is, that time was not now...

Dinner had come and went, a large amount of spaghetti and sauce for the whole family, even if half of it ended up in Nikki's stomach. She laid on the couch, mindlessly playing with her belly as Linda walked up behind the couch to talk. "Nikki" Nikki looked up to her mom, her chubby cheeks lightly jiggling from the motion "I read the letter that you had dropped" Nikki's expression made a downturn, as she expected her mother to be mad at her again, "Your teacher wrote how you were being teased in school for your weight." Nikki pouted, trying her best not to remember what Raiza had said to her, "and that you couldn't do much in gym class. But now... I realize how... well, rude I have been. Sure some exercise would be good for you, but if you really want to be... fat, I won't get in your way."

Nikki was shocked, as she did not expect her mother to be so understanding now of all times, but it was welcome after the horrid affair that was the school day. "Thanks Mom!" she said, smiling. "Now now, there is something I have to do. Your teacher asked me to schedule you a checkup. She had recommended the school nurse, but I'd prefer someone with all the tools on hand for a checkup of your... size." 'And considering the last two times she's had a checkup she came out healthy,' Linda thought 'if the pattern repeats, I'll just let her eat what she wants.'

Nikki pouted a bit, but remembered the last two times she had a checkup she was considered healthy, and what lingering fear she had dissipated.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: A Figurative Weight Lifted

When she was pregnant from Nikki she looked forward to on hot days ran in the garden and do some exercise or that she did a sport. Gymnastics, running, football, baseball, hockey, volleyball, swimming even cheer leading and ballet would be fine with her but she did't do any of those things. That she was teased was't a surprise to her. That was what she always feared but knew was gonna happen if Nikki did't lose weight. Still she did't liked it that her daughter was teased. She looked at Nikki who was busy stuffing her face.

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: What was in the letter?

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
That evening, as Nikki ate another large-adult size meal, her mother picked up the phone and rang her daughter's school. It rang twice, before a man's voice answered.
"Westhama Elementary School, this is the desk. What do you need?"
It was Linda's last chance to change her mind. She looked over at her five year old daughter, saw the round belly, the double chin, the thick thighs... this was something she had to do, for both their sakes.
"I'd like to book a school nurse appointment for my daughter please, under recommendation from a 'Mrs Tatcher'."
"Not a problem miss, what is the name of your daughter?"
"Nikki."
"One minute."
Linda stood silently as the man presumably entered a search into the computer. After a minute he spoke again.
"Nikki from class 2B, taught by Mrs Tatcher. I've made an appointment for half past eleven tomorrow morning. Is that okay?"
"Yes- yes that's fine. Thanks a lot." She hung up, feeling relief that she'd managed to book the appointment. It always felt like a betrayal, like a failure when she had to book examinations for her child; she knew that it was her fault that Nikki was overweight. Still, she wasn't that large, definitely not large enough to have any problems now, at any rate; this was just future-proofing really.
She put the phone down, and went back over to join Nikki at the table. Her daughter was now serving herself seconds from the pan of food in the middle of the table. For a moment, Linda considered stopping her, but then she relaxed. She'd booked the appointment hadn't she? For now, let her eat what she wanted. Maybe she'd even get out the pot of ice cream in the freezer, as a treat before tomorrow. Perhaps she'd even dig out the caramel sauce...
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Dinner phone call.

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
The following morning, after she'd dropped Nikki off at school, Linda sat in the car for a long while just outside the school gates, thinking. She hadn't told Nikki about the appointment; she'd been too tired for the inevitable argument, but as she'd watched her daughter waddle into the school building, it had felt like a betrayal of trust. Hopefully she wouldn't be too annoyed; the young girl had a temper to match her appetite.
Finally, she put the car into gear and accelerated away from the school. If she delayed much longer, she'd be late for work!
//////
A few hours later, Nikki was sitting cross-legged on the carpet along with the rest of her class, listening disinterestedly as Mrs Tatcher read them a story about a crocodile who wore a top hat. She didn't like carpet time at all. She thought the stories were boring and too difficult to understand, for a start, but her legs also went numb from her weight, making her feel very uncomfortable. Worst, the classroom was quite small, and though there were only ten of them in the class space was very limited, so she was pressed up against the other kids. It made her slightly self conscious how much space she took up with her wide form. Suddenly the door opened, and a plump woman entered the classroom, quickly going to stand at the back. Mrs Tatcher finished her sentence, then looked up at her.
"Mrs Caroline, what can I do to help you?" she asked.
"I've got a school nurse's appointment for Nikki." The woman answered shortly.
Mrs Tatcher gestured at the woman.
"Go on Nikki, go with Mrs Caroline." Confused, the young girl heaved herself to her feet, and followed the plump woman out the door.
"I don't think I have an appointment." said Nikki, trying to match the woman's speedy pace with difficulty.
"Your mom booked it last night, now hurry up."
The answer only made her feel more confused; surely her mom would have told her if she'd had an appointment?
Finally, they arrived at the nurse's office, much to Nikki's exhausted relief. She leaned against the wall, panting for breath; that quick walk had been exhausting. Meanwhile, Mrs Caroline poked her head into the room and had a brief conversation with the nurse, before shooing the young girl inside.
//////
Mr Ragni had worked as the school nurse at Westhama school for 13 years, and he had seen a huge amount of ill kids come through his office; today, however, he would have the dubious pleasure of examining the largest five year old he would ever meet. He had been told by Mrs Tatcher why he was to see Nikki -a general health check-up with a focus on weight-based issues- but he hadn't expected her to be so... big. He had a daughter himself, a tiny six year old girl, and though she had a big appetite he was always careful to feed her a balanced diet. Seeing Nikki, still out of breath from the short walk down the corridor, made him wonder how her parents had failed so badly at something so simple. Still; he had a job to do. He smiled widely.
"Hello Nikki. Do you know why you're here?" he asked.
"No. Mom didn't book anything." she wasn't the smartest child, and had never registered the phone call at dinner as anything relevant.
"Oh, she must have forgotten to tell you. Don't worry though, we're just going to do a quick examination, okay?"
"What's an examination?" she asked.
"Well, I just have a- I have a look at you. To make sure you're healthy."
"I'm very healthy!" Nikki said, offended.
"I'm sure you are, it's just my job to make sure. Now, first you just need to stand as straight as you can on this little pad. He gestured at the bright painted weight and height measurement machine.
She waddled over and stood on it, and Mr Ragni checked her height; 104 cm, or 3'5.
Then he checked the scale. God... 294,5 pounds. He knew adults who weighed less than that! Nonetheless, he checked the BMI chart, though he knew the result already. Morbidly obese. He struggled to keep the optimistic smile on his face as he felt a surge of sympathy for the girl.
"See! I'm fine." said the girl. He looked at her.
"Well, er, let's finish the examination first, okay? You can step off the pad now."
He rummaged around in a drawer for a moment, before finding his tape measure and turning back to Nikki. Pulling her outgrown shirt up, he looped the tape measure around her soft, rounded midsection. His hands were cold against her warm flesh as he pulled the tape round, before he encountered a problem; it was too short. Even pulled tight around her middle, his 50 centimeter measure was too short. He half-heartedly attempted to measure her hips, but though they were slightly smaller than her waist, it was still a futile effort.
He returned the useless tape back to his drawer, before turning back to Nikki, stethoscope in hand.
'Could you take off your shirt, please?' he asked, and once she had obliged he placed the cold metal of the device against her flabby chest, listening to her heartbeat. After a long, uncomfortable minute, he sat back again, making a note on a piece of paper.
'Well, I think that should be all, you can-' he started, but Nikki butted in.
'I told you I was healthy.' She said smugly.
He looked at the girl, still breathing slightly fast from the walk, belly sagging over the waistband of her tight shorts, and considered for a second.
He was going to have to talk to her mother'
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Ominous appointment.

choices: Fast forward to the end of the schoolday
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Nikki walked back to her class and walked to her friends. It was free time and kids were playing, drawing and looking in books.
