Of course little talking was actually done by Nikki during this time. No, she wasn't trying to be rude to her old friends, or the new gainer girl she had befriended today. It was just after all the horrible exercise she had to do at gym she wasn't just her usual hungry self, she was STARVING....and it showed.

By the time she had finished telling her birthday story to Rue, she had already downed almost half her lunch. Heck, thanks to how many sandwiches she had eaten it looked like the tubby little girl was building a sandwich bag fort on the table, not that she really cared all that much.

However, this caught two sets of eyes in the room. First, poor Rue could see this clearly. In fact, she was amazed at how fast Nikki was eating. Of course she didn't realize that she was going at a very good pace herself. After all, she had exercised too and, even if it wasn't at Nikki's level yet, she was a chubby little girl and chubby little girls loved to eat.

Of course both gluttonous girls also caught the eye of Ms. Thatcher. The poor teacher just knew it wasn't right that those two were eating so much. However, she also didn't want to make either girl feel bad. Oh, what a dilemma she had! Especially when it came to Nikki. She didn't want this cute little fat girl to get any fatter (who looked even fatter thanks to how much she had eaten), but she could tell from before just how sensitive she would be.

She came to a decision right then and there. She wouldn't talk to Nikki, or Rue for that matter, in class. But the next available time she had with either girl alone she'd let them know how they should cut back on their food.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Lunch continues

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
"Well I'm stuffed." Tanja said satisfied.

"I'm not." Nikki said looking at her friend. "But I never am so what does it matter?"

"You sure ate a lot... but you're still not full?" Rue asked. "I thought my sister could eat a lot but you..."

"I thought you said you had a brother." Denvert said.

"I have both. A little thin brother, and a fat older sister. She 19 and she's a BBW. Her boyfriends loves BBW's."

"BBW. Is that some kind of car?" Robbie asked joining their conversation.

"No! BBW stands for Big Beautiful Woman. At least that's what she told me." Rue said.

"Your big sister is already 19?" Tanja asked.

"Well to be totally honest she's my half sister. We have different mothers. When she was about five years old her mother died in a terrible car accident. But our father remarried with my mother. She also loves my mother even while it is't her real mother. Anyway that's why she's so much older then me. But I love her as a sister." Rue answered.

"So your sister is also fat." Denvert asked interested.

"Yeah that's because after her mother died she was so sad she started to eat way too much and got fat.When she finally realized how fat she got she first started to look on the web how to lose weight but soon found out that there was a large group of people that loved fat woman and liked their girlfriend big round and soft. She found out she liked the extra weight too. So she became a BBW. Or that's what my father told me. She now lives with her boyfriend. She visits every now and then."

"All right kids pay attention!" Miss Thatcher said. "Time for next class. Grab your pencils or whatever you use to draw with. We're gonna make a snake. Each of you grab a piece of paper and draws a piece of the snake. after that we put them all together. All right start."

All kids grabbed some paper. Rue fast started drawing. Nikki was more thinking what she was gonna do. At home she had drawn a snake sometimes but aways colored them totally green and that seemed a bit boring to her. She looked over at what Rue was drawing and was jealous at how good Rue was drawing. She was making a nice pattern. Rue was very good at drawing.

"That's very good." Nikki said.

"Thanks." said Rue. "My parents and sister also say that. They suggest I might need to become a artist.... I don't know... maybe."

Rue did gave Nikki a idea. She started to draw a pattern. Different from the one Rue was making since she did't want to copy her friend but she must admit she soon started to become happy with the result.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: My sister

choices: But Linda, or Rue's sister or Tina showed up to take them home
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
The rest of the day was pretty busy. Thankfully, there wasn't any more gym or running around. It was mostly drawing and listening to Ms. Thatcher either teach them a lesson, or read them a nice story. Most kids liked this, but a few were board by it too.

Nikki and her group was pretty okay with the rest of the day. Of course both tubby girls, and even Denvert, was pretty hungry though since they hadn't had a snack after lunch. However, both girls were just happy they weren't picked on again. Of course that was mostly given the fact everyone was kept so busy with the different lessons.

However, the time had come for the end of the day. Since this was kindergarten the kids got out at about 1pm, instead of the normal 4pm and they're class was the only one outside at the moment.

About half the students were loaded on to the small bus, apparently living far enough away to need some form of transportation to get home. About a quarter of the other students had left to walk home. Thankfully this group included Raiza and her cohorts so neither Nikki or Rue would have to be teased by them again.

However, there was still one person who was looking to talk to them. Ms. Thatcher hadn't gotten a chance to discuss their weight with either girl before and now seemed like a good time as ever. She slowly walked over to both girls...
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: End of the schoolday

choices: Nikki's mother asked her how school was
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
But suddenly a car drove by and stopped. The window went down and they saw Tina wearing sunglasses and she smiled widely showing her pearl white teeth.

"Hi guys. Your mothers asked me to pick you our up since they were kind of busy."

"Is this your car?" Robbie asked in disbelief.

"No. I would like that but it's not. It's my father's car. Anyway I could borrow it. We have three cars at home anyway. Come on jump in."

Then she saw Rue standing there and did't really knew what to do. She looked over her shoulder at the four kids who were sitting there on a row.

"Eh who's that girl over there?"

"Oh that's Rue. She's our new friend. She also likes big bellies." Nikki said with a smile. "Can't you give her a lift home?"

"Well perhaps. I mean I'm not sure if anyone else is picking her up. If I take her while someone else s picking her up people would think I'm kidnapping her. But if she needs to walk home and does't live to far away... sure I can take her."

"Hee Rue! Is someone picking you up or do you need to walk home? If you need to walk home you can come with us."

"My mother is coming to pick me up. But thanks anyway." Rue said with a smile.

The kids waved goodbye and Ms Thatcher just saw the car with four kids drive away. She looked down at Rue. But just when she wanted to just talk to her Rue saw the car of her mother and run away. Ms Thatcher decided to talk to them another time. After all she still had a entire school year to talk to them. She sighed and walked back inside.

In the meantime Tina was driving the kids home.

"Eh Tina you said you family had three cars. But then your family must be kind of... rich. Then why do you work at he bakery?" Robbie said.

"Well I want to work to earn my own money. Your're right that if I did't want to I did't have to work and just buy things with my dad's money like my sister, but I want to be able to earn my own money."

"That's very good from you!" Tanja said. " You appreciate stuff more when you have to work for it."

Tina looked a moment over her shoulder to look at Nikki's big belly. It was a lot of work to make hat belly so big. She first put Nikki of since she lived closer.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: I'm here to pick you up

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Waving goodbye to her friends, Nikki waddled happily through her front door, letting out a loud "Mommy, I'm home!"
Linda appeared almost instantly, kneeling down to her daughter and wrapping her arms around her tight. "Hi sweetie, how was school?"
"Fun! I met some new friends and some of my other friends were there too!" Nikki squeaked happily, a huge smile on her face.
"Awww, that's good," Linda smiled warmly, "what'd you do today?"
"Oh we learned spelling and played games and..." Nikki trailed off, her smile dissolving. Linda quickly caught on. "Did someone give you any trouble?"
Nikki nodded. "This girl called Raiza. Her and her friends were really nasty to me and my friends, calling us names because we're bigger than them."
"What?" Linda asked sternly, scowling softly, "What did she do?"
"Make fun of me because I couldn't touch my toes, and how big I am and stuff..." Nikki mumbles, sniffling at the thoughts of earlier.
Linda, scared at making her daughter upset over the bullying, strokes Nikki's head gently. "There now, you're safe at home now. Why don't we get you a little snack until dinner, eh?"
Nikki's chubby little face brightened up again, a soft rumble emitting from her stomach.


"There you go, my little princess," Linda smiled gently, setting a box of cookies next to Nikki, who was sitting snuggled in the middle of the couch surrounded by fattening treats, "you cheer yourself up and mommy will think of what to do with this Raiza girl."
"Thanks mommy!" Nikki grinned brightly before beginning to gobble up her haul. Linda smiled and headed back to the kitchen to think.
Now her daughter was getting bullied because of her size! What could she do about it?
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Nikki's mother asked her how school was

choices: She brings in another big box the same size
She brings in a bunch of smaller boxes
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Tina dropped Nikki off and the poor girl sighed at this. She didn't want to go face her mother after everything that had happened today. Plus she knew it would only be a very small snack for her, even after going so long without food and she was STARVING!

The poor girl frowned as she looked back, expecting to see the car drive away to take Denvert and the others back their places. However, the tubby kindergartner lit up in joy as this didn't happen. Instead the other doors on the car all opened and everyone got out.

Nikki looked up at Tina a bit confused, although still happy to have this fat loving friends around her. Tina smiled down at the child and explained,

"Your mom had to go run some errands so I get to watch you and everyone for a little while until she gets back." She said happily, knowing that Nikki was liking this idea quite a bit.

Soon the others were happily standing next to her and everyone watched as Tina went around the car and popped the trunk. After a few moments, the teen came back out carrying a large box nearly half her size. She carefully opened the door to Nikki's house and let everyone in as she proceeded to the kitchen and set the box on the table.

"There's a couple more treats I need to bring in. I'll be back in second." She said huffing a little from all the strain carrying the box had took.

She then turned to Robbie and said. "Why don't you go get everyone some plates and some forks. I've got some nice after school snacks for extra hungry kids." She said with a wink at Nikki.

She smirked as she went to get the rest, knowing Nikki was probably pretty hungry and could also use a nice "comfort food" snack after her first day of school.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Nikki's mother is't at home

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Tina carried in a bunch of smaller boxes. Nikki licked her lips. No matter how much it was, most of it would end up in her huge belly. It felt a bit strange that Nicole was't here. She missed her a bit.

"I did't know you had a younger sibling." Tanja said when she saw the playpen.

Nikki rolled with her eyes. Her parents bought a lot of things lately for her younger sibling. Small fences for on the stairs, a bed for babies, baby clothes, the playpen and lot of other stuff. Nikki must admit she liked the idea of having a little brother or sister. Soon she would be the oldest. The oldest. That sounded good. She thought she would be a good big sister.

"I don't have. At least not yet. But I will have soon."

"Her mother is pregnant." Denvert said who already heard the news.

"Oh. I though your mother just gained some weight. Maybe to understand you a bit better."

"No. She did't." Nikki said flatly. "But I gonna be the big sister."

"Well you're big that's for sure." Tina said. "I'm sure you're gonna be a great big sister."

"Yeah but I'm pretty hungry So what do you have for us?"

"Well there are just some small cakes in those boxes, and in here is... well the boss of the bakery wanted to see what I could do so he told me to make something so I made a wedding cake. He seemed very happy with he result. But there was't a wedding anytime soon. He waited a few days hoping that someone would come. If we waited much longer the wedding cake would go bad and hat would be a waste so I bought it for you. I also now are allowed to decorate pies and cakes."

"I never tasted a wedding cake." Denvert said while Tina took the cake out of the box.

All children let out a soft: "Aaaaah!" Seeing how beautiful the cake was. Four layers covered with white frosting and decorated with hundreds of tiny things probably made from marzipan. But it was beautifully decorated.
All kids understood why the boss wanted to sell it. This pie would cost a lot of money.

"How much did this cost you?" Tanja asked.

"Not so much. Normally it would be kind of expensive but since I worked there, I made the cake and it would else go to waste, I got a great discount. Anyway that''s not as important or as much fun if the next thing. Eat it!"

Tina started to cut the pie.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Big sister, big cake

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Tina happily cut everyone a piece of the pie from one of the smaller boxes. It was a beautiful apple pie and one of the largest the bakery served. Needless to say all the kids were excited about this. Well all but one were excited about this.

Nikki wasn't paying much attention to the pie. True this was an odd phenomena, given what a hungry little fat girl she normally was. However, she was focused solely on the wedding cake before her. She almost drooled at the sight of such a yummy treat. It was the perfect size for her too.

Tina smirked happily as she set a plate down with the remaining pie on it in front of the obese 5 year old. With the four slices she had taken out of it, nearly half the pie was still there. This was the only thing that broke the tubby child's train of thought. After all, she wasn't one to turn down food.

Nikki happily rubbed her pudgy hands together as a nice big glass of milk was poured for her. She instantly began to dig in, heaping big globs of the tasty, sugary, pastry into her mouth as fast as she could. She was making a bit of mess as she did so, being so eager to finally get something in her extra hungry tummy.

Despite all this, no one stopped her. Heck, Tina and Denvert both looked on in pleased awe as the overweight kindergartner packed away the apple pie. Both loved how much this little plumper could eat and how much she seemed to enjoy every second of it.

However, all good things come to an end and, with a big burp, Nikki literally licked her plate clean.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: They eat the pie

choices: After the cake Nikki still wants more
After the cake Tina thinks of something else they can do
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
"That was yummy. But now the big one." Nikki said while she looked at the wedding cake.

"He wait for us!" Robbie yelled. "We also want a piece of wedding cake!"

Nikki was't happy about that but waited. After all the others were her friends and she liked them. She looked at Tina who friendly smiled at her with a perfect smile and teeth to match.
Tina liked Nikki so much. She always liked fat and gaining kids, so she was happy she was the babysitter of Nikki and Nicole. But she did't normally fatten kids up. But Nikki and Nicole both liked it so there was no harm in that. Tina only wished there would be work where she could work with them. She was a pretty hard worker. But she would like to work with fat children, but then it would be work where she need to help kids lose weight while she just wanted to do he opposite thing. Working with kids that need to gain would't work also since then she would be working with skinny kids with anorexia. If they would gain weight they would be cured and leave before they got fat. It was complicated. Only with Nikki and Nicole she could do what she really wanted.
Denvert and Tanja fast ate their pie so Nikki did't have to wait to long. Robbie also fast ate his pie. After the kids were all finished Tina took the knife and looked at the wedding cake.

"If you cut a slice out of that cake, do you start at the top layer and cut down through all three layers or do you cut out slices from the first layer? Because that would't be fair since he people who would get cake first would have a smaller piece."

"I don't know for sure." Tina said softly while she pushed the knife in the cake.

"Well I don't need to have such a big slice. I'm not a big eater." Tanja said.

Tina still cut out pretty big pieces for Tanja, Robbie and Denvert and also a piece for herself but more then half of the cake was left for Nikki. as soon if they started eating Nikki started eating like if she had't eaten in days. With both hands she stuffed lumps of the wedding cake in her mouth. Tina watched enjoying seeing this and at the same time made sure Nikki would't choke. The others also liked their cake but Tanja and Robbie both knew that they woud' be able to finish their piece but seeing how Nikki ate that would't be a problem.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: The wedding cake

choices: She gives her some more snacks
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
By this point everyone was done their eating. However, Nikki didn't get the left over cake. It was Denvert who got it. He wasn't trying to be mean, but he was a tubby little boy and wanted a bit more food.

However, the little boy's second helping didn't come close to comparing to Nikki's massive cake binge. The tubby little girl got all two bottom layers of cake for herself. Since this was meant to feed 100-200 guests for a wedding, both layers were pretty large but not large enough for an ever hungry little fat 5 year old who devoured the whole thing in only 7 minutes.

With a pleased burp, Nikki licked the icing off her hands, which at this point were completely covered in it. Her cute, chubby, face also looked as though she had an unevenly grown beard of frosting. However much of a mess it was, it only made her look cuter.

Of course, this wasn't the biggest change on the girl. Her already obese belly had pushed out further with the onslaught of so much food. True the massive dome was so large it was sometimes hard to tell immediately if she had gained anything or not. However, Tina could clearly see the tubby young dome was already a good inch or so large than before. Needless to say Tajna, Denvert and Tina were thrilled at this sight.

"Mmmm....yummy. Can I have some more?" She asked sweetly to Tina as she patted her exposed young tummy and let out another burp.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: After the cake Nikki still wants more

choices: Tina thinks of somrthing else they can do
Fast forward to when Linda comes home
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
"Well I do have few small cupcakes left." Tina said. "But the others... "

"She can have mine." Tanja said and burped softly. "I'm stuffed!"

"The same here." Robbie said.

"Well I would still like a cupcake." Denvert said. "But Nikki if your mother get another child, what do you want? A brother or a sister?"

"Hmmm. I never really thought of that. I really like Nicole so a sister which I could share secrets with or play can be fun... but at he other hand a friendly brother to play with can also be nice. We can also play."

"You like Nicole Nikki, but your sibling might be nothing like Nicole." Tina said. "Just because you like Nicole does't want to say you like your sibling if it is a sister. Perhaps she might act a bit like Nicole but maybe not."

"And we all know your mother. She wants a slender and active kid as a daughter. Like Tina Turner, Sharah Michelle Gellar or... Alicia Silverstone. Well You know she does't want you to become fat. So I don't think she would want your sister to become fat?" Tanja said.

"Yeah... I know. But I became fat while she did't want to." Nikki said. "So perhaps she... "

"He or she probably would't have a endless appetite." Tina said. "Besides that your mother probably would't let the same thing happen to him or her as what happened to you. Here some cupcakes."

Nikki grabbed the cupcakes but instead of wolfing them down like normally she ate them slowly. Softly chewing without really noticing what she ate. The thoughts were going through her head about her sibling. What Tina and Tanja said made perfect sense. She never met another kid with a endless appetite so why would her sibling have it. Perhaps she would become a sportive and slender kid. Did her mother get what she wanted anyway. But even then her mother would probably not pushing Nikki so hard to exercise. That was a good thing.

"Well Nikki but perhaps he or she is pretty nice. He or she won't have the endless appetite like you, but he or she might not like exercise and rather plays with her big sister on the couch in front of the T.V. We don't know. First it has to be born. The first months it would mostly just eat and sleep and try to know who's nice and who not." Tina said.

"Good chance. Let's wait until then. Guess we can't stop it. Can we?" Nikki said.

Tina smiled.

"Maybe not. Now come up finish those cupcakes."
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Your sibling can be...

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Nikki felt a bit better now they had gone from talking about a skinny sibling to a fat lazy one like herself. Nikki would love her new brother or sister no matter how big or slender they were. However, she was hoping she'd have a nice fat brother or sister who would want to stuff his/her face alongside her. Maybe even become a plus size model like she was.

However, these thoughts quickly left her head at the mention of cupcakes. She instantly dove into the tasty treats with abandon and was about as messy with them as she had been with the cake. Heck, she nearly ate them all but did leave just enough time for Denvert to reach over and grab one for himself.

With a nice big, happy, burp Nikki was done her dessert's dessert. She patted her big round belly happily before she cutely began to lick the icing off her sausage like fingers. It was only putting a dent into it the massive amount of frosting that she had spilled on herself, but being the fatty she was, this little girl wasn't going to waste any of it.

Besides this gave her a chance to look over and see Denvert finish off his cupcake. She was finally starting to really notice that she wasn't the only one in the room gaining weight. The plump little boy had put on a few more pounds since knowing this gorgeous, gorging girl. She didn't mind this at all. In fact, like Denvert himself, she thought his extra pudge made him look all the better.

Of course Tina agreed with Nikki, however she wasn't sure how much of a "gainer" her young boyfriend was. However, that wasn't the most pressing matter for her at the moment. The snacks had run out and she had to find something fun to keep them all entertained. For her there were two possibilities:
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Tina thinks of somrthing else they can do

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
"Well since the food is gone who want to watch some T.V?" Tina asked on a happy tone. "I have a few Disney DVD's with me. Go look what kind of movie you would like to see."

All kids ran over to see which movies she took. Tina smiled. She must admit that she liked the Disney movies just as much as the little kids. She liked the songs the funny characters, especially some minor characters that Disney added for some fun. She also liked cartoons for kids. Especially some cartoons she used to watch herself when she was small like my little pony or the snorks. She had a lot of DVD's for kids and she normally took them with her when she babysat kids which was another reason why kids liked her so much as their babysitter.
She must admit that while she looked at the four kids she missed Nicole a bit. She might be younger then the other kids but she was part of their group. She liked Nikki very much because she was obese and gaining and Nicole because she was fat and also did her best to gain. It also showed on her body. Tina had eye for that detail.

Nikki, Denvert, Robbie and Tanja were busy deciding which movie the were gonna watch. It was difficult to choose since Tina took a lot of movies. Tina looked from a distance. As long if they would't start fighting on which DVD they would be watching she could let he kids decide for themselves.

"Come on I wanna watch this one." Tanja whined. "I like princesses."

"Well most Disney movies has princesses in them!" Robbie yelled.

"I want to see one with some songs. Disney songs are fun. Way more fun then the song my parents listen too!" Nikki said.

"Well hen how about: The Princess and the frog?" Denvert suggested.

"Yeah! I have't seen that one yet! Tanja said excited.

They finally decided to watch the princess and the frog.
Tina turned on the DVD and all kids got on the couch watching their eyes glued to the screen. Tina watched with them but watched every now and then at Nikki's huge belly. She filled her pretty nicely but she wondered what to do if Nikki wanted to eat again.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Which DVD?

choices: She gives Nikki some more to eat
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Nikki, like the others, watched the movie intently. However, unlike the rest of the group she did spend a good amount of her time just lovingly rubbing over her big tummy. She was enjoying how large it had gotten just in the last couple of days and playing with her blubber made her feel nice.

Of course, this gave a nice little show for Tina. The feeder teen was able to see each and every bulge of fat as the little girl stroked her gut. The creamy white dome jiggled and shook with delight as the cute little girl rubbed over her tummy. As much as Tina liked these sort of movies, it was hard for her to keep her attention on the screen while this was going on.

The other person in the room who was having some trouble paying attention was Denvert. The young boy had chosen to sit right next to his crush and got the best view of Nikki's belly play. He couldn't help but grin at how cute he thought his young girlfriend was and even held Nikki's other, free, hand as they watched the show.

However, it wasn't long until a loud grumble was heard coming from the same dome that had distracted so many. Nikki blushed a bit. Not so embarrassed by how hungry she was, despite how much had eaten earlier, but more from interrupting the movie for everyone. Still this didn't stop her from looking over at Tina and asking,

"Are there anymore snacks? I'm really getting hungry again."

Tina looked on a bit nervously. She wanted to give more to Nikki, but she knew how well received that would be by Linda when she got back. She didn't know what to do.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Nikki get's hungry

choices: Linda tries to call the mom of Raiza
Linda trie again to convince Nikki to lose weight so that the teasing stops
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Tina was still busy deciding what to do. She really wanted to feed the little butterball of a girl until she was totally stuffed. Even while she knew she would about need enough food to feed a entire playground for that. But she also knew pretty well how Linda disliked her daughters huge weight. She still wondered why. It was't like Nikki was suffering from any health problems. Fine she got fast out of breath, she was't good in exercise but she was't sick or anything.
Lucky for her she did't have to decide since she saw Linda came home.
A few second's later Linda walked in the room.

"Hi mommy. Where were you?" Nikki asked.

"Oh sorry honey. I really wanted to pick you up at your first day but I needed to go to the hospital. Looking if everything is all right with the baby."

"Is everything all right?" Nikki asked worried.

"Oh yeah don't worry Nikki. We did't thought anything was wrong. It was just a check up. But it seemed like everything was fine. Well Tina you can take the others back home."

"But were watching a movie." Tanja said disturbed. "And that alligator is just so funny."

"Ah don't worry. I'll take the movie with me. Then you can watch it at your house." Tina said while she stopped the DVD.

They all said goodbye too Nikki, Denvert also kissed her goodbye and then Tina took them too her car.

"Why did they need to go?" Nikki asked a bit disappointed that her friends needed to leave.

"Now Nikki I like your friends but now I wanna hear all about your first day. How was it? Your first day at school."

"Oh well it was fine. I met a new friend. Her name is Rue. She has a big belly and likes big bellies. Just like me."

Linda nodded with a smile. She liked it that Nikki made a new friend. It did't really mind her that Rue had or liked big bellies as long if it was a nice girl.

"I liked most things except gym. I need to touch my toes. It was very hard. I don't like Gym. I'm not so good at it. Oh and there was that one girl Riza who was teasing me and Rue the entire time. Why does she do that Mommy? She was very mean."

"Well Nikki I can't say I did't see that coming." Linda said slowly.

"Did you knew this would happen?" Nikki asked suspicious.

"Not really knowing Nikki. But I also went to school, and at school, at every school some mean kids tease other kids who are a bit different. Because they are colored, because the are stupid, because they are Jewish or because they are fat. They just wanna find someone who is a bit different from the others, and well Nikki let's be honest your weight is very different from the others. You are the fattest kid in your class are't you?"

Nikki also saw a few other fat kids like Denvert and Rue but not one single kid was close to her size. She was probably the fattest kid in school.

"Well I am by far the fattest." Nikki mumbled. "Maybe the fattest kid in school."

"Because you're so different they tease you. They do that on every school. So I knew they would tease you because you're fat. That's also a reason why I wanted you to lose weight."

Nikki looked with wide open mouth. She was a bit surprised at this and did't really know what to think of it.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: How was your first day

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Linda couldn't help but feel a bit better as she brought up this new angle that would hopefully get her obese little girl to finally start losing weight. Now she did genuinely hate that her daughter was being teased. After all, this was her daughter and she didn't want to see her being made fun of. However, she also knew that Nikki would be teased and teased a LOT because of what a little butterball she was. She hoped this would get Nikki moving and hopefully get her to stop eating so much.

"Well..." Nikki said still trying to process this little bombshell.

Nikki herself wasn't thrilled by the prospect of getting bullied by kids about how fat she was. I mean, to her all that blubber only made her look cuter. She had made some nice friends as a big fat little girl and even got a boyfriend who liked what a hungry tubby girl she was. However, she was starting to realize that there were many in the world who didn't think being fat was such a beautiful thing. Heck, even her own mother thought this way, although she would never tease or purposefully try to hurt her.

"I know it's not a good thing to be teased, and I'm really sorry it happened to you sweetheart, but given how fat you are they're not going to stop." Linda said, seeing that this might actually get her obese offspring to shed a few pounds.

Nikki was really torn. She hated dieting and really loved eating, plus she really loved how fat she was. Heck, she even wanted to be fatter. However, she wasn't sure if she could withstand the bullying all the time. Heck, if it wasn't for her friends she wasn't sure how she would have gotten through today.

It was then it hit her: there was a large group of people who DID protect her. She had a nice group of friends, with a new one she had made today, all of who actually got to know her. All of who actually liked her fat and even more importantly liked her as a person, big or small.

The decision was pretty clear to Nikki.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Linda trie again to convince Nikki to lose weig...

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
"Well then... I'm NOT going to diet!" Nikki yelled loudly.

Linda surprised looked at her fat daughter. She really thought that the teasing would convince her daughter to lose weight. But it seemed it did't work. She still wanted to gain. She could't believe it. Was't there anyway she could let her fat daughter lose weight. It was unbelievable how many times she tried and did't succeed. It seemed like her daughter could't become thin.
She softly rubbed her pregnant belly.

"Please whatever you are don't be like your sister." She whispered so soft Nikki could't hear it.

She loved Nikki very much and when the new baby was born she would't love Nikki more or less then now and she would love the new baby just as much as Nikki but she always wanted her kids to be slender and active. She always hoped she could do do some exercise with Nikki when she was pregnant. But as the years went by and Nikki's weight climbed up, Linda need to face it that Nikki would never be a slender or active kid. She just hoped her next kid would be active and slender. After all what ever Nikki had what caused that she never got full was very rare. How big was the chance her second child had the same. At the other hand her baby could see Nikki as her roll model. But of course there was also a chance Nikki would steal her food. That way she surely would stay skinny.

"It's not worth it mommy. I like being fat and getting fatter. So do Denvert, Tanja Robbie and Rue. Also Nicole and sumo Sandy but they're not on my school. But they all like it and they do protect me. They also like me fat so why would I do something what I and they don't like. The mean way more to me that what one stupid girl said to me."

Linda was proud how wise that last sentence sounded. Even if she was't so happy with the weight gain.

"Eh mommy could you do something so I don have to go to gym anymore?" Nikki asked with her sweetest look.

"Come on Nikki you did't think seriously I would do that. This way you get at least some exercise. It's more exercise then you ever did in your life. It would be good for you. There's no reason why you should't go to gym, and perhaps you lose some weight this way."

"But it's so haaaaaaaaard!" Nikki whined.

"To bad sweethart. If you were't so fat then it would probably be easier."

Nikki angry went sitting at the table. She looked at her mother.

"When do we eat?" Nikki asked.

""When your father get's home. He would take some junk food on the way home."

"Hmmm. Junk food. I like junk food." Nikki said and licked her lips.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: I'm not gonna diet!

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Nikki sat grumpily at that the table. She was not at all thrilled with her mother's response. She knew she shouldn't be surprised her mother wasn't going to help her stop exercising, but gym was not fun at all for the little obese girl. She would have loved just to sit there and watch everyone else run about...preferably while stuffing herself with something tasty.

It was at this time her belly let out a grumble. She looked down at the massive, round, tummy that covered her lap and gave it a loving rub. Despite what her mom wanted, she wasn't going to get rid of her beautiful blubber anytime soon. In fact she planned on adding a bit more to her frame once her dad got home with the food.

It was then she noticed something rare for her to see. Her mother's slight bulging baby belly let out a loud growl of its own. Linda blushed as she gave the dome a loving rub just like Nikki had to her own a little while ago. She was getting a bit hungrier than normal, now that she was eating for two.

Nikki grinned a little at this. She actually liked to see her mom with a nice "fat" tummy on her. Yes, she knew that was her baby sister in there but still she thought her mommy looked much better this way. Unlike Linda though, Nikki really hoped her soon to be sibling followed in her in footsteps. She really liked the idea of a nice fat little sister to gorge alongside her. She giggled a little to herself as thought about how similar it would be to Denvert having Nichole.

It was then her father came home with the tasty food her mother promised he would bring. Nikki licked her lips and looked over to see her dad carrying...
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Dinner

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Bram Came Inside The House With 5 Sheet Pizzas. "I Got Pizzas!" Bram said "Bram, You Got 5 Sheet Pizzas" Lydia Said, Dispointed. Lydia Signed And Then Looked At Nikki. Bram Started To Worry "I Got Way More Than 5 Sheet Pizzas, What Will Lydia Think?!" Bram Worried In His Head. Bram Decided To Tell The Truth. "That's Just The Pizzas I'm Holding" Bram Said "Then How Many Sheet Pizzas Did You Order?!" Lydia asked "I Don't Think You Want To Know..." Bram Said While Getting Nervous "No, I Don't Want To Know, But I Need To Know!" Lydia Said. Bram Gulped, Then Said "I Got 50 Sheets Pizzas, And I'm Holding Just 5 Of Them" Lydia Laughed, As She Did Not Believe Bram. "I'm Actually Serious!" Bram Said Sternly.

Just Then, The Pizza Guy Came In With The 45 Other Sheet Pizzas, And To His Dismay, He Saw Only Bram, Lydia, And Nikki. Lydia Gasped And Then Fainted In Front Of The Pizza Guy

"What Kind Of Idiot Orders 50 Sheet Pizzas For 3 People?!" The Pizza Guy Said Angrily

Bram Took The Rest Of The Sheet Pizzas, Then Said "The Kind Of Idiot Who Has A 218 Pound 6 Year Old Who's A Plus-Size Model!"

"The Pizzas Are On The House, Idiot" The Pizza Guy Said Angrily

"Won't Your Boss Get Mad?" Bram Asked "I Mean, That's Over 150$ Of Free Pizza!"

"I Don't Care About My Damn Job!" The Pizza Guy Said Angrily "Hell, I Want To Get Fired!"

"Well, When You Get Fired, Please Came Over Tonight" Bram Said "Or Next Week, If Your Boss Goes Easy On You"

"Trust Me, My Boss Won't Go Easy On Me" The Pizza Guy Said Angrily

"Why Do You Say That?" Bram Asked

"This Is The 18th Time I've Charged Nothing" The Pizza Guy Said Angrily "Do You Think My Boss Won't Fire Me?!"

"Oh" Bram Said, Embarrassed

"Well, See You Later" The Pizza Guy Said Less Angrily "Oh, And Sorry If I Was Being Rude, I Just Hate My Job!"

"Oh, Don't Worry" Bram Said "It's Pretty Hard To Push My Buttons"

Just As Bram Finished Talking, The Pizza Guy Had Left The House

The Pizza Guy Smiled As He Was Leaving

"Well, I Better Take Your Mom Upstairs" Bram Said "Enjoy The 50 Sheet Pizzas, Nikki"

Bram Picked Up Lydia And Took Her Upstairs

Nikki Looked At All The Pizza Bram Had Gotten Her

Then The Choice Was Clear...
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: A huge amount of food

choices: Tonight time for a midnight snack
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Just a small amount of food. Well small for her at least. Just one bag of fries and a croquette for each.

"Hi dad. Where is the rest of the food?" Nikki asked.

"Eh this is all the food." Bram said calmly.

Nikki looked like she was gonna cry. She knew she could easily eat her and her parents food and still eat way more. But this was just so little. She did her best not too cry but it was very hard for her. She was hungry and wanted food. More then just such a tiny amount of food. She looked at her mother looked calmly what surprised her. Since her mother's belly got bigger she also ate more food.
Linda grabbed the bag of fries first and poured a big amount on her plate. Nikki did't liked this. This mend that there would be even less food for her.

"Mommy why do you take so much?" Nikki asked sad.

"Well Nikki I now need to eat for two. For me and for your little sibling and my child. You want your little sibling to be healthy right." Linda said.

"Well I guess but you also want me to don't eat, So why should he or she..." Nikki started but suddenly was cut of by Linda.

"Nikki I don't want you to don't eat." Linda said calmly. "I just want you to eat less then you normally eat so you lose some weight. Besides the food that is left for you is enough for a girl from your age. So stop whining."

Nikki sadly looked at the amount of food on her plate. She would be hungry tonight. She looked angry at her mother and squinted her eyes. Nikki finished her food in record time and angry asked: "I'm done. Can I leave the table?"

"Sure." Linda said on a sweet tone.

Nikki got off the table and went upstairs to her room. While she got dressed in her pajamas she got a idea, Tonight she was gonna have a midnight snack.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: little dinner

choices: A nice big bowl of jello
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Nikki did go to sleep that night, something that actually surprised her. She hadn't planned on sleeping as she really wanted to wait up until her pre-planned midnight snack. However, with so little food in her obese belly and all the exercise she was forced to do today, her young body couldn't hold off sleeping.

However, her hungry tummy woke her about 12:30 in the morning. She frowned down at the dome. She hated having it so empty. Fortunately, she knew her parents were going to be asleep by this point and the ungraded kitchen would be all hers.

So, Nikki slowly got out of her bed. Despite how careful she was, the tubby little girl's mattress did make a lot of noise, having been relieved of the heavy weight that was sitting on it. Even now, Nikki's pyjamas were too tight and a nice sliver of her big, round, belly poked out between her pants and shirt. She rubbed that area and licked her lips. It was snack time!

The fat child slowly, and as quietly as she could, went downstairs to the kitchen. Flipping on the lights she licked her lips again as she thought of the first place she should check. She quickly chose the fridge and opened the door to the appliance with excitement.

Before her stood a treasure trove of food that made her fat kindergartner tummy rumble. She didn't know where to start and instantly grabbed the first dish that she saw: her mother's potato salad. She reached in and grabbed messy handfuls of the substance and greedily ate down everything she could get out of the dish, even going so far as to lick clean the container itself.

Nikki let out a nice happy burp before she moved onto the next things she found.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Tonight time for a midnight snack

choices: Nikki wakes up before her parents
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
She saw some left over fried chicken and ate it like a starved animal licking the bones totally clean. There was't the smallest piece of meat left on them. Nikki belched and looked further for food.

"I wish mommy would buy some more food. Especially since she's eating for two now. Just because her belly is so big because there's a child inside it. My belly is even bigger but I'm not allowed to eat for two because there's no baby inside."

She reached inside and found some sausages and fast started to stuff her face. She also grabbed some mayonnaise and ketchup and poured some in her mouth after each bite of sausage. When the sausages were gone she ate the remaining mayonnaise and ketchup. Just right out of the bottle without anything else.
She looked again inside.

"Ah what does it matter anyway!" Nikki suddenly said.

She grabbed everything she could find and stuffed it in her mouth. Sticks of butter. She poured jars empty in her mouth. She even ate the lettuce with a lot of dressing. Drank the bottles with juice and soda empty. There was't the smallest piece of food left in the fridge. Nikki belched loudly. She listened but did't heard anything.

"Well mommy is gonna find out anyway I've been down here." Nikki mumbled to herself. "She's gonna be mad... she's gonna be furious. So why not eat more. If she's gonna be furious anyway. Besides I'm not full yet."

Nikki knew very well that that last sentence did't mend much to here.
She opened the cupboard and the first thing she saw were three bags of pretzels. She ripped each bag open and emptied them in her huge stomach. After the last bag she saw a box of cookies and she wolfed them down like she had't eaten in
days. She looked further and found two boxes of donuts. She stuffed them all in her mouth one by one. After that she let out a huge belch and passed out on the kitchen floor surrounded bye empty jars, boxes, bags and bottles.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Midnight binge

choices: She wakes up Nikki and yells at her
Bram comes in and calms her down
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
So there lay Nikki for the remainder of the night. She had a smile on her face and would unconsciously rub her bloated tummy every now and then. Needless to say, the fat little girl was very happy at this point.

Why shouldn't she be? She had just eaten anything she could find. Yes, the 5 year old glutton had emptied both the fridge and the pantry, just to fill her obese fat kid tummy. What a tummy it was too. Now, Nikki's PJs never fit her all that well but now her top was pushed up to be only a belly shirt. Her PJ bottoms were also forced down, although still covered everything that needed to be. In between rose the mountain of little kindergartner girl belly. It sloshed slightly as the little cutie slept and rose and fell with each breath she took.

As cute as the little fat girl looked like this, anger was the only thing Linda could feel as she came into the kitchen. The blimping pregnant woman was up early, and after a bought of morning sickness, was ready to eat and eat quite a bit. It seemed that now she was pregnant, she was getting hungrier by the day and craved a nice big breakfast to feed her balloon belly, which poked out of her pink maternity PJ top with the vertical slit down the front for the dome to emerged.

However, a kitchen brimming with food ready for a hungry mom to be was not what she found. Instead she found the horrible mess of empty containers, opened cupboard doors and one fat little girl with a far bigger tummy, stained PJs and a smile only a well-fed fatty could have.

Needless to say, Linda was not at all happy and waddled over to the dozing plumper, ready to wake her in anger.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Linda finds her next morning

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
"Nikki what have you done?"

Nikki's eyes slowly opened, but flew wide open when she saw her mom. It was obvious her mom was furious. Nikki knew also exactly why her mother was angry. Just like normally she ate too much.

"I had a midnight snack. Come on you know that dinner yesterday was't enough for me."

"Oh so that you ate everything in the kitchen is my fault?" She asked screaming.

"Well. Part of it is yeah. You knew very well I would be hungry."

"I you would eat less you would't be such a fat girl! Then perhaps those mean girls at school would't tease you so much. They just do it because you're so grossly fat. Is't it wiser to lose the weight so they don't tease you any more?"

"Not if I don't want to. This is all you you're talking about. You want me to lose weight but you never ask me what I want. I told you about a hundred times I like being fat and I want to stay fat. Even if they tease me. So what? I have friends who liked me. Were you skinny when you were a girl and did you have friends?" Nikki asked.

"I was slender yeah, and I had more then enough friends. You can also have friends without looking like a overfed pig. You should thank me that I tried to don't let you eat too much yesterday but instead of that you emptied the entire kitchen in your fat gut. How can you stand that fat gut?"

"Just the way you can stand that bony body of you." Nikki mumbled.

"I would kill for a pickle." Linda mumbled. "But now I first need to go to the store."

She angry looked at Nikki who brushed some crumbs of her belly. Why was that kid so hard to control in her eating, and why did't she want to lose weight willingly like every normal girl would. Instead of that she liked it to eat every scrap of food in the house. How could this be her kid?
She looked at Nikki still in her pajamas who were at the point of bursting.

"Get that fat ass of you upstairs and get dressed! I need to take you to school!" Linda screamed.

Nikki fast run upstairs. She knew her mother would be angry but insulting her. Did she really thought that that would have the right effect? Perhaps since she knew how much Nikki hated it. But this only encouraged her to become fatter to show her mother how much she disliked it.
She fast looked in her closet to look for nice clothes that fit. Well too be honest she looked for clothes that fit. Lucky for her she knew which clothes were too small or else it would take her a long time to find clothes that fit.
She really started to hate her mother. Why did she tried so hard to let her lose weight. It was her life and her body right. But it seemed her mother thought different of that. She looked at herself in the mirror.

"All right I look good."

She ran downstairs and found her mother cleaning the kitchen.

"Well get your bag we leave in a few minutes."

"What? But I did't had breakfast yet, and I did't have anything for lunch."

"Well that's what happens if you eat all the food in house. Besides I would say you ate more then enough, and you have enough fat to live on a few days without food!"

Grumpy Nikki waddled to the car.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Furious mother

choices: Linda relents and gets Nikki something for breakfast
Linda holds strong and drops Nikki off at school
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Nikki was flabbergasted. She couldn't believe her mother would send her off without a nice big breakfast and a heaping lunch. She knew her mother hated how big she was, but she didn't think she'd do something this mean!

"B-but mom! I can't go to school without food. I'll starve to death..." She whined to her mother as she was rushed out to the car.

It was here Linda stopped and turned around, her pregnant belly bouncing a little as she did so, and poked Nikki in the tummy lightly. She meant to look a bit angry but actually looked a little shocked as her finger slowly sunk into the little obese girl's blubber, even part of her hand disappeared!

"Look how fat you are! Nikki you just ate an entire kitchens worth of food last night. You DO NOT need to eat any more for a while." She said in an angry huff as she got her hand out of the little girl's blubber.

Nikki knew better than to say anything on the car ride to school. She was more than a little mad herself for not getting a nice filling breakfast. However, she also knew that eating an entire kitchen wouldn't go over all that well, even with her father. She did know she was partially to blame, but that still didn't warrant Linda's harsh "no breakfast" punishment...at last in the tubby little girl's mind.

Truth was Linda was acting more angry than normal. However, it wasn't Nikki's piggy fat kid appetite that was causing it. It was her pregnancy hormones that were the problem. She had been having the standard mood swings for the last little bit and Nikki happened to set one off this morning. Linda would come to her senses soon.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Drive to school

choices: She manages to keep food out of her mind...
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
After going through a bit of complaining from Nikki, as well as her stomach, Linda finally stopped the car in front of the school.
"You be good today Nikki," she said after calming a bit, "and don't try to take any food from your classmates okay?"
"Course not mommy," Nikki huffed, puffing her chubby cheeks in a pout as her mother helped her out of the car, "why would I do that?"
"No reason sweetheart, just making sure." Linda replied with a hint of scepticism in her voice, then managing to bend down to give her daughter a kiss on the forehead and handing her a few coins, "try to get something healthy for your lunch."
"I will," Nikki sighed softly, grabbing her bag and waddling off towards the school. Linda watched her and frowned in concern before getting back in the car and driving off.

As Nikki waddled further towards her friends in the playground, the hunger in the pit of her huge stomach grew with each step. With her greed expanding as much as her waistline, she felt like she needed food almost all the time, and going even ten minutes without a bite to eat would leave her feeling starved. Or so she'd think to herself, being the gluttonous butterball she was.
As Nikki neared her friends playing, they looked at her and grinned brightly, waving at her. She waved back slightly, forcing as much of a smile as she could.
"Hi Nikki!" Tanja greeted her friend, then frowned as she could notice she was troubled. "Are you okay? You don't look so good."
Nikki shook her head, frowning with her eyes widened like a puppy. "My mom didn't let me have breakfast, or make me lunch! Just because I had a midnight snack!"
"That's awful!" Rue gasped, cupping her hands over her mouth in shock, "How could she do that?!"
"She looked really mad," Nikki looked down at her huge round gut, moaning softly and rubbing it as it let out an angry grumble, "and so does my tummy..."
"I have an idea," Robbie piped up, a look of wonder on his face, "why don't you just not think about food?"
Nikki tilted her head, blinking. "Huh?"
"That way, you'll forget you're hungry, and your tummy won't be angry!"
Nikki cocked her head to the other side. "You think so?"
Robbie nodded. "Try it in class!"
Sure enough, just as he said this, the bell rang for the kids to come inside. Nikki went with her friends to join with her classmates, also hoping Riza wouldn't be there...
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Linda holds strong and drops Nikki off at school

choices: Nikki's friends give her some of their food
Nikki go look for some food
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Nikki walked in class and went sitting behind her desk happy she was sitting with her friends and thought about what Robbie said. Not think about food. That was easier said then done. Since the head of the morbidly obese little girl was mostly about food. But she could try. After all if it would't hurt her it could't be bad for her

"Good morning class!" Miss Tatcher said when she walked in.

"Good morning Miss Tatcher!" The light voices of the students yelled.

Miss Tatcher smiled. She loved little kids. That's one of the reasons she started teaching. She also liked the high voices of little kids. When she was younger she used to babysit in every little kid in the entire neighborhood. She did a pretty good job since she was asked many times to come again. Sometimes even two families asked her to come on the same day.
She looked smiling around in the class. Her eyes paused a moment when she saw Nikki. She was surprised again how a kid of her age could be so fat. She felt kind of bad for her. With her size it was no wonder some others teased her. She did't approved teasing no matter what. But still it would be good for that girl to lose some weight. She really need to talk to her or perhaps her parents.

"It's so nice to see you all again. I hope you're all in the mood for learning."

Nikki did her best to think about anything else but food but it was hard for a girl which mind was normally only about food and gaining and getting fatter. That were things she liked
She must admit that she lately discovered some problems about being fat. She still liked being fat and still wanted to get fatter but she was very fast out of breath. even walking short distances like from the playground to her class room made her tired. Also her feet were getting sore more and more, and she got trouble with moving. She must admit it was a bit difficult. But not so much that she wanted to stop being fat, or stop getting fatter by eating hamburgers, fries and... There she was thinking about food again. Her tummy rumbled loudly. She could't wait until lunch time

Denvert looked sadly at his girlfriend. He saw she had trouble. He would gladly stuff her with food until she was totally stuffed while he very well knew that he could't afford that. But he still wanted to do it. He hated seeing his girlfriend being so hungry.

Miss Tatcher started each day by telling a part of a story. In that story was a word the learned to write that day. There was also a song with it. Nikki must admit it did take her mind a bit of food. Not enough to don't feel the hunger pains going through her body but enough to don't let her loose her mind.
After that the kids got some free time.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: A hungry time

choices: They go to find more food
Mrs. Thatcher notices what's going on
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Nikki did her best not to think about food but this was by no means an easy task for tubby kindergartner. In fact, no matter how good the story was she couldn't stop thinking about tasty treats every 10 seconds or so. Needless to say, her belly was rumbling very loudly by the time Mrs. Thatcher was done reading.

Denvert looked over at Nikki with concern. Being a tubby hungry little boy himself, he knew what Nikki was going through. Fortunately, his parents gave him and Nichole a great big breakfast this morning so he was still pretty full. However, he hated seeing his girlfriend like this and decided it was time to act.

"Guys come here." He said to everyone in their little group of friends.

"We gotta feed Nikki. She sounds like she really needs it." He said to everyone in a low voice so the teacher wouldn't hear them.

Everyone looked to Nikki as she nodded at what her boyfriend said with a frown on her dimpled face. The poor little plumper looked ready to cry as her fat 5 year old belly let out another loud growl. She instantly rubbed her obese ball of a tummy to try and calm it a bit. Of course, that didn't work at all.

"Here Nikki, you can have the fruit snacks out of my lunch." Tanja said as she fished the package out of her lunch bag.

Nikki instantly grabbed the treat like her life depended on it and gulped it down. She let out a cute little burp but the treat didn't seem to satisfy her all that much.

"Common guys. Let's make sure Nikki gets filled up." Denvert said as he dug through his lunch, giving the group the impossible task.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Nikki's friends give her some of their food

choices: Raiza is thinking of something mean
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
"You can also have a sandwich from me." Robbie said while he handed Nikki a sandwich.

Denvert opened his lunchbox and shove it over too Nikki. I was a bit hard for him since he knew he would be hungry during lunch but he rather was hungry himself then that he saw Nikki hungry. Even Rue opened her lunchbox for Nikki. Nikki happy took a bite of a sandwich when they heard a voice.

"What are you five doing?" Miss Tatcher said.

The kids looked up and gulped a bit and fast hide their lunchboxes.

"Listen up... I do my best to learn you how to write: Rose. I expect that my students pay attention to me when I do my best to learn them something. So what was so important May I ask?" She asked calmly.

Nikki stood up since she did't want to get her friends in trouble.

"It was my fault Miss Tatcher." She said calmly. "I was just very hungry because I did't had breakfast and because I was so hungry I could't really concentrate. They were just helping me to give me some of their food."

"Well Nikki I'm happy your so honest but even if your hungry that's too bad you have to wait until recess before you can eat. But every kid, boy or girl needs to start the day with a good breakfast. Breakfast is the most important meal of the day since you use that to start the day. It's also important that you eat healthy like cereal or bread. All of you should do that or else your hungry."

"I know. My mother did't give me any breakfast." Nikki mumbled softly so most others did't hear it.

But Miss Tatcher heard it and was surprised why her mother did't let her daughter have breakfast. Sure she was overweight. Even morbidly obese but putting her on a crash diet was't good for a child. She wondered if that was the reason. Perhaps she did need to talk too Nikki and her mother.
Nikki in the meantime licked some crumbs away from her lips. At least she got some food in her belly. As long if they would't have gym before lunch she though she could handle it.

"Do you think you can wait until recess Nikki?" Miss Tatcher asked calmly.

"I think so." Nikki said.

"And don't give them that look Raiza!" Miss Tatcher said loudly looking at the other end of the class room. "Now please everyone pay attention! So the word today is: Rose.

All Kids put their attention back to miss Tatcher who did her best to learn the kids how to read and write.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: breakfast is the most important meal of the day

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Mrs. Thatcher continued the lesson on how to write the word "rose". She was more than a little patient with these children, knowing most had no real schooling before. However, she was getting a bit more concerned with Nikki. She knew such a child needed some breakfast but she didn't even last a half an hour without food! She need to speak to her and her mother very soon about this little plumper's massive appetite.

Nikki was doing about as well as one would expect a little girl who just got singled out in class to do. The poor child's puffy fattened cheeks were very red right now. She didn't want to get into trouble but she was just so hungry! Worse though, was making her friends get in trouble because of her never ending appetite.

She looked over and seen the embarrassed looks on everyone's faces. However she did get a bit of a comforting looking from Denvert. The boy gave her a little smile that let her know he was okay with everything and even lightly patted her tummy, which made Nikki blush and smile back at him. She was still sorry she got her young boyfriend into trouble though.

It was about to get worse for her too. As she looked back up she noticed Raiza and her friends pointing and giggling at her. She couldn't hear what they were saying but she knew they were up to something. She blushed even further and looked back up at Mrs. Tatcher as the lesson continued.

Fortunately, things seemed to calm down from there. With some food in her big belly, Nikki was able to focus a bit better and did actually learn something from the lesson. She was actually very happy she was able to spell the word "rose", even if her letters weren't all that neat.

It was then their teacher let them go for recess and it was then...
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Raiza is thinking of something mean

"Finally." Nikki mumbled. "I'm starved."

All of her friends opened their lunch boxes to gave her some food. Nikki happy took it. True she told her mother not too take food from other people but they did't take but offered it her.

"Better don't eat all of it. It's just first short recces. Else you don't have anything to eat during the long recess." Robbie warned her.

"Don't worry. My mom did't gave me any food but she did gave me some coins so I can get something to eat during the long recess. Thanks for sharing you food with me guys. I really appreciate that."

"No problem. I hate peanut butter and jelly sandwiches anyway. But my mother keeps giving them too me. I don't understand why. Besides I don't have such a big appetite. I can go for some time without food." Tanja said.

"According to my sister I have a big appetite... But her's is pretty big also." Rue said with a smile

"Perhaps." Denvert said. "But no one has a bigger appetite then my Nikki. She has the biggest appetite I've ever seen. I don't know about you or your sister but my sister also got a big appetite."

"Oh I think I saw her when you mother... I assume it was your mother dropped you of. Was that her? That fat girl on the backseat?" Rue asked

"Yeah that was her and yeah you're right it is my mom. Her mom too f course."

Nikki slowly calmed down. She got enough food in her belly so she could wait until lunch. She was still hungry but she was always hungry so that was normal for her. She felt a bit bad she had to ate the food of her friends. She at least left some food from every ones lunch. She did't want that they did't have any food because of her. Especially Denvert and Rue since she knew they both had a big appetite. Well she sure hoped her mother would give her breakfast the rest of the school year.
Perhaps her mother would't deny her breakfast if she did't had any late night snacks. But then she at least had to be able to eat more at dinner. It was some sort of vicious circle. But she was her friends very thankful.

"Pretty mean of your mother send you too school without breakfast. My mother or sister would never let me go to school without breakfast." Rue said.

"Your mother or sister?" Tanja asked.

"Yeah my parents need to work sometimes in the morning so then she takes me to school and watches over my little brother. He almost turns 1!" Rue said

"Yeah did't you remember. I told that to Raiza and her friends in the...... Oh yeah you were't there. That was in the girls locker room."

"Spoken about her I believe she's planning to do something mean." Tanja said and looked in the direction of Raiza and her friends.

"Yeah I think you're right and I believe I and Nikki are the target." Rue mumbled.

He was her boyfriend and wasn't going to let her get made fun of by these girls. He felt he needed to protect her and was going to do that no matter what.

Fortunately, Nikki really liked that idea. After all the horrible things that had happened to her over the last couple of days she could use some help from her friends/boyfriend. She grinned back at him in a way that let him know that, and in a way that let him know that she was impressed with her crush.

"I dunno..." Was all Denvert said in embarrassment.

The poor boy's cheeks grew quite red at this. He really did want to help Nikki and Rue. He might have been big himself but he was strong and wasn't afraid of Raiza's words. He just had no idea what to do here.

It was at this time,
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Raiza does something mean

"Well we have one thing in advantage." Tanja said. "Raiza won't do anything as long if Miss Tatcher around. I mean she punished her yesterday already. If she does anything again... "

"Hm... I guess you're right." Rue said. "She can't do much with Miss Tatcher around. But suppose she needs to leave. Or during recess. Then we're sitting ducks."

The kids looked at Raiza. She looked back with a mean look. What did I do to deserve this. Nikki thought and looked again and Raiza's mean grin got wider and she squinted even more with her eyes. Nikki would't be surprised if she would slide with her hand past her throat.

"All right we're save in class but what can we do during recces?" Nikki asked. "There is someone outside... normally, but he or she can't be around us the entire time and walking with her... walking is making me tired. even short distances."

"That's because of your weight. My sister has that too." Rue said calmly. But before she can do anything... she needs to come near us."

"Right. So what does that wanna say?" Robbie asked.

"Well... I don't know. I hoped that one of you could use that to think of something." Rue said with a sad look on her chubby face.

"Well running away all the time would't work either. So what can we do?" Denvert asked.

"Would be nice if we knew what they were gonna do exactly. Then we could think of something to stop that." Robbie said.

Nikki looked at the clock. The clock ticked slowly taking recess closer and closer. Something what was for most kids a fun time but five kids were't happy with it and hoped it would't start but they could't stop time. Humans tried everything to do with time, slow it down, return things, break through it but the had been never able to control it, and these five young kids were't able to do it either.

"I wish we did't have to go outside." Nikki mumbled.

When the bell for recess rang the five kids walked over to miss Tatcher wit the sweetest look on their face.

10 eyes looked at her wondering what she would say.

Ms. Tatcher looked back at them with sad eyes. She knew what was going on and didn't want to see them get picked on. However, her reply didn't bare this out. She really couldn't let anyone stay inside unless they were sick or physically hurt.

"I'm sorry but everyone needs to go out for recess. Besides, it gives you a chance to get some exercise. " She told them as nicely as she could

Despite Ms. Tatcher's pleasant tone, the news couldn't have been more devastating on the group. It showed too on each and every one of their little faces. They knew their only plan to escape Raiza's teasing wasn't going to work and that they'd need to face the little bully girl, probably very quickly given the look she had been giving Nikki in class.

So all 5 kids walked, or in Nikki's and Rue's cases waddled, slowly outside to the yard. Most of the other children seemed pretty happy to be outside and playing but for this group there couldn't be anything worse. Even now, all of them were looking around to see where Raiza and her cohorts were.

Fortunately for them, no one could spot the girls..yet anyway. Nikki breathed a visible sigh of relief. She was so happy nothing had happened to her yet. She might be able to have an enjoyable recess....and then her big belly rumbled. The snacks she had before weren't enough to satisfy her hungry obese little girl tummy.

"Now I'm all hungry too..." Rue said as she rubbed her own stomach, again, catching the eye of Denvert, but not in the same manner as it had with Nikki.

It was then Tanja looked into the next classroom. It was empty, like all the others, but near the door there was a large tray of cupcakes someone had brought in for their birthday.

She opened her mouth to tell the others...

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Raiza's mean trick

choices: Denvert was there to stop things
Ms. Tatcher was standing over them

Both girls were in trouble. Right now they were surrounded by Raiza and her cohorts with no hope of escape in sight. True, Raiza was the only one currently doing anything to them, but both fat girls could tell the others wouldn't let them get away.

"Look at this whale!" The lithe bully said as she lifted up Nikki's shirt to show off her massive stomach, keeping the rest of her covered.

"Stop it!" Nikki said to her angrily, crying from being pushed down and made fun of in this way.

It was at this time one of the other girls decided to join in with Raiza. She quickly came over to Rue and lifted her shirt up as well, exposing her big tummy. It wasn't nearly Nikki's size but it was still an impressive pot belly.

"Look Raiza! Another big fatty!" The girl shouted happily, hoping to get the approval of her young, cruel, leader.

Unfortunately for the two tubby kids, she succeeded as Raiza grinned back at both of tubby kindergartners with a sly grin. It was one that let both girls know she wasn't quite done with them.

Finally...

Nikki payed no attention to what was going on around her. She was so focused on eating everything in front of her with reckless abandon. So much so that Linda had to enlist help in giving her food, as Nikki was eating so fast that she quickly ran out of plates within her reach.

Nikki's stomach swelled with each plate of food devoured, making her belly bigger and bigger. So much so that her chair had pushed back a bit in order to accommodate it. Yet Nikki didn't notice, as she just continued to eat and eat.

'There's something clearly wrong with her' Linda thought, as she maneuvered empty plates out of Nikki's reach and filled plates within. 'Hopefully the doctor will make note of her extensive appetite and start investigating on why she's so hungry.'

Nikki, at least when she's not eating, never gave thought to why she was so hungry all the time, and instead just followed her instinct to eat, despite the fact that she was eating more than any normal person would eat in a single day. Her mind now, however, was muddled by this instinct, giving her tunnel vision onto just one thing: Eat

Nikki ate and ate, until...
