The final plate had been emptied. Nikki was still in the process of chewing and swallowing, but it was clear to see that her momentum from the beginning had waned. Her belly had a slight reddish hue from how full she was, taking up most of her lap in the process. And that was a new sensation to Nikki: full.

"I'm... full" she said, in between labored breaths. She was so tired from all of the gorging that she could barely stay awake. The entire room erupted into applause, impressed that she had finished all that food and happy she was (for once) full.

Linda walked over to her full daughter, happy that her daughter finally felt full for once. "Nikki, are you okay?" she asked.

"I..." Nikki started to say...
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Clean plates. Full belly.

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
The next moment Nikki leaned backwards and was out like a light. Softly breathing.

"Oh, did she fell asleep?" Nicole asked curious.

"Sure looks that way." Tina said. "It's a lot of work. She used the muscles in her jaws so much she's exhausted.

Nicole looked surprised. She did't knew that while chewing you needed to use muscles. Even if it were only the muscles in your jaws. She never got tired from moving the muscles in her jaws. But at the other hand she never would have been able to eat so much. Nikki used them very much eating so much food. She knew she would't be able to eat so much but who knew, maybe once in a day in the future. Perhaps. She was a gaining girl after all.

"But she did't leave anything for us," Sandy mumbled. "I'm also hungry."

"Come on. Do you really think I would let you go hungry," Tina said and opened her backpack and took out a few pies. "I knew that this would probably happen so I took few pies extra for the guests. That includes you two."

Linda looked a Tina with mixed feelings. One part of her was happy she brought some extra food for the guests, and she clearly loved and cared about Nikki and she knew Nikki liked her too.
But at the other hand with Tina around Nikki seemed to gain more weight. She also did't forget what happened the first time she met Tina. How she and the kids had stuffed Nikki. She seemed to like kids but especially fat girls.
She wondered why. Or perhaps she just saw things there were't there. After all Tina was a babysitter. Why would she be a babysitter if she did't liked kids. Also why would a teenager girl be interested in fat little girls. She could't think of any reason why so she was't sure if Tina really was interested in fat little girls but it seemed that way.
So all with all Tina would't be helpful with Nikki losing weight, but at the other hand she took good care of Nikki and the other kids.

Tina in the meantime cut the pies in pieces (two extra big pieces for Sandy and Nicole) and everyone was talking with each other. Mostly about what Nikki had done who was still sitting passed out in her chair.

"I'm surprised she was able to eat so much. Even I can't eat all that well everyone says I'm fat. I'm a fatty, fatso, fat-ass, super-sized-Sandy, fatty fat two by four can't fit through the cafeteria door. That's how some kids call me," Sandy said sadly.

"Kids can be cruel some time," Tina said. "I know that. Believe me I know. I was many times seen like a freak. because I... eh... that does't matter really. What I'm trying to say is that I know how it feels to be teased. It's no fun. That's why I hate teasing and bullies."

"But, what's happening with Nikki now?" Asked Tanja.

"What about her?" Asked Robbie.

"Well what will happen to her now?" Tanja asked.

"Nothing I guess," Tina said. "She wanted to feel full for once, that happened. She fell asleep so she will wake up later I guess. I don't see why something should happen."

Tanja nodded while eating her piece of pie.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Pie for the guests

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Nikki woke up next morning in a daze. The last thing she remembered was the feeling of being full, though now she was hungry due to her long sleep digesting everything in her belly. She stifled a yawn, then realized that she was still in the dining room, having been not moved from the chair since she got done with her feast.

Before she could even attempt at getting up, her mother walked in. "Good morning Nikki, sleep well?" Linda asked, knowing that she and her husband would of had a hard time trying to move Nikki to her room, so leaving her there was the best plan.

Nikki let out a large yawn, "y-yea..." she then replied, still trying to wake up. Nikki then attempted to get out of the chair, Linda having to help her out after a while due to being tired.

"Now today we're going to go to where Sandy works to see if you can be a plus-sized kid model, but before that they have to make sure you're healthy." Linda said, though for once Nikki didn't look so down about that, in fact, she perked up.

"Yay! I can become a fat model!" Nikki said, slightly hopping at the news. "After the doctor gives the ok." Linda replied, trying to calm her little butterball down. "And that leads me to something I need to say..." Linda soon said after Nikki calmed down.

"I've been mulling it over last night, and I've decided... I'll try not to complain about your eating habits, but I want you to try and control your eating a bit. I'm not going to force you on any sort of diet or exercise, but all I ask is for you to practice some self control."

Nikki was stunned. Her mother was willing to let her be, so long as she didn't base every decision on her stomach? It was like a dream come true.

"However" Linda continued, "If the doctor says you're unhealthy, I will be putting you on a diet until school starts. You understand?" Nikki silently nodded. Linda sighed "Good, now lets get you ready to go, don't think they want you coming in mostly nude"

Nikki was perplexed, she hadn't even noticed her clothes had ripped off!
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: A Talk

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
Linda and Nikki had a hard time finding clothes that fitted Nikki. None of her clothes fit. Finally Linda got some clothes of Bram. The were a bit long for Nikki and she had to turn the pipes and sleeves a few times. It did look a bit stupid but they were't going to a fashion show. After that they got in the car.
Nikki normally hated going to the doctor but now she was looking forward. However a part of her was scared. This check up would decided if she could become a fat model or... needed to go on a diet.

"All right Nikki we're here!"

Nikki got out of the car and looked at the big building in front of her and looked at her mother.

"Is this the doctor's office? It does't look like one. At least not one I've ever been in."

"Well this is the building were the make the magazines for plus size people. They also have a doctor here. The doctor will give you a full check up. If you're healthy you gonna come over here once in a while to pose with some clothes on. Then some people take pictures from you and use those in their magazine."

Linda walked inside. Nikki slowly waddled after her mother. However she must admit that even waddling short distances made her run out of breath. Linda walked to the woman behind a desk.

"How can I help you?" She asked friendly.

"Hello. Linda and Nikki Glemcer. We had a appointment with the doctor."

"Lets see. Ah here it is. Mrs. Glemcer and her daughter. The doctor can see you now. Take the elevator to the third floor go right and then it's the first blue door at your left. Can't miss it."

Nikki was happy that there was a elevator. Walking stairs to the third floor would be torture for her.
A few minutes later they were by the blue door and Linda knocked.

"Come inside!" A woman said friendly.

Linda and Nikki entered. A chubby woman was sitting behind a desk. She smiled friendly at Nikki. Nikki smiled friendly back. She liked that this doctor was a woman. She felt easier around woman then around man except for her family members.

"So you're Nikki. What a nice name you have. Now I'm gonna give you a check up. You don't have to be afraid. I not gonna do you any harm and I don't gonna use needles. I know some kids hate that. But I don't need needles for a check up. Now can you take your clothes of except your underwear?"

Linda helped taking of Nikki's clothes. The doctor put her on a scale and wrote down the weight. Her measured her and did some tests. Asked Nikki some questions. Ask to walk a bit and did a few more tests. He looked at his computer for a while and then at Linda.

"Well Mrs Glemcer it seems like your daughter is..."
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: At the Doctor's

choices: Nikki draws a Momwoman and Super Nikki comic for Denvert and friends.
Linda gets Tina to baby sit with her new outlook.
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
It was the next day, a saturday. Nikki had been up for some time and ate a special breakfast. A large chocolate pudding with sprinkles and chocolate milk, with a large bowl of Frosted Flakes wth extra sugar, chocolate sauce and whipped cream. She was a very happy girl, and Linda was a very happy mother. After getting her dressed, Linda had a surprise for her. Before she went to bed last night, she sewd herself a red cape and mask. The Momwoman game they played yesturday was one of the first memories she had gotten as a new, revitalised mother, and she was intending to relive the happiness of that moment again and again.

The two of them were down at Nikki's room, ready to start Momwoman's next adventure.

"Okay Nikki, how does today's adventure start?"

"I dunno. What do you think?"

"Well, I sort of have an idea. Momwoman is flying over the ocean when she saw he big bad guy, Dr. Volcano! He was a living Volcano with arms and legs who wanted to take over the world! Momwoman wouldn't let him do that, so she grabbed him and took him to the Super Jail that magically made bad guys forget who they are. But he'd have to stay there because he was a talking Volcano, so he would probably get reminded. She decided to go home and visit her best friend, Nikki, but she found that Dr. Volcano had..."

"Turned her entire house into an Evil Gingerbread Kingdom!"

Linda smiled as their imaginations began to meld. They were now entirely inside this imaginary world of theirs...

Momwoman had no choice but to eat through the Kingdom and it's evil Gingebread Soldiers until she found Nikki. But she soon found that the castle was too big, and there were simply too many gingerbread men to eat! Her belly was already the size of a house! She thought that Volcano had finally beaten her...until she saw Nikki! Nikki didn't have any super powers, so when she ate the magic gingerbread, she got some. She became Super Nikki, the Hungriest Girl in the World, and she quickly ate the attacking gingerbread men.

"Nobody messes with Momwoman or her new sidekick!"

Momwoman got up and shook Super Nikki's hand, "Thanks Super Nikki, without you I'd be toast!"

"That's okay Momwoman! But it's not over yet! Dr. Volcano actually made the entire world into gingerbread that looks like normal! I have to eat the rest of it to turn it back!"

Momwoman grabbed Super Nikki under the arms and flew into the air, and straight into the wall of the castle as Super Nikki began to eat, her big belly growing all the while. Soon the entire Kingdom was inside her titanic tummy.

"You did it Super Nikki! But we still have a little while to go!"

Momwoman brought Super Nikki closer to the ground and she began eating the road. People all across the city became frightened as they saw Momwoman carrying Super Nikki as the little blob devoured everything in her path, turning back into Gingerbread Men once they saw her. Soon all of America was in Nikki's belly, and she began drinking the milky ocean. Once it was dry, she was flown down into the middle of the world where she began eating it from the inside out, speeding it all up.

With a hungry slurp, Super Nikki gobbled up the last of the moon. Momwoman rubbed the belly to help relieve the pressure of it's planetary meal. She put her ear to her belly button and heard magic sounds fixing up the world and making everything normal again.

"Nice work Super Nikki. You saved the world and proved to be the best sidekick ever! And with the world inside your tummy, it'll be much easier to protect."

"And so the day was saved thanks to Momwoman!"

Linda and Nikki were lying down in the kitchen laughing their heads off as the adventure finished. Gingerbread crumbs were all over the floor, as well as an empty bottle of milk, the contents of which was churning away inside of Nikki's slightly bloated tummy.

"That was fun! Though in future, before the party can MY Nikki only pretend to gobble stuff when Super Nikki does? We need to save it."

"Sure! Super Nikki can learn to fly with Momwoman."

"Why just fly when she can get Momwoman's super muscles? Say, do they keep the world inside of Super Nikki forever?"

"Nah, the president asks her to let them out after a few days because every time she had a drink she'd flood President City."

"Oh my, and Super Nikki is one thirsty girl! She drank a whole ocean! You want to try and drink another ocean?"

Linda poured Nikki glass and glass of water for quite some time, but stopped after her sixth bathroom trip. They got at least a bathtub worth in, though! Yep, Linda was a changed woman. From now on, if she could, Nikki would be full to the brim with food as much as possible, and would grow into a World Record. Sure, she'd probably get complaints, get told how bad of a mother she was and how she was hurting her child. She'd just shrug them off, her new perspective was that a good mother kept her child happy! That's how her mum raised her, so that's how'd she'd act.

In fact, after the party, she knew Nikki would be seeing a LOT of buffets...
1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.title: Super Nikki Saves the Day!

Nikki in the meantime was lying in front of the T.V. She loved how her mother acted now and loved the playing but it did make her kind of tired. Especially since she was't normally that active. She looked up wondered when she heard the doorbell and even more wondered when she heard Tina's voice.

1112122121222211211211112211212212111121.content:
"So, Momwoman and Super Nikki huh? That sounds adorable!"

"Yeah, and Super Nikki can eat everything! She can't fly though."

"What about me and the others? Are we in any of your adventures?"

"Well not yet, but you can be. Who do you want to be?"

"Good question. You can call me Dr. Food! I was evil, I used to feed people until they got super fat and couldn't walk! I was going to do it to the President, but Super Nikki showed up first. After I discovered she could eat as much as she wanted, I was defeated and decided to become a good guy."

"Good to know your on our side. We need all the help we can get," laughed Nikki, "Maybe when Mom gets back we can play a few games."

"I'd like that. But for now, let's take advantage of your mom's new attitude. You're allowed to eat as much as you want, but your mom dosn't want to use too much money because of your birthday. Well how about I order you a pizza? My treat."

"You'd do that?"

"You're my friend, of course I'd do that."

Nikki rubbed her fat, rumbling tummy as Tina dialed the pizza place up. The teen smiled. She had a coupon for a free pizza party! Nikki had no idea what was going on when a car pulled up carting pizza boxes by the fours out. There must have been sixteen pizzas! There was no doubting that Nikki liked this new opinion of her mothers. And just the idea that this was going to be small in comparison to her party drove her a little nuts with happiness.

"YOU ARE THE BEST PEOPLE EVAH!" she was of course referring to Tina, her friends and parents, but instead the Pizza men were just very confused.

----

Linda was driving home with one of her biggest food shopping sprees she had ever seen, letalone actually do! She smiled like she just discovered the meaning of Christmas at the thought of her daughter digging into it. Ironic that just the other day she would have sighed depressingly at the same thought. She eventually came to a red light and decided now was a good time to call Denvert's parents.

"Hello?" Denvert answered the phone.

"Oh hello Denvert. Are your parents home? I want to speak with them."

Denvert was a little scared. He thought that she was going to ask that Nikki stopped seeing him for all the times he and Nicole fed her. Of course being so young he failed to notice how happy her tone was.

"Uh...okay...I'll go get my mom."

"Hello? Linda? Den seemed worried, what's the matter?"

"The matter? I'll tell you what is the matter! For quite some time now I have seen my little girl feast on food like it was her only possible function. I let people look after her who tried to feed her more, and I watched her get new friends who were interested in cramming her mouth full of junk as well!"

"And you're upset at me for letting Den and Nicole do that? That's understandable, I guess I..."

"Upset? No I'm not upset with you, I'm upset with me! Nikki likes her weight, and she likes to eat and eat and eat, but now I realise that she actually does see a down side. She's never full! Can you imagine that? Torture! Absolute torture! Well I won't have it any more! This mother is making it up to her little girl and in a few days it'll be her birthday. I need enough food to feed an army, and I need your help."

"....Kay."

"Good! I've got things sort of planned out. You, me and some others will have our kids stay over at my house with Tina babysitting overnight tonight. We'll empty our bank accounts and go on a shopping spree to get enough food for the party!"

"EMPTY OUR BANK ACCOUNTS? ARE YOU MAD!? Linda, I see you've had a change of heart but...empty our bank accounts to buy your daughter a big meal? We'd be financially ruined."

"Afterwards we'll all pool togethor to keep us all afloat. Me and Bram have it all worked out."

"Even so, what you're suggesting is...outlandish."

"This isn't what I'm suggesting, this is what I need! This is what Nikki needs! I'm not going to guilt you into helping me, but my baby needs to feel full, and I would do anything to let that happen. Hell, if it was an option, I'd feed her my car!"

"Wow, you're...really serious about this. If it means that much to you, yes. We will help. I'll bring the kids over tonight and explain it to my husband. I just hope that Nikki appriciates what we're doing."

"She was in tears yesturday."

This brought a smile to the womans face, "Make the calls, let's do this thing?"

Linda eventually made it home. She'd have to make a few trips in and out, but she'd get all those groceries in eventually. Once inside she saw Nikki. Stuffed with pizza, and Tina feeding her garlic bread. They knew that her opinion had changed, but weren't quite sure how'd she react.

"Oh hi! Welcome back. I know you guys were tight on money, and that Nikki was allowed to eat more now, so I ordered a few pizzas. Hehe..." Tina was very nervous as she looked upon Linda.

1112122121222211211211112212.content:
The ride home was oddly quiet Nikki didn't want or need to say anything and Linda was to mad to say much of anything. Nikki's mind raced all the way home, what would mom do, what could she do? She looked down, not that she had to look far, at the massive blanket that barely covered her stressed and stretched belly. Her hands unconsciously found what she could of it and slowly started rubbing it, her exposed skin was tight but still remarkably soft to her touch, despite all that she just finished eating. Deep down inside she was still hungry and felt that she could eat a cake or two and another full large pizza or three. A soft sigh escaped Nikki's mouth aw she thought about being fed again, allowing her belly to get even more majestic and large then it was, she started kicking slowly realizing that it had reached her knees at least if not a little further. This excited Nikki to no end she was the biggest, hungryest little girl she knew and she didn't want this to stop. Her silky smooth skin moved and rippled as she rubbed and gently slapped her monstrous belly, imaging all the tasty foods she would eat and how much her soft belly would get.

The car pulled up to the house and stopped at the top of the drive way Nikki realized. She only stopped and looked up because she felt her mother's cold piercing eyes staring at her through the rear view.

"What are you doing?" Linda's question felt like the coldest of ice daggers in her daughter's ears.

"Um," It was all Nikki could think to say as her hands immediately stopped exploring her soft ball like middle she looked down ashamed.

"Exactly young lady," Lind didn't yell which got to Nikki far more then any loud tone could. "Now when you get into the house you are to go straight to bed,"

"But mom I'm still hungry," Nikki said sheepishly

"Bed, because from the looks of it you have already eaten a weeks worth of dinners,"

"But," Nikki was cut off by Linda.

"NO BUTTS MISSY," when Linda got loud Nikki knew not to argue "ROOM, BED, NOW!" Linda's furry finally bubbled to the surface as she release her yelling upon her stuffed child. Nikki slumped as best she could in her chair, it was pretty hard with that beach ball of a belly sticking off her front. "MARCH, LITTLE MISSY!" Nikki clicked her seat belt and slowly waddled into the house, as sad as she was she couldn't change the fact that feeling and watching her belly swish from side to side s she made her sad waddle to her room. Linda follows slowly behind her, feeling slightly defeated as she passed the door way. Her husband came out of the kitchen wearing a slightly messy apron and wearing oven mits.

"Baby, what happened I could hear you yelling from in here," He kissed her forehead and held her in his strong arms for mere seconds.

"Nikki had an incident," was all Linda could say.

"Oh I see," he tried to reassure her that is was ok, while hiding his excitement in the fact that his daughter has a hunger and the belly to prove it.

"I just don't know what to do,"

"I know honey, but lets talk about it in the kitchen I'm still cooking dinner.

...who should we follow in our continued adventures

Even when she did go outside it was only to go for a meal with her mom or see a friend, never any exercise. Nikki had a deep dislike of exercise, mainly due to her lack of it. "Ah, Sasha, you're here. And little Josie too, hello both of you. Shall we leave then? I'll just call Nikki"
She heaved herself off the couch and went to the door.
I'm here. Hi Josie"
"Hey Nikki" replied Josie. She was the same age as Nikki, but blonde. She was about the same weight as well, perhaps slightly heavier, but she was shorter too. Hence she was quite a plump child for her age, with a large, round belly poking out from under her top.
The four of them got in the car and drove to the park, parked and got out. It was a sunny day but the park was nearly empty, so they began walking up the hill. After twenty metres Nikki was puffing for breath. She was, as stated before, incredibly unfit.
"Mom, I'm tired"
"Nikki darling, we've barely started!"
"But I'm tired!" she moaned.
"Fine" as usual, her mom relented "if I give you something to eat, will you walk?"
"Yeah!"

"Hmm... I know what you mean, I've been thinking the same sort of way about Nikki recently"
Finally the reached the top of the hill. Both girls were panting for breath, and Nikki sat down against a tree in exaustion. Linda looked at her pudgy face and stomach. Maybe a diet was a good idea...

"Come on kids, the picnic's ready" shouted Linda, and they ran (except Nikki, who walked) over. On the blanket was arrayed a huge selection of sandwiches, salads, sausage rolls, cold meats and sweets.
They all tucked in, especially Nikki. Josie looked longingly on as Nikki ate two sausage rolls at once, having to satisfy herself with a sandwich and salad. Nikki finished the sausage rolls and quickly moved on to sandwiches, then onto the cold meats.
After twenty minutes she was stuffed, every move she made making her swollen belly ache. Her top had ridden up to reveal her soft, fleshy midsection, hiding the top button of her tight shorts from view as it sagged slightly over her waistband.
Suddenly she remembered there was a dessert, and she managed to summon up her appetite again so she could eat another two chocolate bars, two cupcakes and a large slice of chocolate brownie. She lay back in the sun and closed her eyes, massaging her distended stomach, wishing she had chosen some looser shorts. Vaguely she remembered they were the loosest she had, but then the warmth of the sun and her huge meal combined and she fell asleep.

112122211.content:
She woke to feel hands shaking her soft upper arm.
"Hey, Nikki, play hide and seek with us?" asked Ben.
"Yeah, okay" she yawned, and heaved herself to her feet. She stumped over to the others and Ben started counting down from twenty straight away. The three girls all ran and hid, except Nikki, who couldn't find a place. She heard Ben through the trees saying "Six, five, three" and suddenly she spotted Josie sitting in a tree. She ran over and started climbing, the branches creaking under weight, trying to reach where Josie was.
Her swollen belly was getting in the way, and her shirt caught on a twig, ripping the fabric, but then she heaved herself onto Josie's branch. The wood creaked loudly and she felt the branch bend slightly.
"No! Get off the branch, you're too fat!" whispered Josie, rather hypocritically.
"No!" Nikki whispered back, offended. However, there was a sudden cracking noise and then she was falling, tumbling through the air until...
The floor appeared suddenly in her face and with a clunk she landed in the dirt.

The adults, hearing screams from the forest, leapt to their feet. Nikki and Josie were both lying prone in the dirt.
"I'm a doctor, get back!" shouted Ben's dad, Brian, sprinting over. He knelt beside Josie, who was moaning, holding her arm. Tears seeped from her eyes and dribbled down her pudgy face.
"Mummy!" She wailed "Mummy!"
"Right" said Brian "She's either dislocated or broken her arm. I'll check Nikki, Sandra, get her to the car"
He moved over to Nikki, who's eyes had just started to flicker open.
"Oww" she groaned, rubbing her leg. Brian examined it.
"She's okay, but lets get her to the hospital just in case"
He heaved her up, careful of her leg, and walked quickly down the hill with her. The other adults quickly packed up the picnic and followed.

12.title: Natasja

choices: The buzzer for the door goes.
Nothing happens, and she returns to the table.
121.content:
Natasja bounced impatiently in her car seat, desperate for her mother to return. She wasn't even that hungry after the cookies she'd eaten an hour ago, but she loved pizza too much to care about how full she felt. She stared out into the rain, waiting for Vivian to appear in the pizza place's door, practically tasting the seconds shuffle by. After what felt like at least an hour her mom hurried out, three boxes of pizza under one arm and a bottle of pop clutched in her other hand. She pulled open the car door and climbed inside, shaking the rain from her dark hair and depositing the pizzas on the passenger seat. She turned to smile at Natasja in the back, who was straining desperately towards the pizza boxes.
"There we go. One pizza with everything on it, and two pepperonis."
"Are they all for me?" The six year old asked, eyes wide. Vivian laughed.
"No, silly. The pepperonis are for me and your sister."
"Oh. Right." She paused sadly, then realized that still left an entire pizza for her. "Can I have some now?" She asked enthusiastically.
"Not just yet, Nat. Wait until we get home."
For Natasja, the journey home felt even longer than the wait in the car. The pizzas were emitting a delicious, enticing smell, and her slightly rounded stomach had begun to grumble in anticipation. By the time they finally parked behind their flat and Vivian let Natasja out of her car seat, she was practically bouncing along behind her mother as they climbed the stairs up to their room. Vivian smiled at her daughter.
“Wow, Nat. I don’t normally see you so energetic! Perhaps I should buy pizza more often?”
“Yes! Yes!” Natasja skipped up the flight of stairs and waited impatiently at the top for her mom to catch up. Eventually, they reached their floor and Vivian unlocked the door, letting the six year old zoom across the room to the table, where she sat half exhausted from the climb, half eager for the meal.
“One minute, wait for your sister.” Said Vivian, and not a moment later the bedroom door opened.
“Hi Rebecca.” Said Natasja. “We’re having pizza!” She pointed at the boxes in their mothers’ arms.
“Great!” She said, joining her sister at the table. “I’m starving.”
Rebecca was almost as fond of pizza as her younger sister was, and it showed on her nine year old body; a thick midsection and rounded belly were obvious beneath her tight shirt, and tight jeans revealed her large butt and chunky thighs. Her dislike of exercise had left her limbs soft and flabby; the furthest she liked to walk was to the fridge and then back to her bed.
Vivian deposited the pizzas in the middle of the table, then went to the cupboard to grab some glasses. Without even waiting for her to return, her two daughters ripped open the boxes and began eating, stuffing delicious tomato-sauce covered slices into their hungry mouths.
Vivian turned back towards the table, glasses in hand, but before she could sit down…
121.title: Pizza! Pizza! Pizza!

1211.content:
Before Vivian could sit down with her children, however, the phone rang. She sighed and strode over to it, picking it up as her good mood dissolved. She just wanted to sit down and get a bite to eat after a long day, was that too much to ask?
"Sachar residence, who's calling?" She snapped.
Natasja watched from across the room as suddenly as what little color was normally present in her mom's face disappeared in less than a second. With a quick glance at her daughters, the young woman began speaking quietly and quickly into the receiver, face drawn. Natasja tried to listen in, but her mom had switched to rapid fire Swedish. Shrugging, she returned to the pizza. All the more for her! She swallowed the last mouthful of her second slice and immediately moved on to a third, as Rebecca finished off one of the pepperonis. She had loved pizza for as long as she could remember, and usually managed to persuade her mom to buy it three or four times a week, sometimes more if she'd been good. With most foods, she'd stop eating if she got too full, but with pizza she just couldn't stop.
By the time Vivian slumped into the final seat around the table, all but one slice of pepperoni were gone. In total, Natasja had eaten one whole pizza, and Rebecca had finished off nearly two. As a result both girls were lying back in their chairs, painfully swollen bellies peaking from beneath their tops. Vivian gritted her teeth; true, they were young, but they should know better! She closed her eyes and breathed, in and out, in and out. She had bigger problems.
"Girls?" She asked, but got no response. "Girls!"
Both children woke with a start.
"Uh. What?" Asked Rebecca. Natasja's hand snaked out towards the final slice of pizza but Vivian slammed her hand down hard on top of her daughter's.
"Ouch!" Natasja drew back, tears beginning to well in her eyes. Vivian grimaced.
"Sorry, Natasja, but I need you to pay attention." She opened her mouth, then thought better of it, got up from the table and went to pour herself a whisky.
"Mom, what's up?" Asked Rebecca again. "You're acting weird..."
Vivian threw back the whiskey, then returned to the table with a grimace.
"Girls," She began, "I'm going to have to go away for a while. Do either of you remember your cousin Gina?"
Both children shook their heads, mystified.
"Well, she's my sister's daughter. She's about thirty, and she's got two daughters. You're... you're going to go and live with her for a while."
There was a period of complete silence around the table for a long time, as both children processed the information. It seemed like even the cars outside had stopped to think. Vivian toyed nervously with her ring, twisting it on and off of her finger.
Eventually Natasja spoke.
1211.title: Bad News Travels Fast

choices: They arrive at Gina's house the next day.
The next morning, they set off in the car.
12111.content:
"Okay mommy. As long as there's pizza there." Said Natasja, smiling. She was imagining all the food she could sneak away with and eat without her mom's ever-watching eye. One of her favorite things was eating food on her own, whilst watching TV or just lying around, but despite Vivian's generally lax dietary expectations she had a hard line on Natasja sneaking off with food.
"But... but why?" Asked Rebecca, looking far less enthusiastic than her younger sister. "Where are you going? Why can't we come?"
Vivian sighed, rubbing her temples.
"Sorry, Rebecca, but I can't answer that. Gina's lovely, I promise, and her daughters... well, I'm sure you'll get along just fine." Rebecca tried to interrupt, but she spoke louder. "Look, I don't know how long this is for, but Gina'll sort it all out. Please, don't make this difficult for me."
"But mom! What about my friends at school?" Rebecca complained loudly.
Vivian slammed her hand down onto the tabletop for the second time, making both girls jump.
"Enough! I'm your mother and you will do what I say. Now, we're leaving tomorrow. Pack tonight, and make sure you take all your clothes, books, whatever else we can fit in the car."
"Can't we say goodbye to anyone?"
"Sorry, but no. We're leaving before school tomorrow morning. Anyway, this isn't forever; a few months, at most."
Rebecca turned her eyes downwards. She didn't like this at all, but she could tell that no matter what she did it wasn't going to change her mom's mind, not this time. She turned back to Natasja, but the plump young girl had fallen asleep again in her chair. She shook her head.
"Fine." She grumbled reluctantly.
"Thank you." Vivian looked very relieved. "Now, go pack up your stuff. Help your sister when she comes through as well."
Unenthusiastically, she trudged into the bedroom and began collecting her stuff, soon being joined by her yawning younger sister as together they began packing for what Natasja thought was a holiday, but Rebecca knew was something different altogether.
12111.title: Where There's a Pizza, There's a Way

choices: Rebecca doesn't want Vivian to leave.
121111.content:
Natasja woke up as the car entered a driveway, the sudden change from tarmac to gravel beneath the tires jolting her from a deep sleep. They had been driving all day in the hot sun, but luckily Natasja had spent most of it in slumber, only waking up when they stopped in the drive-thru of a McDonald's for a large meal. Now, finally, they had reached their destination; through the window, the six year old could just make out a large country house surrounded by trees. It was all very exciting!
They pulled to a stop and got out, both children stopping for a moment to admire the house in front of them. All their lives, they'd lived in a small, two bedroom flat, but this house looked like it must have at least five or six bedrooms! It seemed old, the stones overgrown with ivy and moss sprouting between the tiles of the roof. Vivian barely glanced at it as she staggered to the door, rubbing her eyes in exhaustion. She'd driven for nearly eleven hours without a break or food; although her daughters had eaten at the McDonald's, she'd hardly even taken her eyes off the road the whole day. With a sigh, she rang the doorbell, hearing it chime discordantly inside. A minute later, the door was pulled open, revealing a young, pale woman standing within. She had very long blonde hair and bright blue eyes, and was as slim as a twig. All in all, she looked astonishingly like her aunt.
"Vivian! Good to see you again." She smiled warmly.
"You too, Gina." Vivian said, rather more lacklusterly. Any energy she'd had that morning had been sapped out of her by the long journey and her elder daughter's constant pestering.
"And this must be Natasja and Rebecca. My, it's been a while since I've seen you two! You've grown a bit since then." She grinned at the two children, and they smiled unsurely back. "I'm Gina, as I'm sure your mom's told you. It sounds like I'm looking after you whilst Viv's away, right?"
"Yeah..." Said Rebecca, not quite sure what to make of this woman who looked so much like their mother. It was a strange quirk of their family tree that although Vivian was Gina's aunt, Vivian was in fact four years the younger.
"Do you want to head inside?" She asked them. "If you need the bathroom, it's second door on the left down the hall. Opposite that's the living room Just hang out in there for a minute okay? Me and your mom need to talk adult stuff." She moved aside, letting the two kids squeeze past and into the house, before stepping out and closing the door. Her smile disappeared as she turned to Vivian, and a second later the two were engaged in a muttered Swedish conversation. After a few minutes, Vivian nodded, and handed her niece the keys to the car.
"There's a case in the glove compartment. Keep it safe, and don't open it. I'll keep you informed on the phone. If it looks like all this' wrapping itself up, you'll be the first to know. And thanks for doing this, Gina."
"No problem, Viv. You always were my favorite aunt; in any case, it makes sense. They're practically the same age as my two, it's perfect."
Vivian nodded again.
"Yeah. Hopefully they'll all get along. Now, I really must say goodbye to Nat and Rebecca, then catch my bus to the airport."
Gina nodded this time, blonde hair moving in waves around her pale face. With one arm,s he pushed the door open and let Vivian step inside, then, with a furtive look around, followed her aunt within and closed the door behind them.

Natasja, on the other hand, proceeded to stuff her pizza into her mouth as though she was afraid it might disappear. As she ate, she could feel her belly slowly expanding and pressing against her already tight shirt.
Ten minutes later Natasja pushed away her now empty tray. Her shirt had ridden up during the meal and about a third of her swollen belly was showing between her shirt and pants. Her deep belly button was clearly visible under her strained top. Venus stared in amazement. glancing over and seeing Venus staring at her distended belly, Natasja blushed slightly and tried to pull her shirt down to cover it. it wasn't quite big enough, however, and a bit of belly was left peeking out.
Venus whistled.
"you sure do eat a lot!" she muttered.
Natasja blush deepened
"Sorry" she said nervously. she was worried she might have just lost her newfound friend.

She noticed a couple of people looking at her as she approached her classroom but luckily no one commented. Natasja wasn't sure if she could stand any more nasty remarks. Taking them out, she walked over to the full body mirror in the corner of the room and started changing. First came the jeans. They went on quite easily to start with, but it took a bit of effort to get the zip up. However, she sucked in her belly and pushed the button into place without too much difficulty. She let her belly out and looked in the mirror, noting with disress that her belly hung over the top of her jeans by a good inch, almost covering the button. Maybe visiting the pizza place wasn't the best idea after all.
Next came the shirt. Despite it being the biggest she had it was still tight around her belly. Luckily, it was large enough to tuck into her jeans, and that stopped her belly hanging over.
She examined herself in the mirror, deciding that this outfit was good. She would wear it again tomorrow so that she didn't have any more unfortunate incidents like at lunch today.
After that she went downstairs and watched some television for a bit.
After a while...

"So what does your mom do about your weight?" asked the girl.

"That's bad..." said Natasja, "What's your name anyway?"

"Oh...Casey," said the girl - I mean - Casey.

"It's uh...nice to meet you Casey," said Natasja, "I'm...Natasja."

"No need to act all shy," said Casey.

"I'm sorry...I never had a friend before," said Natasja.

"Probably because of this," said Casey as she patted Natasja's belly, "I'm sure you've been teased before."

"Yeah...but you get it worse," said Natasja, "Your own mom!"

"Yeah, but I'll show her!" said Casey, "I'll show every bully in the world. I'll show her that us fatties need to be treated nice, like everyone else. I'll prove it to everyone. I'm gonna get fat! Really fat! That'll show my mom and every bully in the world!"

"You go girl!" said Natasja, sticking up her chubby hand for a high five. Casey gave her the high five, "I want to do that too! I'm gonna get big some day. HUGE!"

"Then keep eating girl!" said Casey.

132111112111212112.content:
One week of life in the lap of luxury really spoiled Mia Lin. The doctor mandated she stay off the leg while it healed. She didn't have a whole lot to do in her motorized wheelchair, so she picked up new, or should I say modified, her existing hobbies.

The TV always had some daytime game show on and she got really good at guessing the answers or solving the puzzles. Her favorite game was actually the Price is Right. She got very good at guessing prices, and her family was pleased that she was developing math skills. When she got really bored, she entertained herself with cartoons. That took the lion's share of her day.

Her family would come in and talk to her throughout the day, asking her if she needed anything. Somehow, they always ended up fetching her food. Besides TV, that is what she decided to do: eat. Mia loved eating after all. The day after her accident, she found out about a very interesting meal called the Manchu Han Imperial Feast. The feast features 108 dishes from China, spanning two dynasties. Ever since she found out about it, she wanted to eat an entire feast by herself, so she worked to reach her goal. Her doting family was happy to oblige her on her quest. They would not know about the gigantic meal she had planned until she felt ready.

108 dishes. It almost didn't matter what they were. She was fascinated because it was a really big number...

So she pushed the limits of her appetite. She ate when she didn't even feel the slightest bit hungry. Even now, she was consuming a portion of pork lo mein that could feed an entire family, and an order of almond chicken, for dinner. She had eaten only a while ago, and was battling a protesting stomach.

Needless to say her family was somewhat surprised and encouraging at the table. "Looks like that broken leg helped you finally get a good appetite, Mia. You look comfortable in there," her grandma commented.

Mia Lin smiled at her nana and kept plowing away. Her constant eating had gotten her to appreciate table manners more, so she wasn't nearly as messy as other small children.

"No kidding," said the father. "She's definitely gotten heavier since the first time I put her in that chair. I feel the difference every morning, lifting her out of bed and into that."

"No one asked you to lift her into the chair," her mom chided. "We know you like it."

The father looked incredulous.

Dinner came to an end with Mia Lin getting the clean plate award: A terribly aching belly. Mia Lin complained that she wanted to sleep. Her father came to the rescue, basically carrying her up to her bedroom. He half-heartedly pleaded with her not too pack on too many pounds while he had to do this. Mia, being sympathetic, kissed her daddy. "I'll try," she lied. She was a sweet kid, but she lived to eat.

Another "problem" with Mia having a broken leg and a reason to practice eating was that she gained a lot of weight in all the wrong places, and her whole figure ballooned out of her clothes. Whatever she wore fit rather poorly. She hadn't torn anything, thank god, but she was well on her way--and everything was harder to fit--and they couldn't take her to the clothing stores in her condition. So she lounged around in sweatpants and sweatshirts most of the time. These were her most elastic clothes. Her belly still surged past the limits of her tops after a good meal, proudly displaying three or so inches of yellow midriff. Laden heavy with food. Her nighties didn't fare much better: they looked ridiculous buttoned up, but at least it was still possible.

"I wouldn't mind serving dessert in bed if you want it," he said. Even with his complaints, he wouldn't deny his little princess while she was convalescing. "I'll come back up and give it to you."

It was tempting, but Mia Lin had to assess her needs.

-

So what will the father do next?

Amy was impressed by Mia Lin's speed. One by one, Mia Lin left empty chip bags on the floor, and she isn't showing any signs of stopping yet. Amy also saw that Mia Lin's belly was growing bigger and rounder as she ate. Amy wanted to squeeze and play with Mia Lin's belly, but she feared that would interrupt Mia Lin's binge.

After Mia Lin finished all the chips and rinds, she went to the jerky next. She grabbed all the jerky, opened them out of the wrappers, took a handful of opened jerky, and bit into the jerky as much as she can. Mia Lin adored the flavor of the smoked, dried meat, and she continued to chomp her way through the jerky at a relatively fast rate. Amy was still impressed by Mia Lin. Normally, beef jerky was tough to bite through, but Mia Lin was able to chew through it as if it was made of cotton candy. After Mia Lin finished all the jerky, Amy took note at how big Mia Lin got. Mia Lin must have grown at least 15 pounds from all the chips and jerky, bringing her weight up to 192 pounds. However, after all the jerky was finished, Mia Lin suddenly stopped eating. Mia Lin still has the candy, cakes, and soda to finish the entire bag.

"Hey, Amy?" Mia Lin asked.

"Yes, Mia?" Amy replied.

"Can you:
13211111211222.title: A picnic's worth of junk food.

choices: Daycare is over for the day; time to go home.
13212.content:
Amy rubbed Mia-Lin's belly for a while longer, thinking all the while.
When she finally stopped, she had come to a decision.

"Mia-Lin," Amy said, her face set in such a way as to show that she was being serious, "I've decided that I'd like to have a big belly, too."

"Oh, that's great, Amy!" Mia-Lin said, getting to her feet. "You'll look so much cuter with a big belly! Not that you're not cute already..."

"You really think so?" Amy asked, excited to have her friends approval.

"I know so!" Mia-Lin smiled.

The two girls embraced each other, Mia-Lin's big, warm belly squishing against Amy's flat stomach. Amy couldn't wait to have a belly of her own.

"So then," Amy said as they broke off the hug, "Do you know any special tricks to help me out?"

"Well, just eat lots and lots, as much as you can at every meal, and make sure to snack in between meals whenever you can," Mia-Lin replied.

"Ok, then," Amy said, thinking of another question, "What kind of foods should I eat?"

Mia-Lin said "Definitely eat lots of candy and cookies and stuff like that. Also, pizza and chips and soda are good. And you can't go wrong with Chinese food! Like my mom always says, 'You eat Chinese food, and you're hungry again an hour later'."

It certainly seemed to hold true for Mia-Lin, but she was perpetually snacking anyway.

"Well I guess it's good we had Chinese for lunch today, right?" Amy said, smiling. "I'll be hungry again soon."

"I'm already hungry," Mia-Lin giggled.

Amy laughed, too, and the two laughed quietly for a couple minutes before calming down somewhat.

"Well, what should we do now?" Amy wondered out loud. "We've got a couple hours until our parents pick us up."

"That reminds me," Mia-Lin said suddenly, "Do you want to come over to my house after daycare? We've got plenty of snacks there."

"Yeah, that sounds like fun," Amy said eagerly, smiling as she thought of the delicious food she had heard Mia-Lin's mother made. "I'll ask my mom when she gets here."

"I'll ask my mom, too."

For a while, the girls were content to sit and read, their stomachs growing ever hungrier, until...
13212.title: Amy wants a big belly too!

choices: An hour later, they're hungry again...
132122.content:
By the time their mothers came to pick them up, Mia-Lin and Amy were practically starving. When they saw their mothers, they ran over as fast as they could and latched onto their legs.

"Mommy," Mia-Lin said, loking up at her mother. "Is it okay if Amy comes over for supper tonight?"

"Sure," Mia-Lin's mother said, "As long as it's okay with Amy's mom."

Amy had already asked her mother if she could go over to Mia-Lin's house for supper, and her mother now said "Sure, it's alright with me."

Amy's and Mia-Lin's mothers had known each other since their daughters had started coming to daycare, and were friends.

"What time should I have her ready to go?" Mia-Lin's mother asked Amy's mother.

"How does 20:30 sound?" Amy's mother said after a moment of thought.

"That should be fine. She doesn't have any allergies, does she?"

"Nope, she should be fine."

"All right, I'll have her ready at 20:30, then."

"Okay. Thanks for taking her off my hands for a while, I'll be sure to return the favor sometime."

"Oh, it's no problem at all, really."

Mia-Lin said "Thanks for letting Amy come over!"

Amy's mother smiled and said, "No problem, Mia-Lin! I know how you two like to play together. See you later, Amy!"

"Bye, Mommy! See you later!" Amy said, hugging her mother.

"Well, now," Mia-Lin's mother said. "Shall we go home? You two look hungry for a snack."

"Yeah, we're really hungry, Mommy!" Mia-Lin said. "Can we get some Wendy's on the way home?"

"Sure, why not?" Mia-Lin's mother said, walking out the door, towards her car, by which Amy's mother had placed Amy's booster seat.

"This is gonna be good," Mia-Lin said to Amy. "Make sure to order twice as much as you usually do."

"I'll be sure to," said Amy, thinking of the big belly she was gonna have.

Once at the Wendy's drive-up, as per Mia-Lin and Amy's request, Mia-Lin's mother ordered 4 Frostees, 4 Baconators, 4 Large French Fries, and 4 5-piece Chicken Nuggets.

On the way home, the girls started on their Frostees and chicken nuggets. As they ate, Amy said, "We've each got a lot of food, Mia-Lin. I'm not sure I'll be able to finish it all..."

"Don't worry," Mia-Lin said, starting on her second pack of chicken nuggets, "I'll eat whatever you don't."

By the time they got home, Mia-Lin had eaten most of her first Frostee and all of her chicken nuggets, and Amy was starting on her second pack of chicken nuggets.

The girls carried their food inside, sat down on the living room couch, and turned on the TV before continuing their "snack".

Mia-Lin started eating her Baconator next, finishing it about the time Amy started in on hers. Amy was a little full already, but she knew she had to keep eating.

While Mia-Lin started in on her fries and second Frostee, Amy slowly but surely finished her Baconator, finishing feeling almost totally stuffed. She slowly spooned her second Frostee into her mouth, watching as Mia-Lin finished her second pack of fries.

"I'm stuffed, Mia-Lin," Amy said, patting her swollen stomach, "You can have my fries."

"Ok, thanks, Amy!" Mia-Lin said eagerly accepting the golden treats.

Mia-Lin ate the last of the girls "snack" and gathered up the garbage, including Amy's now-empty Frostee cup, and went to the kitchen to throw it away. When she came back, she had a box of Twinkies.

"Geez, Mia-Lin! Are you still hungry?" Amy exclaimed, shocked.

"Well, I'm not hungry, exactly, but I'm not totally full yet, either. Want a Twinkie?" Mia-Lin said, munching on a Twinkie already.

"Well... sure, I'll take one," Amy said hesitantly. She ended up having 6 Twinkies, half the box, each time saying, "This is my last one, I swear..."

6 Twinkies, though, was apparently not enough for Mia-Lin, as she returned to the kitchen, and once again brought out a box of Twinkies.

Amy, when offered, declined to take another, but simply sat and watched Mia-Lin eat every last Twinkie in the box, her belly beginning to bulge out from underneath her shirt.

When Mia-Lin got up once again to throw the trash away, Amy feared what she might bring back this time. But Mia-Lin was apparently satisfied, for she returned empty-handed, and sat down next to Amy on the couch.

The girls rested and digested in front of the TV for the next few hours, becoming increasingly eager to eat supper as time ticked away.

In a coincidental turn of events, Mia-Lin's mother had decided to prepare some traditional Chinese cuisine for supper.

Mia-Lin and Amy gorged themselves on fried rice, dumplings, sweet-and-sour pork, sweet-and-sour beef, sweet-and-sour chicken, and crab rangoon, taking heaping helpings of everything, and tall glasses of whole milk to wash everything down.

By the time they were done, both girls were utterly stuffed, barely able to waddle back to the couch. As they sat down, Mia-Lin unbuttoned her shorts, letting her bulging belly out in the open.

"That was a good supper, don't you think, Amy?"

"Yes, very good. Your mom's an excellent cook, Mia-Lin." Amy replied.

"I know. I'm lucky to have her," Mia-Lin smiled.

"If I got to eat your mom's cooking all the time, I'd look like you in no time!" Amy grinned.

Mia-Lin laughed and said, "That's probably true!"

"Only an hour and a half until my mom gets here," Amy said a bit sadly.

"Yep," said Mia-Lin. "Let's be sure not to waste it."

"Wanna watch a movie?" Amy asked.

"You know it," Mia-Lin said.

Once again, the girls rested and digested, Amy stuffed like never before, and looking forward to it once again.
132122.title: Daycare is over for the day; time to go home.

choices: Amy tells her mother about her plan to gain
1321221.content:
They watched T.V for an hour. After that Mia-Lin rubbed her swollen belly and turned to Amy.

"Are you hungry Amy?"

"What are you hungry again. You can't be. We just had a huge dinner!"

"You did't answer my question. Are you hungry?"

"Not... really... i think... but i'm not full. I could... eat something."

"That's good. We need to let you eat a bit more every day. A bit more then you can. This way your stomach can slowly stretch out and hold more food. Trust me this is the right way."

"Well all right then. I guess." Amy said.

Mia-Lin put the movie they were watching on pause and walked to the kitchen and returned with two big bags of chips.

"Think fast." She said while she threw one bag at Amy.

"A whole bag of chips. If i eat all this i will pop!"

"No you won't. Trust me. You need to keep eating. If you finish the whole bag you can stop."

She pressed the play button and ripped open her own bag and started to eat hand fulls stuffing them in her tiny mouth.
Amy slowly started on her chips wondering where her friend was keeping it all. She looked at Mia-Lin's belly that was slowly starting to peek out under her shirt. I looked so soft and comfortable. She also wanted one and this gave her the strength to eat faster. She was able to finish half the bag before she started to feel full.

"All right i'm full now but i need to eat more to get fatter."

She pushed more and more chips in her mouth. Chewing was now problem but swallowing was getting hard. She tried to focus on the movie but her belly started to hurt from all the extra food. It made gurgling noises in protest.

"I just need to finish this bag."

She looked for a bit more room in her over loaded stomach that hurt now even more.

"How faster i'm done how better." Amy thought.

She started to eat faster. It hurt but she kept going. She wanted also a big belly.
She felt like she would pop after eating the last chips in the bag.

"I don't feel so good."

"That's normal in the beginning. But after some time your body will get used to hold more food."

"Are there also other things that help you to gain weight."

"Weeeell. Les exercise. Stop running and climbing all the time and stop smoking."

"I don't smoke! I'm just a toddler!"

"Yeah... right. Oh if you eat snacks be sure they're high fat. Butter, chocolate, chips, junk food, Chinese. The best fattening foods!"

"How do you know all that?"

"From my grand mother."

"She wanted you to be fat?"

"No she wanted a thin, fit grandchild. She told me ways to lose weight. But if one way let you lose weight the opposite way will let you gain."

"That... makes... sense. But you did't lose any weight. How did you grandmother react?"

"Not too happy. We only see her at birthdays from family members."

"I think it's horrible having a grand mother that hates you." Amy said.

"Oh well that's my fathers mother. My mothers mother and i can get along very well. She also stuffs me with food. She always said: A big belly is a happy belly. A thin belly is just a cry for help."

"Then my belly will be very happy soon."

"Yeah and then we can gain together. That sounds good."

Suddenly the heard someone at the front door.

"Oh! I guess my mother is there."

The next moment Amy's mother walked in.

"Hello Amy! Are you ready to go?"

"I guess so." Amy said a bit sad. "See you tomorrow Mia-Lin."

"Yeah. see you tomorrow."
1321221.title: Stuffed Amy

13212211.content:
Amy and her mother started walking back to her house and Amy's mother noticed her daughter's belly was quite distended in comparison to her slim body and she asked to Amy: "Did you eat at Mia-Lin's?"

She replied "Yes, why?"

Her mother said "Oh I'm just asking because your belly seems awfully bloated for eating at a friend's house, how much did you eat?"

She replied " I ate a Big bag of chips all by myself! I'm planning to get a bigger belly because Mia-Lin looked comfortable having a big belly herself and she convinced me to get one as well so what do you think mommy?"

Her mother replied: "A whole bag of chips by yourself!? You must feel sick to your stomach! (Although Amy looked fine) Oh well you don't look to be in pain i guess i will let you get big, but not too big ok."

Amy giggled with joy and she asked her mother: "So how about let's go to McDonald's to start they have real fattening food there so I can big quickly!"

Her Mom said: "Okay."

And they drove off to Mcdonald's. Amy ordered 8 Double Quarter Pounders, 5 Big Macs, 10 Double Cheese Burgers, and Several Super-Size Fries along with a large drink.
Amy's mom brought the huge meal to the table and then Amy began her monsterous gourge fest. She devoured the food at a breakneck pace each crumb sliding into her slowly expanding belly, barely bothering to chew and often swallowing whole. It was a long 30 minutes before she was finally done, Amy's belly was extremely bloated and full. She moaned in pain and thought: "Ohh man, I ate too much, maybe I should take this at a slower pace, but my belly's getting bigger and I'm doing what Mia-Lin advised, keep stuffing myself past my previous limit. My belly will stretch to accomodate and therefore lead to a big soft stomach!"

Amy's Mother noticed her daughter Was in pain so she asked her daughter: "See this is why I was objectionable at first! I'll rub your aching tummy to soothe the pain and take it slower and don't overfeed yourself this much!"

Her mother took Amy back to the car and drove her home, Amy waddled back to the couch and restedher mother slowly and softly rubbed her daughter's distended round belly then Amy drifted off and let herself digest the massive amount that was stuffedinto her.
She woke up and found out that her clothes were much tighter she had Gained...
13212211.title: Amy tells her mother about her plan to gain

choices: Mia-Lin and Amy go look for some food
13212212.content:
Mia-Lin opened her eyes. Normally she woke up pretty early for a 4 year old. She looked outside. The sky was gray and it looked cold and wet and it would probably rain today. Mia-Lin hated bad weather. She liked the sun more. When it shined on her yellow skin it looked like gold. At least that's what she thought it looked like.
Still in her pajamas she went down. She waddled into the kitchen and took a box of cookies. She took it over too the T.V and turned it on. Fast she started to eat the cookies.
She knew her mother would come down soon and her mother had't much trouble with Mia-Lin's weight but she knew that her mother would't like it if she ate cookies before breakfast. After the box was empty she fold it flat and tucked it deep in the trash can.
Five minutes later her mother came down.

"Mia-Lin. You need to go too daycare today."

"I know."

"So please get up and get dressed. I will make you some breakfast. How does a cheese omelet sound?"

"Yummy!"

Mia-Lin waddled as fast if her chubby legs could carry her up to her room. She opened her closet and looked through her clothes and pulled out some jeans and a pink jumper. When she tried to put on her jeans she noticed they were awfully tight around her belly. She need all her strength to button them. Also the pink jumper was tight on her and it did't totally cover her belly. You could see a stroke of yellow flesh. She tried to pull the jumper down but not too avail. Her jumper would't stay down. She decided too leave it this way. She wasn't planning too going outside and it was pretty warm at daycare. And if she did went outside she would wear a jacket.
Fast she went back down. Her mother was busy baking a large omelet with about five eggs. when he was done she shove it on a toast and put another toast on top of it. Just like her daughter liked it. Mia-Lin happily ate her breakfast. Of course two toasts with omelet were't enough for the hungry, Chinese toddler and after two bowls of cereal with sugar and two toasts covered heavy covered with chocolate spread. and three tall glasses of whole milk she was done. Mia-Lin only liked whole milk. Every other kind she found taste to much like water.

"All right your done with breakfast? Can we go then? I have work to do."

Mia-Lin let out a small belch and nodded. They walked too the car and her mother tried to buckle her in her car seat but Mia-Lin's belly was just too big for the car seat that had fitted two weeks ago.
She gave a light pat on her daughters belly and used the belt of a normal car seat for her daughter.

"You outgrew you car seat honey." Her mother said while she got in the car.

Mia-Lin was a bit playing with a doll she left a few days ago in the car and looked at her mother.

"I think Chun-Name might have some old car seats."

Chun-Name was the Aunt of Mia-Lin. She also had a chubby daughter two years older then Mia-Lin. When she outgrew her stuff Mia-Lin could have them. However many times her clothes were kind of tight on Mia-Lin while her niece had no problem back then wearing them.
Mia-Lin was busy too comb the hair of the doll when she suddenly remembered she and Amy tried to also gave Amy a big belly.

"Eh mommy can we get some food?"

Her mother looked at her in the mirror.

"You can't be hungry. You just had breakfast."

"Yeah but it's not for me. You see eh Amy wants also some food."

"Amy also get's breakfast from her mother. So why do i need to buy her food?"

"Eh well we want some food at daycare "

"You get food at daycare."

"Eh Yeah but Amy and i want some more. We also want some food before lunch."

"Come on Honey you have a big belly and i'm sure you can wait until lunch."

"And how about Amy?"

"Amy is not my child. Well here we are. Have fun."
13212212.title: Breakfast

choices: Mia-Lin and Amy eat the cookies and drink all of the juice.
Someone interrupts the duo's feast on cookies and juice.
132122121.content:
After Mia-Lin's mother drove away, the considerably chubbier girl waddled inside the main play area where several kids were playing about in the area. Looking over to the snack area, Mia-Lin grinned as she waddled over to Amy, who sat at one of the picnic table inside the snack room. .

"Hey, Mia-Lin! I got good news!" Amy grinned as Mia-Lin sat next to her. Smiling in return, Mia-Lin looked over to Amy and pinched Amy in the side. "Amy! You're getting fatter!" Mia-Lin squealed as warmth emanated from Amy's slight roll. "Yep! And my mother doesn't notice! Good thing I didn't told her, or else she would be terrified!" Amy laughed as she looked down at Mia-Lin's bulging shirt. "You look larger yourself. Sooner or later, both of us will need new clothes."

"Yeah. My mommy would not stop to get you some food.... Maybe we could find where all the sweet stuff is stored?" Mia-Lin jumped in excitement with Amy, her shirt riding up her belly an inch to allow the fat roll some space to expand. "Yeah! Though... Isn't it locked, Mia?" Amy inquired as both girls looked over to the snack bar where the kids received their daily snack. "No one is there. Let's go!" Mia-Lin whispered as both girls walked- err waddled; to the food bar.

To their disappointment, the counter-tops were devoid of food. "Awww. We've just had snack time fifteen minutes ago, but it looks like the janitor's cleaned up the spot." Amy whined.
"Is the gate unlocked?" Amy asked quizzically as the Mia-Lin waddled to the side of the serving bar.
"Nope," replied the Chinese girl as she budged against the stubborn gate, but to no avail. "The gate is locked. Looks like we won't have food this time arou-"

"Hey! What do you kids think you're doing?"

Both girls turned in fright as one of the male caregivers, an adolescent in his mid-teens, walked in their direction. "You kids better know that this is not snack time! Mia, you know the rules: One snack per day. You need to cut down on your food intake." Stopping ten feet before the children, the teenager sighed as he looked at Mia-Lin's nearly-exposed belly before his eyes settled on Amy's larger gut. "My, Amy... Fine. Stuff yourselves if you like. Just don't tell anyone else both of you are allowed back here-"

"Yay!" Both girls called jovially, though at a whisper. The teenage man merely shook his head as he unlocked the gate. "If both of you- Hey- .... Fine! Eat away!" The caregiver growled as Mia-Lin and Amy squeezed past the caregiver. Shaking his head, the teenager sighed quietly as he walked back to the play area to supervise a group of kids playing with Lego blocks.


"Amy! What'll we do?" Mia squeaked with delight as she opened the mini-fridge door. Both girls' eyes widened at the contents inside. Six boxes of Oreo cookies and four gallons of grape juice were tightly packed within the fridge.
"I dunno. I want to eat the cookies!" Amy squealed as she nudged Mia-Lin's shoulder. The Chinese girl merely nodded in response. "I want to chug out on the grape juice! What to do first...."

As if they were stranded within the wilderness for a week, Mia laid on her back as she poised the gallon-bottle above her mouth. The crispy, tangy flow of grape juice found its way to Mia's stomach as the indulging girl stuffed herself with the sugary beverage. Amy, on the other hand, was busy stuffing Oreo cookies into her mouth one after the other. "Burrrrrp!" Belched Mia as she tossed the empty grape juice bottle aside. Amy's eyes widened as Mia started to stuff Oreos into her mouth. "M-Mia? How can you drink so much?"

Mia-Lin's eyes twinkled above her juice-stained cheeks and lips. "My mother makes sure I drink more than one glass of milk per day! Why, this morning, I drank three glasses of milk and had buttery toast! If you wanna be like me, you should drink whole milk! It's extra fattening!" The sliver of gold skin expanded as Mia's shirt rolled up slightly when Mia shifted her weight. "Eat Chinese food, Amy! It is delicious and fattening. Especially with loads of sauce..."

As the two girls kept eating, Mia's shirt caused discomfort as the Chinese girl's growing blubber pressed the end of her shirt upwards, revealing a deep bellybutton along with more of the yellow flesh. Amy, on the other hand, was finishing her second box of cookies and felt a pain in her stomach. "Mia... I don't think I can eat no more.... Help me?"

"Amy!" Mia exclaimed as she crawled over to her bloated friend. Amy merely moved her head slightly as the force of food in her stomach continued to cause discomfort within her abdominal region. "I'll be fine. I just ate the cookies too quickly...." The pain subsiding, Amy sat up and looked down at her self. Her bloated tummy pressed against her tank top, and her pants were considerably tighter than average. Both girls were in a state of overindulgence as Mia continued to kneel by Amy.

An hour later, Mia and Amy were busy drawing pictures over in the art corner. "Hey, Mia!" Amy piped as she held up a crude drawing of an egg roll. "Should I eat these every day?" "Yeah, Amy!"
