13212212112111112122122.content:
Soon after that day, Ahn-Lin realized how much they both wanted Mia-Lin to become fat, and how much Mia-Lin was capable of eating. So Ahn-Lin cooked more, and Mia-Lin ate more, meaning Ahn-Lin had to cook more, and the vicious circle of Mia-Lin's growth turned faster and faster. Now, six weeks later...

"Lunchtime, dear!" called Ahn-Lin, giving the fried rice in the wok one final stir. From the living room, she heard a series of huffs, then a dull thump of Mia-Lin's bulk hitting the floor. Then, shuffling, and a good deal more huffing and wheezing until the absolutely enormous Mia-Lin waddled into the kitchen, drenched in sweat from just the short walk from the living room- and still eating chips. In just a month and a half, the enormous Chinese girl managed to nearly double her weight, from 130 pounds to an absolutely whopping 209. 79 pounds in just 42 days, which looks impossible until you understand how much Mia-Lin was eating. In fact, the only time she wasn't eating was when she was asleep, and even then she still needed occasional snacks throughout the night. She now wore exclusively crop-tops and shorts, as there was no shirt in the world that could stand up to her exponentially expanding belly- and even those clothes she frequently outgrew. Upon smelling the fried rice, her belly, stuffed though it was, let out a hungry groan. Mia-Lin winced, rubbed it soothingly, and just managed to heave herself onto the kitchen chair. Ahn-Lin, smiling, ladled rice into a bowl, leaving Mia to attack it with the biggest spoon in the house. How large can I make her? Ahn-Lin wondered, looking at her daughter's enormous belly, pressing into the top of the table. 500 pounds? 1000? More, even? She was startled out of her reverie by Mie-Lin's spoon clanking against the bottom of the bowl. Hurriedly, more rice was added from the wok, but at this rate all the rice in the wok didn't quite look like enough. Ahn-Lin began cooking some noodles.

The next day..
13212212112111112122122.title: Obese turns morbid.

choices: How dare he suggest such a thing!? Ahn-Lin is furious.
Of course she is... but what's he gonna do about it?
132122121121111121221222.content:
Dr. P. Turnbull scanned his next patient's profile, one Mia-Lin. Just turned five, she was due her routine pediatric check-up, to ensure she was developing properly and whatnot. Normal, normal, everything looked normal - though he shook his head slightly as he spotted her BMI - 29! Nearly obese, and still so young. Ah well - he recalled speaking to the girl's mother about improving her diet at their last appointment, so with any luck she'd have shed those excess pounds by now.
He heard a knock at the door, and the faint sound of heavy breathing. Ah, this must be Mia-Lin now.

"Come in!" He called.
Dr. Turnbull considered himself a professional man. It took a lot to make him drop his manner of an austere, traditional doctor - but as the door was pulled open, his mouth dropped wide open, and it was all he could do to contain a gasp, his spectacled eyes bulging wide as they struggled to take in the sight before him.
"Good morning, Doctor." Ahn-Lin greeted him, giving her massive daughter a light push on the back to prompt her forwards. Mia-Lin waddled forwards with some difficulty, and with significant help from her mother, climbed up onto the adult-sized chair at the side of the room and settled down. Walking was difficult for her nowadays, and she tried to avoid it whenever possible - just the short trip into the building from the car outside had left her wheezing and panting, thick thighs rubbing together with every step.

Getting a hold of himself, Dr. Turnbull's mouth snapped shut, and he turned to his screen so as not to stare at his patient.
"Good, ah, good morning. Nice, ah, nice weather we're having." He blathered, trying buy time to collect himself. How?! This couldn't possibly be the same girl, could it?
"Yes, I suppose it is." Ahn-Lin replied, glancing out the window. "Are you alright doctor?"
"Ah, fine, yes." He said, steeling himself this time before turning to face them. "So, ah... this is Mia-Lin?" He queried, praying that it wasn't.
"That's right." Ahn-Lin answered. "For the pediatric check-up."

Dr. Turnbull chanced another glance at his patient. She wore a straining crop-top over her bulging chest, the undersized garment leaving her entire stomach uncovered to sag over the waistband of her immodestly-short shorts. He wiped his brow in dismay.
"Yes, the check-up. Well, ah - we'll start with height. Could you please stand against the wall here, Mia-Lin?" The young girl looked dismayed. She was still out of breath and sweating from the short walk inside, and now he was asking her to stand again! Reluctantly, she let her mom shoo her over to stand against the wall and be measured. The paint was cool against her back as Dr. Turnbull checked her height.
"3'5." He muttered to himself. "That's... that's normal. Now, ah, could you please stand on the... on the scale just here. We need to find out how much you weigh."
Grumbling to herself, Mia-Lin waddled to the scale and stepped on. She leaned over, trying to see the number - but her bulging midriff was far too large to see around. Dr. Turnbull had sat back down in his chair, dismayed.
"That's... 210lbs." He spoke softly to himself. "Not... not normal. Not at all." He punched a couple of numbers into his computer, then turned to Ahn-Lin. "Ah, your child - are you aware she's... overweight?" He asked Mia-Lin's mother tentatively.
132122121121111121221222.title: The Good, the Bad and the...

choices: Don't be so rude to the doctor, Mommy...
1321221211211111212212221.content:
Ahn-Lin had felt anger before. She had felt it in her hometown, when the People's Liberation Army forcibly liberated her family of their farm for a minor violation of the law. She had felt it in Beijing, when she realized how much smog the factories belched into the atmosphere. And she was feeling it now, at the ridiculous notion that her daughter- her perfect, beautiful, lovely Mia-Lin- was overweight.

"How dare you suggest that?" she cried, staring daggers into the doctor's eyes. "How dare you say that my amazing little girl is overweight?"

"Ma'am, I didn't mean anything, it's just-" stammered Dr. Turnbull.

"Didn't mean anything? So that means she's fine, right?" Ahn-Lin pointed an accusatory finger.

"No, I-"

"No? You're saying that my daughter is ill?" Ahn-Lin, petite though she was, was backing the doctor against the exam table.

"Yes, but I mean-"

Ahn-Lin's nostrils flared, sensing victory.

"Well, I've never heard anything so stupid in all my life, and I've heard Chairman Mao make a speech in pubic! Mia-Lin is the picture of health! Just look at her!"

Dr. Turnbull looked. Mia-Lin wheezed.

"Well, ma'am," he said, adjusting his tie, "she doesn't look that healthy to me..."

Ahn-Lin bristled. "Well, you're obviously misinformed! I know healthy when I see it! I know of Chinese people who would kill to be as healthy as my Mia-Lin!

"Miss, please, can you just calm down? We won't get anywhere shouting like this..."

But, just as Ahn-Lin prepared to unleash a string of authentic Chinese curses, Mia-Lin (figuratively) stepped in.
1321221211211111212212221.title: How dare he suggest such a thing!? Ahn-Lin is f...

choices: Try to persuade Ahn-Lin not to fatten Mia-Lin any further.
Do nothing. It wasn't his business, really.
13212212112111112122122211.content:
Mia-Lin hadn't been paying much attention to her mother's increasingly raised voice, or to the doctor's frustrated protestations. Instead, she had been (as usual) thinking about food - or rather, about how she hadn't had any in nearly half an hour, and how she was beginning to feel rather empty. She thrust a hand into the pocket of her shorts, thick little fingers rooting around until they came across a wrapped chocolate, which she pulled out and examined. It was sticky and very squashed, mostly melted from the heat of her body - but that didn't faze her in the slightest. She tore off the foil wrapper and shoved it into her mouth, barely even chewing before swallowing, sending the candy to join the mass of food she'd already eaten that day in her oversized stomach. Delicious! But it didn't even put a dent in her appetite.

She wiped her chocolate-stained fingers on her shorts, adding a fresh smear to the assortment of sweat and food stains they had already acquired, then thrust them back into her pockets. However, after rooting around for a while she found... nothing. She pouted. Mia-Lin wasn't used to this feeling - even at school they let her eat snacks, but now a deep, hungry rumble emitted from her bloated body. She looked over at her mother, who was shouting something about Chairman Mao - normal behaviour for when she was drunk, but rare when she was sober - and opened her mouth.

"Mom, I'm hungry." She whined, cutting Ahn-Lin off before she could launch herself into anything too brutal. "Can we stop at a McDonald's before we go clothes shopping?" Ridiculous as it might seem, the top and shorts Mia-Lin was wearing right then were actually the best-fitting she owned, so a shopping trip had been overdue now for some time. To avoid unnecessary exercise, her mom had decided to do it on the same day as Mia-Lin's appointment.
Ahn-Lin immediately forgot about Dr. Turnbull and instead rushed over to her daughter, pulling a bag of candies from her handbag and thrusting them into her daughter's sticky hands before she could say another word.
"Oh, of course we can darling." She gushed, smiling happily as the pampered girl stuffed candies into her mouth at record pace. "Although I was planning to get takeaway this evening anyway. Never mind, we'll just do both!"

At this, Dr. Turnbull tried to take back the initiative.
"Miss, I think junk food is the last thing your daughter needs any more of. Her BMI is literally off the charts, she's-" at this, Ahn-Lin turned to face him, fire flashing in her eyes, and the doctor lost his nerve, "-ah, very healthy-looking. Can we just... can we just finish the examination?" He almost begged her.
"Hmmph. Fine." Ahn-Lin deigned to agree, giving Mia-Lin's belly a last gentle pat before gesturing for him to continue with the check-up.

And so Dr. Turnbull proceeded with the most depressing pediatric examination of his career - and given he'd been in the medical profession for approaching 40 years, that was no mean feat. To begin, he rather resignedly asked Ahn-Lin whether her daughter was getting the recommended hour minimum of exercise a day. The look on her face dissuaded him from continuing on that track, and so he hastily skipped the dietary and other lifestyle questions and moved on at once to the physical examination. After her mom helped Mia-Lin shed her tank top, he pressed the thermometer to the young girl's flabby chest and listened, intently, to her breathing. Strained, wheezing, still out of breath from having to stand upright on the scales - it was a mess. But the look Ahn-Lin shot him dissuaded him from making comment. He listened to her heartbeat - again, far too fast, far too irregular, and not a word slipped from his lips about it. He was a professional - but this woman, a full foot shorter than him though she was, had rattled him to his core.

After checking the five year old's blood pressure (the pressure cuff barely fitting around her meaty upper arm) and finding it higher than his own and still making no remark, he was beginning to question his own professional integrity. He had to try and intervene - but what could he do? This woman was obviously going to ignore every word he said against her daughter, but he couldn't just stand by and do nothing. He looked at Mia-Lin, watching as the last of the candies disappeared into her distended stomach. He stared at the great bulge of flab that was her belly resting between her spread thighs, at the flabby folds of her chest heaving as she gasped for breath between mouthfuls of sugar, at her thick arm jiggling as she scratched beneath a sweaty fold on her side.
And he decided to...
13212212112111112122122211.title: I <3 examinations

choices: Salvation- after a few more turns, fast food as far as the eye can see.
The police catch up with Ahn-Lin's speeding car.
132122121121111121221222112.content:
Dr. Turnbull, for the first time in his life, wished he was a violent man. If he was, he could shout this ridiculous woman down, and make her understand how terribly, horribly unhealthy her poor daughter was. He could be a hero to this girl! (Clearly, he didn't understand Mia-Lin at all.)

But he wasn't. Dr. Turnbull was a small, weak man, and he wouldn't do any of those things. He, instead, wrote down that Mia-Lin was the very picture of health, gave her a lollipop, and watched the enormous toddler waddle her slow, wheezing way out of the examination room, cursing himself all the while. He then went back to his office and poured himself several shots of brandy, vowing never to treat somebody so large again.

Mia-Lin, meanwhile, was ravenous. A bag of half-melted chocolates, while enough to make any normal-sized girl sick to her stomach, was barely anything for the massive Mia-Lin. And Ahn-Lin knew it, which was why she was driving eighty in a sixty-mile-an-hour zone looking for any kind of fast food to stuff into her insatiable daughter. Unfortunately for the both of them, though, Mia-Lin's doctor was dead-center in the industrial district. The high factory chimneys, though awe-inspiring, did not produce any food, and it was quite a large industrial district. Propane- and plumbing supply stores flew by, mere streaks out the window of the speeding sedan. Not fast enough, though- Mia-Lin was starving, and she was not about to be quiet about it. Such a cacophony had never before been heard.
132122121121111121221222112.title: Do nothing. It wasn't his business, really.

choices: They head straight to get Mia-Lin some food.
1321221211211111212212221122.content:
Mia-Lin had always been a bit spoiled. Her whole life she'd been allowed another serving of food if she asked nicely for it, never denied a snack or new toy she took a fancy to - however, the last six weeks of non-stop pampering had turned her from being a generally well-mannered (if slightly self-centred) young girl, into a full on brat. The slightest provocation would result in an ear-splitting tantrum, which would continue until either her screeching mouth was filled with food or she screamed herself hoarse. Even just being denied a snack could set her off - and so now, the gaping feeling of hunger wrenching at her belly, she was throwing the worst tantrum of her life.

She screamed, she cried, she flailed her thick limbs in every direction - but they were already driving considerably past the speed limit, and the little car just couldn't go any faster. That didn't matter to Mia-Lin though. She didn't care her mom was already driving as fast as she could, or that she'd already eaten two meals that day and it wasn't even 10 o'clock. She just knew that she wanted food - and what she wanted, she got. Soon, the noise was driving Ahn-Lin mad, the pervasive wail only faltering when Mia-Lin had to pause to gasp for breath. Terrifically unfit, even just kicking the back of the seat in front of her and waving her arms was tiring for the massive little girl and soon she was exhausted, wheezing loudly between every wail as sweat mixed with tears poured down her red face. This sound was even worse for Ahn-Lin, and the car soon broke 90 miles an hour as she searched desperately for any fast food place.

Just as she spotted a McDonald's the sound of sirens blared behind her, and Ahn-Lin's stomach lurched as she saw flashing blue lights in the rear mirror. Dismayed - not for herself, but for the added delay to getting food for Mia-Lin - she pulled over, and watched as a smartly uniformed police officer climbed from his patrol car and strode nonchalantly towards her window.
Before he arrived, she glanced back at Mia-Lin in the back seat, Fortunately the young girl had quietened down somewhat, apparently too out of breath to continue her tantrum - but Ahn-Lin knew she'd be back in full force in no time. Her poor little belly was half-empty, growling loudly even from beneath the thick inches of flab that clung to her midsection. She needed to deal with this quickly.
The officer reached the car window, and she wound it down.

"Hello ma'am." He began. "Do you know how fast you were going?"
Ahn-Lin did her very best to look innocent.
"I'm afraid not, officer. Not over the speed limit I hope?"
"Actually, I'm afraid we have you clocked going 90. In a 60 zone." He looked at her reprovingly. "That's very dangerous you know. Breaking the speed limit is..." before he could go any further, however, he glanced into the back of the car and spotted the heap of heaving flesh that was Mia-Lin, and he trailed off. Ahn-Lin seized the advantage.
"Is there something wrong, officer?" She asked, looking at him enquiringly. He turned back to face her, eyes wide.
"The girl - is she... is she alright?" His tone was hushed, and suddenly Ahn-Lin had an idea.
"Ah - no officer, I'm afraid she's not. That's why I was speeding actually - she's very ill, and I'm afraid if I don't get to the hospital soon she might not- well, she might not make it." She dabbed at her eyes with a napkin, looking as melancholy as she possibly could.

The policeman was young, and too inexperienced to catch the trick. It helped that Mia-Lin did look very convincingly ill, her wheezing breathing and tears not yet dry on her cheeks fooling him completely. He stepped back.
"I see, ma'am. Well, I suppose I can make an exception just this once - but remember, speeding is dangerous and-"
"Oh, thank you so much, officer." Ahn-Lin cried, winding the window back up before he'd even finished talking. Not even waiting for him to walk away, she started the ignition and sped away in a screech of burnt rubber. Time to get some food!
1321221211211111212212221122.title: Police and Prejudice

choices: Mia-Lin is soon stuffed, but makes quite a spectacle out of herself.
13212212112111112122122211221.content:
This McDonald's, in contrast to most of its brethren, was usually filled with conversation- the lunch whistles blew at much the same time in all the factories, and this was one of the best gathering spots for those workmen with money to spend and a hankering for a Big Mac. Even in a district this large, everybody knew somebody and somebody knew everybody, so talk was cheap- just like the food. As the only restaurant for miles, business politics stayed away- and competitors and comrades shared fries at the same table. Thus it was very rarely quiet and nearly always loud. But, as the door swung open, the restaurant, as one, fell silent. And it was not hard to see why.

The first thing to enter the restaurant was Mia-Lin's quivering mass of belly, followed by the rest of the skimpily clad, loudly wailing, four-year-old Chinese girl, jiggling wildly with each ponderous step. None of the workers had seen anybody like her. Following her was Ahn-Lin, fumbling for her wallet in her cavernous purse. Unperturbed by the roving eyes of the riveters, she marched (really waddled) her morbidly obese charge up to the dumbfounded cashier. She stared him down, and, with a quick pat on her exhausted daughter's sweaty head, she said:

"One of everything, please."

The cashier's jaw dropped. A rapid buzz of whispers flew through the assembled workers like flies through a meadow. Mia-Lin, hearing some talk of food, immediately quieted down. As the shocked cashier shakily attempted to total that number, Ahn-Lin, pleased with the crowd's reaction, said:

"Make that two of everything."

And, with a smug smile on her face, she guided her enormous girl to an unoccupied table, leaving the workers to whisper and gossip.
13212212112111112122122211221.title: They head straight to get Mia-Lin some food.

choices: Mia-Lin finished the cake, and was stuffed to the limit.
Ahn-lin put something "Special" in the cake.
132122121121111121221222112212.content:
The cashier heads over to give Mia-lin and her mother the heaping pile of food, all condensed onto one pile on a single tray.
"Enjoy..." The Cashier stated, quickly moving back to her station. Ahn-lin smiled, and allowed Mia-lin to dig into her meal.
There were plenty of people staring in awe at Mia-lin's seemingly endless appetite, when she was finished with one burger she was onto the next. It eventually became her just shoving food into her mouth rapidly, only breaking to drink from one of her many shakes or drinks.
It caused a few people to even up and leave in disgust, but Ahn-lin and Mia-lin didn't care. They enjoyed the attention they raised, even if it was contraversial. Who were they to tell them how to live their lives?

After a long, hearty meal, Mia-lin had eaten all of the food. She laid down, patting her engorged belly which had rode her shirt up far past the breaking point, but was still managing to hold on by threads. Her short shorts hid barely anything, her bloated butt on full display for anyone who dared look.
She belched, and patted her belly, "That was delicious, Mommy, can we have more?" She asked.
"Oh, honey, I think we've spent enough time here. But don't worry, when we get home, I have a big cake waiting there, just for you." Ahn-lin stated.
The Employees took a collective sigh of relief, as they watched Mia-lin waddle her big gut out the door. She came out managing to be even fatter than she was when she came in.

Ahn-lin kept true to that promise, and when they opened the door a giant cake was waiting for Mia-lin on the table. She smiled, and went up and began to devour it whole. She ripped out chunks of icing-covered cake, chowing down on it from the outside-in.
"Heheh, that's my girl. Eat up!" Ahn-lin stated, as she prepared tomorrow's next big meal.
132122121121111121221222112212.title: Mia-Lin finishes the entire meal.

1321221211211111212212221122121.content: Finally, after nearly a half-hour of eating, the last bite of cake made its way between Mia-Lin's lips and fought for room in her packed stomach. This was by far the most food the young Chinese girl had ever eaten in a single day, and it showed. Her overstretched shirt and tightly-packed shorts had both succumbed to her flab, and were now little more than bright-colored scraps adorning the enormous girl's vast expanse. And vast it was. Her belly, normally an apron of flab cascading over the waistband of whatever poor pair of pants she happened to be wearing and flopping about by her chubby thighs, was now a taut sphere, poking far out from her body and pressing deeply into the table. A trail of crumbs and chocolate led from the tip where it pressed into the table upwards, over her chins, and into her mouth, where all the cake had eventually ended up. Stuffed as she was, she could do little more than huff in place and moan from the pain of being stuffed to her absolute maximum. Ahn-Lin, meanwhile, was enjoying this immensely. She had filled her daughter with calories beyond count, and it showed for sure. As she helped her massive daughter to bed, she realized, quite happily, that though this was the biggest meal Mia-Lin had ever eaten, it would probably also be smaller than anything she'd eat in the future.
1321221211211111212212221122121.title: Mia-Lin finished the cake, and was stuffed to t...

choices: An elaborate Ice Cream Cake made of Brownies and Cookie Dough.
13212212112111112122122211221212.content:
Six long, fat-filled weeks had passed since that day, and Mia-lin's appetite only grew larger. She began demanding more food each day, and Ahn-lin was happy to supply her with it.
As her appetite grew, so did her weight. She reached a whopping 400 pounds in those weeks, and was still growing. It became much more routine as the weeks progressed, Wake up, Eat, and sleep. She hardly did much else, so the fat continued to just pile onto her already obese frame.

Ahn-lin was readying Mia-lin's next meal, when she noticed a very interesting infomercial on the Television. The product advertised was a Cookbook called "The Calorie-Packed Cookbook". It was filled with fattening and delicious recipes for different exotic and amazing foods, Ahn-lin decided she had to get it. She had plenty of ingredients, and it would help feed Mia-lin. She might enjoy it!
She called up the Hotline, and got a Robot, and went on hold for a while until she finally reached a real person.
"Hi, this is Todd with Sweet Dough Inc. What would you like to purchase?"
"I would like the Calorie Cookbook, please."
"Alright, and what is your address?"
"21 Johnson Rd, West Virginia."
"Alright, we'll have that shipped out in a few days. Thanks for the purchase!"
Ahn-lin couldn't wait, and wanted to use the book right away. Luckily, the Infomercial was playing a quick workshop on a free recipe that she would be able to use, and give her bulgy daughter a taste of what will come. She got out the ingredients, and prepared the dish.

"Mooooom! I'm hungry, and I'm out of food!" Mia-lin complained, her many chins jiggling
"Coming! I have something a bit... Different, but I think you'll like it!" Ahn-lin stated as she brought in...
13212212112111112122122211221212.title: Several weeks in the future

choices: Mia-Lin wakes up later, hungry once again.
Ahn-Lin decides Mia-Lin needs a bath.
132122121121111121221222112212122.content: Ahn-Lin swept into her daughter's room, holding in her hands a magnificently large ice cream sundae. It was contained within a glass bowl of the kind normally used for salads, and was made of the richest flavors four gallons of ice cream could offer, laden with sprinkles, chocolate sauce, and extra sugar to sweeten the deal. Mia-Lin let out a squeal of joy and reached her flabby arms towards it, a rare display of effort from the enormous four-year old. She'd rocketed through the 300s mostly because she had done little for the past six weeks except eat, and that constantly. Such a rapid gain of weight on such a tiny figure meant that Mia-Lin was covered with stretch marks. She'd given up on clothes since she broke her final set of crop top and short shorts, thus leaving her fat with plenty of room to expand. Her double chin went up to four, her double belly extended down past her knees, and her wide thighs were just about to start dangling off her twin bed. She was still mobile, albeit barely- she needed help to stand, could barely walk fifteen steps alone, and that only went up to about fifty with her mother's help. Any exertion left her panting and sweaty, even something as easy as feeding herself- which meant that Ahn-Lin often needed to help her finish her food. This sundae was no exception. Mia-Lin was far too flabby to hold the enormous bowl and eat from it at the same time, so Ahn-Lin did both, spooning great gobs of ice cream into her daughter's hungry mouth. Though most of the sweet dessert made it into Mia-Lin's gaping maw, ice cream is notoriously imprecise, so her many chins and folds of fat ended up coated with melted ice cream, sprinkles, sauce and sweat. Though the sundae was enormous, after many, many spoonfuls the entirety of the bowl ended up inside of Mia-Lin. The obese Chinese girl, satisfied with her efforts, licked her lips and fell right to sleep against her pile of pillows.
132122121121111121221222112212122.title: A giant ice Cream Sundae.

choices: McDonalds, who were offering Mia-Lin a job as a promotional tool and be fed free
The Doctor, who had urgent matters to discuss about Mia-Lin.
1321221211211111212212221122121221.content:
Mai Lin woke up, starving for more food. She called her mother, who was ready for her to wake up for quite some time. She had an entire buffet of food ready for her consumption, and Mai-Lin couldn't wait another second! She began devouring the food with whatever strength she had left in her big, obese toddler body, as her mother watched in awe as she ate.

As this was happening, Ahn-Lin got a phone call. It was from...
1321221211211111212212221122121221.title: Mia-Lin wakes up later, hungry once again.

choices: Ahn-Lin rushes Mia-Lin to the McDonalds regional office as soon as she can.
Ahn-Lin forgets, and some time passes before they call again.
13212212112111112122122211221212211.content:
"Hello?" Ahn-Lin asked the phone. Mia-Lin could probably handle feeding herself for a few minutes, they'd just started eating, but she was so worried...

"Ah, yes! Am I speaking with Ahn-Lin Xi?" the voice on the other end asked back.

"Well, yes...who is this?"

"My name's Linda, I work with McDonald's PR Department. I understand you have a daughter named Mia-Lin?"

"Um, yes..." How do they know her? she asked herself.

"We heard about her from the McDonald's in the city..." Linda shuffled some papers, "...we'd like to know if we could use her for advertising."

Ahn-Lin reeled. "Ad-Advertising?"

"Yes, we're thinking we could use her as the 'before' picture to promote the weight-loss powers of our salads and things... Photoshop can work wonders for things like that." The woman laughed rather suddenly. Ahn-Lin forced a chuckle and got back on track.

"Are there any benefits for us? Mia-Lin requires a lot of help..." she said, looking over at her hefty little girl. She was clearly growing tired, sluggishly bringing chips to her mouth with a fat-laden arm and spilling them all over her vast paunch.

"Yes, of course! We'll pay you a large sum to start and a stipend every month."

"Alright..." Ahn-Lin was still not convinced. What if they're scamming me?

"We'll also cover all of Mia-Lin's food expenses..."

That did it, Ahn-Lin was in. Mia-Lin's budget put a huge dent in her finances, and she would love any chance to lower that. Free food was unprecedented.

"That sounds great!"

"If she gets too large for you, we could provide skilled care and even move her into a larger facility..."

Ahn-Lin couldn't believe what she was hearing. Free care? A place for Mia-Lin to really grow? Am I dreaming?

"What do I need to do?"

Linda shuffled some more papers. "Well, you'll have to sign a standard non-disclosure agreement- you can't tell anybody that Mia-Lin will be only the before pictures, after all- and then a few more contracts and whatnot. Nothing terribly difficult. If you come by our regional office we can take care of that quite quickly. Oh, and bring-"

Ahn-Lin, in her excitement, had accidentally hung up, and redialing the number only brought her to the company switchboard. She swore quite extensively in Chinese, but just then Mia-Lin started to cry- clearly, she had exhausted herself and was still hungry. Ahn-Lin rushed to her side, resolving to look into the offer soon.
13212212112111112122122211221212211.title: Better than Ronald?

choices: Ahn-lin got a follow-up call from McDonalds.
Ahn-lin had to figure out how to get Mia to the McDonalds Regional Office.
132122121121111121221222112212122112.content:
Ahn-lin was very excited, but didn't want to leave Mia-lin hungry. She grabbed a ton of snacks from the kitchen, and rushed upstairs to feed her starving ball of flab.
"Mom, it took you so long to get here!" Mia-lin complained, as her mother panted for breath.
"Sorry... I was just on the phone with McDonalds, and they want to use you as their Mascot! They offered to pay for all your feeding expenses, as well as offer free housing to let you grow as large as you want!" Ahn-lin explained.
"Oh my gosh, really? That's amazing!" Mia-lin cheered, her wild outburst causing her many chins and belly to jiggle with glee. Mia-lin wanted to get this on the road immediately, but she certainly couldn't move on an empty stomach.
"Don't worry, my tubby angel..." Ahn-lin smiled, patting her daughter's giant globe of a belly, "I'm gonna feed you every last thing in the house before we go, as a celebration feast!"
"Yay, Celebration Feast!" Mia said, beginning to chow down on the chips her mother brought up.
Ahn-lin smiled, and headed downstairs to start preparing the biggest feast of Mia's life.

Only a few hours pass before Mia-lin finishes all the snacks, and by then Ahn-lin was finished cooking and preparing her daughters Celebration Feast.
Piles of Steak Burgers, Ice Cream Cakes, Pizzas and other such delicacies were all on a giant cart, and Ahn-lin brought them within reaching distance of Mia.
She quickly grabbed chunks of Cake and slices of pizza, and began stuffing her massive maw. She was growing fatter much more visibly than ever, her obese belly filling up more and more of the bed. It wouldn't be long before the entire bed was covered in her Toddler Belly, as if it hardly mattered.
Ahn-lin watched in joy as her tubby girl happily gorged on the fattening foods, forgetting all about the Phone Call. She caressed her daughters big belly, feeling the food slosh around and digest. It was a tingly and warm feeling, that made her feel at peace.

Many hours pass, and Mia Lin was far passed overstuffed. She had eaten every last scrap of food, and her belly covered a good majority of the room she was in.
"Ooh, mom... I think I ate too much..." Mia-lin mentioned.
"No such thing, dear. Yes, it might be a bit harder to bring you out, but... That'll be a problem for another day. For now, let's just get some rest, and have you digest this meal. I think it was your biggest yet!" Ahn-lin stated.
"I bet, but it'll be nothing compared to what I'll have when I get all that free food!" Mia added.
They both fell asleep, Ahn-lin resting on her daughters flab, it was very soft and cushiony.

The next day...
132122121121111121221222112212122112.title: Can't leave on an empty stomach

choices: They couldn't use Mia-Lin in their advertisements.  She's simply too big.
They are going to pick up Mia-Lin and her to the McDonalds department soon.
1321221211211111212212221122121221121.content:
Ahn-Lin suddenly woke up from the sound of her phone ringing. The mother realized that she had slept until the next day on Mia-Lin's massive belly, who had grown fatter and softer from digesting all the food from yesterday. Ahn-Lin then got off her daughter and went to her phone. She checked the caller-ID of the phone, and saw that it was from Linda from the McDonalds PR department.

Oh no! I forgot about McDonalds! Ahh-Lin realized. She then answered the phone, apologizing profusely for not answering her phone sooner. However, Linda was about to tell Ahn-Lin that:
1321221211211111212212221122121221121.title: Ahn-lin got a follow-up call from McDonalds.

...how sad it was that it was two hours away...
1321221211211111212212221122121221122.content:
Ahn-Lin woke up rather luxuriously, yawning and stretching in the early morning sun. Mia-Lin was still snoozing gently on her bed. Her belly had flubbed out significantly since yesterday's stuffing; it had changed from a round, stiff ball to a great swell of flab that reached past her knees and nearly to mid-calf. Ahn-Lin gave it a soft rub, smiling at its softness. Something popped into her head just then; a small, nagging thought that she had forgotten something terribly important. She spent a few minutes looking at Mia-Lin, trying to deduce what it could be. None of her daughter's many rolls offered a clue, though, so she instead headed off to make breakfast.

The thought returned as she fried up some hamburger meat for breakfast burritos- it was McDonalds! She was supposed to bring Mia-Lin to their office! Abandoning the pan, she raced to her ancient desktop and Googled its location. It took ages for Maps to load over her ancient dial-up modem, but finally, she was able to find out where it was. She'd waited far too long, though- the smell of burning meat and the cries of a hungry Mia-Lin reached her ears at about the same moment. As she raced back to the kitchen to salvage breakfast and sate her obese daughter, she could only think about...
1321221211211111212212221122121221122.title: Ahn-lin had to figure out how to get Mia to the...

choices: Ahn-Lin decides to get it overwith and soon enough they are on their way.
Ahn-Lin decides to wait until McDonalds calls again- meanwhile, Mia-Lin grows...
13212212112111112122122211221212211222.content: Though Ahn-Lin was stuffing her massive daughter full of barely-saved breakfast, normally an enjoyable activity, all she could feel was worry. She had no idea how she was going to get Mia-Lin to the McDonald's office. A whole host of problems confronted the nervous mother, and all of them looked fairly difficult to achieve. First of these was the simple fact that Mia-Lin had not been in the car in nearly two months, and she had no idea how or even if she would be able to fit inside. She also had nothing to wear- Mia-Lin had actually gone without clothes for those nearly two months, preferring that over (however skimpy) crop-tops and shorts. Now she was so large Ahn-Lin doubted there was a single thing in the house to keep her decent with. Second was the problem of keeping her fed; Mia-Lin needed quite a lot of help to eat, and though she could manage well enough at feeding herself in short bursts there was not a lot she could do to keep sated over a long period of time, which two hours certainly was. Coupled with the fact that Mia-Lin also needed fairly frequent bathroom breaks, and Ahn-Lin had what looked like a recipe for perhaps the worst road trip of all time. It was only two hours, sure, but it was two hours of driving with a spoiled-rotten-and-morbidly-obese little girl. Ahn-Lin loved her little Mia-Lin to death, of course, but she really wasn't sure if she was ready to love her to death that much. So she thought, and Mia-Lin ate.
13212212112111112122122211221212211222.title: A long drive for a big girl

choices: The positions been filled by someone else!
They can provide transportation to the headquarters if need be.
132122121121111121221222112212122112222.content:
Ahn-lin comes to the conclusion that McDonalds was bound to call them up again, and when they did, they could explain just how large Mia-lin was.
This quelled Ahn-lin's fears, and continued stuffing her daughter. In the meantime, she called up several local food delivery services to come and ordered two of each thing on all of their menus for her daughter. Mia-lin listened, and was super excited. She continued eating and growing fatter by the second.

The food finally arrived, and the entire kitchen was full of Pizza Hut, Burger King, and tons of McDonalds. Mia-lin was overwhealmed with how much food there was, there was even more food than there was last night!
"Eat up, buttercup~!" Ahn-lin smiled, and Mia didn't need to be told twice. She got right to work on devouring all the food within her reach, her body growing fatter with each bite. The chair she was sitting on, which already was holding on by a thread, was obviously crushed under her growing rump.
"Hehehe..." Mia giggled as her butt hit the cold ground. It tickled her, and felt very good against her skin.
Ahn-lin kept moving food closer to her daughter's ever expanding mass, once again forgetting all about the McDonalds Deal. She caressed her daughters flab, happily watching as her fat blob of a daughter growing gleefully.

Once again, Mia had devoured all the food in the kitchen. Her immense belly flooded in front of her, her belly stuffed, taught and round.
"I'm so full... I haven't eaten like that since... Well, yesterday!" Mia stated.
"Are you sure you don't have room for dessert?" Ahn-lin tempted, opening a pantry door to a ton of desserts and sweets.
Mia felt instantly hungry and felt like she hadn't eaten in forever, the food looked so good Mia just HAD to have it. She made grabby arms towards the food, and Ahn smiled.

But just then, Ahn got a phone call, and it was from McDonalds. They called to tell her...
132122121121111121221222112212122112222.title: Growing little girl

choices: Ahn-Lin decided to tell Mia-Lin the bad news.
1321221211211111212212221122121221122221.content:
"Hello, this is Linda from the McDonalds PR Department," Ahn-Lin heard over the phone.

"Oh thank you! I was wondering when you were going to call back," Ahn-Lin spoke to Linda, "I was feeding Mia-Lin to prepare her for your advertisements--"

"Ahn-Lin, I'm sorry to say this, but I have been told to tell you the bad news," Linda said, "We have already found someone to fill the position for our advertisements,"

"What?! Why!?" Ahn-Lin exclaimed back to the phone.

"You had hung up before I could finish our call, and you haven't responded back in a long time, so we had to find someone else to fill the role."

"But I was feeding Mia-Lin during all that time! I thought you were going to call again!" Ahn-Lin shouted.

"Sorry, but business is very competitive. We may consider Mia-Lin when another position opens up, but not right now," Linda said.

"I undertand..." the defeated Ahn-Lin said to the phone.

"Okay, then. We may call you back once a potential position for Mia-Lin opens up. I hope you have a good day," Linda said before hanging up.

Ahn-Lin was defeated. The chance to make her daughter even bigger and happier had gone by because of her hubris. Ahn-Lin was worried that she would break the news to Mia-Lin because Mia-Lin would become very temperamental from hearing that.

Suddenly:
1321221211211111212212221122121221122221.title: The positions been filled by someone else!

choices: A new fast food restaurant with very fattening food.
McDonalds, which happened to be the new advertisement with an obese little girl.
1321221211211111212212221122121221122221.content: Suddenly, an advertisement on television began playing, which caught Ahn-Lin's attention. The advertisement turned out to be from:
1321221211211111212212221122121221122221.title: An advertisement played on TV.

Street address to drive Mia-Lin there for lunch.
1321221211211111212212221122121221122221.content:
The commercial played, and it turns out it is from a new fast food restaurant.  

When the commercial ended, Ahn-Lin astounded. "Paunch Burger?" Ahn-Lin asked to herself, wondering why she had never heard of a fast food restaurant like that before. Not only did the commercial disregard healthy eating and encouraged eating fatty foods, but the meal shown was something never seen before in any other ad. The burger was a tower of patties covered in bacon, cheese, and grease, with only a tiny strip of lettuce on the bottom. The chili-cheese fries were more chili and cheese than fries. Even the talk milkshake was a meal on its own! And that was just the breakfast combo! Who knows what the grander combos would be like? This "Paunch Burger" restaurant was perfect for Mia-Lin to eat at, or even to be a mascot for!

Look's like I found a new restaurant for Mia-Lin! Ahn-Lin thought to herself before searching up the restaurant's:
1321221211211111212212221122121221122221.title: Paunch Burger

choices: Ahn-Lin agrees! Let's get this shoot on the road.
Ahn-Lin wants to wait to get a feel for the situation before she says anything.
1321221211211111212212221122121221122222.content:
"Hello, Miss Xi?" the familiar voice asked. "It's me, Linda from McDonald's. I noticed you haven't come in yet, have you been having misgivings?"

"N-No, not at all! I just couldn't figure out how to get Mia-Lin to your building, that's all. She is awfully big, and our call awfully small..." Most things were small in comparison to Mia-Lin, Ahn-Lin's trusty Subaru no exception.

Linda chuckled. "Oh, is that all? We were worried you wanted to back out! Not to worry, we can send you a car. In fact, if you wouldn't mind, we can have it come today and have everything all signed. How does that sound?"

Ahn-Lin was shocked at this generosity- McDonald's must really like Mia-Lin. Giddily, she said, "That would be excellent! When should I expect the car?"

"By eleven, probably- we'll even pack Mia-Lin a lunch for the road."

Now it was Ahn-Lin's turn to chuckle. "You'd better make sure it's a big one!"

Linda laughed, seemingly genuinely. "Perfect, perfect! See you soon."

"Alright, and thanks for everything!"

Ahn-Lin was about to hang up the phone when Linda spoke again.

"Oh, I almost forgot! Do you think we could do the first photoshoot today as well? It'll save you guys a trip all the way out here..."
1321221211211111212212221122121221122222.title: They can provide transportation to the headquar...

choices: When they reach McDonalds HQ, they are greeted by Linda.
1321221211211111212212221122121221122222.content:
"Why not? It'd save a ton of time, anyway. Let's just do it then!" Ahn-lin agrees.
"Great! Well, we look forward to seeing you, and I hope you enjoy your life in luxury after becoming a part of our brand!" Linda stated happily, as she hung up the call.
Ahn-lin noticed it was only 8:30, so she and Mia had some time before they left. Since Mia still had some food left, she had some time to plan something to do until the car came.

Hours passed, and a giant hauler truck came labeled "McDonalds". Two strapping men entered the home, and spotted Mia.
"Woah! We knew she was big, but..." One of the men stated, shocked. But one look at Ahn-lin's glare and he quickly rephrased what he was going to say, "...N-not like that'll be a problem. In fact, the bigger, the better when it comes to our company."
"Of course, and Mia is happy to get as large as she wants to get." Ahn-lin spoke for Mia, who nodded happily. Mia looked to be well over 600 pounds now, and looked the size of a dining table. Ahn-lin fitted her a Bra and skirt in an attempt to cover up her nude parts, but it didn't do much due to the sheer size of Mia.
The two men did notice this, but opted to not say anything as to not upset Mia's mother.
The two heaved Mia from the buttocks, and lifted her into the Truck

The inside of the Truck seemed like a Miniature mansion, with a cushioned chair perfectly suited for an obese girl the size of Mia, and even a conveyor belt to feed Mia whenever she wanted.
"Ah, this is even better than I could ever imagine!" Ahn-lin said, "Oh, you'll absolutely love it here, Mia!"
"Yeah! I want AAAALL THE FOOD!" Mia shouted, causing her fat folds to jiggle. She was sat on the chair, and she turned on the conveyor belt that sent out a small meal for her. But it was more like a snack, and she could devour it quickly. She saw there was a size meter, and chose the highest setting; "Family of 20."
Piles of Burgers, Fries and Shakes were sent out on the conveyor, and Mia began devouring them all, pressing the button multiple times to get more and more food.
"She's a real eater..." One of the men said, "We should probably hurry and move her to HQ before she outgrows this entire truck, heh."
They were both only half joking, they needed to get a move on.

Ahn-lin stayed in the back, watching Mia eat all the food she could, her belly growing slowly, yet visibly.
She couldn't wait to see how big her daughter could get.
1321221211211111212212221122121221122222.title: Ahn-Lin agrees! Let's get this shoot on the...

choices: Follow Ahn-Lin- should she sign or shouldn't she?
1321221211211111212212221122121221122222.content:
Mia-Lin was rather rudely awakened from her food-induced stupor by the truck coming to a sudden stop, spilling milkshake all over her vast expanse of fat. She looked around, monumentally confused, and was about to cry until Ahn-Lin, thinking quickly, shoved a few fries into her mouth and said, "We're here!" Mia-Lin's expression immediately changed to one of pure joy, a wide smile spreading across her flabby face. "Yay! Even more food!" Her stomach, in total defiance of all the food she had just eaten, let out an enormous growl, causing the enormous girl to wince. Ahn-Lin put a few more fries close to her mouth and marveled at her huge daughter. During the two-hour ride, she had managed to consume nearly twenty of the largest meals the truck's system had to offer- four hundred hundred burgers total at a rate of three per minute, not including fries, shakes, and everything else the machine spit at her massive daughter. The feeding had been more than enough to totally shred the skimpy and overwrought clothes Ahn-Lin had tossed onto her this morning, and she honestly didn't mind all that much; the two workers had been totally professional and helpful. At this moment they were busy heaving the nude, food-covered body of Mia-Lin onto a very large cart, but they weren't having an easy time of it. Mia-Lin was too large, too soft, and too ungainly to make any movement-related job easy. However, after a few minutes of effort, they managed to heave Mia-Lin's flabby expanse onto the big cart, upon which they found that she was too big for it- her flab hung off on all sides and brushed against the floor. Ahn-Lin, appreciating their efforts, waved them on anyway, and soon they were rolling down the ramp and into the building, Mia-Lin's fat brushing the ground as they went.

Upon passing through the double-doors in the front of the building, they were greeted by a security guard, who appeared to be very flustered at the morbidly obese, nude, and now extremely hungry and angry girl sitting on a cart in front of him. "You, uh, you can't, uh...who are you, trying to come in all...inappropriate like that?" "Huff...HUNGRY!" shouted Mia-Lin, her enormous paunch growling in tandem with her announcement. Despite all the food she'd eaten, all she could think about was more. Her many folds broke out into a sweat with the effort of shouting and sitting. The guard bristled. "Now listen here, little lady-" "Lenny, it's fine, she's supposed to look like that," interrupted a strident female voice. "Buzz them in." The guard jumped. "But, Miss Kozikowski, are you-" "Of course I'm sure, Lenny, I invited these people!" Begrudgingly, the guard waved the group through, and soon Mia-Lin was treated to her first glimpse of the corporate world.

Ahn-Lin had barely walked through the door before her hand was enveloped in an extremely powerful handshake. "Ahn-Lin? It's a pleasure, a real pleasure." The hand belonged to a short, powerfully built blonde in glasses, a bun, and a brown suit. "Linda Kozikowski. I'm so glad you're here." "I-" said Ahn-Lin, but by then Linda had already moved on Mia-Lin, who was currently flapping a useless hand at a picture of a hamburger. "And you must be Mia-Lin! Oh, you're so adorable!" Linda cooed, pinching one of Mia-Lin's enormous cheeks. Mia-Lin burped- very sweetly, thought Ahn-Lin- and shouted "HUNGRY!" again. Linda let out a squee fairly unbecoming of her businesslike look. "She's so cy-oot! You must be hungry from the car ride, huh?" Mia-Lin nodded as much as her four chins would let her. "Brilliant! Bring her to some more food." The two workers, impassive as always, wheeled the enormous girl off to something to eat. "Wait, I-" cried Ahn-Lin, but Linda was already steering her in a different direction. "Right this way, Miss Xi- I have the forms all ready and waiting for you to sign."
1321221211211111212212221122121221122222.title: When they reach McDonalds HQ, they are greeted ...

choices: "I will not! She's my child, and I won't give her up no matter what!"
1321221211211111212212221122121221122222.content:
"Well, Ms. Xi, now that we're alone, we can talk business." Linda stated, taking her to her office. "You see, the McDonalds corporation has a long, extensive line of Child Actors. First it was about health and fit figure, but we realized that the healthy crowd don't order nearly as much as those who are gluttonous and obese. So that's the crowd we're wanting to pander to from now on."

She continued to talk more about the history and process McDonalds was going through, but Ahn-lin couldn't take her eyes off of Linda's office. It was quite massive, one that might belong to a CEO. Linda was sitting in a Velvet Recliner, while Ahn was squatting in a wooden, rustic chair.

Linda continues, "I did tell you that we were going to make your daughter seem thinner using Computer technology, but you had to assume that would be impossible. The Media would find out soon enough that our "Healthy Child" is truly just a gluttonous blob. That is why, instead, we're going to start the 'Big Little Girl' campaign. If we can prove that even a Child, like yours, can live a healthy and happy life as a half-ton child, we can surely encourage people to start living the lives they want to live, instead of the lives they're forced to live."
Ahn-lin felt this was amazing, now people wouldn't find Mia weird, or strange, but as an Idol. A goal to live up to. However, she did have her fair share of concerns.
"So you're going to be fattening America?" Ahn-lin asked.
"Oh, we've always been doing that, Ahn. Now we'll be doing it much more publicly, and if all goes well, our profits will skyrocket from gluttonous blobs who love to eat!" Linda explained.
"It does sound nice... And Mia would be well fed here, right?" Ahn asked.
"Of course. We would never let her be hungry again, but there is one thing you do need to know..." Linda stated, "If you sign this, you'll be signing control of her to McDonalds Corporation for at least 2 months while we use her as our promotional tool. When we return her, she will be unharmed and hopefully three times as large as she is now, if not larger! As well as an international superstar."
Ahn didn't like the idea of not seeing or having control of her child for months, but the benefits could possibly outweigh the downsides..
"Shouldn't I talk this over with my daughter?" Ahn-lin asked.
"Listen, this deal ends the minute you walk out that door." She pointed towards the doors leading to the rest of the building, "Don't let this slip!".

Ahn Lin considered for a while, and decided on an answer...
1321221211211111212212221122121221122222.title: The Contract

1321221211211111212212221122121221122222.content: Ahn-Lin said to herself that she could relax for a few months while her child gets fatter so she singed. She told Mia-Lin about the deal and she was okay with it as long as their is tons of food there.
1321221211211111212212221122121221122222.title: "Alright, I'll sign the contract."

1321221211211111212212221122121221122222.content:
Ahn-Lin stared at the contract for one final moment, then shoved it away from her in disgust. "I can't sign this! Mia-Lin is my daughter, and I'm not signing her away to some company that I don't trust!"

Linda's plastic smile stayed exactly the same, but her gaze turned to ice, an acidic glare directed into Ahn-Lin's fearful eyes. When she next spoke, it was with a venomous, corrosive drawl.

"Well, Miss Xi, I'm afraid you don't exactly have a choice."

"Wh-what?" Ahn-Lin gasped.

Linda chuckled darkly. "I'm afraid she's rather busy at the moment. They're getting her ready for her first advertisement!"

Ahn-Lin sprang up and headed for the door, but it shut with a snap.

"She's in the studio on the other side of this building, Miss Xi. In between this office and that studio are fifty armed guards and countless employees who will stand quite effectively in your way. And, if you get to her, what will you do then? You can't honestly expect to push an eight-hundred pound toddler all the way home, can you?"

Ahn-Lin took a very deep, very shaky breath, and turned back towards Linda, face wet with tears. Linda smirked.

"Good, very good! Now that we've got all of that settled, how about you sign here? You'll have Mia-Lin back safe and sound before you know it."
1321221211211111212212221122121221122222.title: No escape for the moment

choices: "Your feeding, the moment you've been aching for!"
1321221211211111212212221122121221122222.content:
"Alright, but please just keep her safe!" Ahn-lin stated, in a nearly pouting voice.
Linda smiled, going back to her chipper, happy-go-lucky attitude, "Good to hear you're on board! Don't worry, we won't lay a single finger of harm onto your daughter. Pinky promise!" Linda said, shaking Ahn's hand after she signed the document.
"Can I at least say one last goodbye to her before I leave?" Ahn-lin asked.
"Of course, we're not TOTAL monsters." Linda chuckled. She showed Ahn out the door, and they began to head over to Mia-lin's studio.

"And... Action!" A director called out. Cameras began rolling, and Mia-lin was rolled out onto the stage. They did a few zoom up's on Mia's jiggly body as it was pushed in via Greenscreen crane, and she was plopped down right in the middle.
"Hi, I'm Mia, an' I'm over 800 pounds! I love being this size, an' I wanna get bigger, but people wan' me to lose it." Mia recited from a teleprompter.
The Camera panned down to a man in a suit, who patted Mia's belly, and chuckled, "What a big ball of fun, huh? People think that being overweight is a problem, but recent studies have showed at kids, and even adults, who are overweight show more signs of happiness than those of a healthy weight. Join us in the campaign to promote and accept the gaining of people globally." The man recited, in a more serious tone.
"Yeah, and help kids like me get even bigger than this!" Mia added, "I'm not even 5, and if I can handle this amount of weight, so can you and your kids!"
"Cut, that's a wrap!" The director called out.
Mia Lin exhaled, "That's hard work, readin' all those words."
"But you did such a good job!" Linda stated, clapping from in front of a door next to Ahn-lin.
"Mommy! You're here!" Mia cried, grasping out her arms to reach for her mother. But her arms were far too chubby to be of any use.
Ahn and Linda laughed, finding the attempt adorable.

"...What're you sayin', mom?" Mia asked, after being told about the Contract.
"I'm saying Mommy's gonna have to leave you here with McDonalds until you're done with your advertisement work, sweetie." Ahn-lin stated in the simplest terms possible.
"But... But I want you to stay!" Mia pouted.
"I'm sorry, but they'll make you fatter. You wanna be fatter, right?" Ahn tried to reason.
"...Yeah..." Mia admitted, "But... When'll you be back?"
"Don't worry, I'll be back before you know it." She gave a wink, knowing Mia didn't know a thing about time yet.
Linda tapped her wrist, indicating it was time for her to leave.
"Well, I'll see you soon, Sweetheart. I love you..." She gave one final, long embrace before lowering herself to the ground and walking out the door.

"Well, Mia Lin, now that she's gone, we can finally get started with..."

1321221211211111212212221122121221122222.content:
"Alright, Mia, it's time to get something to eat! You're lookin' mighty hungry there from all that hard work."
"Yay!" cried Mia-Lin. She would have clapped her hands for joy, but she hadn't been able to reach her arms high enough to touch each other for quite some time. As it was she settled for clapping her vast belly. "I am pretty hungry..."
"And a good thing too!" said the director, giving her flabby expanse a soft pat. "You're plenty big, but you're gonna need to be a lot bigger to get these ads done!"
Mia-Lin's eyes widened to the size of dinner plates. "B...Bigger?"
"Yep!" said the director whimsically. "More'n double!"
Before Mia-Lin could answer, he strode away, and she was whisked away to another room labeled, in colorful crayon letters, FEEDING ROOM. But that was just to welcome Mia-Lin. Underneath the cheery paper sign was, in stark industrial letters, was the word REJECT PROCESSING.

It was in this room that food items that did not pass inspection were processed. Hamburger patties that were perfectly safe but violated some piddling FDA regulation, slightly overcooked McNuggets, excess "pink slime", that sort of thing. Proper garbage was sorted elsewhere and properly disposed of, but this perfectly edible food was costing the company quite a lot of money to get rid of when it really didn't need to go.

Enter Mia-Lin.

For this was the second reason McDonalds needed the enormous girl. Not only was she to be used in advertising, she was to help dispose of their excess-and serve as a rather unorthodox scientific experiment to boot. Of course she, being four years old, was entirely unaware of this, but even she was slightly nervous when she saw the feeding apparatus she was to use.

"I have to eat from THAT?" she said, pointing a fat finger at the conveyor belt-large tube combo gleaming ominously in the corner. The man pushing her said nothing, simply positioned the cart in front of the machine and turned it on. Immediately all kinds of things flew into Mia-Lin's shocked mouth, and soon after that she was too busy eating to think any longer.

Mia-Lin devoured the food as it came, it tasted delicious, but it was just so much food at once she was barely able to force all the food down her throat. Her belly took up more space as she ate from the tube. Time flew by very quickly as she ate, it seemed to have no meaning to her as she ate. Although she truly wished, for the first time in her life, that she would stop being fed soon.
Obviously, the people keeping an eye on Mia had no idea where or not she was enjoying it until the feeding was concluded. And that wouldn't happen until she was needed again for making another ad or for resting. For now, she was as good as an ever-expanding trash bin for rejected food. The most they could do is an hourly check on Mia Lin to make sure she's still alive and kicking. Well, not so much kicking, given her large weight.

After an hour, The tube was stopped. The observers checked the scale, and saw Mia had broken the 1,000 pound mark.
"Hm. Impressive." The first observer stated, "Do you think it has to do with our food, or her weak metabolism?"
"Either way, I like the results." The other remarked, and both chuckled.
They both headed down to check up on Mia Lin. They hopped on a Cherrypicker-like device, and were lifted up to Mia's Level.
"Greetings, Mia. How are you feeling?" One of the observers asked.
"Hungry. Very." Mia said. Even though she disliked the feeding tube, she still enjoyed the feeding.
"Heh, big appetite. That's good, because we got tons of food for ya." The other responded, "So do you like the tube?"
"I don't like it! Too fast. I cannot eat that fast!" Mia complained.
"Understandable. We can slow it down next time, but right now you've been called back to the studio. We need you for another shoot."
"Again?" Mia asked, a bit annoyed.
"That's the life of a star, kid." The Observer stated bluntly, "Like it or hate it, it's the life that's been chosen for ya. Let's get you moving."

Mia was lifted via crane to the Studio Room, where they were filming yet another ad.
"Alright, Mia. Just read the Teleprompter exactly as it's written, in your same happy, childlike 'tude!" The Director stated, "And... Action!"

"Robin you don't need to eat so fast." Her father said.

Robin and her parent's (John and Lisa) and her older sister (Christie) Were eating at Mc Donald's. Robin loved Mc Donald's. Especially their chocolate milkshake.
Robin looked at her parents.

"Robin you don't need to eat so fast so you can take a second course. If you want more we can take some more."

"Besides you already eat faster then us if you eat at your regular speed."

"I'm just hungry dad." Robin said and looked at her father.

She rubbed her potbelly.

Her sister looked angry at her.

"Just because you like Mc Donald's so much i need to eat this greasy food that's going to ruin my figure!"

"It will be good for you if you would gain a little Christie." Lisa said. "Your so thin the wind can almost blow you away."

"So we do eat here to fatten me up. But why does Robin need to eat here also. She's is the last person that need to be fattened up!"

Robin had a nice layer of fat over her whole body. She liked to eat and especially chocolate. And with her parents who spoiled their children a little she was quite fat but did't really mind. Neither did her parents.

"Come on Christie. Robin is only five years old. I'm sure she'll grow into it."

"You don't know that mom."

"You also did."

"What? I was't fat. Maybe a little chubby but that's it."

"Well you turned out thin. So i'm sure Robin also will."

Robin knew they were talking about her but did't really paid attention to it. She liked her body and did't mind being fat. Since Robin was very helpful she had enough friends at her school. However some kids had some trouble at the start thinking that a kid with the name Robin would be a boy not a girl. But they got used to it after a few days. And Robin liked her name.

"Mommyi'mstillhungry. May ihave somemore." Robin wasn't only a fast eater but also a fast talker. She pushed all her words in one sentence and one breath.

"Robin... slow down. What did you say?"

"I want more. I'm still hungry." She answered.

Her sister let out a sign of disgust about her sisters gluttony.

Lisa ignored her oldest daughter and said friendly: "Of course honey i will get some more for you."

"You're not full yet?" Christie asked.

"Nope."

"You know if you keep eating like that you'll become even fatter then you are now."

"Cristie stop it!" Their father said. "Leave Robin alone."

And Robin smiled and also eat her next two packs of fries, two big mac's and large chocolate milkshake that her mother took for here. After that she let out a large belch.

"Robin say excuse me." Her mother said smiling.

"Excuseme!"

"Close enough. Now let's go."

They got up

1412.content:
Suddenly, Robin was in a completely different world.
She was sitting in a king-size (no pun intended) bed made entirely of marshmallows. Her blanket was a thick sheet made of cotton candy. Robin bit into her blanket, and much to her delight, the blanket instantly regenerated, showing no sign that she'd taken a bite out of it. The world around her had changed too. The walls, ceiling, and floor were made of Hershey's chocolate. She hopped out of bed, stopping a moment to stuff her face with the huge marshmallows that made up her bed. Stifling a belch, she went to the kitchen. Looking in the pantry, she found that there was nothing but the most delicious candy of her life: chocolate, caramel, M&M's, marshmallows, cotton candy, and countless other delicacies.

She gorged on several of the pantry's contents, then went to the refridgerator. She opened it, revealing plate after plate of pieces chocolate cake. She greedily stuffed 10 pieces into her mouth, then looked in the freezer. No sooner had she opened the door then hundreds of dozens of gallons of chocolate milkshake flooded into her open mouth. She swallowed the entire freezer's delicious surprise, then grabbed 5 more pieces of cake, 7 king-size Snickers bars, several handfuls of the wall (which was also made of Hershey's), and 15 massive marshmallows as she hauled her huge frame back to her room. Her parents were waiting for her, sitting on her bed, watching her sluggishly move toward them.

'Hello, sweetie,' her mother said cheekily, 'Did you have a nice snack?'
Robin could simply nod as her mouth was nearly spilling over with sweets.
'Are you still hungry, Robin?' her father asked,
Robin nodded again.
'Would you like us to feed you, dear?' her mother asked as she and her father helped her sit down.
'Yes please, mommy,' Robin said, finally swallowing. 'feed me till I gotta roll to move!'
'OK, here comes the airplane, carrying nothing but chocolate brownie cake,' her mother said, making airplane noises.
Robin opened her mouth, and her mother stuck the entire piece into her mouth.
'Yummy,' Robin said, licking her lips to get any frosting that had smeared onto her chunky face, 'more, please.'
'Here comes the marshmallow train, now boarding at the Robin Station,' said her father, stuffing several marshmallows into Robin's waiting mouth.

That's when she woke up, and was STARVING. Luckily, she heard her mother downstairs cooking up some food. She ran downstairs, as fast as her chubby legs would allow, to begin eating the feast of a breakfast she was in for.

Robin quickly awoke, panting as she stared up at the ceiling. She was having such a nice dream about eating up the world's biggest chocolate cake, only to have it quickly turned on its head when she found herself being chased by a large, hungry wolf. She could hear its growls clearly as she helplessly waddled away from it.

Grrrrooouuurrrlll...

Robin squeaked and pulled the covers up over her nose, darting her eyes around for any sign of the wolf. She then blinked with realisation, quickly recognising the sound.
She pulled her blanket down, revealing the very round stomach being barely contained in her nightie.

"Oh," she mumbled quietly, putting a hand to the doughy flesh, "I must be hungry."
She looked at the delightful kitty-clock on her bedside table. The display read 1:24 AM
She blinked, surprised by the sight. She hadn't even heard of such a time before!
Nonetheless, the nagging need to feed in her head was insistent that she get moving, and so she began her journey.

She slowly lowered one chubby foot to the carpeted floor, and sneakily waddled across the room. The door silently opened, and she made extra effort to sneak past Christie's room. She stopped for a moment to throw a chubby scowl toward her older sister's door.
The stairs would prove to be the real challenge. Taking it one step at a time, she slowly descended the steps, making her breath as soft as she could.

Eventually, she made it downstairs, and took a few minutes to lean against the wall and get her breath back. She never enjoyed using the stairs, not a bit. They always made her tired and sweaty, plus her legs always got rather sore.

After wiping her brow, she continued to the kitchen and made straight for the pantry, giggling rather greedily as she opened the door and eyed up the plethora of candy inside.

With a gluttonous rub of her jiggly dome, she began happily stuffing her face, right there and then!

Robin did you eat everything?" She looked at the refrigerator and saw the grocery list was gone so that mend her mother would also do some grocery shopping.

"Yes my little piggie, it's really good. I know you're full but I bet you're hungry too, huh," Christie said.

"Mm-hmm," Robin nodded. She wasn't really telling the truth -- she was full. She didn't know why she was lying. Nachos sounded delicious, though. She felt greedy. It felt good.

Christie looked at her sister's fat tummy. It was poking out from the bottom of her shirt. She imagined her sister expanding right in front of her -- Robin's belly puffing outward, her arms becoming more swollen and segmented, her face becoming more cherubic, her hands and feet becoming more pudgy and cute. She was fasinated by her daydream. She needed to feed and fatten her little sister.

She secretly wanted a big, BIG little sister.

The next day Christie woke up early to make sure there was enough food to test out her plan. Sugary cereals, chips, a huge amount of leftovers, and few quick to cook things filled the house. Christy thought there would be enough for the first day at least. She got a few foods ready and eagerly waited for Robin to wake up.
Robin awakened to a plumper body that her pajamas were fighting against. She sleepily wandered to the kitchen as was routine and grabbed a big bowl of cereal then headed to the couch. Christie happily prepared a few other things for Robin to eat. As Robin finished up the cereal, Christie slid in a bowl of chips.
"Gotta keep you growing," she said to her overweight sister.
Robin smiled and started eating the chips. After that it was an omlet, then a second bowl of cereal. The girls then heard their parents coming from their bedroom. Christie scrambled to hide the evidence.
"Hey mom, Robin and I we're hungry for some pancakes and bacon, and eggs" Christie said.
"Hmmm I guess I could do that for you guys; I mean breakfast is the most important meal of the day," she replied. Christie smiled and turned to Robin.
"You're gonna get so fat," she said.
"Can't wait!" Robin replied as she patted her semi full belly.
When the food was food was done, Christie again pointed out how Robin was a "growing" girl and doubled her food amount. Eight pancakes, a separate plate of eggs and nine strips of Bacon. Robin eagerly ate every bite on her plate even when her stomach started to hurt. She liked the pain and the thought that her belly was going to grow fatter because of the food inside it.
Christie guided Robin to the couch where she planned to feed her more. She started off with leftover pancakes. Robin forced herself to eat them despite her aching tummy's protests.
"Christie I'm so full..." Robin moaned while rubbing her stuffed paunch.
"Don't worry, I'll help you," Christie said. She went and grabbed a pack of cookies and a tall glass of milk. Slowly, Christie eased the cookies into Robins stomach until the pack was empty. The fat girl's shirt couldn't go the length needed to cover her belly.
"Just a little more?" Robin asked, to Christie's surprise.
"Are you sure?"
Robin patted her heavy paunch. "Belly needs more!" Robin said. Her belly was aching but she was feeling greedy. She wanted her belly to hurt a little more, but her eyes widened when she saw Christie come back with a large bowl of pasta.
"This is half the pasta, the rest is going to be your pre dinner." Christie said, "Besides, we both knew this would end up in that belly of yours eventually." Christie towered over Robin and started feeding her. Robins belly grew with every large, forced bite. She could feel the food stretching her gut and she rubbed it to try to soothe the pain. When Christie was finally done, Robin closed her eyes and focused on breathing. She knew this was all for her to get fatter. She actually felt physically tired from eating so much and fell asleep on the couch. Christie was amazed by how much Robin ate. She couldn't wait to stuff her again.

Robin thought about it. She liked snacking a lot, and this would mean that her tummy wouldn't hurt so much anymore. "That sounds okay," she said.

Robin smiled at her. This wasn't so bad, she thought. Now Christie would be nice to her. All she had to do was eat all the time, which she liked anyway. As Christie left the room, Robin was already unwrapping the first candy bar.

14223122111.content:
Christie got up off of the couch. "Stand up for me," Christie said. Robin frowned. She had been lounging for a while and didn't want to move. With a grunt, she managed to get herself up and on her feet.

"Show me your tummy," Christie said as she got on her knees. Robin lifted up her shirt enough to show Christie her big stomach. Christie put her hands on Robin's tummy and squeezed it. Then she tested how big her thighs were. "Hold out your arms," she said. Robin held her arms out -- they were getting more and more plump due to her overeating.

"Alright girls, dinner time!" their mom said as she came into the room. Quickly Christie pulled down Robin's shirt and stood up. As they walked to the dining room, the delicious smell of fettucini pasta with cheese sauce hit Robin's nostrils. It smelled so good! But she was so full already -- she had literally been eating and eating all afternoon.

Christie smiled. The more and more food Robin stuffed into herself, the bigger her tummy would get, and the more it would take to make her full. Robin would grow faster and faster and get postively huge! This made Christie excited.

Their mom began dishing their plates. "Robin's been hungry all day mom, you should give her extra," Christie said and smiled. Robin's eyes grew wide with surprise, but nodded in false agreement.

Robin stuck her fork in a big blob of cheesy, fattening pasta and shoved it into her wide, open mouth. Some of it was dangling, so she used her other plump hand to push it all the way in. Christie giggled at her messy sister.

Christie made sure Robin was constantly eating something for the rest of the evening, but let Robin take her time -- she managed to consume two bowls of ice cream and several cookies, as well as a few tall glasses of whole milk.

"You were a good girl today Robin," Christie whispered to her sister while they watched TV before bedtime. "Doesn't it feel good to get fat?"

Robin nodded and hiccupped.

Finally, the day was over and Robin was ready for bed.
