142231221111.title: We go to the mall

1422312211112.content:
As they drove to the mall, Christie plotted out how to feed Robin as much as possible throughout the day. Fortunately, the food court was right in the middle of the mall, meaning that they would likely be passing it several times that day. If they managed to stop for a little snack each time...

Christie's stomach rumbled, breaking into her thoughts. She realized that, sadly, the three girls had not had breakfast yet today! She soon cheered up, though, for she saw a most convenient sign: 'IHOP, Straight Ahead!'

"Mom, can we stop at IHOP for breakfast, please?" she asked sweetly.

"Why of course, honey! That's a great idea!" The girls' mother agreed.

"Yay, pancakes!" cheered Robin.

Soon, the trio had arrived at IHOP and climbed out of the car. Christie looked at the sign and smiled to herself: 'All-You-Can-Eat Pancake Special!' it exclaimed.

'Yes, this will be a very good start to the day...' Christie thought gleefully, resisting the urge to rub her hands together like the villain in an old movie.

The girls hurried inside and sat down at a booth.

As they perused the menu, Robin licked her lips. "I can't decide what to have," she said to Christie.

Christie took this opportunity to say "You know, they DO have the 'All-You-Can-Eat' special... And that's whatever kind of pancakes you want! So you could try them all..."

"Ooh, that sounds great! Thanks, Christie!" Robin said. She set her menu on the table and waited hungrily, swinging her legs.

Christie decided on the chocolate chip pancakes, and their mother settled for blueberry pancakes.

When the waitress came to take their orders, everyone except Christie was shocked when Robin said, in her sweetest voice, "And I'll have the 'All-You-Can-Eat' special, please!"

"Honey, don't you think that's a little much?" Her mother said. "Maybe just one plate would be best, don't you think?"

Robin adamantly shook her head. "Nope, that's what I want."

To their mother's surprise, Christie stood up for Robin. "If she thinks she can handle it, Mom, you should let her try."

Their mother sighed and gave up. "All right, Robin, but is you eat yourself sick, don't say I didn't warn you."

"And what kind of pancakes would you like to start out with, dear?" The waitress inquired of Robin.

"I'll start out with the chocolate-chip, thank you," Robin smiled.

The waitress smiled and took their menus. "All right, then! Those'll be out soon!"

The girls waited, steadily getting hungrier, Robin most of all. It didn't help any that Christie kept talking about food as they waited.

In about 15 minutes, the pancakes had arrived. Each was about the size of a small plate, and each girl had three on her plate.

"Enjoy!" the waitress said before moving off to serve someone else.

Robin hastily poured syrup over her pancakes and dug in. She cut the pancakes up into pieces small enough to fit into her mouth before stuffing them in.

She had finished her plate even before Christie and her mother had finished their first pancakes. She signaled to the waitress, who cam over and said "Yes? How can I help you?"

Robin pointed to her plate and said "I'd like the blueberry pancakes next, please."

"Right away, dear." The waitress said, returning to the kitchen. Soon, she came back with a plate of blueberry pancakes and set it in front of Robin. Robin thanked her and started to eat.

When she was done with that, Christie and her mother had barely finished their second pancakes. Robin was starting to get full.

"Good job, Robin," whispered Christie when their mother wasn't looking. "Keep up the good work."

Robin smiled and ordered a plate of apple-cinnamon pancakes. The waitress merely nodded and placed the order.

When it was up, she grabbed it and set it in front of Robin, noting that the other two were nearly finished with their meals.

As Robin continued to eat her 3rd plate, Christie and the girls' mom finished their meals and relaxed, waiting for Robin.

"Ah, I'm full," said Christie. "How about you, Robin? Getting full yet? Or do you still have room?"

Robin thought this may have been a veiled threat, and so said "I think I could eat another plate, I guess."

In truth, her stomach had become full, and was now starting to protrude from her clothes a little. But if she was going to get stuffed again, anyway, Robin thought she may as well do it herself this time.

Christie took the liberty of ordering another plate of pancakes for Robin before she was even finished; just plain ones, this time.

By the time the new pancakes had come, Robin had just barely finished her third plate, but she started immediately in on her 4th.

Their mom excused herself to the washroom to clean up, and Christie started to give Robin some encouragement. She began to rub Robin's stuffed stomach, which was now round enough to be only 3/4 covered by her shirt.

"Come on, Robin. You can do it," Christie whispered. "Just remember how good it feels to be stuffed. How good it feels to get fatter. Remember: The fatter you are, the better. It's good to be fat..."

Robin paused in between mouthfuls of syrup-drenched pancake to say "Christie, if it's so good to get fat... Shouldn't you?"

Christie closed her mouth. This was something she hadn't thought of. Before she could say anything, her and Robin's mother came back and sat down.

Shortly, Robin had finished, absolutely stuffed. She leaned back and said "Thanks, Mom! That was good!"

"You're welcome, sweetie. But that was quite a few pancakes you ate; are you sure you're alright?"

Robin nodded. I feel fine, Mommy." 'Fine' was an understatement; in truth, she felt great!

The girls' mother signaled the waitress for the check, and once they had received it, they got up to pay, leaving behind a nice tip for the waitress. Robin's pants creaked dangerously as the full weight of her stuffed belly came to rest on them, straining the button. Robin didn't attract too much attention as the trio paid and left, as there weren't too many people seated around the door area.

Once they got back in the car and Robin attempted to buckle up, she found it somewhat more difficult than before, due to her stuffed belly taking up so much space.

Christie was still silent as they continued onwards to the mall.
1422312211112.title: Pancakes, anyone?

14223122111121.content:

142231221112.title: A dream with a lot of food

choices: Christie feeds Robin in her sleep
1422312211122.content:
Robin snorted in her sleep as she continued to dream about getting huge and massive by eating everything in sight. What she didn't know was that by her side, next to the bed, Christie was awake and gently whispering suggestions to her.

"That's it Robin, dream of getting bigger and eating everything... eat... eat..." Christie said softly.

Robin smiled and moaned slightly as she slept. She unconsciously began to rub her belly, already fatter from today's binging. "M..more..." she mumbled.

"Yes, just like that Christie... good girl... have some more chocolate and pies and milkshakes and hamburgers..... eat and grow huuuuge..." Christie said. She was getting more and more into fattening up her little sister. It was really fun, and for some reason it made her feel excited. She didn't want to stop, and she didn't want Robin to stop either. So she would do anything to coerce Robin into becoming her willing feedee.

And it was working. In Robin's dream, though she sensed she had grown so extremely fat and huge that she dwarfed mountains, could think of nothing better than to find more and more things to stuff herself with. Every bite of the cartoonish fantasy land seemed to make her swell slightly, and every time that happened, her limbs felt more pillowy and constricted, her body felt larger, her mind felt more carefree, and her stomach felt more greedy.

That's when she saw the parade. At the center of the city nearby, there was a giant parade filled with all sorts of delicious things. Rank after rank of frosty gingerbread soldiers marched dutifully. Ice-cream smothered parade floats glistened in the sun. Giant translucent blimps filled with milkshake hovered along.

Robin, slowly but surely, lifted her right leg, from her massively turgid thigh all the way to her plumping toes, and stepped forward. As she got a rhythm going, she began to slowly waddle toward the parade, each step causing the earth to shake. Robin hoped she wouldn't trip on anything -- with how fat she was, she couldn't see her own belly button, let alone the ground.

"Tell me how much you want to get fatter Robin," a voice said softly. Robin didn't know where it was coming from as she made her way to the musical parade of endless desserts, but she responded enthusiastically, "I want to get fatter more than anything in the world."

At her daughter's prompting, she tried harder, putting herself closer to the ground and lifting farther. She groaned loudly with effort but was, once more, unsuccessful. She only succeeded in pushing more of her daughter's belly out. The titanic tummy sprouted, surrendering more flesh to the open air, before Christie's eyes, as the inadequate shirt dragged up. The attempt also caused a weak pants button to croak loudly, and then give up under pressure. It collided with Christie's hard ab muscles with a surprising amount of force.

Then, Linda spoke: "I'm trying honey, but you gained weight." Then she peered over her daughter's form from where she stood behind her. That spare tire that sagged and looked especially bloated in the front attracted a lot of attention. What an incredibly wide, gentle curve. She was almost spherical.

"Well, what did you expect, mom?" Christie quipped.

"Yay! Mom can't carry me anymore!!" Robin celebrated.

"I hope you like walking then," Christie reminded, slowly patting her unbelievable Buddha belly. Robin looked down, dejected. That shut her up.

"Well, you're gonna help me get her upstairs if we have to," Linda ordered, which caused Christie to protest against inequity. She had it up to here with all of Robin's coddling.

All of this, while Linda tried for the third time to lift her enormous daughter. Her mom's struggle caused her rubbery skin to stretch and her fat rolled around her bones like pudding. But no matter what, no actual lifting. She ordered Christie over, and together they tried a fireman's carry. With the fat five year old draped awkwardly across their collective shoulders, they trudged up the stairs. The amount of pressure Robin exerted upon them was big. Christie could swear she felt her spine compressing. She and her mother groaned and grunted their way to the room.

Robin's bed was in sight! Linda unloaded her burdensome daughter. Standing on the floor, Robin climbed up into bed, somehow.
14223212122.title: Is't able to lift Robin

choices: Christie's attempts to ruin Robin only result in Robin becoming more pampered.
Christie can't sleep with Robin's snoring; she gets some food to keep her quiet.
142232121222.content:
Not so much as a creak or whisper heralded the huge *KER-RACK!! FLUMP!* that made mother and daughter practically jump out of their skin that was produced when Robin's bed gave way beneath her weight, sending her flat-backed onto the floor with only her mattress and natural padding to cushion her.

This naturally set her excess weight in motion for a second, except for her stuffed stomach, which remained rather still, being so solid, and forced a great "*URRRRRRRPPP!!*" out of her. Uninjured, she giggled, and didn't even try to stand up as her mother and sister stood over her to survey the damage.

The bed's four legs had cracked off and splayed outwards all at once, the footboard and railings had fallen flat to the floor, and the headboard leaned against the wall.

"Well, it was only cheap plastic, anyway..." Lisa murmured, seeing the thin mattress absolutely crushed beneath her daughter. "She was past due to outgrow it..." She just hadn't imagined it would happen in quite so spectacular a fashion.

"Whelp, have fun sleeping on the floor!" Christie laughed as she headed for the door. "It'll be just like your own little pigpen!"

"Oh no you don't!" Lisa said, catching her by the shoulder and spinning her around. "Robin is sleeping in your bed until we can get her a new one!"

"Wh-what?! That's not fair! There won't be room enough in there for the both of us!" she cried, stamping her foot.

"Then you can go get a sleeping bag from the basement," her mother said, unmoved. "Now help me get Robin up."

After much pulling and straining, it was decided that they'd give the fat five-year-old a sort of "bobsled ride" to Christie's room next door by tugging on the mattress, sliding it along the floor. Once there, and they got Robin to her feet, she pulled herself up into her sister's bed, and made herself comfortable.

"Goodnight, girls. No fighting," Lisa said, leaving the room to clean up the mess and break the news to John.

Christie ground her teeth for a minute before she finally decided to carve out a space for herself in her bed, finding that she had plenty of room. Still, she wasn't satisfied, for she wanted it all.

"Goodnight, little piggy. Try not to oink in your sleep," she grumped, turning her back on her sister.

"Goodnight, Christie!" Robin said sweetly, lying on her back, rubbing her belly and burping. "Sweet dreams!"

"Hmph." Christie closed her eyes, and surprisingly quickly, sleep came.

14223212122211.content:
After Robin had recovered somewhat from eating more food than most consume in a week, Lisa declared that they were going out to buy a new bed. Christie stayed at home, well and truly sick of her oversized sister, as her mother heaved Robin into the car. Lisa fastened the seat belt over her daughter's swollen midsection with some difficulty, and then they were off.
They soon arrived at the furniture shop, and they both got out the car and entered. Inside were chairs and tables and beds and all other sorts of furniture. Robin waddled over to the beds and sat down on the closest one to catch her breath. It had been a short walk from the car to inside the shop, but the young girl was worn out.
Beneath her, the wooden bed supports groaned ominously, and Lisa quickly pulled her daughter back to her feet before she destroyed any more furbiture. Nearby, a shopping assistant spotted them and hurried over.
"Hello, can I help you with anything?" He asked politely.
"Erm, yes. We're looking to buy a new children's bed."
"Right. Follow me; we have an extensive range of junior beds just over here..."
The shopping assistant led them round the corner, revealing a large selection to choose from.
"Is the bed for the young madam?" He asked.
"Yes, it is." She looked around. "Which of these would you suggest?"
"How about this one?"
However, when Robin heaved herself onto it, the entire frame bent inwards. It was the same with the next they tried, and the next was too high for Robin to climb onto, even with her mothers help. Another was too narrow. Finally, the assistant shook his head.
"Fine. There's only one thing for it; I'll have to show you... The Steel Sleeper."
He led then through to a back room. By thus point, Robin was exhausted from walking round the shop, reaching heavily and irregularly as she waddled after the two adults. However, when she reached the back room, she knew she had found the bed for her. It was low and wide, with six legs, three along each side. The entire frame, including the legs, was made of reenforced stainless steel. It was horrendously ugly, but at that moment, to Robin it was as beautiful as Heaven itself.
She pushed past her mother and scrambled onto the bed, and almost instantly her eyes were shut and she was asleep.
Later, Lisa found out that not only was the bed unattractive, unmanoeuvrable and awkward, it was also put seq break in fly expensive.
Still... Anything for her darling Robin, right?

She wanted to be bigger. She wanted to be huge! But that her clothes were getting too small was one of the things that she did't liked about gaining weight.
Suddenly the door to her bedroom opened and Lisa walked in.

"Oh good. You're up. I talked to your father and he said yes. Put on some clothes then we can go."

"Mommy I don't have anything that fits." Robin complained.

"Well I guess we can go clothes shopping after wards. If we need to fatten you up we might need bigger clothes anyway. But lets see. Hee I think this fits. Don't you think?" She said holding up a pink, white dress with flowers.

Robin stuck her tongue out and pointing with a finger in her throat. She hated dresses anyway an especially this one. But at the other hand it probably would fit. It was elastic and dresses fitted easily on people with big bellies.

"Well I guess you have to wear this or go naked." Lisa said.

"I pick naked!" Robin said stubborn looking in disgust at the dress.

"Come on Robin you also wore it on grandma's birthday."

"That was only to do her a favor. She's old and could die any day. I don't like it to wear dresses."

"Well do it just this one time. I'm not taking you naked!"

A few minutes later Robin was in her dress and they were both in the car on their way. Lisa stopped by a big building. Robin was a bit surprised at how it looked and let her mother took her by the wrist. They walked inside. Robin saw a woman behind a desk with a computer.

"Hello." Lisa said. "I'm..."

"Yeah I know who you are. You have a appointment. Second floor room 25." She said flatly.

Lisa and Robin took the elevator too the second floor and walked too room 25 and knocked on the door.

"Come in!" A voice said.

Robin and her mother walked in and Robin saw a big but friendly looking man. He smiled warmly at her and Robin got the idea she could trust this man completely.

"So you're Lisa and that little butterball must be Robin. I explain it one more time to be sure you understand what we are going to do. We give Robin a serum that would make it possible for a person to become way past morbidly obese without suffering from any health problems. After that we want Robin to gain weight. Every now and then we will do some tests to see how she is doing. If everything goes well we can bring it on the market!"

"We understand." Lisa said while she and Nikki signed the contract.

"Good. First we you need to see the doctor. Don't worry he's not going to give you a injection. He's just going to do some tests to see how healthy you are now. After that you get the serum.

1422322.content:
Robin woke up on the couch groggy and disoriented. She quickly noticed strange stuffed feeling from her belly and instinctively started to rub it. It was gurgling loudly and Robin didn't know what to do. Christie suddenly came in with an evil smile on her face. "I hear your tummy is wanting more" she said

"But I already ate so much..." Robin said, starting to get scared

"Oh, I forgot to tell you; we won't be having any sort of leftovers" Christie said.

"Why?" Robin said, confused.

"Because I discovered we have a human trash can" Christie said. She then pinned Robin down and started feeding her all the leftovers from the past few nights. First to go was the spaghetti from the night before. Half of the pot was left until Christie forced it into Robin's gut. Next went a steak and half of a cherry pie. Robin's already upset stomach started to gurgle even more and she began to feel the strain of the food. Next was some chinese take out from two days ago and half a liter of soda. Christie smiled as she how Robin's belly was struggling. It looked so tight and stuffed and she could hear every gurgle and every groan it made. Finally was the jello that no one had bothered to touch. She stuffed huge chunks into Robin's overstuffed tummy until it was all gone. Christie then got off of Robin and examined her belly.

"Drum tight, that's good" she said as she traced her hands on Robin's belly. Then put her ear up to Robin's stomach. "Sound's like total chaos in there" Christie said with an malicious tone, "On top of that you'll be getting fatter? There isn't a down side to this." Robin opened her mouth to protest but a huge belch came out instead. Christie smiled evil again. "Get ready Robin, we're meeting up with some special people at the mall tomorrow"

"Here's the little butter ball I promised" Christie said, "I've been trying to keep her filled up but I may need some help with that."
There we're four people in total; 3 girls and one boy. They all looked to be around Christie's age. Robin looked at them fearfully. One of the girls walked over to Robin and pulled up her shirt to look at her belly. she had bright green eyes.
"Hmmm, she's not as stuffed as she could be," the girl said as she rubbed Robins belly.
"Well I had to get her here," Christie said.
"She's got a nice start," said another girl with glasses, "the extra food will definitely do this porker some good."
"Just as long as we get rid of the extra food," the boy said.
"We still have a deal right?" Asked the girl with green eyes, "we get to feed her?"
"Yes; once a month you get to get feed her the leftothers as long as you give me the daily leftovers to feed her with. And you can start today." Christie said.
Robins eyes grew wide as the girls smiled and rushed back to the table. Christie followed with Robin and what was there was a recliner chair and a few rather large bags.

142232211.title: Emergency food

1422322111.content:
Robin took a big bite out of what she believed to be her sixth cinnamon roll. She honestly tried not to count during the sessions; just eat until it was over. The cinnamon roll disappeared into her already over fed gut. This was her third session with Christie's friends who worked at the mall and Robin's weight gain was all but subtle. She had put on more pounds in just 3 months; her mom had to take her clothes shopping twice. Christie brought Robin to the mall in a newer shirt that could only cover half her jiggly midsection. She always made sure Robin was already stuffed before the feedings. Robin belched before biting into the first of many burgers. She focused on eating all the food instead how uncomfortably full she was. Christie told Robin that her belly was most important. She told Robin it was her job to eat and make it fatter even if it hurt. Christie made Robin a slave to her belly which became Christie's prized possession. Each pound gained was an accomplishment as well as every shirt out grown and every button popped.

Robin finished her second burger and groaned. Her belly was gurgling immensely from the greasy fattening food already inside it. But she had a job to do and readily took a big bite out of the next burger. Her stomach let out a disapproving groan for the incoming contents. Just gotta eat it all... Then it's over. But Robin knew that would only last for so long; the breaks between her work. She would often be in pain from eating so much while her stomach protested loudly. Christie made sure Robin's stomach was always noisy so their parents thought she was always hungry. She had to be full before every meal and would nap after each one because being so stuffed drained her of energy. Her life now was about keeping her belly full of food and growing. It was best to keep the peace between her and Christie.

The last of the burgers finally disappeared into Robin's mouth and was washed down with soda. Robin belched a few times which relieved some of the pressure but not much. Her shirt could only cover half her stomach but just barely
"Thanks guys. This is doing wonders for her belly" Christie said.
"Oh we know. It's blowing up pretty well" said Melony who wore glasses.
"Got your leftovers" the boy, Tony, said.
"Thanks!" Christie cheered as she was handed several grocery bags. Then came the hard part: walking. Robin slowly got out of the recliner and began waddling behind Christie toward the exit where their mother, Lisa, was parked. Her stomach, though stuffed to the brim, jiggled slightly with each step and she burped the entire way. They finally made it to the care after what felt like forever and Christie told their mother she got Robin a "snack to hold her until dinner. Robin was thankful that she had a few hours to let the food settle before she'd be stuffed with 2 more meals.

At home Robin went to her room. She pretended everything was fine like how she'd become accustomed to doing when her fat paunch had enough food in it for 3 adults. She laid on her bed and rubbed her swollen gut try to settle it's contents. The soda and grease really did a number on her this time. The burps were hard and non stop and Robin could feel them coming from deep within her gut. Christie then came in with one of the bags she got from the mall and Robin groaned. She knew her Christie was probably going to feed her to make her belly even noisier so she could pass as hungry. Christie started rubbing Robin's fat midsection and was happy to hear the gurgling it made as well as Robin's burps. She laid her head on Robin's stomach to hear it better and was amazed by the chaos inside as Robin continued to burp.
"This is amazing!" she said happily, "Your belly needs to sound like this all the time. This is our new goal" Robin let out a loud belch in response.
"Excellent," Christie said, "Very productive tummy. That's how we know it'll get fatter. Dinner will be ready soon so we'll start the tummy tightening soon." she said as she left. Tummy tightening; what Christie called the pre-meal meals. Robin's stomach would always feel a little tight from being filled with the first of 2 meals. The second one is always bigger than the first and leftovers on top of that.

A couple hours later Robin had fallen asleep but was awaken by Christie to be fed. First came soda for stretching and Robin gulped down as much as she could. Then came half a pizza and bread sticks followed by 6 tacos and more soda to top it all off. The end result was a full, but not quite stuffed belly. The girls were called down for dinner and to the table they went. By now their mother Lisa knew to give Robin about twice as much than before because she is a "growing" girl as Christie pointed out. They were having steak and potatoes; one of Robin's (and Christie's) favorites. 2 steaks and 2 potatoes sat upon the plate in front of Robin and with a sigh she began eating at quick but steady pace.
1422322111.title: Food Court Leftover Stuffing(s)

14223221111.content:
A couple hours later Robin had fallen asleep but was awaken by Christie to be fed. First came soda for stretching and Robin gulped down as much as she could. Then came half a pizza and bread sticks followed by 6 tacos and more soda to top it all off. The end result was a full, but not quite stuffed belly. The girls were called down for dinner and to the table they went. By now their mother Lisa knew to give Robin about twice as much than before because she is a "growing" girl as Christie pointed out. They were having steak and potatoes; one of Robin's (and Christie's) favorites. 2 steaks and 2 potatoes sat upon the plate in front of Robin and with a sigh she began eating at quick but steady pace. Steak always sat heavily inside of Robin's belly and made her feel full quickly. Her appetite hadn't grown as much as she wanted since she became responsible for fattening up her belly. Half way through her first steak, Robin's stomach let out a violent groan.
"Whoa, she's pretty hungry," Christie said with a smug grin.
"That she is." Lisa replied. She got up from the table and pulled out lasagna from the night before and put a huge slice in front of Robin on the table "Your appetite is getting out of control but we can definitely keep up." Lisa said playfully before kissing Robin in the cheek and patting her stuffed belly. Christie stared the second plate in disbelief. She looked at Christie with pleading eyes only to find Christie giving her an evil smile. The pasta was going to end up in the same place as the steaks: Robin's stomach. Robin continued to eating but at a slower pace. Her belly's protests were getting harder to disregard. Finally the steaks and potatoes were in Robin's growing paunch but the lasagna remained. Her family finished eating before she did and she knew what was coming next. Christie appeared from the shadows with a fork in hand and began shoveling the lasagna down Robins throat. Robin clenched her stomach and tried to keep up with Christie's super speed feeding. Each bite was more painful than the last and made her belly churn and groan louder and louder. The last bite disappeared and Robin was in tears from the pain. Christie had her hands all over Robins tight midsection making sure there was no room left. She rubbed and poked and slapped Robin's belly. It was packed tight and gurgling violently.
"It's good but you're not burping. We need to get food that's going to keep you noisy in both the belly and mouth" Christie said.
"Please no more.... it can't hold anymore food, it needs to digest" Robin pleaded.
"Oh don't worry, I'm aware that we can't restock your tummy yet," Christie said, "But you will have to go to bed very soon. This food will turn directly into fat and sleep will make that happen faster"
Robin felt a wave of relief wash over her. She went to bed soon after cradling her aching paunch knowing Chirstie would be in her room in a few hours to "restock" her growing gut

Robin groaned as she ate another sausage pattie and biscuit. This was only her second breakfast (first as far as her parents were concerned) and she could already start to feel her belly protesting. With Christie keeping her belly drum tight round the clock, the weight gain has been rappid. Robin is able to feel exactly where the fat is going on her body; thankfully most of it is going to her belly. She finished up what looked like a breakfast buffet for four as quickly as her sore, stuffed belly would. When she swallowed the last bite, she let out a huge belch followed by a quiet moan. Robin had become accustomed to the routine; any second Christie would be in there to feed her even more to make her stomach as loud as possible. She had both hands on her belly rubbing it in big circles. Christie walked into the kitchen to meet Robin; who noticed she had a pizza box in her hands. Her huge, taught belly let out a loud groan in anticipation.
"Well today is going to be another mall day, but a little different." Christie said as she grabbed the first slices of a loaded pizza. Robin tried to not to think about what that could mean; she just focused on eating for Christie. "The mall is only the first stop, and you know what's going to happen there. Then we're going to show off that belly of yours." Christie said.
Roin was already on the third slice of what appeared to be a large pizza. The grease had already started a war in her stomach, but she had gotten use to the feeling of food sloshing around in her stomach. "What's that mean?" She managed to get through clearly between bites.
"It means we're gonna find others like... Us." Christie said. Robin had mixed feelings about the idea but she knew she had no say. "And you already know belly stocking will be involved." Christie said
Of course, Robin thought. Her stomach's protests were getting harder to ignore, even for Christie. She felt her obese sister's stomach to make sure there was room for the entire pizza. Robin started to moan and burp and her stomach became was violently gurgling as the final slices entered her mouth. Christie was pleased to see that a little more than a large pizza will be needed to stuff Robin to borderline immobility. The journey to the food court was a long one. Robin doesn't have any shirts that will cover more than half her belly; the one she was wearing today was struggling to cover even half. Robin held her belly the entire time as it's contents refused to get along still and strangers stared the entire walk. Just reminders that her life is about her fat belly and how she's supposed keep it full and make it grow.
They get to the area where the feeding takes place, a little break area in one of the restaurants. Robin was out of breath by the time they got their.
"She's getting really big" a girl said with a smile on her face. Robin didn't bother to pay attention to names; she usually just tries to prepare for the insane amount of food that her belly is about to get. With some group effort, she was put in her usual chair and her work began. It started with more pizza, at least a dozen slices, then the same amount of burgers. She only stopped to chug soda, which was used for its carbonation to make more room in her stomach. When all the food was gone, Robin felt ten pounds heavier. The burps were non stop and there was no way her shirt could cover her belly. Someone then pulled out a scale and told Robin to get on it. She weighed 180 lbs.
"And that's with 10lbs of food in that belly," a guy said, "thought we would've broken 200."
"Christie you might want to feed her twice at night." A girl said.
"Was planning on starting that tonight," Christie said. Robin's belly groaned at that moment, as if it knew more food was to come. Christie and her friends loaded up Robin into a mysterious car and took off. Robin rubbed her belly for what felt like hours.
As her stomach settled she realized it felt kinda strange. She and her body had normalized Christie's fattening process. She had become accustomed to treating eating like a work out. Having so much food in her that it restricts her breathing; being filled with gasses and grease and feeling the food fight inside her. And the burps.
Robin was interrupted by the car stopping. Everyone got out and Robin saw they were in a city place. The walk wasn't too far thankfully; they arrived at this secluded building with an old black door. Robin rubbed her belly anxiously. She missed her bellyache and Christie noticed.
"I figured you might want a snack when we got here," Christie said with a malicious grin. They were let in by a security guard and what Robin saw looked like the state fair and an all you can eat buffet combined. There were so many kids with huge bellies like Robin's but hers was, by far, one of the roundest.
"I'll go look for a specialist" the guy voice said.
"OK, we'll get some food ready," Christie said.
"Remember not to feed her until he measures and weighs her" the guy said as he ran off. Christie and her friends took Robin to an empty lunch table with a chair next to it before leaving to get food. Robin noticed a lot of lunch tables with chairs next to them and a lot of the tables had a mountain of food on them. The fat children sat in the chairs while someone older fed them. Then Christies guy friend a long with Christie came back with man following behind him.
"This is the belly?" The man asked.
"Yeah," Christie's girl friend responded, "Christie keeps it packed almost all the time. It should still be pretty loaded"
The man measured Robin's belly, listened to it, then weighed her. "This is one of the best bellies I've come across; especially how you care for it. I noticed the child has a look of hunger on her face; so you might want to refill that tank" the man said as he patted Robin's belly which made her belch. Christie looked all too happy to hear those word's and immediately put Robin in the chair.
Robin eagerly opened her mouth for the first of many triple Bacon cheese burgers. Her stomach started to to get louder and the louder it got the more enthusiastic Robin got. Christie fed Robin nothing but sugar, grease and fatty foods trying to bloat and upset her belly as much as possible as well as making it grow. Robin with each bite Robin was getting more tired. Her belly gurgled violently and the belches almost prevented her swallowing incoming bites. Half of the table disapeared inside Robin's every growing gargantuan gut. Robin was in paid, a lot of pain. She moaned as rubbed her upset stomach which felt like it's contents were fighting her body.

John and Lisa don't say anything negative to Robin when they get home.

1423.content:
Robin's father, John, was peeling the stickers off of Robin's numerous fry containers, burger wrappers, and cups.

He now held a few up. "Hey, look at this, everyone! Robin won a few free burgers!"

His wife, Lisa, grabbed them and looked. "Why, so she did. Congratulations, Robin!"

Christie rolled her eyes. "I knew it was only a matter of time, considering how much she eats..." she muttered.

Robin cheered. "Alright! We can use them now, then, 'cause I'm still hungry!"

John and Lisa stared at Robin, concerned. "Are you sure, Robin? We don't want you to eat yourself sick, now..."

Robin shook her head, adamant in her decision. "Nope, I'm still hungry."

Lisa sighed. "Alright, then, I'll go get them for you."

Soon, Lisa had returned with 3 more Big Macs for Robin.

Robin eagerly tore the wrapper off the first one and began eating, while Christie looked away in disgust.

With each few bites Robin took, her stomach swelled a little more.

When she was halfway done, her pants began to creak dangerously.

At some point during her third burger, a few threads popped, then a few more.

Robin popped the final bit of burger in her mouth, chewed, and swallowed.

"Alright then," John said, standing up, "Let's get going."

RRRIIPPP!

The entire front section of Robin’s pants ripped clean in half, the button and zipper on one side, still fastened.

“Oh my gawd…” Christie sighed, embarrassedly hiding her face.

“Uh-oh…” John and Lisa said, exchanging a look.

“Ah, much better!” smiled Robin.

Robin stood up, holding on to the side of her pants to keep them up. Her belly was round and stuffed, resting in the gap it had created, uncovered by either pants or shirt.

“Well, come on, let’s go, then.” Robin said, apparently unconcerned.

John and Lisa followed her, shaking their heads. Christie followed them, trying not to look like she was.

Once they had returned to the car and buckled up, Robin having rather more difficulty with this, they drove home in silence.
1423.title: Peel and win!

choices: Robin takes revenge at Christie by gaining as much if she can
Robin goes too bed and something happens
14233.content:
"One piggy went too the market. One stayed home. One had something to eat. One had nothing and this little piggy ate herself so fat and round her pants ripped." Christie sang when they were home.

"Mommy! Christie is teasing me again."

"Christie stop teasing your sister. She's not a piggy."

"Really?" She pushed one of her fingers deep in Robin's soft belly flesh.

"Auw! That hurt!" Robin said. "You have sharp nails."

"Fake nails. They could never make normal nails as beautiful as this."

"Just like your personality." Robin whispered.

They walked in and Robin put her fat behind on the couch. She reached for the remote and put the T.V on.

"Well Robin you sure have eaten a lot. You must be stuffed." Lisa said.

"Well it was a lot of food. BURP! Oh excuse me.

"I never have been so embarrassed in my life!"

"Well now that's not true. Remember when you were on that stage and suddenly your skirt ripped of." Robin said and started rolling on the couch from laughter.

"All right except from that part. The point is... i was really embarrassed that my little sister made a complete pig out of herself and don't tell me you did't mind." Christie said to her mother.

"I was't happy that her pants ripped but those things just happen. We just had need to buy bigger pants for her. It's our fault."

"Are you blind not seeing what for a fat and greedy pig she is?"

This was too much for Robin. She started too cry. Her mother rushed over too her.

"There there Robin, It's all right. You're not fat or greedy. You're just a girl that's a bit big for her age and that just likes good food."

"She is..." Christie started but was cut off by her mom.

"Christie go to your room. Now."

"But she..."

"And if i hear one more bad word from you you're grounded for a week without T.V or Internet!"

"Fine i go. I still need to do some things on my room anyway."

After Christie was gone mother looked back at Robin. Her face was still red but she stopped crying.

"M... mommy. can i have something too drink?"

"Of course honey. What do you like?"

"Some Cola please."

While her mother took some Cola for her Robin focused on her belly. It was big and round and she thought it was all right. She liked that her belly was big so it could hold more food and Robin loved food. Especially chocolate. That why her mother sometimes called her: 'A chocolaty filled blond' or 'Chocoholic'.
But she was also smart enough too know that how more you eat how fatter you get and if she need to be honest she liked that being fat sort of and even if she did't, she liked eating so much that if she needed to gain weight with it so be it.
But she liked having a big round belly. It felt nice.
But then why Christie could't see it that way?
Robin was also still angry that Christie teased her so much it made her cry.
14233.title: Christie teases

142331.content:
As Robin drank the Cola, she thought about how she could get back at her sister.

'If she's just gonna make me feel bad again tomorrow... maybe I should make her feel bad, too?'

The more Robin thought about it, the better it sounded. She decided that if she showed Christie that she didn't care what she thought of her, and even went so far as to show everyone else around, too...

Robin sucked down the last of the Cola and grinned. She had big plans for the days ahead... big plans indeed.

Just then, Lisa came in and said "It's almost time for bed, Robin. You got about half an hour to play, then you'll have to go to bed."

"Okay, Mommy," Robin smiled.

'What should I do until bedtime?' Robin wondered.
142331.title: Robin plots revenge!

1423311.content:
Robin rubbed her belly while she thought, and the idea struck her: She should get started on her revenge right away!

As she tried to get up, though, her belly suddenly felt very heavy. Robin rested her rump on the couch again.

‘Phew! Maybe I’ll just wait a few minutes,’ she thought. ‘I guess I’m a little full, still.’

So, for the next 20 minutes, Robin sat and watched television while she rubbed her belly, trying to make herself digest faster so she could fit in more food before bed.

As she walked into the kitchen, the door of the cupboard, slightly ajar, caught her eye. She wandered over to it, wondering what could possibly be too big for the cupboard.

When she opened the door and looked in, she saw a small chocolate cake. Written upon a note set upon it was “Do Not Touch! Need for School. Signed, Christie.” Robin grinned deviously and took out the cake.

‘What better way to embarrass to embarrass Christie than to eat her homework?’ Robin thought, giggling to herself.

Robin snuck to her room with the cake. She set it on the bed, closed her door behind her, and crawled onto her bed. She propped herself up against her headboard, pulled the cake over to her, and began to eat.

The cake was heavenly. It was intensely chocolatey; very delicious and moist. Robin sighed with pleasure as she ate slice after slice, her belly swelling bigger and rounder every few bites. It was doubly delicious because she knew Christie would be embarrassed at school the day after tomorrow when she didn’t have her assignment.

Robin was on her last slice when her mother knocked on the door. “Robin? It’s time to get your pajamas on,” she called through the door.

Robin swallowed her mouthful and called back “Okay, Mommy! I’ll be ready in a few minutes!”

Robin hurriedly threw the last few bites of cake into her mouth and slid off her bed. As she chewed, she changed into her pajamas, her round belly poking out of her shirt and pushing her waistband down.

Hearing footsteps in the hallway, Robin threw the cake tray under her bed and jumped into bed. She pulled the covers over herself and lay down. A moment later, her door creaked open, and her mother entered the room.

“Goodnight, Robin,” she said as she walked over to the bed. “I’ll see you tomorrow morning.”

“See you tomorrow, Mommy!” Robin smiled.

The two exchanged kisses on their cheeks, and Lisa left the room, leaving a very happy, quite stuffed Robin alone in the dark.
1423311.title: Robin revs up for revenge!

14233111.content:
Robin woke up at about 8:30 in the morning. She sat up and peeled her covers back. As she yawned and stretched, her pajama top lifted, exposing more of her soft stomach, peeking over her waistband.

Robin rolled out of bed and pulled the hem of her pajama top. It moved only slightly, leaving nearly an inch of her belly exposed.

‘All right!’ She cheered, looking down at herself, ‘I’m fatter already!’

Quite pleased, Robin opened her door and walked out to the kitchen. John and Lisa were sitting at the table, drinking coffee and reading the newspaper.

“Good morning, Robin!” Lisa smiled when she saw Robin. “Don’t eat anything yet; I thought I’d take you girls out to breakfast this morning.”

‘Perfect!’ thought Robin. ‘Another chance for revenge!’ Out loud, she said “Mmm, that sounds great, Mommy!”

Robin happily skipped into the living room, where she plopped down on the couch and turned on the television. She had been watching cartoons for nearly an hour, her stomach getting progressively hungrier, when she heard Christie shuffle into the kitchen.

“Good morning, Christie!” John said. “Your mother’s taking you girls out for breakfast this morning, so don’t eat anything yet.”

Christie nodded tiredly and plopped down in a chair. A few moments later, Lisa came into the living room, saying “Okay, Robin! Go get dressed and ready to go!”

Robin eagerly complied. As she returned to her room, she heard her mother tell Christie the same thing. Robin closed the door behind her and went over to her dresser.

‘I should pick out some nice, tight clothes,’ she thought, snickering, ‘that way I’ll be sure to embarrass Christie.’

Fortunately for Robin, finding tight clothes would not be a problem for her, as just about everything in her wardrobe matched that description. She settled on a chocolate-colored t-shirt and some blue jeans. Her outfit hugged her every curve and bulge.

Robin brushed her hair and teeth and hurried out to the foyer, where she put on her shoes and coat, hungry and impatient. A few minutes of foot-tapping later, Christie and Lisa appeared, dressed and ready. Christie looked reluctant to go.

They said their goodbyes and climbed into the car, Robin leading the way. They pulled out of the driveway, and were soon on their way downtown.

“What are we having?” Robin asked, bouncing in her seat.

“Not McDonald’s, I hope…” sighed Christie.

“No, we just had McDonald’s last night. I thought that this morning, we should go to a place where they wait on you. So I was thinking that we could go to…”

Her parents spoiled their daughter, as was plain to see, and could not love her any less. They often showed their love by getting Jessica just about anything she asked for. Jessica was a girl of simple tastes, and since her discovery of the wondrous world of cookies, that was almost all she ever asked for.

"These will be tasty," she thinks to herself as she returns to the computer.

1521.content:
Riley woke up hours later, right at lunchtime. She yawned and sat up, patting her pudgy belly. She sniffed the air; her Mother was still cooking lunch, and the smell was making her tummy growl like a wolf. "Mmmn..." she said, rubbing her belly. She looked at herself: her fat belly strained her clothes, with her pants forming a good sized muffin top, whilst her shirt, which stopped just above her cute navel, had large gaps between the buttons where even more of her belly could be seen. She giggled at this, finding it funny that her clothes were so much too small. She didn't care how big she was though, as long as she could eat til her belly was ready to burst, any time she wanted.

"Hi Mama!" Riley grinned as she walked into the kitchen. "Oh, there you are Riley," replied Helena. "Lunch is almost ready, we're having fried chicken," she smiled, blushing as her own stomach grumbled. Riley giggled, patting her own belly. "How long til we eat?" sh grinned cutely. "Just a few more minutes..."

"Riley, time to eat!" Helena called. Riley didn't need her to repeat, within seconds she was already in her chair and reaching for the chicken. She took a bite...and squealed happily. "So good!" she squeaked, and then began to gorge herself. Her mother shook her head and ate at a slower pace, whilst Riley was cramming as much down her throat as her hands could hold.

POP! Riley and her mother looked up at the same time. "What was that, Mama?" she asked. "I don't know..." said Helena, before looking at Riley's belly. "...Oh -w-;" Riley made a confused face. "What, Mama?" Helena shook her head. "You popped a button off your shirt!" Riley looked down and blushed a bit...and then continued eating, causing her whole shirt to pop open, her belly pushing out. Suddenly, there was a POP...PING! as her jeans burst open, popping the button with incredible force: it was imbedded in the table! Her zipper could not go down fast enough, so it snapped off too. Riley blushed for a moment, but only kept eating, while her mother shook her head.

Riley belched, setting down the plate. "I'm stuffed, Mama," she sighed, patting her bloated tummy, which was a few inches bigger than before. Her Mom sighed. "I wish you would eat less sometimes...I can't go buying you new clothes every week. Riley giggled and blushed, getting out of the chair with a groan. She sighed happily."I think I might pop..." "Please -hic- stop" she managed to say before letting out a loud belch.

"Alright class we don't want to over do it with the food. We don't her to throw up; the food needs to stay inside of her for her belly to grow." Ms. Waxford said. "Perhaps you should take a nap Susie, I'll go get you a blanket. We'll continue your feeding afterwards."

Susie groaned as she threw her head back relief. The weight of her belly was holding her down in the bean bag chair. She rubbed her gurgling belly in an effort to sooth its aches before falling into a food induced coma
1532322.title: Feeding Time

15323221.content:
Susie's eyes slowly opened. She looked around. This was't her bedroom. Suddenly she remembered what had happened. But she did't hear anything. She looked around and saw the entire class was empty. Except Ms. Waxford who was busy reading a book. Susie let out a loud yawn what got the attention of Ms. Waxford.

"Ah Susie, you woke up. Good." She said and looked at Suzie's belly. "Can you come over to me please?"

Susie did what she was told. Her shirt still was't able to cover her belly. Her belly was free to show in all its glory. Ms. Waxford put her hand in it and softly kneaded it. Susie giggled but wondered why she did this.

"What are you doing?" Susie asked with a giggle.

"Seeing if you're ready for more food. If you eat much your belly get's hard. If the food is digested your belly becomes soft and squishy. Like now. So I now know we can continue feeding our class pet."

"Were are all the others by the way?" Susie asked.

"Outside. It's recces. They will be back soon. You don't mind that they feed you right?" Ms. Waxford asked.

"No. Of course not. I love food and eating, and I enjoy that my belly is the class pet."

"All right then I guess everything is fine. Oh looks like recces is over.
15323221.title: Soft, squishy belly

choices: Suzie went home, her parents wanting to talk.
Suzie bunped into some kids from her class as she left.
153232212.content:
"Miss Waxford, I really like my fat belly an' all, but I think I've been eating too much recently." Suzie told the teacher.
"Oh, but the students love seeing your fat belly grow, Suzie! You don't want to let them down, do you?" Waxford responded.
"I'm sure they do, but..." Suzie was too late to say anything else before all the students returned.

"Alright, Class. I hope you are ready to feed the 'Class Pet'..." Waxford said in a calming voice, almost made Suzie fall right back asleep.
She quickly regained her sense of panic, however, as students held out a number of large, tantalizing and overall fattening sweets.
They began feeding Suzie once more, and Suzie could do nothing but watch as she grew even fatter than before.
"Don't be shy, children. Feed her until her belly can hold no more." Waxford encouraged.

By the end of the day, all of the students were let out. The kids returned to their families waiting to pick them up, all students except for Suzie.
Suzie stayed a bit later because Ms. Waxford had a word to say with her.
Waxford mentioned Suzie's concerns, and relieved them as best she could by telling her that her gain would not risk her life or bother others around her.
"But... Look at me!" Suzie shakes her globular gut, "It this keeps up, I prolly won't be able to move by a few weeks time!"

Waxford laughed, and patted Suzie's belly, "Dont worry about that now. I'll handle everything, just run home now."
153232212.title: Trying to voice reason.

1532322121.content:
Susie rolled with her eyes. Running was't something what she could do normally but with this huge belly full with food she could't do more then a waddle. Slowly she went outside and saw the car of her mother and waddled over to her as fast if her chubby legs could.

"Hello my little butterball. Did you had a good day at school?" Her mother asked, and hugged her.

"I've had better days." Suzie mumbled.

"Really? Oh honey what's wrong with my sweet butterball. They did't tease you, did they?"

"No they did't tease me. BUUUUUURRRRRRRRP! Oh good that one was bothering me. You remember that I told you my belly would become the class pet. BUUUUUURRRRRRRP! Excuse me. So the kids fed me a lot of food. But they fed me sooooo much. It hardly fit all in my belly. What they all feed me was delicious bit it was all just a bit too much. BUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRP! Look at my belly! It's as round and stretched like a beach ball! If I need to do this every day... I won't be able to move in a few weeks.

Susie did't saw how happy her mother looked. She would like it if Suzie became that Size in a few weeks but she took a deep breath and looked at Suzie with a friendly smile.

"Don't worry sweetie. The food is now still whole. Of course your belly is swollen. It's perhaps a bit pain full in the start but soon you belly get's used too holding more food. As for your belly... when the food is digested you belly shrinks a bit. It's not staying this size forever,"

Susie's mother said while she buckled Susie up in the kiddie seat that was a bit to small for her.
Her mother stroke a bit over Susie's belly enjoying how big it felt

"So don't worry about it. I'm sure everything is gonna be fine. Everything will be better tomorrow."

"I guess. BUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRP! If you say so." Susie mumbled.
1532322121.title: Talking and burping

choices: Go and rest off her massive meal.
15323221211.content:
"Now, go rest your belly. I have a big dinner planned for you." Her mother mentioned as they pulled into the driveway.
"Alright, mom." Susie lifted herself out, and walked inside to her room.

She laid on her back, rubbing her engorged gut. It felt nice, in a way.
"You know, I love being fat." Susie spoke to herself, "But all of this feels strange. Why are people so supportive of this belly?"
Susie decided to brush it off, and rest for her big meal she was promised.

She was awoken by the sound of her mother calling her down for dinner, and Susie noticed that her belly shrank quite a bit over her nap. Most of her fat was now spread across her body, making her look more pudgy and cute.
She waddled downstairs to find her meal, a large pile of neatly arranged Burgers, Fries, Hot Dogs, Milkshakes, and other such fattening foods.
"Mmmm!" Susie exclaimed preemptively, "This all looks great!"
"Dig in, Susie, my big fat butterball. It's all for you." Susie's mom smiled, and Susie left no time for hesitation before following her mothers command, very willingly.
Susie ate all she could, and when she couldn't eat any longer, her mother helped by stuffing the rest of the food into her.
"Mmmph... Sho good, but... so much..." Susie moaned while she was being fed.

By the time she finished, Susie had amassed a much larger belly.
"Can't wait to see how fat I get after I digest all of this!" Susie exclaimed, smiling at her progress.
"What shall we do now?" Susie's Mom asked.
15323221211.title: They arrive home

choices: Fast forward to tomorrow at school
153232212112.content:
"To be honest, I'm really full now mommy." Susie moaned. "And tomorrow they gonna feed me a lot at school again."

"Well all right then. But if you change your mind you can still have dessert. Just say so."

"I will mommy. Can I watch some T.V now?"

"Sure you can. I need to feed you little brother anyway."

Susie looked at her younger brother. He was sitting a few yards away from the table. He was busy building a tower of blocks. However it seemed he liked it the most to push the tower over. Susie was happy the blocks were hollow or else he might hurt himself while pushing a tower over.
Ronnie was't anything like his sister. He was't a big eater. He was a little twig. You could almost count his ribs. But their mother did't mind this. Girls need to be fat, but boys need to be strong. Ronnie was't strong yet, but his mother was convinced he would play some sports when he got older and become pretty strong.
Ronnie looked up and grinned. The next moment he pushed his tower over and smiled when it fell on the floor. He clapped in his hands.
Susie lifted herself up from her chair. With rubbing thighs and a jiggling belly she waddled too the T.V.
She was happy her mother was busy feeding Ronnie. Not that she did't liked her brother, but while watching T.V he always wanted to watch too and then she need to be sure it was't too scary for him. Mostly that end up with watching stupid cartoons that were mend for three years old. Susie hated that. Lucky her mother realized that too so she now and then took Ronnie so Susie could watch what she wanted.

"Mommy was right about my belly. It does shrink after it digested its food." She mumbled and rubbed her belly with both hands. "But I don't get it why they are all such supportive about it."

Susie remembered daycare. Some people there teased her because she was fat. Also some kids in the neighborhood used to tease her. But now at school suddenly they all wanted to feed her to make her belly grow. that was something new. It looked like fun when it started but Susie now was't sure if she made the right choice. Sure she liked being fat. She and her mom wanted her to become fatter. But she was't sure about how much the other kids fed her. It was a bit too much. She looked at the T.V but did't really noticed what was on. She was with her thoughts by the feeding of her. Or her belly the class pet.

"What do I need to do?"
153232212112.title: Ronnie

choices: At the end of the day...
Fast forward a few weeks- constant eating has taken its toll...
1532322121122.content: Susie's daily routine had been well established, it seemed. When she arrived in her classroom, panting with the exertion of the waddle from her mother's car, her classmates immediately sprung into action, feeding her everything from nachos to beans to cupcakes to entire family-sized bags of chips. Miss Waxford made sure the class stayed on track by using Susie's burgeoning belly as an example for the other children's classwork. "If Susie eats five plates of six cupcakes, how many cupcakes has she eaten?" she asked during math. Eagerly, several children sprang from their seats, cupcakes at the ready, to find the answer. As cupcake after cupcake disappeared down her gullet, they arrived at the final answer- thirty. More and more food found its way into Susi throughout science- "Let's all convert Susie's weight into kilograms", English- "Can anybody tell me a synonym of 'fat'?", and even music- "Play this rhythm on Susie's belly, please." Susi hadn't even left her cot for the whole day. She wondered what would happen if she couldn't.
1532322121122.title: Another day, another stuffing...

15323221211222.content:
Weeks wore on as Susie became more and more of a fixture for the classroom, and seemingly less and less of an actual student. She no longer did school work, or homework, or was involved in classroom discussions. She no longer sat at a desk, instead being permanently seated on a big beanbag chair in a front corner of the room where she was in view of everyone. Behind her the walls were covered in student artwork, and teacher-made graphs of her growth. Both in pounds and size, the line graphs were more than 45 degree angles as they measured her rapid gain.

And what a gain it was. Months of ever-increasing force feedings by both her teacher and fellow students had buried the young girl in fat. The 6 year old was stuffed into her chair, her belly massive and all encompassing as it's double tiered rolls stretched down to her outstretched knees as her illsized shirt rode high. Her overinflated arms were forced into 45 degree angles out of her sides, unused as she did nothing but be hand fed by others. Her tiny head was framed by fat, 3 chins piled up in front of her as her mouth area was caked in layers and layers of messy food fed to her by messy children. Groggily, she moaned and burped, as side effect of her last stuffing as the class worked up their multiplication tables and the number of cupcakes grew and grew.

"Okay Class! It's time for everyone's favorite part of the day" Miss Waxford called out, standing in front of the class beside Susie. The children of the class buzzed eagerly as Susie laid in her chair, letting out a small burp and fart. "Time to weigh Susie!"

Slowly but surely, with a great amount of physical effort on the teacher's part, Susie was slowly pulled up off her chair and into a standing position. Even though they recorded her weight daily, Susie still struggled as she inflated with fat to get up off her butt and waddle towards the heavy duty scale. Eventually the deed was done, and Susie stood shaking on the wide scale in front of everyone as her stomach grumbled and moaned.

"426!" Miss Waxford called out, "Can anyone tell me how much more that is since yesterday?" she asked, motioning to Susie's recorded weight from the day before. Several kids raised their hands as they jumped in their seats, many holding out fingers and yelling out the answer out of turn. "Yes, Andrew?"

"Four! It's four!" the kindergartener called out, eager to show off his addition and subtraction skills.

"That's right! It's four pounds since yesterday." she finished. Satisfied, she waddled Susie back over to her beanbag chair as the massively obese 6 year old plopped heavily into her seat. Writing the new weight on the board, and updating Susie's weight chart, Miss Waxford got the attention of the class. "Okay class, since today's almost over I'm allowing you to have a free period till class ends so have fun!" With that, every student jumped up as they ran over to Susie, heavily petting her belly as they took turns stuffing her face with food till the evening bell rang.
15323221211222.title: Fast forward a few weeks- constant eating has t...

choices: Uh-oh! Susie's too big to fit!
Mother's upgraded the car, she fits both times.
153232212112221.content:
The end of the day had come. The cadre of students that had been feeding Susie pulled her up to a standing position, leaving her panting and shaking on her weak and fat-filled legs. Then, three of her best friends (and most entheusiastic feeders), Kiara, Allysa, and Sarah, helped her waddle the few hundred feet to her waiting mother. By "help," I mean that Kiara and Sarah did most the work of supporting their obese friend, while Allysa walked slongside and fed the huge Susie jelly donuts to make up for any lost calories. "Attagirl, Susie!" Kiara cried, struggling under the weight of a huge arm. "Only a few more steps!" "And never fear!" cried Sarah from under the other arm. "We'll still be here even if you can't walk." "Thanks *huff* guys..." Susie wheezed, sweat dripping from her forehead onto her triple chins. "Ooh, you're gonna get soooo BIG!" Allysa sqealed gleefully, shoving another jelly donut into Susie's mouth. The only response the obese girl could muster was an entheusiastic "UUURRRRRPPP!"

Once they reached the car...
153232212112221.title: Susie's mom picks her up

choices: Susie's mother is estatic! Even more stuffing for the enormous kindergartner.
Susie's mother is nervous. Only a morsel for her daughter.
1532322121122211.content:
As the four girls exited the school, the family car came into view. Susie's mother was taking a nap in the front seat. This raised a problem- who was to go wake her up? If Kiara or Sarah left, Susie wouldn't be supported...but if Allysa left, Susie wouldn't get fed! What were they ever going to do? Finally, the very sweaty and massively overstuffed Susie convinced Allysa to leave the donuts and wake her mother. Reluctantly, Allysa hurried over to the car and knocked on the window, startling Susie's mom out of her slumber. After giving Susie a hug, the four of them waddled the larger girl over to the car, and helped her in...

...only she wouldn't get in. She was wider on all sides than the door. They pushed, they shoved, Susie jiggled helplessly, but they were still stymied. Susie'd simply outgrown the seat. Her friends were absolutely ecstatic. They embraced Susie (well, Susie's belly anyway) and themselves in a big group hug. She still had to get home, however, so in the end they put her into the trunk.

At home...
1532322121122211.title: Uh-oh! Susie's too big to fit!

15323221211222111.content:
Susie's mother was ecstatic. The recent months of Susie being the glass pet had grown her daughter to immense proportions, along with her appetite. This allowed her to practically spend every waking moment cramming food into Susie as the poor kindergartner inflated like a fat filled balloon.

Driving home like a frantic lunatic, Susie's mom pulled up into their driveway as she jumped out to help Susie heavily land onto the ground and make her way into the house. It wasn't easy, the 6 year old was dragging behind as her massive legs rubbed up against each other and her belly constantly flopped and jiggled against her knees. Panting as she was nearly dragged behind her mother, Susie carefully waddled sideways through the front door as she was assaulted by an army of aromas. Dragging her feet into the kitchen Susie realized her mother had spent all day cooking and every table space was covered in food.

"Whoooaaa!" Susie gasped, still panting from the short walk from the car as sweat dripped down her face and stomach. Still stuffed from school she was already licking her lips in anticipation.

"Come on, let's get started." her mother cooed. It was only 2 in the afternoon, no where near dinner but this amount of food was going to take time to eat.

What followed was a feast to be remembered. Dish after dish after dish went into Susie's gaping mouth. Her stomach inflated into a huge fat filled ball as the hours wore on. As Susie ate, her mother continued to cook more to refill her dishes as her daughter began to slow down her pace. Eventually the kindergartener's arms gave out completely, a defeated blob of fat her mother ran over and continued her pace. Susie's eyes went from joyful, to pleased, to almost panic'd as her mother continued to feed more and more and more to her. Even when they got to deserts, her mom continued, placing a large funnel directly into Susie's mouth as she poured shakes and melted icecream down her throat, It was 10pm by the time they were finished, Susie's stomach was massive and red as it throbbed in her hands. Unable to lift her stuffed daughter for bed, her mom let her sleep in the kitchen for the night. Of course, her mother took every opportunity as she slept to poor more shakes down her throat occasionally as she slept..
15323221211222111.title: Susie's mother is estatic!

choices: Her class rescues her for even more stuffing!
Nobody comes! Poor Susie will have to starve...
153232212112221111.content:
Despite needing quite a lot of help to leave school at the end of the day, Susie always made the trek to her classroom by herself. Although her breakfast was at least five times larger than an average adult breakfast (a dozen eggs, two pounds of bacon, an entire box of Lucky Charms... the list goes on) it was only enough to tide the massive kindergartner over until she reached school. As such, she was barely full, and still able to handle herself. Or so she thought.

Susie pushed herself out of the trunk and gave her mother a tired wave with a chubby hand. Her enormous stomach-distending meal of the night before had digested, leaving her belly to flabbily flop out of her totally inadequate shirt and over the waistband of her triple-XL (but still far too small) stretch pants and hang heavily past her swollen knees. She'd barely taken ten steps before her heart started to pound. She paused for a moment, took a deep breath, and pressed on. Five more steps, halfway to the school door. She paused again, sweat streaming from her brow, and lifted a heavy arm to wipe her forehead. This simple movement led to her waves of upper arm fat leaving their rest on her fat side and hanging freely- almost causing her to lose her balance! She righted herself carefully and kept going. One step, two steps. Her stomach slapped against her legs. Three steps, four steps. Her shirt rode up and her pants rode down, exposing for all the school that she wore neither bra nor panties. Five steps, six. Sweat dripped off her forehead and collected in her chins. Seven, eight. She was nearly at the door! Nine, ten... Almost there...

Eleven...

With a final burst of energy, she stuck out a jiggly arm and heaved open the front door. She waddled inside and flopped triumphantly against the wall, collapsing to the floor. She sat there, panting with the exertion of her twenty-six steps...

...until she realized she still had to get to class.

"Hah...Haff...Help..."
153232212112221111.title: She's still mobile...kind of...

choices: Allysa has trouble moving Susie on her own.
1532322121122211112.content:
Susie sat against the wall, gasping for breath and fanning herself with two little fat hands. Now she was down, she knew there was no chance of getting up again without help – hopefully the others would come by soon. But… wait, surely they’d already be in class? They’d been running late because she’d had such a massive breakfast, so chances were all her friends were in roll call right now. How long would she have to wait here? Until recess? Until lunch? Forever?!

She took a deep breath (which was quite an effort, with the sheer amount of flab weighing on her chest) and tried to calm down. Someone would surely be along soon, and then they could help her up, and she could get to lessons. Then she remembered how much food she’d probably be fed once she was there, and groaned. At this point in the morning she was at her emptiest, and her stomach was still straining uncomfortably to contain her vast breakfast. She couldn’t remember the last time she didn’t have chronic stomach ache, or when her skin didn’t feel stretched to breaking point over her overstuffed midsection. The red marks that showed even against the dark skin of her belly were a testament to its repeated abuse. Perhaps she didn’t mind sitting here a while longer, digesting what she’d already eaten.

She shifted into a more comfortable position, legs spread wide to allow her massive stomach room to sit without putting any unnecessary pressure on it, and it grumbled happily at her. Her mom had always told her that gaining weight was a good thing – and her classmates certainly seemed to agree – but Susie was getting a little bit scared. She could barely even walk anymore, and she couldn’t even stand up on her own. Not being able to move at all was getting awfully close, and though she loved the food and attention she got from her classmates the idea frightened her.

Maybe, she could ask Miss Waxford if perhaps they should slow down a bit. She wasn’t sure at all her teacher would listen, but did kinda miss playing outside with her friends. She remembered how she’d used to do dancing lessons, and wondered naively if her leotard would still fit. Maybe she could try doing them again some time?

Before she could think anymore though, a round face appeared at the end of the corridor. It was Allysa!
“Susie! We’ve been looking all over for you. Miss Waxford was worried.” The far smaller girl said happily. “C’mon, I’ll help you up. I baked you a quadruple chocolate cake, come and eat it!”
Despite Susie’s thoughts only seconds before, the moment her friend mentioned chocolate cake her stomach began rumbling loudly. Perhaps she didn’t need to have that word with Miss Waxford today… maybe she could put it off a while longer. After all – she did love chocolate cake.
1532322121122211112.title: Rotund Reflections

15323221211222111122.content:
"C'mon Susie, let's go! You must be starving, I'll have you there in no time!" Allysa said cheerfully, grabbing at one of Susie's fat-stuffed hands and giving a big ol' heave. Susie's bulk rose off the ground... about three inches, until her sweaty palms slipped out of Allysa's tiny hands. With a soft plop, she fell back onto the floor, sending ripples throughout her flabby form. "Oof," said the bigger girl, her worries flooding back all over again.

Allysa was not one to give up, though. She pushed, pulled, shoved, lifted, heaved, and squeezed, for quite a while. The only thing she really succeeded in doing was further disheveling all of her friend's already disheveled clothing, revealing even more of her fat body. Allysa stood stymied, hands on her hips, then her expression changed to one of pure joy. She flopped with a platch onto her huge friend's belly (causing Susie to involuntarily groan in discomfort), pinched her fat cheeks, and squealed, "You're so CUTE! I'll get the others!" She jumped up and raced down the hallway, barely able to contain her joy.

Susie was left alone for a few minutes more. She was panting and sweating again, and this time she hadn't even done anything. Is this gonna be my life? she wondered, taking deep breaths. Relying on others for everything? I don't know if I like that... Then the aromas from her classroom reached her nose, and as her enormous stomach was gripped with pangs of hunger, all was forgotten.
15323221211222111122.title: Allysa has trouble moving Susie on her own.

choices: Just some sauce and crumbs left!
There's still a bit of cake to go...
153232212112221111221.content:
Susie's tongue greedily slid across her plump lips as the appetising aroma of junk food wafted in from her classroom. In a single moment, all her doubts of the future were swept away, and her mind became overfilled with images of cakes, pies, chocolates, pizzas and all other kinds of fattening treats she had become used to in her short life.

True to her word, Allysa returned with her classmates in tow, and as soon as they got their eyes on her they practically dove onto her, rubbing her filled belly and petting her chubby cheeks. Even Ms Waxford was getting in on it!

Once they had all calmed down some, with a joined effort, the class hoisted Susie onto her flabby feet, and the obese girl unsteadily balanced herself.
A cheek-dimpling smile crossed Susie's face when she was up; not only was she mobile again, but she could go for that cake she was promised!
"Quadruple chocolate..." she mumbled giddily as she waddled awkwardly to her classroom, a sliver of drool sliding down the corner of her mouth.

Once she was sat back down, the enormous chocolate cake was set in front of her, and true to nature, she dug right into it. She didn't bother asking for slices; she simply used her hands to take out globs of it, or even shoved her face right into it!

The class watched eagerly as Susie stuffed herself silly, and before long, she had become stuffed to the gills once again...
153232212112221111221.title: Stuffed to the gills again...

choices: She still had to be weighed...
1532322121122211112211.content:
Susie leaned back and let out a satisfied belch. The cake was gone, digesting in her distended stomach. She rubbed what little she could reach with her fat-laden arms, satisfied with her feat. That was SUCH cake... she thought contentedly. "Thank you guys!" she said happily to her classmates. "You've stuffed me good!"

Rather than the ecstatic cheers she was expecting, the class all looked at each other in monumental confusion. Finally Miss Waxford broke the silence.

"Susie... that was just the first snack of the day..."

Susie groaned and her classmates pounced.

-----
The amount of food that was entering Susie was absolutely astronomical. Soon after the cake Miss Waxford had given up all pretense of teaching and simply allowed the class to go to town. Not a moment went by in which Susie wasn't eating something. So energetic were they that they ran out of home-bought food in two hours. Not to worry, though: Miss Waxford seized the moment to teach about improvisational skills. Within minutes, the rambunctious kindergartners had raided the school's kitchen. First to go was the actual prepared lunch- overcooked green beans and terrible pizza- which even Susie didn't like (but still ate). Then came the true improvisation. Sticks of butter, bags of sugar, and gallons of vegetable oil wound up in the mildly disgusted Susie. This bought them until lunch. Susie hoped for a break. No such luck. A few of the more industrious members of her class rounded up a few of the bigger kids and convinced them to give their lunches over to the "poor, starving" Susie. Sandwiches, cups of yogurt, and generally wimpy bags of chips were the next casualties in the war on Susie's belly. Now will they stop? thought Susie. Nope! Miss Waxford had called out for pizza. And lots of it. The class at large sampled a few slices, and then the greater part of five large pizzas went to Susie. And, at last, the end of the day.

Susie had previously thought her stuffing from last night was a lot of food. That was nothing compared today. Her stomach was stretched to a ludicrous size. It was so high up as to impede her vision, so long as to reach her feet, and so taught as to be nearly transparent. It hurt, but in the best way possible. Susie was ridiculously full. She rubbed what little of her stomach she could reach, every movement sending painful reminders of how stuffed she really was. However, the day was not quite over for her...
1532322121122211112211.title: She was done...or so she thought...

choices: Susie's mom meets with the teacher
Susie gets slobbier as she gains
15323221211222111122111.content:
Susie was a mess. laying in the middle of the room as she choked back food from her massive meal. All she could do was lay in a haze as she burped and panted, her face red from exhaustion as sweat dripped down her face. Her mouth, nearly hidden by her fat laden cheeks and three chins was absolutely covered in food debris. Layers of white powder, oil, and grease were smeared over her face as the young girl gently touched and rubbed her stomach whining to herself. Miss Waxford knelt down beside her and firmly pressed her hand into her stomach, testing its give to see if the poor kindergartner had any room left in her gut. Fortunately for Susie, her stomach was rock hard, Miss Waxford's fingers barely making a dent in it allowing Susie a small reprieve from her force feedings.
