"Okay class, it's time to weigh the class pet!" Miss Waxford called out, the class getting up and crowding around their prized hippo of a classmate. It took the entire class to move the poor girl, as the teacher stood behind her to lift Susie and her classmates lifted her belly up from the floor so she could walk without tripping over it. Poor Susie groaned and whined the entire move, her body yelling at her as her stomach felt like exploding and her young bones crushed under her massive weight for such a young girl. Finally, after what seemed like a brutal eternity for the almost immobile 6 year old they made it to the scale, her classmates dropping her belly onto her legs as her entire body jiggled and swayed.

"Aaannnd, it's 510!" Miss Waxford announced, petting Susie's belly, which groaned and shook against her hand. "We're so proud of you Susie!" All Susie could do was stare back in a feeding obscured haze, food dripping down her chins and onto her chest as she let out a small burp and fart.
15323221211222111122111.title: She still had to be weighed...

choices: ...brought her to the bathroom just in time.
...couldn't do it- Susie made a mess. (Warning)
153232212112221111221112.content:
Susie's enormity did not come without consequences. As the obese kindergartner continued to grow in size, and as more and more food found its way into her belly, her personal habits gradually fell by the wayside. Miss Waxford frequently had her lessons interrupted by a burp or bout of flatulence from Susie (to the delight of her classmates) and her trips to the school restroom (which required quite a lot of assistance to do, at her size) became significantly more common. And, with all of her insulation, she sweated quite a lot- so much that whatever clothes she happened to be wearing were usually soaked through by the end of another day of stuffing. Her mother, as well, was so proud of her daughter's gain that she kept dressing her in clothes that fit hundreds of pounds ago, so there was usually quite a lot of Susie on display. Though the average person would be disgusted, her classmates loved it, as it meant that their class pet was only going to get more petlike and adorable (in their eyes, anyway.)

The real crossroads of this slobbery came to Susie in the middle of a day like any other. The now-562 pound girl was chowing down on her fourth bag of
Doritos for the hour when she had to go. Like, really go. She signaled her needs first with a blast of foul-smelling fart and then with a wheezy cry of "Bathroom!" (Her third trip of the day, and it was barely noon.) Her usual posse of helpers arrived to lift her up, and found that they couldn't. More kids arrived to help, and were met with similar difficulties. All the hands on her belly were only making the problem worse for poor Susie. Eventually, the whole class gathered around, and...
153232212112221111221112.title: Susie gets slobbier as she gains

choices: Susie's mom meets with Ms. Waxford
Susie's mom takes her to a buffet
1532322121122211112211121.content:
Susie was panting up a storm as she and her entourage of classmates waddled to the class bathroom. Drenched in sweat and food, the massive girl squeezed through the single door, moaning as the pressure on her stomach increased her bathroom urges. Eventually she made it to the toilet, a pair of students pulling down her pants for her as she plopped heavily down. Her entire body jiggling as she hit the seat, she immediately let out a massive groan as the contents of her stomach poured out of her. She was on the toilet for over 45 minutes, and multiple flushes as the mounds of junk food flowed through her. Her classmates hovered around her, some wiping sweat off her brow, some gently rubbing her belly to ease her pain. Allysa stood diligently by her, shoving entire sticks of butter into her mouth as she sat there, her hands grasping her overstuffed belly.

Another close call, Susie thought to herself as she sat panting between mouthfuls of greasy fattening foods. She didn't know how much longer she could keep this up. Her classmates seemed bent on fattening her up beyond her expectations. How much longer till she couldn't walk at all?
1532322121122211112211121.title: ...brought her to the bathroom just in time.

choices: ...we purchase some mobility equipment and a feeding machine to keep her growing
15323221211222111122111211.content:
Susie's mom was slightly nervous. Miss Waxford had called earlier and said that they needed to talk about Susie. She'd always thought Miss Waxford was on her side- what could this meeting possibly be about? She adjusted her sunglasses and wiped her brow. Susie was at home with lots of food within arms reach- nearly four hundred dollars worth of snacks. She hoped it'd hold her until dinner.

She soon pulled into the parking lot. Normally, the parking lot was bustling with cars bringing students to and from extracurriculars, but it was oddly still today. The oddness of this didn't help Susie's mom's mood very much. She reapplied some lipstick, took a deep breath, and walked into the school.

She soon found Miss Waxford's room, and knocked lightly at the closed door. Upon a weary "Come in" from the teacher, Susie's mother pushed the door open-and gasped. The room was absolutely filthy. Wrappers, bags, and crumbs- so many crumbs- covered the floor, becoming denser and denser as they approached a beanbag in the center of the room. Well, thought Susie's mother wryly, now I know who sits there. "Please, sit down," said Miss Waxford, gesturing limply at some chairs by her desk. "I apologize for the mess, I don't really have any time to clean in here. Now, we really have to talk about Susie." Her mother gulped nervously. "She's really become quite large, and it's becoming very hard to teach. As such, I think it's time..."
15323221211222111122111211.title: Susie's mom meets with Ms. Waxford

choices: Susie's mom goes home and feeds her daughter more than ever before.
She goes home to find Susie's had a problem without her...
153232212112221111221112111.content:
"I think it would be for the best," Miss Waxford said tentatively, "If Susie perhaps starts slimming down a bit."
Susie's mom couldn't believe what she was hearing. She'd thought the class and teacher were on her side. This was a betrayal!
Miss Waxford kept speaking though, even as Susie's mom simmered.
"It's become quite disrupting to the class, after all - what with the constant breaks for feeding and taking her to the toilet, we barely get any work done nowadays. And Susie hasn't so much as glanced at a worksheet in months..."
She trailed off as Susie's mom rose to her feet, face twisted with anger.

"Absolutely not!" she proclaimed. "Susie is my daughter and you will do exactly what I say with her. As far as I'm concerned, she's not large enough yet; not by a long way. I absolutely insist you continue feeding her as you have done - and if you don't, I'll have you know I'm a leading member on the local board of education. It won't end well for this school of you try to cross me."
Miss Waxford looked dismayed. She'd hoped this woman would be able to see reason, but it wasn't looking likely.

"Come now - I've supported Susie's gain up until now, but it's getting unpleasant. She can't even walk on her own anymore, and it takes the whole class just to get her to her feet. It won't be long now until she's completely immobile!"
Susie's mom smiled - that didn't sound too bad in her opinion.

"You have my answer, Miss Waxford." Then, she had an idea. "In fact, I'm going to ask you to increase the amount you feed Susie every day by a third."
Miss Waxford looked alarmed.
"No, we couldn't possibly! We already feed her until she's in quite a lot of pain - I don't think she can possibly have any more. Plus, all this junk food in the classroom isn't good for the other kids!"
That was true. Since they'd started feeding Susie, almost every student in the class had put on weight just from the amount of snacks they had while feeding the massive girl.

"If I tell you to, you most definitely can possibly feed her more." Susie's mom ordered, marching away towards the door. As she got to it, she turned and made one last warning. "And don't think you can get away with not feeding her enough. I'll be able to tell..."
And with that she strode away, leaving Miss Waxford alone in her dark classroom, distressed and unsure of what to do.
153232212112221111221112111.title: ...we talk about her slimming down.

choices: ...the teacher's in revolt! Susie gets nothing!
...the teacher's been cowed. Susie gets fed.
1532322121122211112211121111.content:
Susie was just getting done with a thirteenth bag of Doritos when her mother stormed through the door. "Hi Mom," Susie called through a mouthful of chips, "how was the meeting?" Her mother gave no reply, simply stalking into the kitchen. She heard her mother rattling pots and slamming the fridge, but didn't devote much thought to it. After all, the thinking was interfering with her food. She opened the shrink-wrap on a packet of cookies and stuffed her face, unaware of what was coming.

Susie's mother was steaming. "The nerve of that teacher! Interfering with my culture, my lifestyle, my daughter! It was unheard of! Such insolence would never be tolerated in the home country!" she cried at the pots and pans. "I won't let her hurt me or my Susie!" In her furor, she didn't quite notice the full extent of the food she was grabbing. Susie's normal dinner was a fridge-buster, but she just kept cooking, and cooking, and cooking. The vast stockpiles of food in the basement were cooked, as was everything in the shed out back. The kitchen got fuller and fuller, steamier and steamier, as more and more food was dished out and even more was cooked in its place. When she snapped out of her trance, though, she merely smiled.

Susie herself barely had time for a "Wha-" before the first heaping spoonful of dinner entered her mouth. Soon after that the first plate (rice and beans) was cleaned off. What followed was what could only be described as a cataclysm of food. Pork chops, tikka marsala, chicken chili, Ramen noodles, bowls of popcorn, potfuls of spaghetti, and even a ten-pound steak forced their way into the young girls enormous stomach. Evening turned to night, and still there seemed no end to the waves and waves of food. Pots of pudding, tiramisu, sticks of butter, entire pies, sheets of cookies, pans of Jell-O, and gallons upon gallons of ice cream fought for room in the obese girl's belly. By the end of "dinner," it was one in the morning. Susie's stomach was so full she had to lean forward on the couch to let it rest on the floor. Every slight shift in position caused her to moan in pain. Her fat face and enormous yet tiny T-Shirt were smeared with the detritus of her feast. Even her hair was matted with sticky cream and a few grains of rice. As she moaned and groaned her way to sleep, her mother could only stand, breathe heavily, and smile even wider. What beautiful pounds this would make.

The next day at school...
1532322121122211112211121111.title: Susie's mom goes home and feeds her daughte...

choices: The class greets Susie with her new equipment..
Susie gets stuck in the doorway..
153232212112221111221112112.content:
"She's really become quite large, and it's becoming very hard to teach. As such, I think it's time..." Ms. Waxford spoke softly, wiping some crumbs off her desk as Susie's mother nervously looked around the room. "We perhaps brought in some equipment to help her get around, and maybe some feeding tools to alleviate some of the work required to keep her filled."

Susie's mother let out a deep sigh of relief, relaxing herself, "Oh thank heavens," she sighed, "I thought you might have wanted her to loose some weight or something."

"Oh no no no!" the teacher jumped in, "Susie has become quite a staple in the classroom, and we look forward to piling on pounds till the end of the school year. It's just...you see..her feeding is cutting into class time, and she's become quite a task to lift up so she can go to the bathroom. We've already had several close calls as it is."

"I know the feelings," Susie's mom chuckled, remembering all the trouble she's went through to get Susie ready in the morning and during diner. "I'll be happy to help however I can."

"Good, here's a list of everything that should help us out here, I hope it's not too much.."
153232212112221111221112112.title: ...we purchase some mobility equipment and a fe...

choices: The days pass by, and Susie falls farther into the depths of immobility...
No! Susie decides to take a stand.
1532322121122211112211121121.content:
As Susie wobbled, waddled and jiggled her inadequately clad self into the classroom (with help, of course- her belly nearly reached her ankles) she noticed something was different. There was the usual smell of food and the class was just as excited to see her, but still, something was off. Her friends guided her towards her beanbag...

...only the beanbag was gone, replaced with a vaguely sinister hospital bed with a hole in the center. Next to it stood an ominous-looking crane and a double-sized wheelchair, as well as a comically oversized blender-y thing with a thick rubber hose snaking out of it. Susie couldn't make sense of it. "Wh-whu..." she wheezed, through fattened cheeks, "who's bed is this?" The class only laughed. "Susie, you big silly," giggled Alyssa, poking her nose, "it's yours!" Oh no, the ludicrously fat kindergartner thought just before her classmates lifted her on.

What followed was a day unlike any other. Miss Waxford began the day by demonstrating the use of the blender-y thing, revealed to the enormous Susie to be a feeding machine, before rather suddenly sticking the end in Susie's mouth and turning it on. Now, rather than the usual group of people needed to stuff food into Susie, they could simply drop various items of snack into the machine, thereby allowing the class to both grow their pet and focus on the lessons. Plus, the pureé allowed Susie to eat faster than she ever had before, leading to even more calories- and even more food. However, the new purchases were prepared for that too- when Susie first felt the urge to go to the restroom, Miss Waxford merely walked over, took off Susie's (ludicrously overstretched) pants, gave her a look and said, "You go there, honey- what did you think the hole was for?" The heavily embarrassed Susie, too large to do otherwise, went. The holding tank was luckily anti-odorous.

As the day wore on and Susie got even larger, the final pieces of her machinery got their demonstrations. The bell rang, and Miss Waxford showed the class the use of the crane. The class placed a number of canvas straps under Susie's enormity and with a few deft button presses and activation of levers Susie was lowered into the six-foot-wide wheelchair (which still pinched the girl's growing butt.) As her friends wheeled her out to the car, talking, laughing, and pushing cookies into her mouth, Susie wondered if this was all she'd ever be.
1532322121122211112211121121.title: Tubes and lifts and big beds, oh my!

choices: The class holds the stuffing of a lifetime..
15323221211222111122111211211.content:
Starting that day, Susie settled into her new troubling routine. She would be wheeled into class as her stomach hung over her knees and nearly blocked her vision. She would be hauled up by the creaking crane and placed onto her bed at the head of the room. Her classmates would line up and pile food into the machine as the pump would turn on and force a slurry of combined food into her cheeks and down her throat. Day in, day out, the pump would keep her stomach tight and filled the entire class as Ms. Waxford returned to properly teaching her students their actual lessons.

Weeks went by as Susie grew, the lack of attention and involvement in the class numbed her mind as she stared up at the ceiling sucking on her hose. Her liquid diet did a number on her stomach as well. Her stomach groaned and turned on itself, causing Susie discomfort as she moaned and panted in her bed. On a liquid diet and no need to get up to go to the bathroom anymore, Susie was nearly constantly letting out long strings of farts and burps as she went to the bathroom whenever she pleased. Occasionally Ms. Waxford would walk over and wipe sweat off Susie's brow with a wet washcloth and rub her extended belly.
15323221211222111122111211211.title: The days pass by, and Susie falls farther into ...

choices: ...shoved the tube back into Susie's mouth.
153232212112221111221112112111.content:
A month had passed since the introduction of the machine. Susie had grown exponentially under its influence, now well into the six hundreds (663, according to the bed scale) and only getting larger. This was making her very nervous. The crane needed to lift her into bed was making more and more ominous noises every day, and the wheelchair seemed to grow tighter and tighter. She hadn't worn pants for quite a while, and she suspected her shirts would soon go as well. Even at 6XL they did little more than hide her chest- her belly, now near her calves, was far too large to be contained. In short, Susie was fat- and she didn't like it. Sure, it was nice being pampered to the extreme, but she was too large to do, well, anything, which was very scary. What if there's a fire and I can't leave? she thought to herself one sunny Friday morning. What if everybody starts ignoring me? What then? These thoughts were, of course, very silly- a more devoted group of friends there never was- but sounded quite logical to the enormous six-year-old. But what'll I do? she wondered then. I'm getting fed so much...

Though the answer would be obvious to anybody else, Susie was never exactly the sharpest of people, and months of nothing but food had dulled her already dull wits even further. However, it did eventually make its way into her fat-clogged brain, and upon realizing it's obviousness she would have smacked herself on the head if she'd not been so lazy. I've just gotta take that tube out! Then I'll slim down! This was an absolutely terrible plan. Ignoring the obvious fact that that was not how fat worked, she'd not factored in the level of devotion from her friends. But Susie was not about to be deterred by logic. She instead took several deep breaths, summoned up her tiny reserves of energy, and set about moving her arms.

It was an arduous task. To reach her flabby arms to the tube not only required her to move her lower arms, a difficult task in itself, but also her upper arms, which she hadn't moved unassisted in quite a while. Nevertheless, after straining herself for ten minutes, she was able to shift her arm into position and take the thick hose out of her mouth. She rested, with the tube spraying liquid pizza all over her shirt, then took another deep breath and wheezed out, "want...stop...eating..."

This move completely disrupted the class. As one, each of the kids abandoned their times tables and ran to their pet's side, ignoring Miss Waxford's futile attempt to corral them. They rubbed her bloated stomach comfortingly, murmuring kind words and hugging as much of her as they could. Susie was ecstatic! They understood! Then, Alyssa leaped onto the bed and...
153232212112221111221112112111.title: Susie tries to fight back..

choices: Susie talks to her mom about her weight..
1532322121122211112211121121112.content:
Shuffling as she jumped onto the bed, careful to not crawl onto Susie, Alyssa grabbed the tube hanging down and slid it back into Susie's mouth. "Uh-oh!" she cooed playfully, "Look's like someone let go too early!" Susie's eyes widened with shock, they didn't get it at all! She didn't let go she wanted to stop eating! Moaning and whining through her tube, Alyssa shimmied down to her colossal stomach and started rubbing large circles into it. It was tight, Susie's stomach absolutely packed to the brim with food as it inflated up and above her. The weeks of constant feeding made it difficult for Susie to even see the class anymore, the crest of her stomach rising above her vision as she laid flat on her back sucking down food.

"Now now class," Ms. Waxford called out, walking over to the crowd of children, "It's not Susie-time yet. You will all have to wait till the end of class. There's plenty of food in there already." Stepping beside the six year old beached whale, she gave her stomach a quick jiggle to test it's fullness. Stopping for a moment, she stepped over to the feeding machine and turned it up another notch. This was horrible! Susie's plan couldn't have backfired in a worse way, as now the food pump was working overtime! Susie groaned, her eyes watering as she broke out in a cold sweat. Her usual dull ache of being over-fed turned into a throbbing pain as she was force-fed more liquid for than ever. Letting out a deep long fart, she watched as the class went back to their seats, unaware of her struggle and pleas.
1532322121122211112211121121112.title: ...shoved the tube back into Susie's mouth.

choices: Susie is now permanently at school.
Susie is now permanently at home.
15323221211222111122111211211121.content:
Susie had been basically immobile for a long time, requiring the assistance of an ever-growing posse of people to help her ever-growing body around. However, the fact that she could even go places meant that she was technically still mobile, though it didn't feel much like it to the poor girl herself. But even those days had to come to an end, and come they did on one rainy April day. In the months since the introduction of the machine, Susie's weight gain had been off the charts, and her personal habits had only gotten worse- she'd gotten so lazy and used to using the bathroom as she pleased that she often wasn't able to make it all the way home without having to go. Her enormous stomach was now brushing the tops of her feet, and some of her rolls were beginning to hang off the sides of the bed. This had previously not been a big deal, but today was the day that everything gave out.

"Okay, Susie! Time to go!" cooed Alyssa as she removed Susie's feeding tube and slid the crane's straps under the massive girl. She then stepped up to the control panel, flipped some switches...

...and nothing happened. The crane gave a great WHRRR, but Susie didn't move an inch. The crane had become incapable of dealing with the overfed kindergartner. Alyssa cheered internally, but realizing the scope of the task at hand suppressed it. She rallied the class and told them that they'd have to get Susie going the old-fashioned way. Immediately the big girl was surrounded by a swarm of smaller kids pushing and pulling on various outcroppings of fat, slowly and surely rotating her to the side. As she turned, her fat cascaded in a slow and very jiggly waterfall, pouring over the side and hanging towards the floor. And even that was making Susie tired. Everything made Susie tired these days. Finally, though, the class turned her properly, and managed to set her down somewhat gently on her swollen feet.

"Alright! Now just a few steps to the wheelchair!"

The massive Susie took several deep breaths, and then proceeded to...

... do nothing. She was so fat that she simply couldn't lift her feet off the floor or shuffle them, and her class, though determined, was not strong enough to move her in such a fashion. Alyssa still did not lose hope. She had half the class stand by her and sent a few more to grab the chair. They maneuvered it somewhat dexterously behind the swollen girl, and lowered her fat butt down into the seat. Well, most of it anyway-- a large portion of her flab overflowed the armrests and jiggled uselessly by the wheels. Finally, it seemed they had succeeded. She'd soon be on her way. Alyssa released the brakes, gave a solid push...

...and the wheels bent, the frame collapsed, and Susie was unceremoniously dumped onto the ground. She lay there on her too-large stomach, a useless flabby lump barely able to draw breath, while behind her Alyssa finally gave the cheer she'd been holding on to.
15323221211222111122111211211121.title: Immobile Susie

choices: ...that Susie was moving on to first grade!
153232212112221111221112112111211.content: Seeing as Susie was starting to get too large to breathe unassisted, let alone move, the decision was made to keep her permanently at school. This not only meant that her classmates now never wanted to leave but also that her feeding tube was kept permanently in, causing her gain to skyrocket to an even more ludicrous level. For Susie, the reality had truly set itself in- she was really and totally incapable of doing anything. It made her very, very nervous, especially since the end of kindergarten was fast approaching. The question of what to do after was on the minds of the kids and adults, as well- was Susie the class's pet, meaning that she would accompany this group to first grade, or was she Miss Waxford's, meaning that she would stay for another group of kindergartners to fuss over? There was also the matter that she had not, technically speaking, passed kindergarten- but did her cultural status exempt her? No other question in the history of the school had been so mulled over. Meetings, PowerPoints, and puppy-dog eyes all failed to solve the problem, so one fateful May day the school board called it to a vote. It was eventually decided...
153232212112221111221112112111211.title: Susie is now permanently at school.

choices: ...Susie is fine with the plan and wants to start soon.
1532322121122211112211121121112111.content:
It was finally determined, after much deliberation, that Susie was to remain with the class that had made her so large, and that she would be moving on to first grade with Miss Wellspring. However, this designation was only ceremonial at best, for even if Susie was capable of grabbing a pencil and moving her arm enough to write, she certainly wouldn't do well on any sort of test- the months of doing nothing but eating had not exactly worked wonders for her already dull wits. All that would result from the change was her moving across the hall to Miss Wellspring's room- a task daunting in itself, for though her bed had wheels, it was wider than the door, which meant that it would have to be dismantled to move it across the hallway. Susie was also wider than the door, so she would therefore have to get off the bed. A task that hadn't been done in months, months in which Susie had had plenty of time to get fatter and flabbier. And then, once they finished with the bed, they would have to move Susie across the hallway as well- which would be even harder, seeing as Susie was rather hard to grab.

The various adults deliberated, discussed, and dissembled for nearly an hour before they realized they'd forgotten a fairly salient point- nobody had actually gotten around to telling the bedbound girl herself the results of the vote. Unable to reach a consensus on what to do, they decided to simply ask her, and trekked down to her classroom to do so. When they arrived, Susie was merely doing what she always did, which was eating, but she perked up slightly when she noticed the crowd of staff. She immediately wished she was wearing something- she had foresworn shirts long ago, which was no problem for her friends and classmates but rather a shock to anybody else. Luckily, none of the administrators seemed fazed. They immediately launched into a lengthy diatribe on her options and the plan, which of course bored poor Susie to tears. In the end, though...
1532322121122211112211121121112111.title: ...that Susie was moving on to first grade!

choices: They decide to move her there and then.
They decide to let her stay for the end of term class party.
15323221211222111122111211211121111.content:
As Susie listened to the school administrators' lengthy explanation of what was going to happen, she felt her heart sink (and not just in the fluttery, irregular way it did whenever she overexerted herself). She would love to have some new scenery; her months-long imprisonment within the classroom had left her bored to tears by her surroundings, having stared around at the same displays and pieces of artwork until there were all but burnt into her eyes.
It was alright when everyone was there, in the day - then, at least, she could look around at her classmates faces and sometimes join in with their conversations - but later in the evening when even Mrs Waxford had gone home, she was left immobile in her bed with nothing to do and only the whirring of her feeding machine to listen to. She slept a lot, but being unable even to turn around to look at the other side of the classroom without help she felt more bored by the day.

However, she couldn't shake a niggling doubt that if she went with her friends to Miss Wellspring's classroom, she'd never leave it. She hadn't even stood on her own two feet in months, and with her gain only increasing in rapidity she was scared she'd never walk on her own again if this kept up. It all felt surreal and dreamlike, days blurring into weeks into months as she lay on her bed, barely thinking, barely moving. She hadn't felt the sun since she was rendered bedbound, and her dark skin - once smooth and unblemished - was now strained and blotchy, vicious purple stretch marks streaked across her vast body. Although her friends did their best to clean her with wet sponges and scrubbing brushes, her washes had become less frequent as she had ballooned in size; whereas once they had been every day, that had soon dropped to every week, then every fortnight. Now the process was hurried if it happened at all, even her friends losing interest as it became more and more of a chore.

The results were uncomfortable. As Susie's hygiene deteriorated, she developed a series of itchy rashes and bedsores between her rolls, the constantly moist conditions taking their toll on her already strained skin. Miss Waxford had taken to wedging the classroom windows open to get an airflow, but even so a pungent smell of sweat and other, fouler things was obvious to any visitor.

With her arms all but useless, forced out to her sides by the obscene bulk of her midsection, she wasn't even able to scratch her numerous itches, leaving her in a constant state of discomfort. Combined with the throbbing, splitting pain of her constantly stuffed gut and the tightness of her chest whenever she so much as stirred, her existence had become wretched indeed, and each day she felt more and more unhappy as she was submerged beneath a mountain of flabby pounds.

So ultimately, what was her choice to be? Neither option looked good, and her head was starting to hurt from trying to think for the first time in several months. In any case, it sounded like the administrators had made up their minds already...
"I'll-" she managed to gasp, and everyone fell silent as they waited on her next word. After taking a few moments to gasp for air, the massive weight clinging to her chest making her breaths shallow and difficult, she spoke again. "I'll... go." The words took all her strength, and the moment she choked them out she slumped back against her pillows, head spinning as she began to feel rather faint.
Miss Waxford laid a hand on the great expanse of Susie's chest, smiling tearily down at the enormous girl.
"You be good for Miss Wellspring now," she said, looking proud, "I'll come and visit you every lunchtime, don't worry!"
Susie could barely hear her teacher's words over the sound of her pulse, loud and irregular, throbbing in her ears, but she got the gist. She smiled back up at her (one of the few things she could still manage alone), before slumping heavily backwards into an exhausted sleep. They'd have to move her later - for now, she had to rest.
15323221211222111122111211211121111.title: Should I stay or should I go now?

choices: The damp short-circuits her feeding machine.
The class gives Susie an emergency bath.
153232212112221111221112112111211112.content:
After a few more minutes of deliberation over Susie's gently snoozing bulk, the administrators decided it was better for all parties to move the enormous girl after the year was fully over. It would certainly not be a good idea to move her during the school day, and even if they succeeded, they doubted Miss Waxford's class could keep from disrupting Miss Wellspring's current, non-fattening first-grade class- or if they could handle anybody else feeding their beloved Susie. So, with a few cursory handshakes, the issue was put to rest, and the administrators left Susie to sleep in peace. The year would end in about two weeks, and once the rest of the school was out they could truly focus on moving the blubbery girl.

That next week was one of the hottest on record. The school's vintage 1950s air conditioning broke on Monday, bringing an air of general stickiness to the building. Gym was suspended, fans cranked to full blast, and all windows opened, damn the bugs. These measures were generally ineffective, but were even less so for one particular kindergarten classroom, and for one particular kindergartner.

Susie was never not sweaty. As she neared half-a-ton, simply existing took effort- and with effort comes sweat. Normally, this was bearable, but the rise in temperature only exacerbated the problem. Susie was practically dripping. Day in and day out, sweat flowed off her vast expanse, dampening the floor and bed she laid on. This, in turn, only made her itchiness worse. And with that came pungency. On Wednesday, as the temperature climbed to a whopping 102 degrees, one could almost see a haze over Susie's corner, as the dampness condensed into a vague cloud. Something had to change, and change it did.
153232212112221111221112112111211112.title: They decide to let her stay for the end of term...

choices: Luckily, the class notices and helps Susie out.
They don't hear- Susie will have to do something drastic.
1532322121122211112211121121112111121.content:
The day wore on. The students stewed in their chairs, trying to focus on reading and not their enormous class pet. Though they all loved Susie, the smell was really unbearable, and today especially there was a constant and very distracting drip, drip. Unfortunately, Susie was not a faucet, and there was really no way to stop the dripping other than a bath- and nobody wanted to give her one of those. So they read on- to their detriment, as ignoring a small problem always turns it into a large one...

Susie was not at all enjoying herself. It was altogether too hot. There was an itch very close to her arm, but she couldn't move her hand enough to reach it- and of course couldn't move her arm in the slightest. She didn't have a book to read, the wall in front of her was just the same as it had always been, and the dripping of her own body was starting to bother her too, muffled though her ears were by facial flab. She attempted to take solace in the fact that it really couldn't get any worse when, of course, it did.

The first thing she noticed was a loud pop and a quiet fizzle, along with an acrid smoky smell. As she could barely turn her head, at first she couldn't figure out what it was. But soon enough the lack of food from her feeding tube clued her in to the problem. The rain of her own sweat had soaked the floor to the point of ruining the extension cord of the machine. Her body, so used by now to constant eating, was now thrown into a complete panic. Barely fifteen seconds after the change her belly was sending warning signals to her brain- HUNGRY, they cried. After thirty, the pain of not consuming was becoming unbearable. Susie screwed up her face and tried to cry for help, but the now useless tube only let her whimper. She flopped her hands and kicked her feet, uselessly attempting to attract some attention to her plight, but the surrounding fat deadened what little noise would have been made. Her belly growled in hunger, but it was so flabby that the fat worked against itself- although it shuddered from her middle all the way down to its end far past her toes, the groan was reduced to little more than a low moan. One minute had gone by, and Susie was getting desperate...
1532322121122211112211121121112111121.title: An unwelcome crisis

choices: "Quick - call the fire brigade!" (Not realising Susie's not being fed...)
15323221211222111122111211211121111211.content:
The calibration of Susie’s feeding machine was precise. Incredibly precise, in fact. It had fed her, for unceasing months on end, the absolute perfect amount to fatten her at the fastest rate possible. Day in, day out, it pumped a sickly mix of nutrients and liquid lard down the vast girl’s throat and into her titanic stomach, matching her rate of digestion to keep her in a permanent state of ‘torturously overstuffed’ no matter how fast she converted the incoming paste into fat. Indeed, it actually outpaced her digestion to a minute degree - just enough to ensure that her gut was constantly being stretched out larger and larger by her ridiculously excessive diet.

And so, when it stopped, there was a panic. Susie had grown to need food like a patient on life support – it was vital to her. Although her stomach was in constant pain from being overstuffed, it was now so wrenched out of shape, so stretched out beyond what it should be for a girl her age, that it could never return to its former self. And so, despite her resentment for it, she needed the feeding machine – now and forever. But her sweat had shorted it out, and now her oversized body was preventing her from attracting anyone’s attention.

The effort of shifting her arm slightly had left her gasping for air, and the panic was only making things worse – darkness was moving in around the edges of her vision as the desperate complaints from her midsection grew cripplingly worse, her stomach beginning to feel a slight hint of emptiness for the first time in longer than it could remember. But completely disabled as she was, what could she do? Her hands and feet flopped around uselessly, pathetic as a fish out of water – and with the vast weight of her flab weighing down on her body, she could barely even breath – never mind cry out for help. She could only roll her eyes in her head, trapped uselessly inside her immense form.

Ultimately though, her body came to the rescue in a way she could never have imagined. Her movements as she tried to attract attention shifted one of the great flab rolls hanging from her side, and a gasp of air escaped. It had been trapped there for nearly a day, festering and growing foul in its stagnation, and now it was released to drift slowly across the class. Some of her classmates retched, but didn’t bother turning around – others glanced back, but saw nothing amiss. Then, the eye-watering fug of air made it to Miss Waxford, and the teacher looked over – in time to see a rising column of smoke drifting from the feeding machine. She deduced what had happened in an instant.
15323221211222111122111211211121111211.title: Halp

choices: Miss Waxford suddenly remembers Susie and attempts a rescue.
Susie is forgotten- she gets a bath courtesy of the firefighters.
153232212112221111221112112111211112111.content:
Miss Waxford was a well-trained teacher. She had memorized her handbook and knew exactly what to do in any emergency, up to and including terrorism. A fire starting was nothing new to her. So, with well-practiced authority, she gathered the class, pulled the fire alarm, and marched her students two-by-two out to the safe area.

Except, of course, for Susie.

Miss Waxford had years of fire drills under her belt. In every single one, the procedure was the same- line up the class, turn of the lights, lock the door, head out of the school. So, as was natural, she followed this procedure to the letter- and half-ton kindergartners were nowhere in this procedure. So out they went, leaving Susie alone and afraid.

So few things in Susie's enormous body worked properly anymore. Her limbs were useless, her lungs couldn't breathe without the support of an oxygen tank, her digestive system was broken to the point of overtaxing the bed's holding tank, and she got chest pains from just thinking. Fight-or-flight, however, remained untouched- and that kicked in full force. Susie's small mind was overwhelmed with fear. Sweat, even more than before, broke out all over her enormous body. She flapped her pointless flabby limbs, stirring up her flab like waves in a gale and exhausting her still further. Through all of this, her hunger remained strong, intensifying the situation still further. Folds of fat shifted for the first time in months, sending out yet more gasps of moist, ancient air. Susie, convinced of the fire, gripped by the cold claws of biting hunger, and sure she was going to die, started to cry, salty tears flowing down her puffy cheeks and disappearing among her vast chins.

And that was when the bed gave out.

Susie's rather sudden, if pitiful, movements were the, to make it more accurate, lead blocks that broke the camel's back. Unbeknownst to anybody, the pin holding the back right wheel onto the leg was faulty, and this cracked it. The wheel went, the leg bent, and before long, the bed was dumping its surprised and terrified occupant unceremoniously onto the floor. And, to make matters even worse for the poor girl, the holding tank ruptured as well, and the smell in that classroom reached entirely new heights of disgusting.

Susie wasn't capable of coherent thought at the best of times. Her entire worldview having been literally upended didn't help matters. After seeing only the door for months, the back wall was totally incomprehensible. Overwhelmed with new stimulus, Susie finally passed out, and soon was snoring gently despite the sirens outside.
153232212112221111221112112111211112111.title: "Quick - call the fire brigade!" (Not r...

choices: Miss Waxford makes it in first, with plenty of food for the enormous girl.
The firefighters make it in first, and have no idea what to do with Susie.
1532322121122211112211121121112111121112.content:
All outside was pure chaos. Students broke ranks from their neatly formed lines and raced about, teachers in hot pursuit. Several girls were in hysterics, and one of the new teachers too. The arrival of the firemen, grim-faced and serious, didn't much help the situation, as that only convinced the children that something serious was happening. Through all of this, despite her devotedness, Miss Waxford had no time to think of Susie. Her hands were full with her out-of-control students and her clipboard blowing away, so though the class kept crying "Susie!" it all just went in one ear and out the other. And so it was that Susie got her first bath in six months.

The flabby girl was awoken by the stinging sensation of cold water on her massive, warm body. She gasped and moaned slightly in pain from the chill and the strength of the streams of water. She was not being directly targeted, luckily, but even just the spray felt terrible to her warm, weak skin. The water flew over her fat, trickling down into all her little nooks and crannies and flushing out months of stale sweat and filthy air. Her backside and legs were getting some of the freshest air they'd felt in months. It was one of the best things to happen to Susie in quite some time, but she didn't know it, dim as she was. All she knew was that it stung, that it was hard to breathe (her face was smushed into her breasts, and the many folds of her chin and neck had shifted enough to vastly restrict her breathing tube) and that she was, above all else, still ravenous. It had now been upwards of thirty minutes without food for the exhausted girl, and though she had slept for most of these minutes every single waking one was an exercise in starvation. She never would starve, of course- thousand-pound kindergartners rarely do- but it certainly felt like it. She was still totally immobile, though, so all she could do was lie there, facedown in her own rank-smelling fat, and pray for something to eat.
1532322121122211112211121121112111121112.title: Susie is forgotten- she gets a bath courtesy of...

choices: I want to be in the living room.
I want to be in the guest bedroom.
15323221212.content: Susie's mother said,"Susie, I know your belly is the class pet, but I think it would be better for you to start homeschooling because you can barely move without help. I will make sure you can see your friends as often as they can visit you." Susie says I guess so she pulled her out of school Monday so she has one more day there for them. She also asked if she would rather be in the living room or move downstairs into the guest bedroom. Susie says
15323221212.title: On the way home

1532322122.content:
Susie walked along to the parking area. Her beanbag was in the sleeping area. It would certainly take the janitors little while to clean up the crumbs there.
Passing through the door, she had gone past the art and crafts area. On a number of tv shows she had seen a number of puppets and kids building and painting things and that conversation with Mrs Waxford made them think about them much, much more. She put her hands on her stomach and the size from her last feeding still talked to her through her pudgy hands. It caused her to sway and her arms and belly rubbed together as she passed by the halls. She wasn’t too far behind the other kids so she could still follow them.
There was a small walkway over the lawn in front of the kindy and many parents were there in cars and the staff were keeping an eye on the children’s safety. She couldn’t see her mothers car there, but she was looking forward to sitting down on one of the benches near the car park.
Her thoughts were interrupted by the sudden appearance of someone next to her.
It was Natalie. She knew that she had a number of artwork on the wall and enjoyed painting.
As well as the cupcakes that she bought in covered with frosting.
“Hey Susie!” Natalie smiled “We really enjoyed our work today. I couldn’t believe how much you could eat.”
Susie sighed.
Eat? That is all they see me for in there?
Natalie heard it and her bubbly enthusiasm began to wane. “Are you feeling sad?”
Susie nodded as they walked along. “Yeah”
“Why? You’re getting all that you want.”
“Yeah, but I’m not sure about it”
“About what? It’s what your mum wants”
“Yeah, but you have all those pretty pictures on the wall. I want to make something like that as well.”
“Oh.”
It was Natalie’s turn to be silent.
All of a sudden they both gave a squeak of fear and looked up.
It was a man and next to him a small girl. Noticeably pudgy as well.
1532322122.title: Suzie bunped into some kids from her class as s...

choices: They decide to play together tomorrow
15323221221.content:
Oh. We’re sorry.” Said Natalie

The man smiled

“We’re going to the kindy tomorrow and thought we would take a look around before we come in tomorrow morning.”

He turned to the girl grasping at his hand with her left hand and sucking on of her right fingers on her other hand in her mouth.

“This is Naomi.” He turned to his daughter “Say hi”
The hand with the finger in Naomi’s mouth slowly came out and Naomi gave a small wave and a shy smile.

“I’m Natalie!”

“I’m Susie!”

They both smiled and the corners of Naomi’s mouth grew wider.
“Naomi is very good at singing, she likes music and banging on her xylophone” her Dad said

“I’m good at drawing and painting” Said Natalie

“I’m...” Susie began. She trailed off on that.

“I want to be good at that as well” she said rather quietly.

“I’m sure you will” Said Naomi’s Dad “You look like a really smart person”

Susie looked up. “But I couldn’t really do that well”. She said sadly.

Naomi’s Dad bent down. “Hey, everyone can do something special. It may take you a bit to try it, but don’t let get you down”
He took out his phone and started tapping the viewscreen.
“Let me show you a video.”

He showed them a video of a man sitting on a couch and looked like he had his arms behind his back.
He had a big smile on his face.
Naomi’s Dad hit play.
He started speaking “… the only way to real beauty is how you love people, the way you listen to people the way you smile.”
“What you feel in your soul in how you can be a person to create and build things. That is who you are not what you look like.”
There is only you and there is never going to be another you. You. Are.Beautiful.”
Susie felt a gentle warmth inside.
15323221221.title: Introductions are in order

choices: Susie arrives home and dinner is on
153232212211.content:
Natalie and Naomi were also intrigued by this person. Susie turned to Naomi.
“How about you and Natalie and I play together tomorrow. ”
Naomi smiled. “Yeah!”

Suddenly a cry from the car park broke the discussion.

“Susie!”

All of them turned to meet her mother coming down the pathway.

Naomi’s Dad smiled. “Oh hello, I was just introducing Naomi to her new play group. Susie and her friend Natalie were very excited to meet tomorrow and play.”
“Oh.”
Susie’s mum stopped short and smiled. “Well I’m glad to know Susie has friends”

“You will get a chance to play tomorrow but for now it’s time to come home.”
The three girls walked together and make their way to the pickup area.

They waved goodbye and each piled with their parents to drive home.

Susie was there buckled in the backseat. She sat there thinking as the kindergarten disappeared into the distance.

“We’ve got a good dinner at home tonight.” Her mom said “Also picked up the peanut chocolate cookies that you like some much”
Susie thought and looked up to the front where the trees and the buildings zoomed past in the mid afternoon sky.
“It’s pretty outside. Isn’t it Mommy?”
Her mom turned sightly and looked outside. “Yeah. It is. All those clouds reflecting the setting sun.”
153232212211.title: They decide to play together tomorrow

1532322122111.content:
They pulled up into the driveway and they both jumped out.

The door opened and the old Chinese lady got out with little Ronnie standing by her side.
“Thanks again for watching him Miss Gatshi!” Susie’s Mum smiled.

Ronnie hugged his Mommy and they all disappeared inside.
Entering the living room there was a table with a number of snacks on it. Ronnie had evidently eaten a few of them.

Susie still thought about the sunset and headed towards a chest of drawers. There were a number of colouring pencils and paper.
She got them out and leaned over. Ronnie appeared by her side.

“Waszat?”

“Its colouring in”

Susie picked up a colouring pencil and started drawing red, orange and yellow.
She wanted to try and capture the sky she saw in the car.
It must have been at least 45 minutes until the smells from the kitchen came in.
She looked up and saw Ronnie with a paper coverd with what could best be described as a pink cloud with blue legs.
The same colours covered his hands from the textas he had found.
“Dinner!” came the call from the kitchen.
Ronnie and Susie got up.
The wafting smells of rice and sauces filled their nostrils and they got into their chairs as mom served up their meal.
The family started eating.

Susie found herself not so hungry. The food from the kindergarten had been enough to keep her filled throughout the day.
Susie saw the almost empty plate and said “Mommy, I can’t eat any more.”
Her mom looked up
“You have to eat Susie. It is how you will be strong and healthy.”


“Mommy I had a bit to eat at kindie. I feel so full”
Her mom considered it.
“Okay Susie, you lie down in the lounge room. I’ll sort all your plates and Ronnie too.”

Susie moved back to the place on the carpet where she got the textas out and the paper and saw the evening sky on the page.
She thought about other animals that she knew at kindy.
She got out the texta and began to draw a dog on a green lawn with a blue sky in the background.

Next she drew a horse standing by a fence with its head held up high.

She began drawing a pig. She realised that the only way she could think of drawing a pig was with its head in a trough munching on food.
She realised she had given her piggy a big tummy as well.

She looked back on the different drawings that were on the pages. She wandered what she liked the most.
The Horse standing with its head held high, the dog playing in the park or the pig who spent all day munching in its pen.

Her mum came in and saw what she had done.
“Well, I was wondering where that colouring in stuff was. Looks like you put it to good use sweetie!”
After that Susie was lead with Ronnie to the TV and a program of Dora the explorer was on.

Immediately she was intrigued by this little girl who went out to find new people and friends.
It joined her in that sleep that night.
1532322122111.title: Susie arrives home and dinner is on

15323221221111.content:
The next day her mother led her out of the car and towards the kindergarten as usual and she did notice that a few of the other kids had packed lunch boxes and wrapped containers.
Her mood brightened as Noami approached with her Dad.
Natalie beamed and followed Susie into the classroom. The children all began to congregate around the mat and the desks. Susie could not see Natalie anywhere

Noami and Susie sat down and Mrs Waxford began going through the routine with them of the coming day. There would be an art class with finger paints and paper followed by a Physical Education and a maths game.
Susie sat quietly. Her shirt felt a little constricting as she shifted her weight. She looked at her fingers.
They still had ink from the pens from last night. There was also smears of Nutella from her breakfast this morning.
The movement of another impatient sitter from the corner of her eye turned and she saw Natalie.
She looked like she was keen for painting on big sheets of paper as well.
“...and so without further ado, I would like you all to find yourself an art smock and walk, do not run, to the aisles and I want you to paint something that you like the best.”
All the children got up and went to the racks where the art smocks were kept.
Susie pulled herself up and Noami was by her side and they wondered over.
Most of the painting smocks were one-size-fits-all as oversized old adult T-Shirts, so Susie did not need to have trouble finding something that fit her.
All the other kids moved around and one of them put a chocolate cookie into Susies hand.
“Oh Susie” Mrs Waxford scurried over. “You don’t have to if you don’t want to. There are some snacks by the bean bag that you can get stuck into”.
Susie looked up. She saw a few different boxes of chips and cookies around it. She went towards it.
Naomi looked up with a questioning look in her eyes.

Susie returned with a packet for herself and a packet for Noami.
She and Naomi grazed on some crackers while they got paint on their fingers.

The packets were forgotten as they began to indulge themselves in their painting.
Naomi finally stepped back with a painting that looked like a Wiggles Stage

Susie made a rainbow with several birds flying over.

They washed their hands and recess was about to begin.
Susie got out her heavy lunchbox and sat next to Naomi.
They began to talk.

“My mommy says that girls need to eat and be big to be beautiful. Funnily enough the rest of the kids want to help out.”
Two other girls passed her a candy bar.
“So you can see what I need to do”
Naomi considered the candy bars.
“You could still play and draw” she smiled “ I know I would like to play with you”
They both finished their food. Susie ate some candy bars but did not take much from her lunch box.
Mrs Waxford rang the bell to show that the time was come to play.
They all got up. Susie included and they sat down together in the sand pit.
Naomi found some toy animals in the container.
“Hello!” She chirped “I’m Raymond the dog!”
Susie pull out another

“I’m Cuddles the koala!”

“I’m Natalie!”

Both girls jump when they realised who was sitting with them in the sand pit.
The Natalie blushed. Clearly she had not thought what to do after the surprise part.

She quietly picked up a toy.

“T-Toby the Bull?”

Both girls looked at each other and giggled

“I didn’t see you earlier today. Where have you been?” said Susie
Natalie’s smiled wavered.
“I had to see the Doctors. He was friendly, but he asked me a lot of questions about how I was. He said I was good, so I guess that’s okay.”
Susie frowned. She never thought about Doctors before.

They all played pretend for the rest of recess time.

The PE lesson came around and most of the stuff that Susie had to do was more exercise than she had to in her life.
She sat down and had a drink and a few of her snacks.

Susie also got into Maths and she found that the biscuits could work very well as counters and measuring for time and place.
At the end of the day, Noami, Natalie and Susie spent so much time together, they each talked to their parents about going home and catching up.
Natalie had to go home, but he said she would ask her Mom next time.
15323221221111.title: Next day at school

choices: Susie is back home for Dinner!
153232212211111.content:
Natalie had to go home, but she said she would ask her Mom next time.
They both agreed and they both headed to Noami’s place.

Funnily enough, they all realised that they lived across the street from each other!

Susie giggled as she rolled around the trampoline.

Susie and Naomi were both jumping up and down on either side. She had been up and down throughout the afternoon bouncing until she got tired.
She sat up in a dizzy daze.

Then several different small coloured balls appeared courtesy of Naomi’s Dad.

Susie realised felt something that she had grasped in the people she knew in her life. Her mother, her brother, even with all her “friends” at Kindy. Naomi liked her. Not on the outside, but on the inside.

They started pushing balls around the trampoline. The balls rolled around their legs and near the foam around the edges.
After half an hour, Susie finally called it quits. She was tired but happy.
153232212211111.title: They go to Noami's place

choices: The next day her mother's ultimatum takes form
1532322122111111.content:
She blinked as the front door to her house opened and the front pavement lit up against the fading light of the sun.

Naomi and her Dad said goodnight and Susie tiredly walked up the steps to her mother.

“Well. I haven’t seen you all afternoon. You must be starving my dear.”
Susie was hit by a wave of steak, sauce and pasta aromas wafting from the kitchen.

She got up and immediately got stuck into a large plate of T-bone steak, gravy and cheesy mash potato.

She stopped munching and realised that there was garlic bread on the table. See grabbed half of it and, it being lukewarm so as not to burn her fingers, she began downing it between slurps of grape juice.

She finally licked her plate clean and there before her was a delicious saucy burrito. Without hesitation she picked it up and began consuming it with large mouthfuls.
After that was done, A big bowl of ice cream with bananas and sprinkles appeared and in a blur the bowl was empty.

Susie finally sighed without any more and the feelings of her stomach began to catch up with her.
“Had enough sweetie?”
She groggily turned to her mother.
“Mmm-mhmm”
“From what Mrs. Waxford has told me you have been missing out on a lot of this.”

Susie blinked several times.

“My dear I want you to be the best daughter that a person could love one day.”

She frowned
“You denied eating anything at school and by what you have eaten now, I doubt you have eaten anything at Naomi’s place”
Susie looked up in fear.
“This has to stop now! Starting tomorrow, I will ensure you become a girl that no-one can turn down!”
1532322122111111.title: Susie is back home for Dinner!

choices: This goes on and Susie remains at home
15323221221111111.content:
The Next day was on a weekend. Susie groggily opened her eyes.

The dinner last night was just the beginning of a later supper with fried rice and Mongolian Beef.

She got up and started towards the living room. Ronnie was already up and smells of cooking were coming through house.

Susie sat down on the couch infront of the TV next to Ronnie. Mom came in.

“Ah Susie I was about to wake you up. You slept in pretty late.”

She whizzed round and disappeared into the kitchen.

Susie sighed and re-positioned herself.
Her pajamas were tight again and a little uncomfortable. Figures.

A tray of French toast came to her and her routine appetite resumed.
This was followed an hour later by an omelette.

Then doughnuts

Then hotdogs

Then cheeseburgers and chips

Then pieces of chicken and gravy.

The next thing Susie remembered was she was waking up out of a food coma and she got hurried into the bathroom for a wash.
She dipped in under and out of the bathtub and a set of plastic balls started floating around.
It reminded her of Natalie and Naomi.

“Mom”
She looked up to her mother leaning over the side.
“Can I play with Natalie and Naomi tomorrow”
Her Mother stuck her nose up.
“Not until they respect our family traditions”
15323221221111111.title: The next day her mother's ultimatum takes form

choices: She has some visitors during the night
153232212211111111.content:
Wednesday came around and Susie was lying in the evening looking up at the sealing.

Her window was slightly open as it was a mild evening and a breeze blew through.

The dull ache of a well distended stomach subsided as it began to gurgle with digestion from another agenda of food and snacking with lessons in between.

She rolled over onto her side and she caught sight of several seats of paper on the ground.

She looked at the paper and realised that they were the drawings that she had done the afternoon that she had meet Naomi.
There was the horse, the sheep
and the pig.
She sighed and drifted off into a slumber.
153232212211111111.title: This goes on and Susie remains at home

1532322122111111111.content:
A loud bang broke her out of her dreamscape.
She instinctively hit her touch desk lamp and her room filled with light.
What she saw made her squeal with delight.
There was Natalie and Naomi clambering onto their feet after coming through the window.
She immediately got out of bed as fast as she could and put each of her large arms around her friends in a group hug.
She grinned from ear to ear. She never felt this way about anything before.
“I’m so glad to see you!”
“Same here Susie!” Naomi croaked as Susie released her hold.
Natalie smiled.
“We didn’t know what happened to you and then we asked your Mom and she said you were sick”
Susie’s head sunk down.
“I guess I can’t do anything. I’m meant to just eat and that’s all I can do. It’s not as if I can walk much now.”
Naomi fumbled with something in her pocket.
She brought out something black, smooth and rectangular.


“That’s your Dads phone! Should you have that?” Susie quavered

Naomi turned on the screen and there was the man that was talking before with his arms behind his back.
She pressed play
He started speaking

“…Well it all depends on me! Can I do it can I not do it? You don’t know what you can achieve until you try! You know the Doctors didn’t know I’d be walking until I actually started doing it. I now golf, swim, fish and surfing!”

Susie gasped and realised something.
“He doesn’t have any arms and legs!”

Natalie smiled “No, but that does not stop him doing things that he enjoys”

Susie was bewildered as everything seemed to be opposite in her head.

Then Susie once again felt something warm inside her. It was as if something was telling her that she was meant for more.
She began to laugh and the rest of the girls joined in. Susie looked up and froze.

Standing in the open doorway was her Mother.
1532322122111111111.title: She has some visitors during the night

choices: A new routine and a new horizon
15323221221111111111.content:
She wasn’t angry. In fact the best way to describe her was “wet” with a soft demeanour.
She sighed

“I’m sorry Susie. I have never seen you this happy in days.”

She looked up.
“In our home country I couldn’t gain weight. I ate and it didn’t make a difference. Eventually I moved to America and I found your Daddy. After he left I thought I could make up for my sad time by investing it for you”

She looked down

“I realise that the only person I was thinking about was me.”
She smiled

“You are beautiful, my dear, and smart and fun and I want you to be the best that you can be”
With that she through her arms around her daughter. Susie felt all the anxiety leave her.
15323221221111111111.title: Her Mom is happy

153232212211111111111.content:
Susie is still a big girl and enjoys her food and drink, but now she does it because its her choice.

Except when it comes to green vegetables and stewed tomatos!

Naomi and Natalie hang out constantly at school with her as they learn counting and reading big letters in preparation for the first grade.
Their pictures line the wall with lots of animals and places.

After school they pick a different persons place to go to and things to play with.

Their bedrooms are filled with animals and photos of them going to parks and swimming pools and camping together.

Naomi’s Dad and Susie’s Mom get on well together, so well in fact, that Susie and Noami were thrilled to learn that they were going to be sisters.

Susie didn’t know what her future would bring, but she knew that whatever happens she can follow through with it with her family and friends.

Their strength was in her heart.
153232212211111111111.title: A new routine and a new horizon

1533.content: Susie was at a buffet with her mom. Ronnie is at a daycare. Her mother took susie to this place offtend. She knew Susie would eat alot so this way she would gain more weight quickly. Susie was on her 5th plate and you could tell. Her belly was bigger than it was before. Her shirt was ridding up to her belly button. She felt really stuffed but kept eating. she ate...
1533.title: the buffet

15331.content: 2 plates later Susie was so full she could not even talk. Her mom went and got 4 more plates and told Susie to eat them.'Im to stuffed'said susie. But before she could protest any more her mom put a spoon full of soup in her mouth.... After an hour and a half her mom forced all the food in her belly. Her shirt was torn and her pants button had poped. she helped her daughter to the car and drove to pick up Ronnie and go home. when they got there...
15331.title: Can tummies pop?

choices: She buttons her shorts but then her pants rip.
They go home without any problems.
154.content:
Becky 5 years old
Short red hair, tan skin, glasses, pudgy all over
Likes adventure, has a wide open mind. Not to big initally, but gains weight quickly.
Hobbies: Eating, reading, drawing and watching TV
Favorite food: Any baked good (cake, pie, doughnut, etc…)


Becky sat up in the booth at the buffet where her family was eating. She was a chubby girl, just on the overweight side for her age. She just finished her plate of macaroni.

“Mom, can I go up and get more food?”

“Sure, sweetie.” Her mom replied, forgetting that Becky had already had three plates. “That’s the purpose of eating at a buffet. You want some more, Josh?”

“Maybe a bit.” Josh was Becky’s brother, over twice her age. He was a big eater like Becky, but his days on the Little League field kept him trim. They went up to the lines together.

Becky piled her plate with food as high as she possibly dared. Slowly, she carried it back to the table and began eating. Her favorite color was green, but now her green shorts felt tight. She unbuttoned her shorts under the table and continued eating. She swallowed the last of her plate.

Josh had only eaten half of his plate. “You want the rest, squirt?” Josh was a nice big brother, and didn’t mind his sister’s eating habits.

“Sure,” Becky said as Josh scooted the plate over. She fixed her glasses, which were always sliding around her face."

“I’ll just be going to the bathroom,” their mom said. “Tell the staff they can take my plate.” She left. There was a sizable amount of food left on her plate. Becky looked to make sure her mother was gone, and then dumped her mother’s food onto her plate. Josh didn’t notice, as he was busy playing his gameboy.

Becky was just finishing the food when their mom came back. “You guys ready to go?”

“Yeah,” said Josh. Becky finished the last morsel of ham on her plate and remembered that she needed to button her shorts.
154.title: Meet Becky

1541.content:
Becky tried to button her shorts, but her belly, swollen from the food she had eaten, didn’t want to close. She struggled for a bit, but had to leave them open.

“Something wrong?” her mother asked.

“Mommy, my shorts don’t want to button.”

Her mother looked at them. “Those shorts were getting too old anyways. We’ll have to buy some new clothes for you today.”

After dropping Josh at a friend’s house, Jo took her daughter to the department store. “Want some ice cream, Becky? You never had dessert back at the buffet.”

“Yeah!” said Becky. Jo drove the drive-thru of a nearby Dairy Queen, letting her daughter order a large cookie dough blizzard. Becky had finished most of it when they parked at the department store.

They went into the kids section, and Jo looked through the girls clothing. “Something a size or two bigger, so we can grow into it. See anything you like?”

Becky pointed to a pair of green shorts just like the ones she was too big for. Unfortunately, they were the exact same size.

They don’t have much here for a girl of Becky’s physique, Jo thought. Kids grow in strange ways in these years. She led Becky to another part of kids clothing, which happened to be husky sizes. Becky didn’t notice the difference. Finally, Jo found a few pairs of pants that would fit Becky.

As they drove away Jo glanced at the clock. “Josh has his baseball game at three o’clock. Did you want to go see it? Or I could leave at home for a few hours.”

Becky pondered. She had seen plenty of her brother’s baseball games, but they did serve great hot dogs at the community park's concession stand.
1541.title: She's a growing girl.

choices: Jo gets back with the hot dog for Becky
Becky gets tired of waiting and goes to find her mom.
15411.content:
Becky didn't like being left at home on her own much - she enjoyed being able to watch as much TV as she wanted without her mom pestering her, but all the good snacks were in the cupboards too high for her to reach, and TV just wasn't the same without something to munch on as she watched.

They drove to the baseball game, arriving just as it was starting. They made their way to the seats and sat down quickly, cheering as they spotted Josh and his team. The game began and Becky watched for a while, not really understanding much of what was going on. Baseball didn't interest her much, even if her brother was one of the players, and she was soon bored.

She looked down at the new pants they'd bought at the department store. They were much more comfortable than her other clothes - recently, all her clothes seemed to be a little too small for her, the waistbands digging into her tummy when she sat down and stuff like that; these pants though were nice and loose.

Glancing around, she caught sight of the concession stand, and suddenly remembered the great hot dogs they served there. She was still feeling quite stuffed from everything else she'd eaten today, but she reckoned she had enough room for a little more. She grabbed her mom's sleeve and tugged on it.
"Mommy, can I have a hot dog from the stand?" Jo looked down at her, uncertain.

"Darling, you've already eaten quite a lot today. How about you wait until we get home?" Jo suggested. She wasn't really concerned about her daughter's weight at all - in fact, it hadn't even crossed her mind that Becky might be anything but average. However, even she thought a buffet, ice cream AND a hot dog in a single afternoon was excessive.

"Pleeease, I'm really hungry," Becky lied, clutching her tummy with one hand as she tugged irritatingly at her mom's sleeve with the other. Jo rolled her eyes.

"Alright, but this is your last snack until dinner." She got up and went to buy a hot dog for her hungry daughter, wondering where this newfound appetite had come from. Maybe she was going through a growth spurt?
15411.title: Baseball

choices: Becky isn't sure if she can even move...
154111.content:
Before long, Jo had returned, hot dog in hand. It was large - more like a meal than a snack - but the smell reignited Becky's hunger.
"Gimme!" she said, snatching at it. Jo held it out of reach.

"Manners!" Jo exclaimed. "What do you say?"
Now it was Becky's turn to roll her eyes. Her tummy was rumbling again, the scent of sausage making her completely forget how much she'd already eaten.

"Please." she said grudgingly, and Jo passed her the hot dog. She tore into it immediately, tomato ketchup dripping onto her shirt in her haste. Jo grumbled to herself as she watched her daughter eat - that was just yet more washing she'd have to do later. Forgetting about it, she turned back to watch the baseball game.

By the time half the hot dog was gone, Becky was running out of energy. She'd already eaten a lot that day, and she was beginning to feel a bit sick - beneath her tight shirt her belly was swollen and bulging, packed to bursting with unhealthy junk food. She'd always had a fairly big appetite, and was no stranger to overeating - that much was obvious from her pudgy body - but she'd never eaten this much in a single afternoon before and it was taking its toll.

Jo glanced down at her.
"You alright, darling? Can't finish it?"

Becky frowned.
"I'm - I'm fine." She said stubbornly, biting off another big mouthful of the hot dog. "I'm gonna finish it." More determined than ever, she choked down the rest of the greasy snack, swallowing down the last bite as the game was almost finished. She leaned back in her chair, groaning unhappily; her belly was aching sharply, filled to its absolute limits. Her new pants, so loose only half an hour ago, now felt tight against her swollen tummy - but still she was filled with a sense of victory. She'd managed to finish the hot dog, even if she felt awful now.

Before she could revel in her success too much though, her mom was standing up.
"Come on Bec, the game's over. Let's pick up Josh and head back to the car."
154111.title: Victory!

choices: They don't sell it at this shop!
1541111.content:
They made their way back to the car and drove towards home, Becky cradling her stomach the whole way. She looked almost pregnant, distended belly poking out from beneath her tight top as they climbed into the car and Jo strapped her into her car seat. As they pulled out of the parking lot and headed from home, Josh looked over at his little sister.

"You alright, Bec? You look kinda... stuffed," he said, gazing incredulously at her swollen midsection. He knew his little sis had an appetite but this just seemed excessive.

"Yeah... I ate a hot dog while you were playing. It was pretty big, but I finished it all," she announced proudly. Josh raised his eyebrows.

"Even after everything you had earlier? Sheesh. You won't be my little sister for long if you keep eating like that!" he laughed, giving her exposed belly a little poke.

"Nooo!" Becky squealed, batting his hand away, "Don't!" Josh chuckled, considering for a second tickling his younger sister - but from the look on her face she'd probably just be sick on him. Obligingly, he withdrew his hand.

"Oh yeah, that reminds me," he said a moment later, "have you heard of that new juice drink that they're selling now? Lotus, I think they call it. We had some before the game, it's fantastic."

The peaked Becky's interest. She wasn't allowed more than one soda a day, but juice was fair game.
"What's it taste like?" she asked, licking her lips despite herself.

"Dunno. Lotuses?" Josh shrugged. Becky already wasn't listening to him though - she was leaning forward, trying to get her mom's attention.

"Mommy? Mommy? Can we buy some Lotus? Pleease?" she whined, "Josh had some, I wanna try it. Pleeease."

Jo rolled her eyes. She hadn't been planning to stop off at the shops on the way home, but she just knew Becky would pester her until she did. Without a word, she pulled into the parking lot of the nearest supermarket. What was so special about this Lotus drink anyway?
1541111.title: Lotus Love

choices: Her full belly makes her sleepy - she nods off.
All that sugar keeps her awake!
15411111.content:
The whole drive home Becky was practically bouncing with excitement, desperate to try the new Lotus drink. Her aching stomach forgotten entirely, she rushed inside the house the moment her mom unstrapped her from her car seat and got a glass ready in the kitchen. A moment later her mom came in after her, carrying the shopping under one arm. She rolled her eyes, half amused, half exasperated at Becky's behaviour.

"Don't get too excited Bec, you might not even like it," she warned as she poured some of the vibrant green liquid into her daughter's glass. Her prejudice was ultimately unjustified, however, as Becky immediately gulped it down and held the glass out again for more.

"It's fantastic!" she almost moaned, eyes wide. It tasted incredibly sweet, like liquid candy to her little mouth, along with some fruity flavour she couldn't identify, "More please!"

Chuckling, Jo poured her daughter another glass, then put the bottle on the table.
"Have as much as you like darling, it's just fruit juice," she said, before heading out of the room, leaving Becky alone as she swallowed down her second glass of Lotus. The toxic-green liquid felt sticky on her lips and in her mouth, but it tasted incredibly, unbelievably good. Her second glass was gone in seconds, followed quickly by a third.

At that point though, her abused stomach made itself known once again. Stuffed with several plates of buffet food, ice cream, a hot dog and now three glasses of hyper-sugary juice, it was gurgling and aching to no end. Reluctantly, she put the Lotus bottle in the fridge and made her way through to the sitting room, where she collapsed onto the couch to watch some cartoons and nurse her absurdly bloated gut. Normally, Becky could be described as pudgy - but right now, her belly was so swollen that she looked downright fat, shirt pulled up to expose the taught skin of her overstuffed tummy.
15411111.title: Surfeit of sugar

154111111.content:
Becky awoke a few hours later to the smell of cooking food. She rolled off the couch, belly now rumbling hungrily - it seemed all the food she'd eaten that day had finally been digested, leaving room for more. Before she even had time to realise how hungry she felt, the aroma of frying sausages send her hurrying towards the kitchen to see what was for dinner.

Jo turned to smile at her as she stumbled blearily into the kitchen, rubbing sleep out of her eyes.
"Oh, good, I was just about to wake you. Dinner's ready. Go sit at the table, I'll serve."

Becky went and hopped onto a chair, and before she knew it there before her was a great plate of buttery mashed potatoes, sausages and baked beans - and even another glass of Lotus. Without a moment's hesitation Becky tucked in, swallowing down great bites of the meal so quickly she could barely even taste them. She felt incredibly hungry - much more so than usual - and before long the entire plate was clear, the adult-size portion of food vanished into the starving five year old.

Jo was impressed - her daughter always had a big appetite, but today was exceptional even for her.
"Do you want more, darling?" she asked, still on her first portion herself.
