Becky let out a little burp - her belly felt full, but somehow she was still hungry. She quickly slurped down the last of her Lotus, then smiled messily at her mom, chin stained with baked beans.
"Yeah!" she exclaimed.

"Yeah please." Jo corrected halfheartedly as she spooned more potato onto her daughter's plate, "Remember your manners, dear."

Becky was too busy with her second portion to listen to her mother's rebuke though, mouth and mind already full of delicious food.
Her hunger seemed insatiable - and as happened earlier, the only thing that eventually managed to stop her was the increasing discomfort from her mistreated stomach. Even as she swallowed down the last of her second portion, belly aching fiercely, she still somehow felt as hungry as when she had first begun.

She whined in piteously frustration; she was desperate to eat some more to sate the rumbling hunger deep in her gut, but at the same time that very same gut was desperately pleading with her to not be fed any more, the poor organ stretched to its very limits. Irritated, she threw down her fork and leaned back in her chair, massaging her belly to relieve some of the pressure.

"Are you alright, darling? You sure ate a lot there," Jo asked, looking concerned, "How about you get an early night and sleep it off?"
Becky nodded, eyes watering. An early night sure sounded appealing just about then. Without a word, she let her mom help her from her chair and up the stairs to bed, falling into a deep sleep the very second her head touched the pillow.
154111111.title: Hunger unsatisfied

choices: Another fortnight passes, and it's almost time to go back to school
1541111111.content:
Over the next two weeks, Becky settled into some rather unhealthy habits. She quickly took to drinking two or three litres of Lotus a day - she had it alongside everything, from meals and snacks, to just drinking it down on its own whenever she could. Her mom didn't care - it was just fruit juice, right? What could possibly be harmful in juice of all things?
Her appetite also suddenly increased. If she'd been a big eater before, now she was a massive one, swallowing down as much as her beleaguered stomach could bear at every meal. Ever since that day they'd gone to watch Josh's baseball game, it seemed that her appetite was quite literally insatiable, much to her frustration.

Her perpetually full stomach contributed to another unhealthy habit - inactivity. Her belly was typically so full at any one time that even the slightest nudge would make it ache for minutes, so the running-about and general games of a typical child her age quickly ground to a halt as she attempted to avoid jostling her poor tummy at any cost. She spent most of her time now splayed out across the couch or asleep in her bed, whittling away at her holiday one wasted day after another.

The effects of these bad habits soon manifested as changes in the young girl's body. Though subtle, for now, an attentive observer would notice a softening of her features, a plump roundness to her form that hadn't quite been there before. Her belly became softer and rounder, a thickening layer of flab obvious even when she was (as was such a regular occurrence now) stuffed fit to burst. Her upper arms and thighs lost what little muscle they had, and even her little butt became chunkier.

Not a single member of Becky's family noticed these changes, though. They were busy with other things, and as the youngest member of the household became more and more of a couch potato, appearing outside of mealtimes only to grab more Lotus or a snack (usually both at once), none of them noticed a thing.
1541111111.title: Bulging Becky

choices: Becky finds clothes that fit and they go clothes shopping
15411111111.content:
Another two weeks passed and Becky's actions did't changed. However her weight and body did change. She was no longer a chubby child but downright fat. She also became pretty lazy but no one noticed this. Not even Becky. She just liked eating and drinking while watching T.V like other kids liked swimming and going to the playground.
Becky's mother still did't thought anything was wrong with fruit juice. But there was something with the name Lotus. She was sure she heard it before somewhere. But she could't remember where that was. It kept nagging her when she went to bed and while she was doing normal house hold things. She just knew there was something with the name Lotus. But even while she could't remember where she heard the name before. She kept buying it. With how much Becky drank of that stuff it was important that she bought a lot of it. She rather had Becky drinking fruit juice then soft drinks.
But it was almost time to go back to school.

Becky was watching T.V in her pajamas. Since they were elastic they still fit her growing body. That and Becky was most of the days to lazy to get dressed. But this day her mother walked over to her.

"Becky it's almost time to go back to school." She said.

Becky moaned. She did't liked school. She rather stayed home. But if she should believe Josh it would only get worse. Especially in first grade. Well at least she had still one easy year.

"Becky I know you don't like school... and to be honest, I hated school too when I was young. However... you need to go. You can't stay home unless your sick."

"How about school sick?" Becky asked.

"A few days a year. Not more. But can you try on your uniform? See if it still fits. You're a growing girl after all."

"Fine." Becky moaned and rolled of the couch like a beached whale, and slowly waddled upstairs.

Her mother sighed and cleaned up some of the packages of stuff Becky used for breakfast and walked too Becky's room and was a bit surprised How Becky was squeezed in her mini school uniform. She had't been able to pull her pants up all the way. Her shirt was only able to cover about half of her torso. Her belly was bare for all to see. However her mother was still blind to her daughters gaining weight and size.

"I guess it shrunk in the wash. I have to buy a new one. Perhaps a few sizes bigger since you probably have grown of course."

Becky surely had grown. But not in height.

"You know what you need to get some new clothes anyway. Get dressed and then we go clothes shopping and take your size. Then I can ask school for a uniform the right size. Now go get dressed."

That was easier said then done. Becky's waistline grew, but her clothes did't. Becky Tried clothes but most pants had trouble going up. Even if the did she was't able to button them. It was just as difficult if finding a shirt that covered her bellybutton.
In the meantime her mother looked at some titles of the books in Becky's bookcase.
15411111111.title: Try your uniform

154111111112.content:
Finding anything that would fit Becky's new body was quite a challenge, as garment after garment fell short of covering her thickened body. Soon she was feeling quite upset, as old favourites and even recent purchases all failed in the face of her chubby form. Eventually though, she did find an outfit that was just about sufficient - one of Josh's old shirts with a baseball team logo on the front and some shorts with an elasticated waist.

Neither fit her particularly well. The shirt was stretched tight over her belly but hung loose elsewhere, and the shorts were so tight that her plump thighs looked like badly stuffed sausages - but at least she was covered.
Becky looked down at herself, feeling miserable.
"Mommy, why do none of my clothes fit?" she asked, tugging at the shorts disconsolately, "All my favourite dresses are too small."

Becky's mom gave her daughter a reassuring hug.
"Don't worry about it, you're a growing girl!" she reassured her, "And we're about to go out and buy you a load more favourite dresses right now!"
Becky pouted, but didn't say anything as her mom lead her out of her room and outside to the car. She let her mom buckle her in to her car seat, then they set off to the clothes store.

As they drove, Becky sipped on a carton of Lotus. She'd eaten a big meal barely an hour ago but she was still painfully hungry, even as her stomach grumbled and complained about how much food had been stuffed into it. Groaning irritably, she massaged her bloated belly with one hand and drank from the carton with the other. Just as she was finishing her drink, they arrived at the mall and Becky's mom helped her out of the car.

Becky followed a couple of steps behind her mom as they entered the shop, grunting slightly as every step jostled her aching stomach. Even this very short walk was now tiring for her - her thigh muscles were burning and she was out of breath, face flushed as they made their way through the aisles towards the kids section. The moment they got there Becky sat down heavily on the floor, breathing ragged and wheezy. She was sweating profusely, dark stains appearing on the shirt under her arms. Her mom looked at her with worry - this didn't seem right even to her - but before she could think too hard about it a young shop assistant appeared beside her.

"Can I help you, ma'am?" the girl asked, smiling brightly at her. Becky's mom nodded hurriedly.
"Um, yeah, I'm looking to buy some new clothes for my daughter. She's growing so fast at the moment, you know, and she's about to go back to school."
The shop assistant nodded amicably, before glancing over at Becky. She looked the overweight five year old up and down, then turned back to Becky's mom.
"I'm afraid I don't think our standard range is going to accommodate a child of your daughter's... proportions. Our husky range, however, is right over here..." she led mother and daughter through to the next aisle over, where the plus-sized clothes hung from the shelves.
Becky's mom looked around for a moment, bemused, then she laughed loudly.
"Oh, Becky's not husky, this stuff will be far too big for her," she said, thoroughly ignorant of her daughter's exponentially increasing size.

"Well, the customer is always right..." the shop assistant said, rolling her eyes, "What size is she, then?"
"Well, she was normal size for her age last time we were here, so I suppose she probably still is," Becky's mom said, "If you could measure her to check exactly though, that'd be great."
154111111112.title: Husky.

choices: Becky orders a lot of food
1541111111121.content:
The shop assistant took a measuring take and took Becky's size. Jo looked at them and and wrote them down so she could get a good uniform for Becky. The shop assistant looked at the numbers and then again at Becky.

"Well according to her measurements... she... still needs clothes in... the husky range." She said softly.

Jo gave her an angry look but decided to look in the husky range anyway. Becky after all was a growing girl. Becky was growing. Not in the right size but she surely was growing. Even while Becky's sizes were a lot bigger then they used to be still her mother did't realized her daughter's size. She looked through the clothes. She knew exactly what Becky liked. clothes with pictures of Fairy tales and cartoons she watched.

"I still don't understand why Becky's sizes are in the husky range. Do all kids here suffer from anorexia or something?"

Becky sat down. There was a T.V showing a movie for kids. So the little kids had something to do while their mother picked clothes for them.
Becky normally did't do any kind of exercise. But in the past month she gained more weight and became very lazy that made her weak muscles even weaker. She rubbed her belly. She hoped mom would take her to the food court after wards. She felt hungry even while she ate a short while ago. She also just wanted to eat. She liked eating just as much if some other kids liked their teddy bear.

"Becky I found some nice clothes for you. A few dresses and some nice shirts and pants. Lets try them on."

Becky sighed and stood up and walked with her mother to a dressing room. Jo helped Becky try on the new clothes. To her surprise they fitted perfectly. However she was still in denial about Becky's growing weight.

"Mommy. After we're done... can we get some food at the food court?"

"Come on Becky. You can't be hungry already. You just ate an hour ago." Jo said.

"But... but... the food here taste so good." Becky said using her puppy dog eyes.

The puppy dog eyes were Becky's biggest weapon. She could look so sad you hart would break. Becky normally used it to get what she wanted and to get out of trouble.

"Well... I guess since you have't been complaining, you deserve a treat. So fine."

Becky felt a lot happier. But she suddenly got a frown on her face.

"Mommy my pants are kind of tight." She mumbled.

Jo lifted her shirt and saw the pants were cutting a bit in Becky's soft belly.

"Hm maybe I should buy those one or two sizes bigger. so then you have some room to grow. Wait here. I'll be right back." Jo said and walked out with the pants and returned with some bigger ones.

"Ah those fit way better." Becky said after she tried the new pants. "More room for my belly."

Jo paid for the clothes and walked to the food court. She looked over her shoulder to look for Becky. Becky was waddling. Her weak muscles and laziness from the past time made her slow and she got easily tired from even the distance from the clothing store to the food court what really was't such a long distance.
1541111111121.title: Husky clothes

choices: Becky spots one of her school friends eating nearby
Becky wants a shake for dessert
15411111111211.content:
By the time they reached the food court, Becky was wheezing and red-faced once again. Her new clothes were much more comfortable to walk in, sure - the pants didn't dig in under her belly any more at least - but her useless muscles and newly flabby body hadn't changed. She collapsed into a chair the moment she could, sweating dripping off her nose onto the tiled floor.

Jo watched her, looking faintly worried again.
"Are you alright, sweety?" she asked, hovering anxiously beside her struggling little girl. After a few seconds though, Becky was feeling well enough to sit up and decide what she wanted to order, and Jo's worries were sated.
"Can I have a, um, a Big Mac, and fries, and a big bottle of Lotus please mommy," she managed to say, and Jo nodded.

"Of course, Becky darling," she said, hurrying away to order the meal. It didn't sound like an awful lot, but it was more than a girl Becky's age should be expected to eat in a day, never mind a single sitting - not that Jo knew that of course. She approached the McDonald's and ordered at the counter.

"That's one Big Mac, a large fries and a bottle of Lotus for my daughter, and just a salad for me, please."
The cashier nodded and began ringing up the order.
"Lotus, huh?" he said as he worked, "Weird stuff that. I don't trust it. Like, what kind of proper drink is that colour?"
Jo shrugged, surprised.
"Well, it's better than soda, I guess," she said, "My daughter drinks loads of it, she loves it."
"That does seem to be the way," the cashier said, "Once you start drinking it, you don't seem to stop. And that'll be nine dollars, please."
Jo pulled out her purse and handed over a note.
"I guess. Still, it can't be too bad; it's fruit flavour, I think."
"Well, I don't know," the cashier said, passing her meal over the counter to her, "It just seems to do weird things to your appetite. Have a nice day!"

Jo smiled once more at the friendly cashier, then took the food and returned to the table. Becky reached out to snatch at it the moment it came within reach.
"Gimme!" The omnipresent hunger that had plagued Becky recently seemed worse than ever today, her belly growling audibly as she ripped open the bag and began gorging on its fatty contents. Grease dripped down her face, already staining the top that she'd only bought a few minutes ago. Once the burger was gone she moved on to the Lotus, gulping down the entire bottle in one long chug. Finally she grabbed handfuls of fries and pushed them forcibly into her mouth, barely able to swallow fast enough. In no time at all the entire meal was gone - and Jo had barely even started her salad.

Jo wondered if maybe the cashier was right. Becky's appetite had seemed a little odd recently, she supposed... no, no, it was probably nothing. Promptly forgetting about it, she returned to her own meal.
15411111111211.title: Food-Court Feast

154111111112112.content:
Becky still was't full. She did't got her growing waistline from eating big meals. It came more from the fact that she was eating all the time. The past time you rarely saw Becky without something in her mouth. Becky looked as sweet if she could at her mother.

"Mommy. Could I have a shake? For dessert?"

"Are't you full sweet hart?" Jo asked, but already pulled her wallet.

"I still have enough room for a shake." Becky said trying to sound as sweet if she could. A way she used often to get what she wanted. It mostly worked, and it did now.

Jo got up to get a shake for Becky. Becky in the meantime stretched herself once and her belly poked out between her shirt and pants. Becky blushed ca bit and pulled her shirt down. However Becky suddenly realized that she perhaps gained more then she or her family realized. She enjoyed just lying on the couch watching T.V, eating food and drinking lotus. She always used to be a bit fat. Her sister often teased her with it. But now she looked at herself she realized she was a lot bigger them she was before. However she forget this all when her mother gave her a shake.
Jo finished her salad while Becky was still busy drinking her shake.

"Let's go Becky. You can drink that shake on the way."

Jo took Becky by her wrist of one hand while Becky hold the shake in her other hand. Becky had trouble to keep up with her mother. She felt all the food slosh around inside her. Her thighs were rubbing her belly jiggling and her butt wobbling.

"Mommy! (pant) Can you (pant, pant) slow down (pant) a bit? (pant pant) I have (pant) short legs. (pant, pant)."

Jo did slow down but looked a bit worried at Becky. The just walked a short distance and Becky already seemed tired. Beck never had been an active kid. She never showed any interest in sport. But still could she be already tired from such a short walk. However she started to walk slower so Becky could keep up. But when they finally reached the car Becky seemed exhausted. panting heavy. But still Jo did't realized that it was because of her daughters huge weight, just like she still did't realized how fat Becky really was. In her eyes Becky was just like any other 5 year old.
When they came home Becky took a tall glass of lotus and some cookies and went sitting on the couch again watching T.V.
Jo called school to ask for a new uniform for Becky using the measurement she got in the store still not seeing how fat her daughter was.
154111111112112.title: Tired Becky

1541111111121121.content:
Eventually though, it was finally time for Becky to go to school. Her uniform had indeed arrived on time, but thanks to the unreliable measurements from her mother, it was rather snug.
The skirt was rather strained around her waist, with her thunder thighs visible underneath. The shirt was tight, and large gaps between the buttons showed her soft belly.

However, once she had finally arrived at school, it seemed she wasn't the only one on a Lotus kick. All around her, many boys and girls, including those her age, were holding cans and bottles of Lotus in their hands as they wandered around or talked to each other. Becky grinned, happy to see she wasn't the only one getting in on it.

What she hadn't noticed, however, was that these kids were also quite rounded, either just tubby or rather large like herself. Uniforms were tight, cheeks were chubby, bellies and butts were bulbous. They were also keeping their moving around to a minimum.

The Lotus trend was catching on rather quickly, as were the calories.
1541111111121121.title: A 'Growing' Trend

15411111111211211.content:
"Hey Becky! Over here!" A voice said.

Becky looked up and saw two of her friends. Fast she waddled over too them. Both really gained. Becky hugged her friend Gwenda. She was wide with brown hair in a ponytail. Gwenda always had been a chubby girl but now she was fat. But Becky still was fatter. Both liked it sinking a bit in the fat of the other.

"It's so good to see you again. But I rarely saw you in the vacation. We had sleepovers and went swimming."

"Well... I was busy." Becky said, not telling that being busy was lying on the couch snacking, drinking lotus and watching T.V.

"But now it's time for school again! hi hi hi" Oona said.

Oona was a typical happy girl. Always giggling. With pink hair and mostly a bright smile showing her perfect white teeth. Wat before the vacation had been a nice jelly belly was now a round potbelly with a lot of extra fat on her body, especially her butt and thighs had grown a lot giving her a pear shape.
There was a third girl with them. She had very long black hair, was kind of short and was very fat but still Becky was fatter. She looked at her feet

"Who are you?" Becky asked

"Did you forget who I am?" The girl asked, raising her head.

"Pandora? Is that you? Wow I did't recognize you." Becky said.

That was because Pandora was a thin girl before vacation. She was also the smallest girl in class. She tried to make that up by having the longest hair that had grown past her knees.

"Yeah. we all gained. Just like you." Pandora said

"What? I did't gained. Perhaps a few pounds but not too much." Becky said.

"Hi hi hi, You did gain Becky. And more the just a few pounds. You gained a lot of pounds. But that's not bad. Almost every kid in school gained. A few exceptions but most kids did. Besides I think it looks good at you."

Becky suddenly started to think. All the clothes that were too small. All the snacking and drinking while lying lazy on the couch. Not burning a single calorie while she was constant getting more calories inside her. How harder it was to move and walk and how snug her uniform was. Slowly she noticed she was fat. Very fat. Her friends were fat and she was the fattest. However she did't saw this like a bad thing. She noticed how big her belly had become butt she liked how round and fat her belly had become. She liked her love handles. She realized she was fat and loved it.

"Oh look there's our teacher." Pandora said.

Becky and her friends waddled over too school
15411111111211211.title: Gwenda, Oona and Pandora

choices: Class starts - but most of the children are too hungry to work!
The school day goes on as normal.
154111111112112111.content:
Becky's class teacher, Mrs Hassan, felt distinctly disturbed as she looked around the classroom at her returning students. They all looked so- so different! And not in the normal growing up, aging kind of way either. It seemed that over the summer break, at least half of the students had become significantly heavier. There were a fair few that seemed unaffected, certainly, but of those who had changed the difference was stunning - several had gone from skinny to chunky, or from chunky to straight up fat, in only a couple of months!

Mrs Hassan was used to children coming back from break chubbier - it was just a fact of life. What she wasn't used to though was it being this widespread, this drastic, and this unexpected; and from the look of the playground it wasn't an issue confined just to her classroom. Swallowing dryly, she began roll call.

As she worked her way down the list of names, she noticed something; almost every kid who had gained over the summer was drinking the same liquid. Whether it was from a little carton, can or bottle, all were guzzling the same thing. Squinting at the label, she could just make out the name... Lotus.


While Mrs Hassan was trying to work out what on earth had happened to America's youth over the summer break, Becky, Pandora, Oona and Gwenda were getting reacquainted. The four were at a table by themselves, sipping Lotus and chatting about what they'd been up to. It seemed that all of them had spent rather a lot of time lying around and snacking over the break, but Oona had been on a vacation out of state on top of that, and was very eager to tell them about it.

As Oona talked, Becky shuffled in her chair. The classroom felt a lot smaller and more claustrophobic than she remembered from last year - her chair was set a bit to close to the table, but she couldn't move it back even a little because there wasn't enough room behind her. As a result, her belly was pressed right up against the table, and due to it being as thoroughly stuffed as ever it was getting quite uncomfortable. She took a sip of Lotus to make herself feel better, already wondering how long it was until they were allowed to go and eat their snacks.
154111111112112111.title: The American Youth

choices: Fast forward to the check up
1541111111121121112.content:
"Nice to see you all again." Mrs Hassan started. "We're gonna have a fun year together. I understand that you don't like it that the summer vacation is over, but I'm sure we will have a lot of fun at school. I have some great ideas for this year."

All kids seemed to feel fine. It seemed like Mrs Hassan was a kind and friendly teacher who cared about her kids. That was exact what Mrs. Hassan wanted. Make sure the kids trust you and feel fine. Then it will be easier.
But still she was worried a bit about their sudden weight gain. She could't just tell people their kid was fat. Even if they were. But then she knew somebody that could.

"You can all do something for yourself or look around if you like and explore the new class room. I need to do something."

She did't like it to leave the kids alone. Especially not now the first school day just started, but she had to do something. She went directly to the school nurse and knocked.

"Come in." The school nurse (Mrs. McCoy) said, and Mrs. Hassan entered.

"Oh Mrs. Hassan. Already here on your first day. School hardly started. Not such a good start. Too bad. Is it a student or is something wrong with you?"

"Well... there's nothing wrong at the moment. It's just that... well... I noticed that most kids... seem well... to have gained a lot. Not just a bit. A lot of kids gain some pounds during the vacation. But they have gained more then a few pounds."

"So it's not just me." Mrs. McCoy said. "I also noticed a lot of kids seemed to have gained a lot of weight. I thought I was maybe seeing things. But It seemed I was't. So the kids are gaining. But why did you came to me?"

"Well I can't tell parents that their kids are fat. But you can. If kids are overweight you can send a letter to his or her parents right?"

"Well... I can do that. I can also give them perhaps a full check up. Height, sight, reflex and weight too. If I would only check the weight it would seem a bit weird. Well I will ask the principal if I can give all kids a check up. You can better go back to your class. It's not smart to leave those kids alone for too long."


Becky an all others were looking around in the class. They were new toys and games they could play with. Mrs. Hassan seemed like a nice teacher. It seemed like this would become a great year.
Becky went to a spot in the reading corner and looked again a her belly. It was big. She always used to be a bit fat but this was way more then a bit. How was it possible she did't noticed. Not even her family noticed. No one. She touched her belly and smiled. She liked it. It was soft and squishy. Like a nice pillow. She liked it. She liked it a lot. She liked being fat and now... she wanted to get fatter.
1541111111121121112.title: Time for a check up

choices: Try on clothes then eat with the team later.
15412.content:
“I just saw Josh’s game last week, Mommy.”

“Alright,” Jo said, turning in the direction of home. “Be sure to try on some of your other clothes to see what you are growing out of.”

Jo kissed her daughter goodbye. Becky walked into the living room to look for a book to read. However, a smell called to her from the kitchen.
Jo had offered to feed Josh’s baseball team after the game. The team, all ten to twelve age boys, would be rather hungry after a hard game. Jo had the dinner table set up with seven different pizzas, a long party sub, and big bowls of chips, along with a few two-liter bottles of soda.

Although she had just had buffet and ice cream, the smell of the pizza seemed to loosen Becky’s stomach, as if she could still eat more. However, when she walked to the table her shorts slipped down. She was still wearing her too small shorts.

Her mom had asked her to try on her other clothes to see if they’d fit, and Becky usually managed to eat dinner with Josh’s team after a game. She pushed her glasses up her nose, which was a sign she was having trouble making a decision.
15412.title: Decisions, decisions...

154121.content:
Becky could wait until the baseball team was back before she ate. It was usually pretty fun hanging out with Josh’s team. She went upstairs to sort through clothes.

Several pairs of her shorts were getting tight. All of these either had buttons or zippers on them. Her elastic shorts and pants still fit fine. She changed into one pair.

Her t-shirts were still okay, but her button-up shirts were taunt. She changed into a green shirt.

Becky sat reading until she heard the door open and the noise of Josh’s baseball team mingling downstairs. It would be time to eat. Becky licked her lips and envisioned the food she saw on the table.

“Becky, you want to come down and eat?” her mother called.

Becky grabbed a plate and sat between Josh and a beefy kid named Kyle. She took a section of the party sub and some chips, and listened to the baseball team as they ate and talked.

“I bet you I could eat eight slices of pizza,” a boy said.

“That’s nothing, I could eat ten,” said Bobby, another player.

“I could eat way more than that,” said Kyle. His less active position as catcher made him a bit thicker than the other team members.

“Are those fightin’ words, Kyle? I’ll challenge you.”

“You couldn’t even beat me on a good day. I once ate fourteen slices in a sittin’.”
Becky spoke up. “I could eat more than that.”

Kyle looked down at her. “You’re just a girl. Besides, you’re five years old and you just ate some of that sub. There’s no way you could bet me.”

“Wanna bet?” she said, trying to do an intimidating stare at Kyle.

“Alright, hold on.” The first kid shifted an uneaten pizza over to the other side of the table. “We’ll do this fair. The three of you start with a piece, and we see who can eat the most pieces in five minutes.”

“Okay.” Bobby, Kyle, and Becky agreed.

“I’ll start the timer… and go!”

The three competitors grabbed a slice and ate. They chewed them down almost simultaneously, and then reached for another. Within a minute, Bobby showed signs of slowing, and stopped after his sixth slice.

“Kyle and Becky are still going at it!” exclaimed the kid moderating. “Someone get them another pizza!”

As they started the new pizza, Kyle got slower and slower in his eating, but Becky actually sped up now that she had a rhythm going. Kyle plopped a half eaten piece of pizza out of his mouth.

“Kyle’s out at twelve! Becky’s still going!”

Becky ate rapidly, and the other kid called time.

“Is she still eating?!”

“Becky, you can stop now!”

“What, over already?” she asked, mouth full of pizza.

“24 freakin’ slices! That’s a new record!!”
154121.title: Showdown

1541211.content:
"All right kid. You beat me. Even if i don't like to admit it, i'm honest. You won. Congratulations."

"She did't only won she set a new record!"

"May i have some more slices? I'm still a little hungry."

"You can't eat anymore." Bobby said.

"I can. I also beat you."

"Well all right. If you are able to eat one and a half pizza you get a pie from us."

"What if i lose?"

"Then you may never tell anyone this happened."

"Why not?"

"He has his pride to take care off. He is one the cool boy's. When it comes out he lost an eating contest from a five year old and a girl his reputation is ruin."

"Okay!" She said. "But a big pie."

"We won't exactly take a wedding cake but it will be bigger then a normal pie."

"Close enough."

And she fast started to eat another pizza after a half she started to slow down a little but she still managed to eat the other half without a problem.

"She can't do it."

"I'f she does it she breaks a record. No one of us have ever eaten this much."

"Even if she loses she still has set her record."

"Seems like she does't wanna lose."

"She has that from me." Josh said and smiled.

Becky had eaten already one slice. Three to go and she would be champion. She grabbed the second slice and forced it down her throat.

"You can do it sis!" Josh yelled.

This gave her some support and she also stuffed the third slice in her mouth. Still one slice to go. Becky felt so stuffed but she did't want to give up. Not now she was this far. She opened her mouth and started to eat.

"No way."

"Wow Josh your sister is cool."

"She did't finished it yet."

Becky's stomach hurt since she ad already a lot of pizza in it. She felt so full but did't wanna give up. She almost needed to strangle it down finally she took the last bite, chewed and swallowed. After she showed her mouth was empty all the others started to cheer.

Becky felt so full she could't move. She just closed her eyes and fell asleep.

"I take her to bed." Josh said.

He tried to lift her but Beck was starting to get very heavy.

"Eh can some of you help?"

A few started to laugh and after that helped him to carry his fat sister to her room and tugged her in while her belly was busy digesting the huge meal she had."
1541211.title: More pizza

choices: She gets some water and goes to bed.
15412111.content:
Becky found herself in bed. It was late at night. She attempted to sit up straight in bed, but her belly forced her down. Her new girth was making it harder to move. She could hear her belly gurgle. It had managed to digest her binge from the day, and she decided to get out of bed. She felt thirsty now.

Struggling and moaning, Becky got out of the bed and waddled down the hallway to the kitchen downstairs. When she got there, she found the remnants of the meal from earlier. Her stomach grumbled loudly.

Becky pondered. Sure, it was all just scraps, but it all looked really good.
15412111.title: The Aftermath

Next morning her mother asks her about the weenies and chicken.
154121111.content:
Becky put one step to the table. It all looked so good and her rumbling stomach did't help.

"Well i think mom will throw this away anyway tomorrow so i might as well eat it."

She put all what was left in front of her and started to eat. Well it was more devourer. She pushed all what was left with her hands in her mouth. Opened so wide she could and pushed all the food in with both hands. She was eating so fast she almost had't time to chew. It took her three minutes to eat everything. There was't a crumb left. She even licked the boxes clean.

"That was good."

Becky rubbed her round tummy that felt a little big. She still felt hungry and waddled over to the refrigerator and opened it and looked inside. She saw a half can with weenies and some chicken legs and wings. She took the weenies, legs and wings to the table and also too a bottle of ketchup and some mayonnaise.
She almost drowned the weenies in ketchup and mayonnaise and pushed them in her mouth pouring some more ketchup and mayonnaise right in her mouth.
After the weenies she start eating the chicken legs and wings. There were four legs and four wings. She start ripping the meat of them until the bones were totally clean.
After that she laid back. Her belly felt full and a little bloated. Her clothes also felt very tight. She still wore her clothes from that day since Josh and his friends put her in bed without changing her clothes.
Becky stretched and with a: "PENG!" noise he button of her pants popped of.

"Well it were some old pants any way."

She put the ketchup and mayonnaise back in the refrigerator and dropped the bones from the chicken in the garbage bin.
After that she heaved her heavy body upstairs and waddled back to her room. Just when her head hit the pillow she was out like a light.

choices: Becky's mother gets angry at Becky
Becky's mothers don't gets angry at Becky
1541211111.content:
Becky slowly opened her eyes. She looked at the clock. The numbers were kind of blurry. She reached for her glasses and put them on.

"8:30. Already that late? Oh well. It's Saturday so i'm free."

The weight of her belly Still made it hard for her to get up so she rolled out of bed and went downstairs still in yesterday's clothes with the button less pants.
There was no one downstairs. Her parents were probably still asleep and her brother was probably at a friends place or maybe doing some exercises, Becky did't understand that it was fun to do some exercise in the morning.

Becky's stomach started to rumble. She patted it and walked to the refrigerator. She opened it but did't see anything good. Then she remembered She eat all that stuff last night. She then opened the freezer and found a big bucket of vanilla ice cream. She took the bucket and walked to the T.V. She placed herself in front of the T.V and started to watch: Dora the explorer.
She opened the bucket of ice cream and started to push the ice cream in her mouth with her hands while watching T.V. When the bucket was empty her hands were all cold and sticky and her clothes ass well as her face was covered with ice cream and was also cold and stick. Becky still watched T.V. Becky still was kind of hungry. She waddled back to the kitchen and found a box of cookies and waddled back to the T.V and kept watching T.V for the next hour.

Finally her mother came down and saw her daughter on the couch all sticky and messy with spots of ice cream (that melted in the meantime) and cookie crumbs smeared over her face and clothes and an empty bucket and an empty box of cookies.

"Morning mommy."
1541211111.title: Ice cream breakfast

Becky starts to daydream as she rubs her belly
15412111112.content:
"Morning mommy," Becky said.

Jo yawned and smiled at her burgeoning daughter. "Good morning Becky," she said. She noticed how her daughter had ice cream stains and cookie crumbs all over her, especially around her mouth. She looked in front of Becky and saw the empty bucket of ice cream.

"Hmm, looks like we need more ice cream, huh Becky?" Jo said absent-mindedly.

"Yeah, mommy you should get TWO buckets when you go to the store. Oh and more cookies," Becky replied.

"Yeah that's a good idea," Jo said before yawning again. She left toward the kitchen to make some breakfast.

Becky burped and rubbed her belly. Her shirt was riding up slightly more than it had been earlier this morning. She licked her sticky, sugary lips. Her hunger was coming back.
15412111112.title: Mom doesn't care

"Mommy can i have some breakfast? Please?"

"You're still hungry?"

"Well i guess i can make some pancakes for you."

Becky smiled and rubbed her round belly. She thought it looked kind of pretty and waddled to the kitchen.
Her mom smiled friendly at her while she was busy making some pancakes.

"Becky while i bake those pancakes you better can go upstairs and put on some new clothes. You already wore those yesterday."

"Okay mommy." Becky said while she slowly waddled upstairs.

On her room Becky undressed herself and threw her clothes in a corner of the room. After that Becky opened her closet looking for which clothes maybe still would fit. On her plate was a pile of pancakes. Becky grabbed some icing sugar and some syrup and almost totally covered every pancake completely with it before she wrapped them up and started to eat them.

Becky leaned a little more forward so when some syrup would be dripping it would fall on her plate.

I know Becky likes food but i'm worried she maybe likes it a little too much. But she is only a toddler. There is a good chance she will grow into it. Maybe i'm worrying a little too much."

Becky waddled back too the T.V too watch some more cartoons. Becky was always kind of lazy in the morning weekends.
She was watching spongebob while her belly was digesting her breakfast and started to think what to do the rest of the day.
154121111121.title: Pancake breakfast

choices: Becky,  Josh and Jo go home
1541211111212.content:
After Spongebob was over Becky got off the couch and walked to her mother.

"Mommy can we visit grandma and grandpa?" Becky asked with her sweetest voice.

Jo looked at Becky. Visiting her parents was't such a bad idea. But her parents always stuffed Becky with food. They really loved their only granddaughter. Becky did't had any nieces in her mothers side of the family so it was no wonder her parents loved her and want to make her happy by giving her food. But it was always nice to see her parents again. The loved it when they came to visit. Her grandpa always liked it to play a little baseball with his grandson and son in law. Her father was very sportive for someone his age and he sometimes learned Josh new moves.

"Sure why not. It would be nice to see my parents again. Oh and Becky... don't eat yourself sick when we're there."

"Should i call dad and Josh?"

"Dad is out for some things. Josh is training at the sport field with some friends. We can take him with us. But i first call grandma and grandpa. See if we can come."

"If we can't it would be the first time." Becky said.

Ten minutes later they drove too grandma and grandpa after picking Josh up from the sport field. He also always liked it to go to his grandparents.
Becky's grand parents were sitting in the garden. They had a big garden so it was fun to play in.

"Hello Jo, Becky. Josh won your last game?"

"Of course grandpa. But next time we have a game against the wild bears. That won't be easy."

Grandma hugged Becky

"Wow Becky you sure have grown since last time. It looks like you also have an healthy appetite." Her grandmother said while she rubbed Becky's belly.

"Yeah Becky loves to eat. She is a big eater. I wonder from who she has that?"

"Well she doesn't have it from you Jo. You were always a small eater. Talking about food. I have some pie left."

"Yeah i like pie!" Becky said happy.

Josh an his grandfather walked back to the others.

"Well i think it's good to eat some pie. After that i will teach you how to throw a splitter. You need to have enough strength when you throw it or else it's a ball."

Becky did't understand everything her grandfather and Josh said. She had seen many of Josh his games but still did't understand all the rules of baseball or baseball language.

Her grandmother returned with a big pie and some whipped cream.

"Do you want a big piece or a little piece Becky?"

"A really big piece!" Becky said.

Her grandma cut a piece twice as big as a normal one and covered it with whipped cream. Becky happy started to eat her piece of pie.
1541211111212.title: Grandma and grandpa

choices: Grandma invites them all to stay for dinner.

15412111112121.content:
Becky took heaping forkfulls of pie and thick whipped cream and pushed them into her mouth. "It's soo gwdd!!" she tried to say with her mouth full. Her grandmother laughed and looked lovingly on her as she ate. When she finally finished her huge piece of pie, she burped and smiled. "You are a good cook grandma."

Becky's grandmother looked back at the others. Grandpa was busy teaching Josh to pitch, and Becky's mother Jo was acting as pitcher. They weren't paying any attention to Becky. Her grandmother leaned in close, "You finished that off so quickly, I think we can sneak you another one and no one will notice! Would you like that Becky?"

Becky nodded and smiled, bits of crumbs and whipped cream stuck to her face. As she rubbed her tummy softly, she whispered back, "I want another big one...!"

"Anything to make my favorite granddaughter happy!" her grandmother said as she fetched another piece and brought it back. "Here, let me put some whipped cream on that." Her grandmother took the can of whipped cream and began to spray it onto the giant pie piece. The amount of whipped cream grew and grew into a white fluffy mountain atop the dessert, half falling off due to its size. Becky grabbed the fork and leaned in close to the plate so she could shovel it in as fast as possible. "Good girl!" her grandma said.

Becky tackled the heavy whipped cream first and started eating the pie. "Oops, you ran out of whipped cream Becky!" Grandma said. Becky was too busy eating to hear her. "Here sweetheart, let me put some more on." Grandma began to spray more and more whipped cream as Becky ate. Becky was so close to the plate that it was like Becky was just shoveling in all the whipped cream grandma was spraying out. Her grandma slowly moved next to her and moved the nozzle closer to Becky's lips. Eventually, Becky's grandma was spraying whipped cream directly into Becky's mouth. Becky hardly noticed this transition, and just closed her eyes and moaned as the sticky, sugary cream filled her up.

She liked the feeling of grandma's hand on her belly as she allowed herself to be fed more and more fattening cream. The canister ran out and sputtered, and Becky slowly came to her senses. "Oh, there's still more pie!" she said happily.

Her grandma laughed, "You better hurry and eat it all up!" she said. Becky finished the second gargantuan slice right as the others came back and joined them.
15412111112121.title: Grandma gives Becky more and more dessert

"Josh is a natural talent. He learned how to throw a splitter. I took me a week to learn it."

"That's just because your such a great teacher grandpa."

Becky and her grandma shared a look with the word: splitter since they did't had any idea what it mend.

The kids room was the name for the room they had for their grandchildren to stay when they went to them for a sleepover.

After Jo drove away Josh and his grandfather tried to perfection his splitter while Becky and her grandmother choose dinner and most important dessert and in the meantime Becky ate the remaining pie while her grandmother rubbed her belly with her hand.

Grandma turned her head.

"Josh!"

"Eh that window was my mistake." Grandpa said.

Becky and her grandmother who were busy cooking both shook their head and mumbled: "boys!"

Becky noticed how much her grandmother and she looked alike. The hair of her grandmother was turning grey but when she was young her hair was just as red as Becky and she was also a big eater and was still a little plump. Her dad sometimes said that grandmothers genes missed one generation and went directly too Becky. Becky said that she liked it to look like her grandmother.

Later they all went sitting for dinner with lots of fries, salad with some feta cheese and burgers.

"I bet Becky picked out the dinner." Josh said.

"Why? Something wrong with it?" Becky asked who piled her plate with two burgers and a huge pile of fries and almost drowned them in mayonnaise.

"No! It's just that lately you developed a taste for fatty food."

Becky turned her head and concentrated on her food.

"Josh don't tease your sister. Becky is just a growing girl. She needs good food." Her grandma said.

"Yeah Josh. There is nothing wrong with like good food at Becky's age."

"I'm not saying it is bad but i'm just saying she developed a taste for it."

"What's for dessert?" Grandpa asked loud so they would forget this talk.

"For dessert some chocolate pie." said grandma. "Becky helped."

Josh rolled with his eyes knowing that Becky loved anything that was baked but nobody noticed.

After dessert Becky's grandmother gave her some cake.
And after dinner Grandma took Becky upstairs to wash her and take her too bed.
Becky always liked it to go in bath.
Grandma looked for some shampoo while Becky was laying in the bad tub. Her belly was sticking out of the water like an island.

"Oh is't that belly cute?"

Her grandma pushed it underwater and it immediately jumped out of the water like a whale gasping for air.
Becky and her grandma both giggled.

Grandma tucked Becky in and read the story of Hansel and Gretel. Well reading was't the right word. Mostly grandma started the story normal but halfway she changed the story a little and made it her own one. Like now where instead of Hansel Gretel ended up in a cage and was fattened up. Of course the story ended with the witch in the oven and Hansel and a lot fatter Gretel returned home and lived happily ever after.
After the story was finished Becky fell in deep sleep that she not even heard Josh when he also went to bed.
154121111121211.title: Fatty dinner

choices: becky falls asleep in the chair and her grandma puts her to bed
1541211111212111.content:
becky woke up in the middle of the night with a feircly growling tummy. she waddled out of her room and into the kitchen.

on her way she passed the bathroom, and she noticed her reflexion. she saw that her tummy had swollen to the size of a small tv. her thighs were thicker than a car tire. she also noticed that her arms were thick stubs of fat, and her face had become puffy and swollen.

she thought that she was quite cute this way and continued onto the kitchen.

when she got into the kitchen, her grandma was sitting at the table with a vast amount of incredibly fattening food.

"what are you doing with all that food grandma?" becky asked.

"it is for you my cute button", her grandmother replied, "you cant go hungry while you are at my house."

"i love you grandma." becky said climbing onto her grandmas lap.

"we are going to have a wonderful time while you are here." her grandma said simultaneously feeding becky two tubs of ice cream.

becky inhaled both tubs of ice cream, three double chocolate cakes, three gallons of lard, and enough chocolate icing to cover the country of russia. all throughout the feeding becky became engorged with food. her pjs ripped and she gained a 300 inch waist line.

"grandma," becky said, "i am full but i dont feel full at all. i feel hungrier than before."

"you havnt had a bite my dear," her grandmother replied, " you have gotten lighter if anything. you seem to have lost weight!"

"okay grandma, if you say so," becky said while being fed 20 more pounds of butter and lard.

by this time becky had eaten over 90 pounds in fat filled food. she thought that she was not gaining an ounce.

"i think i should send you to bed now." said her grandma

"okay" becky replied.

as becky stepped down to the floor she suddenly felt as if she could not move, though she was still very hungry.

"grandma! i cant move!" becky cried out. but her words were stifled by 30 gallons of liquid lard being forced down her throat.

"oh dear, i guess my little sweety has become quite a porker," her grandma said with a grin, "i think you should just sit back and relax in that chair in the kitchen."

becky was rolled over to an armchair that had a vast assortment of food on it. becky was delighted with all the food. she quickly ate all that she could reach. her grandma kept replacing the food.

becky had eaten, at this time, a total of 120 pounds of food, though she had not gained an ounce.

after inhaling fattening food for almost 6 hours...
1541211111212111.title: hungry Becky

choices: Becky uses pillows to pretend she's fatter
1541211111212112.content:
Becky dreamed that she was sitting on the couch between Jo, her mother, and Josh, her brother. She and Josh were dressed in strange clothing like from Hansel and Gretel. They were all watching TV. Everything looked a bit strange, especially bright and with bold colors.

Suddenly, the news came on. Her grandma was the news anchor! "This just in," her grandma said. "Every time sweet little girls think about getting bigger, they grow! This strange phenomenon is because of global warming. We now return you to your regularly scheduled program."

"What did they say, Hansel?" Jo said absent-mindedly.

"I dunno," Josh said.

Becky was surprised. Would it really work? Would she get bigger just by thinking about it?

She closed her eyes, concentrating, and thought to herself, "Bigger..."

She felt herself swell up a bit. She rose an inch off of the couch because of her bigger behind. Her tummy became fuller and rounder. She felt softer and more cushiony all over.

This made her feel really, really good. She was feeling very excited. Again, she thought the words.."Bigger..."

She swelled up even more. Her body was widening. Her arms were getting pudgier. Her legs were getting fatter. Her tummy was even bigger than before.

"And bigger..."

She felt her sides bump up next to Josh... and next to her mom. "Hey, scoot over Gretel," Josh said. "Why are you so close to me." She turned her chubbier face to her mom. She didn't have any room to scoot over. She struggled and tried to shift her big bottom over, and successfully moved a few inches. Her soft fat was pressing against her mother.

Her mom didn't seem to even notice. She was lazily watching the TV.

Becky started fidgeting. If she made herself any bigger she would irritate Josh. But it felt so good every time she grew. By now she was a very fat girl... but "very fat" wasn't fat enough. And it was so easy to think about getting...

"Bigger..."

Her whole body swelled again. Her fingers were becoming more plump. Her arms became a little harder to move. Her tummy became even rounder and larger. The seems of her German dress started to split. Her hips again bumped into Josh.

"Gretel, you have gotten too fat," Josh said.

"Fatter..." Becky thought and grew even more. "Fatter and fatter..." she thought again. "Bigger, and bigger, and bigger.." she kept thinking about it and thinking about it. Her body slowly and steadily expanded. She felt herself rising as her bottom ballooned outward and upword. Her tummy started making her lean backward. Her arms fattened and plumped, becoming less and less able to bend easily. "And bigger... and fatter... and..."

"Gretel, you're out of control!" Josh said as Becky's body began to slowly encroach over him. He pushed against her expanding fat. Her mom kept staring at the TV as Becky's body expanded over her.

"And bigger... and bigger.." Becky thought. She felt herself rise and rise, and spread out further and further. She wasn't stopping. She couldn't stop. Her mom was so small. Her brother was even smaller. He heard Josh yelling at her, but the sound was muffled. It seemed to be coming from so far away.

The seams of her dress kept tearing and splitting. Buttons popped off one after the other. She looked at her hands -- they were so fat! Her tummy blocked her view of anything below her waist. She felt her face with her fingers -- her cheeks were big and soft. She grinned. She put her hands on her tummy and began to rub it. She could feel it getting bigger between her fingers, like an inflating balloon. But instead of air, she was being expanded with soft, pillowy fat.

She was lost in euphoria. She could feel Josh pushing her expanding fat away from him. But her bloated body was relentless as it grew slowly and surely. She giggled.

She could hardly move. All she could do was rub her increasingly massive tummy with her outrageously pudgy hands. She giggled again. It was funny. Josh was so mad and her mom didn't even notice. And it was so comfortable being stuck inside her soft body. This is what she wanted in life. She wanted to get huge and round and cute just like Gretel did. But she wanted to get bigger than Gretel. Much bigger. Twice as big. Ten times as big. Huge. Round. Growing.

"More... more... more..." Her fat was billowing over the back of the couch. Touching the ground in front of her. Covering most of her mom and Josh. Her dress was tearing. The couch was breaking. "More... more..."

"Get up!!" Josh yelled.

That's when Becky realized that it was a dream, and her real life brother was calling to her to wake up. Becky looked down at her body as she awoke. She felt small and tiny. Not big enough. Not hardly big enough. She didn't even notice that yesterday's binging at grandma's had made her visibly fatter.
1541211111212112.title: Becky dreams

15412111112121121.content:
"Ah Josh i just had such a nice dream."

"It's unhealthy if you sleep too much."

"But i'm a lot younger then you. I need more sleep."

"You're up now anyway. You might as well get up."

Becky slowly got up and got dressed. Her clothes felt a bit tighter. But she still felt small and tiny and now also very hungry. She would gave anything for some good food and then remembered that grandma always made something good for breakfast. At least when they were there for a sleep over. In a few minutes Becky was dressed in a fire red sleeveless T-shirt and a some cut off jeans. The sun was shining. It seemed to be nice weather today.

"I bet Josh wanted to get up early so he could practice a little more with grandpa. I hope grandma has something to eat for me."

She hurried down to the kitchen and oped the door.

"Grandma i'm hungry and... "

She stopped and noticed she did't need to say anything more. The table in the kitchen was filled with food. Waffles with icing sugar, some leftover pie, some boiled eggs, some apple turnovers, chicken legs and some pancakes with icing sugar and syrup next too it and also two bottles of soda too wash it all down.

"So your hungry. That's good since your brother seems to find it more important to train with his granddad the enjoy a good breakfast that your grand ma made. Well at least this way my husband still does some exercise. Some of our friends can't walk on their own any more so i'm kind of glad your grandfather is still in such good shape."

"Yeah. But since Josh doesn't want to eat breakfast can i eat?"

"Sure honey eat all you want and if you brother is hungry when he later get's in i can always make some more."

Becky fast started to stuff the food in her mouth still feeling herself small and tiny. She grabbed the waffles and pushed so much in her mouth she almost could't close it but she managed to swallow the waffles inside without chewing or choking. She pealed the eggs and after she covered them with salt she pushed them in her mouth one by one. She then wolfed down the apple turnovers.
Grandma smiled seeing her little grand daughter stuff all the food in her belly. Her belly was pushing against her pants and Becky unbuttoned them.
Then she focused at the chicken legs. First she covered them highly with mayonnaise an ketchup and ripped the meat of them like a wild animal. She licked the bones totally clean and belched loud. She blushed for a moment but fast got her attention back at her food. She first covered her pancakes highly with syrup and icing sugar and after that rolled them up and stuffed them in her mouth. After that she looked at the left over pie. She saved this for the last because it was the most delicious thing of the whole breakfast. She pulled the plate to her and buried her face in it so fast she started to eat it. She devoured the entire pie in less the a minute and belched again loud.

"I did it grandma. I finished it all. *hiccup*"

Becky looked at all the empty plates and wondered how she could have eaten so much and suddenly noticed how full she felt but she also felt kind of proud at herself. She looked at her belly that was very bloated and round sticking out a bit forward making her shirt ride up and her pants were unable to be buttoned.

"Wow. Did i eat *hiccup* all that. That's a lot of *hiccup* a lot of food."

"I think it's best for you if you rest out a bit and watch some T.V and let that food digest."

"Yeah! That seems like a *hiccup* good idea."

Grandma took Becky to the T.V and put on cartoon network. Becky laid back in her chair smiling she watched cartoons while her belly digest it's huge meal.
15412111112121121.title: Breakfast at Grandma's

choices: It's time to get up and leave
154121111121211211.content:
As she watched cartoon after cartoon, she could feel her clothes getting tight on her. Her tummy was making funny noises. That's when she smelled something delicious coming from the kitchen.

"Becky, I just finished making some brownies, do you want to be my taste-tester to make sure they're good?" Grandma said.

Becky's tummy rumbled in anticipation. "Yes please Grandma!" Becky replied. She started struggling to get up.

"Oh dear, stay right there! You keep still, I'll bring them to you," her Grandma said. Becky relaxed and stayed put. She then saw her Grandma come around the couch holding a big pan of brownies. "Here dear, tell me how these taste," Grandma said, taking one of the brownies out from the rest. "Open wide!"

Becky opened her mouth wide, and her grandmother placed the warm and gooey brownie on her tongue. She closed her mouth and chewed. A few chocolate crumbs escaped. "MMmm, Grandma these are GOOD!" she said.

"Oh, wonderful!" Grandma said. "I'm glad they turned out alright. Do you want one more?"

"Could I have two more Grandma?" Becky said innocently.

"Of course you may sweetie." Grandma fed her another brownie, and then another. Then Becky saw another one coming her way, and accepted it greedily. Then another one. Grandma wasn't stopping. "What about this one?" Grandma said.

"That one's good too," Becky replied before opening her mouth for another.

"And this one?"

"Mmmm so goood," Becky moaned while chewing, before swallowing and opening her mouth again. Her plump hands, slightly more chubby than from the day before, slowly rubbed her tummy. She wasn't the taste-tester. Becky was the sole recipient of a giant batch of fattening, calorie-laden brownies.

When the final brownie was consumed, Becky licked her chocolatey lips. Grandma knelt down and whispered, "What a good girl you are, eating so much." Then she kissed Becky on her soft, plump cheek and returned to the kitchen to wash up, as if nothing had happened. Becky burped and giggled, causing her tummy to shake slightly. She was so comfortable, she wished she never had to leave.
154121111121211211.title: Becky is still hungry

1541211111212112111.content:
Still even after a huge breakfast and a pan of brownies Becky still found some empty space in her tummy.

"Ehm Grandma do you have some more?"

Her Grandma looked wondered but happy at her fat granddaughter that was lazy watching T.V rubbing her big fat belly.

"Of course i have some more for you. Anytime."

Her grandma looked in the refrigerator and pulled out a chocolate pie and a can of whipped cream.

"I was saving this for Tuesday when some friends came over but you need it more now and beside i can always make a new one."

She put the plate on Becky's lap and gave her the can of whipped cream. Becky start too spray until the entire pie was covered with whipped cream and Becky started to stuff the pie in her mouth with her chubby hands. She opened her mouth as far if was possible and then stuffed in as much if was possible. Soon her hands and risks were covered with chocolate and whipped cream just like her face. Becky sure did't use any manners at this point and her grandma did't cared. She just smiled in a funny way. Becky still stuffed pieces of pie in her mouth and spray whipped cream right out the can into her mouth. She swallowed and burped loud and a few bites later most of the pie was in her belly. Becky looked surprised at her sticky chocolate covered hands and put them in her mouth licking them clean. She also whipped the chocolate and whipped cream of her face and licked her hands clean again. Her clothes were now awfully tight and Becky felt way too full too even move a muscle.

"Are you full Becky?" Her grandmother asked.

"Yes... Grandma." Becky mumbled.

Becky continued watching T.V Sometimes burping and her stomach was making sounds of digesting her big meal.
Later Josh and his grandfather walked in.

"That was a good workout and a good training for both of us. If you lose that next game then it would't be your fault."

Josh saw Becky and her clothes at the point of ripping. He was a bit worried but decided to ignore it. What could have happened, and besides grandma was here to keep an eye on Becky.
The next moment they saw lightning and a few seconds later they heard thunder in less then five minutes the weather outside changed from nice into a true storm. Trees were bending under the great pressure of the wind rain was splashing so hard against the window you could hardly see anything. They saw and heard lightning and thunder at the same time. But inside it was nice and warm.
Suddenly the phone rang and grandma picked up.

"Hello.... What?..... No No of course not i'll be happy too..... No of course it's no problem... Yeah see you then."

She hung up.

"That was your mother. Thanks too the weather there is no traffic possible. Too bad but you have to stay with us. Two boring old people." Grandma said with a smile.

"Yahoo." Becky said.

"Tomorrow morning we'll drive you two too school and then your mother picks you up. I better can look what i have left for dinner."

Becky slide deeper in her chair. This was so perfect. She thanked the storm that she could stay longer. The only thing she did't liked was that it was school tomorrow.

At dinner, Becky's grandmother had set up a mini buffet. It included 15 burgers, buckets of fries, a gallon tub of baked beans, and for dissert and huge 5 layer chese cake.
She did this for two reasons. one is because even though of the storm, Josh had a couple freinds that lived by his grandparens that came over, two is to make sure Becky gets as full as possible.

Becky sat down and had on her plate...

choices: After Dinner, Becky finished all the food given to her
154121111121211211112.content:
When they started to eat it was not the usual kind of dinner, the storm was still raging outside and the noise it made casted a near silence over the room. Thunder and lightning were going down outside in a rapid fashion and even tho Beckys grandma had made food for so many it was questionable that with weather like that any of Joshs friends would come over. Not that Becky's grandmother was worried about that at all, after all it meant she had more food to spoil her little granddaughter with and how she liked to spoil her, she did not even try to keep it a secret as she started to fill Becky's plate for the beginning with half a bucket of fries and 2 burgers.

"You spoil her Louise!" , Becky's grandfather said to his wife and gave her a critical look, tho then he just smiled and shook his head, "Aww, so typical of you... I know why I married you...", he said, obviously not minding much for what she did, whereas Josh however looked pouty. "You never give me so much food Grandma!", he called out, making Louise blink, before she spoke, "Aww Josh, your sister is still growing she has to eat more than you, but tell you what if you are a good boy and help grandpa getting some groceries later, then I give you some icecream...", Louise smiled friendly to Josh, before she began to fill her own plate with food, by the time she was finished most of the food that had been on Becky's plate already was gone, the little girl had just kept eating, while the others had been talking and she never ate slow, so it was no wonder her food was nearly gone.

One by one Becky kept shoving handfuls of fries down into her maw washing them down with milk then taking a bite from one of the burgers, then she continued starting anew from the beginning, fries, milk, burger, fries, milk, burger. In just a few moments her plate was empty and she would hold it out to her grandmother, demanding: "More!", and More was what she would get her grandma filling the plate once again with fries and burgers, before she put the plate down infront of Becky, who went back to her routine. Like that it would continue for a while about half an hour, Grandpa and Josh had already stood up and left the table and grandma had finished her food, as Becky finally ate the very last of the burgers, by now feeling pretty full and having a large and round belly poking out from under her shirt.

She was huffing and puffing but her grandma took a quarter piece of cheesecake from the buffet and put it on a new plate overfilling it with whipped cream she put it down infront of Becky, she knew her granddaughter would eat it because she had no selfcontrol and never was able to stop eating when there was any food infront of her on the table. And she would be right as despite being full Becky would start to one by one shove fork after fork of calorie-laden cake down her throat. Whenever the plate would be empty Grandma would fill the plate again and watch her granddaughter all curiously, she just wondered how much she could eat...
154121111121211211112.title: Dinner at Grandmas

1541211111212112111122.content:
Becky kept eating. Every fork full of calorie loaded food.
Becky never left a crumb left on her plate. Thanks to her huge appetite she always had been able to clean her plate. Her parents where proud at her that she always cleaned her plate but Beck had never eaten so much if this. She did't really noticed what her grandma was doing. But a girl always need to clean her plate.
Halfway her last piece her belly button was blown of but neither of them noticed or else did't cared.
Finally the last fork full went past her lips. Becky saw she had eaten everything. There was't a crumb left. She looked at her round, full, bloated belly.

"Good girl Becky. You cleaned your plate."

Becky looked at her grandmother. She was sure that if she took one more bite she would explode. She could't remember eating so much ever before. Her belly was hard and round. She felt a bit like she swallowed a boulder. Normally she could always think about food but now she could't stand thinking about it.

"Becky are you all right." Her grandma asked worried.

"Well my belly hurt. I think I ate a bit too much."

"Oh my poor girl. Come let's go to the living room so you can watch some T.V."

With some help of her grandmother Becky was able to stand and slowly waddled over too the living room. Josh and his grandfather were still talking about baseball. His grandfather had some papers with different place's were the players were standing.

"They must have said anything there's to say about baseball." Becky mumbled.

"Becky baseball is very important for your brother and your grandfather. I saw almost every game of your grandfather."

"I did't knew you liked baseball so much."

"I don't. I just watched it to do him a favor. Since it was very important for him. If you love somebody really you'll do things for him even if you don't really like them yourself. So I went to your grandfathers baseball games just like he went to my performance of Elisabeth. Princess Sisi!"

"So if I have a boyfriend I need to do things I don't like. Maybe I stay single."

"Come on Becky. Once you will find the right guy. It can hit you if a lightning bolt. Then you want to do those things for him. Besides I think you're a very attractive girl. When you're older I'm sure many boys will like you."

"Do you really think I become beautiful grandma?"

"Of course. I was beautiful when I was younger. You have 25% of my genes. Now let's put on a nice cartoon so you forget that pain in your belly."

Grandma put on the movie the princess and the frog. Becky always had been a great fan of Disney movies. Her grandma stayed next to her and start rubbing her belly.
Later Becky did't know or it was because of the rubbing or the attention she was putting to the movie or both but her belly did feel better. But it was still round and big.
After the movie grandma took her upstairs and after showering and brushing her teeth and putting on a nightie grandma tugged her in in a special room she had for when her grandchildren came over to sleep.

"Josh will also soon be send to bed. Now sleep tight Becky. Nice dreams."

After her grandma left Becky was staring at the sealing for some time. She pulled her nightie up and felt her big belly. A few minutes later she was in a deep sleep still with her hands on her belly and a smile on her face.
1541211111212112111122.title: Very stuffed Becky

15412111112121121111221.content:
Becky wakes up craving something sweet despite her belly telling her otherwise. She struggles out of bed and waddles down to the kitchen. To her surprise, Grandma was waiting for her.

"I thought I might want a midnight snack" Grandma said. Becky say a table full of goodies ranging from cakes to candy bars. Becky's face lit up

"This all for me?" she said happily.

"More so for that growing belly of yours" Grandma said as she patted Becky's soft squishy gut, "Just eat as much as you can sweetie, I'll help you if you need me to"

Becky dove into the table of desserts. The candy quickly disappeared but the baked goods took a little longer. Grandma rubbed Becky's belly to keep her going for as long as possible. Cookies, brownies cupcakes all went down Becky's throat; she could feel her belly getting stuffed. The greedy little girl kept eating despite her gut's many protests. She finished everything on the table except a triple layered cake. By then she was feeling quite stuffed but greedily wanted the cake
15412111112121121111221.title: Next morning; 3 a.m snack

choices: Becky wakes up the next morning hungry
154121111121211211112211.content:
Becky fast started to think. She really wanted the cake but she was't sure she could eat it all. But she also knew if she ate a bit more then she normally could, it would stretch her stomach so it could hold more food in the future.
But if she ate too much she would probably vomit. Then she would lose the calories from the cake and most of the baked goods and candy. That would be a waste. But she really wanted that cake in her belly. She decided too take the risk, but wanted help.

"Grandma, can you feed me the cake?"

"Of course sweetie. Why would't I?"

She picked up a knife and a fork and cut of a small piece and started to feed it to Becky. Becky must admit she liked being fed. This was so much more easy. She closed her eyes and just opened her mouth and swallowed whatever her grandma fed to her.
Grandma liked this too. She was feeding Becky with one hand while the other rubbed her belly speeding up the digesting process. It did help. Becky did't realized how full she was getting.
But at a sudden moment she noticed there was't any more food going to her mouth. Disturbed she opened her eyes.

"Why did you stop grandma?"

"Because you ate the entire pie sweet hart."

Becky looked surprised at the empty plate. But she just started eating. Or had it been a few minutes. She enjoyed it so much she did't notice how long it was. It might has well have been a few seconds or a few hours.
She then noticed how stuffed her belly was. It hurt but in a good way. A nice way of pain was going on in her belly. She wondered or that was the stretching of her stomach.

"I guess you're sleepy, right? It's pretty late."

Becky yawned and nodded.

"Can you help me get up?" Becky asked, and reached out with her arms to her grandmother.

Her grandmother pulled Becky on her feet and helped her upstairs and put her in bed, and tucked her in. The moment when Becky's head hit her pillow she was out as a light while her belly was making noises busy digesting the huge meal.
154121111121211211112211.title: The entire pie

154122.content:
Becky’s stomach grumbled, which she took as a sign of it being empty. She sat down at one end of the table and pulled a pizza towards her. It was an extra large, extra cheese. She grabbed two pieces, folded them over calzone style, and started to eat.

She finished a whole pizza this way, and then reached over for something to drink. Her stomach was getting bloated again. She grabbed a bottle of Mountain Dew and began chugging it. Becky had a large stomach capacity, and the fizzy soda stretched it even more.

She moved on to a pepperoni pizza, eating it in the similar folded over calzone style. Her stomach was becoming stuffed to the max, and still she continued to eat pizza. For the next hour she manage to finish the pepperoni, a sausage, was just halfway through another cheese pizza when she got sleepy. The humongous mass of pizza in her poor stomach tried to digest and she got very sleepy…

…There was the bang of a front door opening and the sound of rowdy boys, cheering about here victory at the baseball. Becky lifted her head from where it lay resting, and suddenly her knowledge of her situation returned to her. She put her glasses on and struggled to button her green shorts.

The baseball team stopped in the doorway to the livening room when they saw Becky. Her distended belly hung out over her shorts, which couldn’t be closed. After an initial shock the boys started to laugh.

“Becky?” Jo called out, working through the mass of little leaguers. “Did you eat all of this?”

Becky turned crimson, almost as red as her hair.

Jo helped her daughter up. Becky’s small shorts started to slip, but her mother held them up. “We’ll just get you upstairs, okay?”

Becky heard the boys shout in the dinning room as she walked up the stairs.

“Nice, bro. Your sister totally pigged out on pizza.”

“She ate four freaking pizzas! What a pig!”

“Hey, shut-up Bobby!” Josh yelled. “Remember when your baby sister ran through the kitchen without a diaper when we were at your house.” The team changed targets and laughed at Bobby.

Jo sat Becky down on her bed. “I’ll just go see if you left enough for the boys to eat.” Jo rarely got angry at her kids, and not one ounce of frustration was in her voice. “If there’s anything you want to talk to me about, we can talk later, okay?” Jo went downstairs.

Becky lied back on her bed, and picked up one of her favorite books. She sat and read, massaging her swollen belly. Her book improved her mood, and soon she was back to her normal confident self. The pizza still struggled to digest her stomach
154122.title: The appetite of a baseball team.

choices: The teacher callsthe class together for an activity.
1541221.content:
Jo opened Becky’s door, but found that her daughter was sleeping. She checked her watch. It was earlier then Becky’s usual bed time, but it would be pointless to wake her now and then send her to bed a few minutes later. Jo crept in, removed Becky’s book, removed Becky’s glasses and put them on a nightstand, and then pulled the covers over Becky’s sleeping form. Jo left, and made she the hallway outside was darkened.

“Becky, time to get up!”

Becky rolled out of bed groggily. Her belly wasn’t as bloated as it had been when she eaten the pizzas last night, but a new layer of fat did extend her belly to a bigger size.

“Get dressed. You have kindergarten in an hour.”

Becky put on her glasses and went to put on one of the new pairs of shorts Jo had bought yesterday. It was a slight squeeze, but her bigger shorts managed to fit her larger belly. She picked one of her favorite green shirts. It still managed to cover her tummy, but just barely.

She went downstairs, were Jo was cooking pancakes.
