1543111.content:
Tara's mother, though she tried not to show it too much, was not too fond of her daughter's lifestyle. While other five year-olds would love to get outside and play on a sunny weekend, her girl was more content to sit around on the couch and stuff her face with junk food while watching cartoons.

Even now, the chubby child was happily munching on a large chocolate bar. The effects of her poor diet were easy to see, with her round belly slightly resting on her lap. She could swear she saw a sliver of pale skin peeking out from beneath her shirt. Her shorts were looking rather tight as well, her thighs rather snug and ever so slightly bulging out of them.

Though, Tara seemed totally clueless to how large she was, especially with how she looked up at her mother with a smile that dimpled her cheeks and gave her a slight squint.
"Hi, mommy!" She chirped, and put a free hand on her tubby tummy. "Is lunch ready yet?"
"Yep, it is," her mother nodded, managing a smile and petting her daughter's soft hair, "come on."
"Yay!" Tara squeaked, and wolfed down the rest of her chocolate with haste.

The greedy girl slid herself off the couch and walked toward the kitchen. Though, her mother could swear that she had the tiniest waddle to her gait.

Tara sat herself down at the kitchen table and looked down to see...
1543111.title: She didn't like her daughter's fat life...

15431111.content:
Though Tara's mother wished her daughter could eat better, fruits and vegtables were not things she could readily afford on a nurse's salary. And, as a single mother, she was already overloaded enough without having to shop and cook- if she tried to do any more, she was certain she'd fold up under the stress like an accordion. So, rather than the wonderful home-cooked meals ahe wanted her and her daughter to enjoy, the table was currently laden with three or four bags of McDonalds, holding within an assortment of burgers, fries, chicken nuggets, and even a salad. This salad was the closest Tara's mother could get to healthy eating- whatever restaurant they picked up from (it wasn't always McDonalds- sometimes she could splurge on Chinese takeout) she would always order a salad with the hopes that Tara would eat it. However, she never would, and it would languish for a day or two in the refrigerator until her mother would take it for breakfast. That was life, and though she did not like it, it worked well- and Tara clearly loved it.

Upon seeing the McDonalds, Tara made an immediate beeline for a chair and began to pull various things out of the bag. "Thank you, Mommy!" she said gleefully, furiously unwrapping a hamburger. I'm starving!"
"Good," said Tara's mother, smiling wearily. "I hope you enjoy it." She slid a few chicken nuggets over to herself and noshed quietly as, to her worry, Tara moved on to her second hamburger. She hoped there'd be enough left for dinner.

154311111.content:
Even though Tara was her only child, Marie was quite sure a five year-old should be nicely full from a single hamburger, a few nuggets and some fries.
And yet she was sat there, almost in awe as she watched her daughter wolf down three hamburgers, the majority of a box of nuggets and a whole large box of fries all by herself.

Marie had absolutely no idea where Tara's voracious appetite came from, though she chalked it up to just being a thing kids get around this age. Kids need food to grow, after all.

Of course, the salad was left completely untouched. Marie decided she may as well have it to herself. She always heard kids weren't big fans of vegetables, but Tara would never even want to smell the stuff, let alone taste it.

Tara slouched back in her chair, her belly looking even larger than usual as she licked grease and sauce off her plump little fingers. A cute little burp escaped her.
"Scuze me," she mumbled, remembering her manners, and lazily slid off the chair, "thanks, mommy..."
Marie just watched as her growing girl waddled into the living room.

Tara half-climbed, half-rolled onto the couch, laying across it on her back and letting out a long yawn. A nice big lunch always made her rather sleepy, and she liked having a nice nap when she was all full.

Her pudgy hands resting on her stuffed dome of a belly, her eyes fluttered shut as she nodded off...
154311111.title: Sleep it off

choices: Tara wakes up early, ravenous for lack of dream-food.
1543111111.content:
A large meal is always conducive to a good nap. Tara's gut-bustingly huge fast food lunch was no exception. Almost as soon as her head hit the couch cushion, she was off and dreaming. However, as sometimes happens after especially large meals, her dreams got rather odd.

When Tara awoke in dreamland, she was standing in a dark, dark forest. She could barely see her chubby hand in front of her face, much less anything around her. Apprehensively, she took a step forward. Nothing. Another step, then another...

And, with a great flash of welcoming light, the sun was out. And what a world it revealed.

Tara was standing in a great field filled with every single kind of food she could imagine. French Fry grass waved gently across the hamburger ground with each gust of the sweet-smelling wind. Lollipop trees stuck out of Jell-O hills, and butter-stick birds flew over high piles of rock candy. In short, Tara was in heaven. And she wasn't about to let this opportunity go to waste.

With a squeal of pure joy, she flopped onto the ground and started stuffing great handfuls of the French Fry grass into her hungry mouth. Below that, she discovered what would be dirt was hamburger, and before long she had ate herself a hole four feet deep. Not satisfied with just that, though, she ate her way back up to the surface, and somehow raised her massively engorged body up on her stubby legs to conquer some other kind of food.
1543111111.title: Food Land

choices: She starts getting thirsty...is that a river of chocolate milk?

15431111111.content:
Tara lumbered her way through the French Fry grass, stuffing handfuls of them into her mouth on the way and licking the grease off her fingers, and came across a patch of flowers. She bent over to take a closer look - the petals smelled of delicious white chocolate, while the red stem had a lovely scent of strawberry.
With a greedy giggle, she picked a bouquet's worth of flowers and gave them a hearty sniff...before cramming them all into her mouth!

She let out a content sigh and licked her lips, before freezing as something caught her attention. Her eyes went wide as dinner plates as she looked up at the massive mountain of red, translucent jelly. It bobbed and jiggled as the cool breeze brushed against it.

Tara's tongue hungrily slid across her lips. It was time to conquer Jell-O Mountain!

Wasting no more time, she waddled as fast as she could - which wasn't that fast - to the great mountain of strawberry jelly. Its wobbly, jiggly texture was rather reminiscent of her belly, which had gotten larger with her gorging.
With little effort, she had started climbing up the mountain, using her hands and mouth to take large clumps of jell-o off of it on her way. Despite her underused muscles and great weight, she was making good time.

It wasn't long before she was sitting at the very top, picking handfuls of jelly from beneath her to gobble up. She had practically ballooned on her little journey, with her belly, backside, limbs and face much rounder and thicker than they had been before!

With a content sigh, she patted her belly before adjusting herself to get onto it, facing the other side of the mountain which remained untouched. Until a few moments later when Tara kicked herself down the wobbly slope, mouth wide open to scoop even more jell-o into her tummy!

She reached the bottom with great speed, and bounced harmlessly along the hamburger ground like, landing in a sitting position. It was as if all that jelly inside her that given her flab a similar texture, and she could easily be wobbled and bounced like a rubber ball!

Asami opened her eyes and did't knew where she was. After a few minutes she remembered. They moved and this was her new room. Looking around she must admit she liked her new room. She opened her curtains a bit and looked outside. It was dark outside. The shadows of the forest seemed even darker and kind of scary. She knew for sure she saw a few scary monsters in the forest. She fast closed the curtains and hide under the covers and waited. After a few minutes nothing happened she crawled under the covers.
There came a loud rumble from her belly. No wonder. She fell asleep after that food it appeared that she missed dinner. She was hungry.

"I'm hungry. Hmm perhaps there's some food left in the refrigerator."

The little girl fast put on some slipper's so her feet would't get cold and slowly walked downstairs. She hated climbing stairs and wished her mother would have taken a house with a elevator. Or else a bedroom and bathroom on the first floor. That would have made life a bit easier. She listened carefully. Like most kids she was afraid in the dark. She also was't sure there were't any monsters in the forest. Her mother said: No but people make mistakes. So why would't there be monsters in there, or witches, or something else. But her hunger was bigger then her fear. Slowly she walked into the kitchen and froze a moment when she saw someone sitting at the table. But then she saw that it was her mother and sighed relieved
Yoko looked up from her book and saw her daughter."

"Asami what are you doing out of bed?" Yoko asked surprised.

"I'm sorry mommy but I got hungry. It seems I slept through dinner."

"Yeah you did. I wanted to wake you but you dad thought I could better let you sleep. He's of to bed. He need to get up early tomorrow. For work of course but then we have time to visit our neighbors. I heard they also have some young kids. Perhaps you make some friends."

Asami was a bit doubtful about this. She was't really good at making friends but she also understood she would have to come anyway and maybe it was't so bad. Again her belly let out a loud rumble.

"Sounds you could use some food." Yoko said with a laugh.

"I do. I'm really hungry."

"Well I'm afraid Jack in the box and Mc Donalds are closed but perhaps I can make some hamburgers myself. I have some in the freezer. How does that sound?" Yoko asked.

"Delicious mommy!" Asami yelled.

She liked the hamburgers her mother made. Perhaps not so much as the burgers from Jack in the box or Mc Donalds but they were still delicious. Her mother got very good at making hamburgers. Asami waited patient looking through one of her books. She wished she would be able to read. She knew for sure then books would be a lot more fun.

"Here you go Asami." Yoko said and handed her daughter a plate with four big burgers.

Asami was a bit surprised at this. Not that she got food her mother never made a problem about that but she was surprised how much she got. just two or maybe even one would have been enough to fill her tummy but now her mother gave her four. But still she was't the girl to turn down food. She grabbed the first burger and started to eat.
Yoko smiled. She was happy her daughter had come back for a midnight snack. She made sure the burgers were dripping from the grease. She smiled seeing how Asami started to eat. Her pyjama's were a bit wide but that would soon change. At least she hoped.
Asami finished her first burger. The area around her mouth was covered in grease but she did't cared. Fast the second burger found it's way to her tummy. She knew it was enough but the two left over burgers looked so tempting. It was or they shouted: Eat us Asami. Eat us. we taste so delicious. and eating she did. Halfway her third burger she started to feel the familiar pain from earlier that day. She thought about stopping but the burgers just tasted to good. She saw her mother watching her. She was smiling.
She was able to finish her third burger and now looked at the last burger on her plate. She grabbed it and took a bite even while her tummy made a sound of protest. She kept chewing even while every bite made her tummy hurt more. But finally the last bite went past her lips. She even licked of the grease around her mouth and lifted he shirt a bit to massaged her poor stuffed tummy. Yoko saw it and liked what she saw.

"All right and now it's time for you to go to bed. It's way past your bedtime, and your still young. you need your sleep. You can't be hungry anymore."

"Tell me about it." Asami added to herself. But she looked sadly at her mommy. "Carry me."

"Oh fine. Why not." Her mother said and lifted her stuffed daughter up a bit disappointed how light and bony she was.

She took Asami too bed tugged her in and wished her tonight. Asami still felt the burgers in her tummy pressing against the sides for some time. Soon after that she fell asleep.
15431212111.title: Midnight snack

154312121111.content:
The creeping morning light shone upon Asami's dreamy face like the sun beating down upon a gold ingot. From beneath Asami's bedroom door rose a savory, meaty aroma of eggs, milk and cheese sizzling in lard as this morning's breakfast spread throughout Asami's bedroom.

"What... Is that delicious smell..."

A voice mumbled from Asami's bed as the petite child opened her eyes and sat up straight.

"Breakfast!"

Without changing into her day clothes, Asami leaped down from her bed onto the redwood floor and ran out of her hallway before she met the top of the stairs. Again, Asami hated climbing stairs THAT much...

"Why didn't mommy buy a one floor house?" Asami grumbled as she held onto the handrail before descending into the foyer.

---

Two bags of six Egg McMuffins, eight hashbrowns and four chocolate milk bottles sat on the dining table behind Yoko as the mother continued to fry four eggs along eight bacon strips: She herself would eat a bowl of salad whilst Asami would fatten herself up on the McGarbage which would only continue Asami's weight gain journey into a jiggling, quivering butterball. Shortly after her husband left at 4:30 to consult with some engineering firm in dire need of advice, Yoko drove up to McDonalds to purchase Asami's breakfast: Oh, if only Asami saw the looks of surprise on that worker's mortified face! And thus Asami was set up for the first part of the meal when she walked in.

"Mommy," began Asami with big eyes before she caught an overwhelming glimpse of today's breakfast. Frowning slightly, Asami scratched her tummy as she slowly walked to her chair.

Turning her attention to the table, Yoko silently panicked when she saw the frown on her face. What if she finds out about my plan... Is it too late?

"Mommy... I need help getting into my seat!"

Giving herself a mental sigh of relief, Yoko only smiled as she went to and lifted her daughter into the seat. The cute Japanese girl giggled as she dove her greedy fingers down one of the bags to retrieve the first hashbrown. "Thank you, mommy! These are delicious!"

Thank goodness...

"You are welcome, sweetheart," Yoko grinned slyly as she returned to the deep fryers. Asami, meanwhile, chewed like a rabid beast on her dwindling hashbrowns as the crispy-gold potato cakes went down her gullet. Reaching for a bottle of chocolate milk, Asami gave little notice before she tore off the cap of the chocolate milk bottle and started to chug those sweet, zingy calories which would pay her back later; chocolate stains began to spread around Asami's mouth as they intermingled with crumbs of hashbrowns which glistened like grease.

Asami thought for a while. She really liked jack in the box but she also liked Mc Donald's. She also had Jack in the box yesterday. Not that she minded having jack in the box two days in a row. She even would't mind to eat it everyday but thought it was better to go to Mc Donalds today.

"Mc Donalds mommy." She said sweetly.

While her mother drove to Mc Donalds Asami thought about her talk with Danny and Jamie

"Mommy. Would I look better if I was fatter?" She asked.

Yoko was a bit scared that Asami found out that she was trying to fatten her up. But she stayed calm. She was sweating but stayed calm and asked on a normal tone: "Why do you ask honey?"

"Oh it's just about a talk I had with Danny and Jamie. They said that if you eat to much Jack in the box and Mc Donalds you become fat. But you did't answered my question mom. Would I look good if I was fatter?"

"I think you would look adorable." Yoko said telling the truth. "Did you know about that other neighbor of us. I never suspected."

Asami was like every kid scared of witches and still believed in them. She used to have terrible nightmares about them and was still scared of them.

She loves kids. She also knows terrific stories. She's also a terrific cook. All kids in the neighborhood know and love her. Perhaps you can meet her once if you go for a walk in the forest."

Asami looked a bit painful. It was't that she did't wanna meet this woman. She liked stories and good food. But she hated walking. She also need to walk through the forest and she did't knew how far in the forest this woman lived. But at the other hand she was kind of curious.
Yoko ordered a big meal for Asami and looked smiling at her. "

1543121211112222221.content:
Asami licked her lips as she peered from her seat to see her mother read the menu.

"Hello. Welcome to McDonalds. May I take your order?"

"Yes, please. We need four triple-layer Whoppers, Supersized fries, loans lots of ketchup for a party."

Yoko smiled as she looked back to Asami, who grinned at her mother in reply: By "party," Yoko meant letting Asami feast on more calories than what a family of three should eat in four days. Yoko was still concerned, though: How fat would Asami allow herself to become before the little girl- Oh! That was nonsense with Yoko's plan to implant fat-positive beliefs into Asami's head. As Yoko pulled into the second window, the receptionist only glanced at its two occupants and widened her eyes in horror, though not long enough to disrupt the transfer of food into the vehicle. Asami received the bag which threatened to burst only after Yoko pulled out of the McDonalds drive-thru and onto the main road.

Licking her lips again, Asami began her lunch by tearing open the Big Mac box before two little hands formed around the girl's burger as Asami bit into the burger. Greasy oils spilled down Asami's jawline along with ketchup and mayonnaise which stuck to her cheeks. Yoko smiled.

"That's my girl. Eat it all up: I pay too much for wasted food."

Asami merely nodded between two bites before she stuffed her face with the Big Mac as gulps of food went down into Asami's stomach. Okay. So her mother thought she looked adorable with some extra weight... But was she really trying to fatten her up intentionally? A handful of fries passed through Asami's mouth as the little girl pondered: What would she look like down to the smallest fat roll on her waist? Asami saw very few chubby kids in her old country, but could she tolerate having more than a baby bump?

Asami continued to stuff herself with fries at an unrelenting speed, though, as her greedy senses experienced euphoria: So what if she would bloat up to the size of a beach bal?. The greasy, explosive flavors of fries, burger and milkshakes appeased Asami's internal debate for now.

"Mommy, may I drink the last milkshake?"

Yoko looked through the rear-view mirror with surprise: Asami was rubbing her bloated tummy in a pile of burger wrappers, French fry holders and two empty chocolate shake cups. Yoko could only muster a sweet, devious smile, howevver, as she held out the extra large bottle of chocolate ice cream.

"Thanks, mommy!" Asami cried before she sucked through the bending straw to suck up the delicious, fattening treat. Her beautiful dark eyes twinkled as they closed in nirvana: The to-be-obese plumper knew that this was the first of many feasts which would put her in a state of bliss; Yoko, on the other hand, longed for the day when she could squeeze, pinch and caress Asami's golden love handles of pure blubber.

Asami finished her last chocolate milkshake by the time Yoko pulled into the driveway to the house: Asami truly was a mess with chocolate stains smeared across her face which put Yoko in a state of worry: How would her husband react when he saw discarded McDonalds bags littered in his company's car?

"Asami, ball up your trash and give it to me."

"Okay, mommy."

Asami, too, was aware of the trash littering the floorboard, car seat, passenger-side seat... Quickly, Asami pulled the trash together into a ball before she held it to her mother.

"Thank you, sweetie," Yoko smiled as she chucked it into the passing garbage can. Her daughter ate all of that... That was something for both Yoko and Asami to be proud of. "You are going to become a big, beautiful girl."

"Tee-bee! Thanks, mommy!"

Asami grinned at Yoko as she stayed in her seat, her smile enhanced by the food stains created during her binge. Yoko released Asami's seatbelt before the tired plumper found herself embracing Yoko's shoulder as the two walked inside.

"I'm home, honey! Asami needs to wash up before we meet Miss Patterson."

"Okay," came yet the same muffled voice still in the attic. Yoko frowned: This was not the first time the satellite dish bugged up. Asami would have to make do without reliable service for the night...

Yoko held Asami dearly as the little Japanese child fell asleep with a full stomach. Ascending the stairs and heading into the bathroom, Yoko then took out a rag and, after applying some moisture, began to gently clean Asami's face of chocolate stains along with her neck and even the topmost sections of the spaghetti-strap cami which was somewhat outlined with grease.

Like the grandma of little red riding hood, or the house of the three bears, the house of the seven little goats, or the house of the seven dwarfs. in the front of the house was a veranda and in front of that a garden with also some flowers at the edge and even a vegetable garden. The woman herself was in a chair reading. She had long straight gray hair. Yoko could clearly see the big potbelly the woman had. She wore a black dress and seemed really friendly. On a small table next to her was a big jug with a yellow liquid.
When Yoko and Asami entered the garden the woman looked up from her book. She placed a finger between the pages she was reading and looked at them and frowned.

"Have we met?" She asked. "Because if we do I can't remember you. But of course I also am getting old. So maybe I forgot."

"No you did't. We just moved here a few days ago. We live at number nine."Yoko said. "We wanted to meet you."

"Ah good. It was about someone would live there. Well welcome in the neighborhood. Would you like some lemonade?" She asked and took two cups from under the table. "I made it myself from real lemons."

Asami found it kind of strange to make something from lemons. She thought they tasted much to sour. But she took a sip from her cup anyway and must admit it tasted sweet. She liked it.

"I heard you liked young kids."

"Oh yeah. I like young kids. I like it to play with them or tell them stories. In my life I've heard so many stories. Some of them I made up myself. I hope they remember them and write them down for later generations. They mostly also enjoy my cooking and I babysit many times some kids. If you ever need a babysitter just call me."

Yoko smiled. That would be very handy since Asami's old babysitter lived a bit far away now.

"And what do you like, little girl?" The woman asked friendly.

"Jack in the box." She mumbled.

"Oh yeah. I remembered that. I used to work there for a long time. Of course that was some years ago."

"You worked there?" Asami asked suddenly very interested.

"Yeah I did young girl." She said friendly. "Next time you come tell me and I will make some of their food for you."

"Oh. Eh can I use your bath room?" Asami asked suddenly.

"Of course. It's in the hall first door left."

When Asami went to the bathroom the old woman said: "What a cute girl."

"Yeah she is." Yoko said. "But I would like it more if she was fat." As soon as the words left her mouth she knew she made a mistake but the old woman stayed pretty calm.

"I agree. Kids are way cuter when they are fat. If you want to fatten your daughter up a bit. I can help doing that. Just call me."

"That would be great. But don't tell Asami"."

"My lips are sealed."

Asami is stuffed mid-way and has to be carried upstairs.
1543121211112222221111222112121112111221.content:
"You know," began Patricia when Asami tore open the third burger wrap. "Does Asami only eat three meals?"

Yoko paused from putting away some dishes: Now that she thought of it, Yoko did not feed Asami that many snacks. She shook her head.

"No, but I-"

"Should."

Yoko and Patricia looked at one another and smiled somewhat awkwardly. "It's just that she never asks for anything while watching TV, for instance."

"Try and offer large bowls of ice cream covered with fudge between meals. Encourage her to eat it all by adding extra sugar, and soon Asami will have more rolls and bulges than we can ever dream of."

Yoko nooded before turning to the freezer. "I don't think we have any ice cream in the fridge, but perhaps I can get some?"

"Yes. That, or I can make some," Patricia laughed quietly. "It's easy to make! All you need is lots of sugar, milk and vanilla inside a bag surrounded by ice, and your little one will be all over the stuff when it is ready to eat! Also, be sure to feed her lots and lots of chocolates: She will get even rounder and cuter for you and make her crave more sweets."

"Thank you, Patricia. I don't know how else I could have done so much so far." Yoko laughed.

"I know what parents' kids like best when they come over. Your daughter will love to eat almost constantly."

Meanwhile at the table, Asami had finished her fourth burger and was focused on depleting the entire platter of ketchup-soaked fries as fistfuls of golden crisps entered her mouth. It was becoming ever so difficult to finish the meal, but Asami was determined to eat every last fry.

I want to get much, much cuter," thought Asami when she pushed her free left hand into her stomach such that neither adult could see her explore her fat. Now Asami was at the point where she could dip her entire hand in and get nothing but soft, squishy bulges of fat. This made her smile as she continued to finish the platfer of fries.
1543121211112222221111222112121112111221.title: Enough dining, not enough snacking

choices: Ask if Asami wants to know how much she weighs
1543121211112222221111222112121112111221.content:
The fries were good, but the burgers were huge. Asami had already eaten so much that day. She pushed herself, willed herself to finish every scrap. But her belly protested. It stabbed her with sharp pains every time she took a bite, so she did the smart thing and stopped. There were still plenty of fries left to eat, and she could tackle the leftover's later.

Asami laid back and hiccuped. The adults noticed while she drummed her fingers on her belly. Asami basked in the feeling of satiation. In her mind it was worth the journey to this lazy, stuffed feeling.

"Full?" asked Yoko. This would be the first time in recent memory that her daughter didn't finish a meal, but she wanted to be supportive.

Asami could only manage a groan, and began to dose off.

"Oh, I think someone needs a nap. Excuse me Patty."

Unlike usual, where Asami could cooperate with her mother in order to be carried, this time she was dead weight. Asami's ponderous bulk wouldn't allow mommy to budge her daughter from her place. She was again surprised, because Yoko had spent all this time unaware of the leverage her daughter was giving her. She briefly panicked, remembering her fear about not being able to do this one day, when her strength would not be enough. If that moment wasn't now, it was soon, unless Yoko did something about it. Yoko thought about doing housework around the house while carrying her daughter to muscle up to the challenge. It might be fun for Asami to help do stuff, too!

Time for try number two. Yoko wrapped the girls arms carefully around her neck, squatted, and prepared to do a proper lift from the knees up. Yoko reflexively let out a groan as she taxed her arms and hips:

"EEEEIIIUUuungh... Phew."

She stood proudly, hefting the child in her arms to ensure her grip. She felt her daughter's immense belly pushing rhythmically against her torso with each drawn out breath. It was a pleasant, soft feeling from cuddling.

"That sounded difficult," Patricia commented warmly. "You ought to weigh that child soon."

"It might be difficult now, but the reward is great. Truthfully, I've been debating the scale issue," she said. "A number to go along with this heavy feeling would be nice."

"Everyone needs a starting point in order to track growth," Patty replied simply.


* * *

Upstairs in her bed for a nap, Asami laid asleep. Yoko poked her daughter's belly just to watch her squirm. Her tummy was as tight as a drum.

Boy, was Yoko ever lucky that her girl hadn't heard her struggle. Asami would tease her mommy to no end about that, she thought. And the charade would be over for sure. Although, maybe it was time for this to end. It was getting hard to believe that the toddler didn't know about things by now. She gave plenty of hints. She definitely reacted very enthusiastically to food. Weight gain didn't need to be a secret anymore.

Yoko's decision...
1543121211112222221111222112121112111221.title: A groan to remember

choices: Dreams of herself one year older (Age 6), with a comfortable weight of 160 lbs.
Wakes to the unfamiliar smell of... Snacktime!
1543121211112222221111222112121112111221.content:
... To maintain the status quo would continue, but a thought came into mind:

What if I weigh myself, record the number, then I hold Asami and step on the scale again to find the difference? I subtract my weight from our weights, and she can have a starting number...

Yoko watched as Asami's girth rose and fell with each breath. Gently, she rolled up the sides of Asami's shirts some three inches to let her fatty body spill onto the bed. Truth be told, Yoko felt impatient with how slowly it took for Asami's belly to permanently Hang out of her shirts; in a matter of months, Yoko hoped, Asami would be well in the triple digits with so much fat pushing aside shirts that Asami would show her gorgeous beautiful stomach to everyone as a source of pride for the perfectly-fed girl. Yoko needed to act swiftly to start Asami's snacking routines, and thus left the woman as she ran to the kitchen.

Asami slowly rolled onto her stomach and moaned in quiet pleasure as her fat seeped out like a squishy mattress: She hadn't felt so SOFT before like a cuddly pillow in her life! Her tummy still hurt, but Asami knew that all of that food would mean that she was becoming a fatter, cuter girl. Inside, her body was converting the day's meal with amazing efficiency into great soft, warm pockets of fat which spread throughout her body, but more so to her cute tummy and chubby thighs which provided warmth by blanketing her big bones. If Asami ever became too hot in the Summer months, she could just get addicted to fattening ice cream which would both cool her and add to the blubbery, jiggling, waddling butterball just wanting to be super fat and happy. This was everyone's last chance to make Asami a skinny girl, but now Asami's weight gain would seem to accelerate in a blissful cycle of eating, sedentary play and napping.

Asami...

Asami suddenly smelt something. The sleepy girl opened her eyes a bit and sniffed again. The smell was real and not a part of some strange dream. It smelt delicious anyway. Asami belly rumbled and she really did want a bite to eat. But she hated to get out of bed. Asami was't active and hated moving and that was even worse after she just woke up. She rolled out of bed much like a beached whale and slowly waddled downstairs wising her mommy would build her room on the first floor. The delicious scent of snacks took her straight to the kitchen were her mother and Patricia were busy talking.

"See. You can make it just a bit more delicious with the right spice. Why make something good when you can make something fantastic and it is't that hard." Patricia told her mother and suddenly saw Asami. "Oh hello sleepyhead. You fell asleep so we took you to your room."

"I would still like it if my bedroom was on the first floor." Asami whined.

"Well I'm sorry honey but we don't have any more rooms left on the first floor. Your father decided to give you a room at the second floor. Not me."

"Then can't you at least build a elevator?" Asami asked.

"Well I'm sorry honey but we don't have the money for that. This house and garden cost a lot of money. Say are't you hungry? While you were asleep Patricia was so nice to make a delicious meal for you."

Patricia walked too the kitchen and returned with a big plate of fries, burgers and chicken nuggets. Asami's mouth started to water. She need to eat all of this. It smelled so delicious, so good that it would a shame to leave anything. She would eat anything to the last crumb. It tasted to good to not eat it all. She grabbed the fries and dipped them in mayonnaise and ketchup and stuffed them in her mouth. Yoko enjoyed seeing Asami eat.

"I was wondering when are you gonna make that swimming pool ready?" Patricia suddenly asked.

Yoko got distracted from Asami's eating and even Asami stopped chewing for a moment.

"Which swimming pool?" Yoko asked slowly.

"The one after your house. Did't you know there was one. I mean it's a pretty big one. You did see this house and garden before you bought it right?"

"Well my husband did." Yoko said.

Too be totally honest she did't went into the garden that much, and Asami rather stayed inside on her fat but in front of the T.V or something else that did't cost any energy. Of course in the first weeks they were busy unpacking. Now she thought of it her husband kind of tried to not let her go into the garden too much. Since she was busy unpacking and Asami's gaining she did't really thought much of it. But did't he knew about that swimming pool? Then it hit her. He did't told her because it was a surprise for her for when it was summer. The swimming pool was surrounded by a hedge with one gate so you could't really see it so that was why she did't notice it. Since no one told her there was one she did't really looked for one. And she was't really a woman that liked to work in the garden. But a swimming pool sounded great. Especially since with a swimming pool Asami would wear her bikini a lot with all of her fat spilling out.

"We have a swimming pool?" Asami asked slowly.

"OMG did't you know that. Come on I show you were it is."

Asami fast grabbed a burger to eat while she followed Patricia into the garden to a corner and then patricia opened a gate in the hedge to a swimming pool. A pretty big one too. It was covered with a plastic blanket and she also saw a few jerrycans with chlorine. Asami looked also interested. She could swim. Her mother put her on swimming lessons last year. To be honest swimming was the only kind of exercise she did like. since she could float in the water without using any muscle and it did make her body less heavier.

"It needs to be cleaned of course. But I can help you with that if you want. In a few weeks it will be summer and when it's hot it's nice to cool of in a swimming pool."

Asami nodded excited an took another big bite from her burger.

1543121211112222221111222112121112111221.content:
Burger juice spilled around Asami's chin as the fat girl waddled back inside, excited. A swimming pool!
But Asami's thoughts were interrupted by the familiar smell of fast food, and once more she found herself indulging in the feast. Asami started on her second burger and worked her way into the ketchup-slathered stack of lettuce, cheese, pickles and onions. Yoko and Patricia smiled when, after returning from the back, they saw Asami lick her pudgy fingers before starting on several fistfuls of fries.

"Yoko, I brought two gallon-tubs of chocolate fudge ice cream she will like."

Yoko nodded while watching Asami's pillowy arms move. "Good. I will give Asami one tub for her to feast on while watching TV."

"Just remember: If she needs more, just call me and I will buy some more for her."

Asami did not hear the two women talk... Nor did she care. The last burger bite sat on the platter, with a stuffed Asami gearing up to finish it off. Sauces were smeared across Asami's face with great abundance. Asami's shirt was once more rolled up to the top which revealed curvy rolls of blubber hanging over her waistline. Without any effort on her part, Asami lunged a fatty arm towards the burger segment and stuffed her face with the delicious combination of fattening stuff yet.

"Burp! I am finished!"

Asami licked her fingers greedily before letting them rest between two fat rolls: For the first time, Asami felt surprised at the absence of pain! Though full, Asami knew one thing with quiet excitement: She could eat more, meaning her stomach was growing.

Yoko and Patricia grinned at the sight of the adorable fatty before Yoko reached out to pick up Asami. Asami wrapped her pillow arms around Yoko's neck before Yoko turned to Patricia. "This little one needs a cleanup. Plus, I found a solution to our problem."

Asami did not let it show, but fear crept into her mind: What was the 'problem' here? Did Yoko think Asami was too fat? Asami felt her belly rest against Yoko's slender form as she thought along. Asami wanted to get rounder, softer and cuter- not skinny!

Meanwhile, before Asami woke up on her accord, Yoko had made sure to move the scale before the bathroom counter and had weighed herself out to what she'd expect before. Now to hold Asami while cleaning her up will be a challenge, Yoko thought as the two turned into the bathroom. Holding Asami, Yoko needed to weigh their combined weights in a subtle manner while cleaning Asami innocuously like usual.

1543121211112222221111222112121112111221.content:
"Mommy do you think I'm getting too fat?" Asami asked with a worried look on her face.

"No honey. Why would you think that? You have a healthy appetite. Healthy. You know it would't hurt you too eat a bit more. After all you're a growing girl. Growing girls need a lot of food. A lot of people grow into their weight so don't have to worry about anything." Yoko said. "You should't be so worried about your weight. You're just five. I know a lot of teenagers are worried about their figure but you're way too young to worry about that."

Asami rolled with her eyes. She knew her mother was lying. How old did she think her daughter was. Three? Why did't she just told her.

Yoko filled the bath tub with water and made sure there was a lot of foam just like Asami liked it. She thought it was funny to make a foam beard and/or hair from foam. Asami smiled when she saw all the foam. She liked it to go in the bathtub.

Yoko was thinking what to do. How was she able to read their combined weight without Asami noticed it.
Asami in the meantime undressed and Yoko got a good view at how fat her daughter was. Beautiful love handles and fat folds. Yoko thought she looked beautiful. Like a princess. Just a princess in those stories Asami liked. Yoko many times also told her stories she made up. She had a lot of imagination. Asami always got lost in her stories. Then she knew what to do.

"Asami let me tell you a story. Once upon a time, long, long ago, in a land far, far away from here, lived a princess. She was a young precious little girl. Beautiful, cute and fat."

"Fat?" Asami asked,

She never remembered a single story about a fat princess. Normally it were always tooth pick girls with a waist of a insect. Asami must say she liked this story about a princess much more. It was't for Yoko hard to describe the little princess. She only needed to look at her daughter. Asami was so lost in the story she did't notice that after her mother picked her up looked at the number of the scale and put her in the bathtub, very happy with the result. She washed her daughter wile going on with the story and how it ended with marrying a nice prince who loved a fat princess and how she lived fat and happily ever after.
Asami smiled. She liked this story of her mother way more then any other story she ever heard. Partly because it reminded her a bit about herself. Also that a fat girl was beautiful and cute just like that princess.

Yoko smiled now knowing how fat Asami was.
Then she picked Asami out of the bathtub, rubbed her dry, dressed her in her pajamas that looked a bit tight already, and after she brushed her teeth she went straight to bed since she was pretty tired.
Asami was asleep in a few minutes and Yoko fast ran downstairs to tell Patricia the good news

1543121211112222221111222112121112111221.content:
"Patricia!" Yoko quietly hushed into the lobby once she descended the stairs. "Asami weighs eighty-four pounds!"
Patricia's eyes widened with joy. "Really, now?"
Yoko nodded. "Yes. And she suits that number very well: Her cute little love handles and rolls look perfect on her! I just hope she weighs 160 pounds by her sixth birthday."
And I need to do some more chores, Yoko thought as she considered the prospects of lugging around someone more than her weight: Soft, squeezy and snuggly Asami could be, but the adorable Japanese mini-sumo was difficult to carry like a sack of potatoes.
"I want to see her when she blows out those candles. She will look very gorgeous in those 160 pounds!"
"Yes, she will." Yoko's lips moved while her mind dreamed of her little girl getting too fat to walk: Thick, massive bulges of fat growing through Asami's thighs, rear and elsewhere making her trip over and crawl. For a moment, she could almost see her fat pumpkin smile with an open bucket of ice cream and empty Jack-in-the-Box bag at her feet- her briefs and bikini top stretched to their limits by Asami's beautiful girth while the little girl was downing a Big Gulp. Yoko smiled sinisterly at this thought. "I guess I should start feeding her ten cupcakes a day in preparation for her big birthday."
"Don't forget the ice cream I brought you, dear," Patricia reminded with a smile. "I hope she's eating lots of ice cream in place of milk lately. She needs that sugar tooth in order to keep piling on those adorable rolls."
Yoko shrugged as her gaze fell to the fridge. "Let's hope it works. It should be refrozen by now."
1543121211112222221111222112121112111221.title: Eighty-four pounds of jiggling, visible baby fat!

choices: Too busy, gotta do chores, reward her with candy around the house.
1543121211112222221111222112121112111221.content:
Asami had taken to wearing sweatpants to bed because of their elastic properties. Very small sweatpants apparently. Her legs were stuffed in them. She tried several times to sit up, and eventually succeeded, her belly rolling into her lap like thick banana pudding, and taking up most of the drawstring of the sweatpants, such that you could only see the knots, and her tee shirt showed off her belly button, even though it wasn't made for that.

Asami sure liked feeling so big! Her belly must have grown in her sleep. She took a deep breath while poking underneath her extensive muffin top. She heard stitches creaking. I feel hungry... So she called for her mommy, and Yoko came.

They exchanged good morning's. Asami was about to tell her mom that her clothes felt tight, when she was pre-empted by a deep roar from her cavernous stomach. The dutiful mother lugged her downstairs for breakfast. Waiting for her was a country style feast, full of Western foods: a big omelet, a heap of hashed potatoes, bacon, sausage, and some toast. To drink, she would have heavy cream.

The heavy little girl dutifully slaughtered the omelet and its friends. And it was oddly too easy. The omelet took up a whole plate, and yet with the last bite, she felt very unsatisfied; the food tasted delish, but it wasn't filling.

"Today Asami, I want you to do chores with me; I'll carry you around and you can help mommy." She would need to do vacuuming, dishes and laundry at least. Asami would be most helpful in hanging the laundry and folding."Then after that, you'll play with friends." All together, the day sounded exciting, and Asami excitedly talked with her mom while she ate. She was a polite girl in conversation, so she minded her manners.

Asami ate, and ate, striving to feel sated. Reach for the bacon--munch, munch, much--feel that tee shirt stretch and climb up her gut. As Asami leaned forward to reach for her milk, the furthest thing away, the room filled with a most delightful tear. The seam that sewed Asami's sweatpants had burst. Her waist bulged out of the hole. Her waistband, still in one piece, but useless, created bulges where it lay. Asami drank the milk in victory.

Yoko sat there, rather stunned.

Asami felt like she just ate a light snack, and really needed something to put a dent in her stomach. Someone had underestimated her capacity. "Mommy, I'm still pretty hungry..."

How will Yoko react?

"Ice cream!" Asami yelled with a grin, her rounded cheeks making her smile even more adorable. Yoko then retrieved an ice cream scoop from the silverware drawer before she took out a gallon tub of rich, fattening chocolate ice cream for her girl. Asami sat upright as she let her fingers play with her love handles. Yoko then settled the ice cream before Asami with the scoop.

Asami looked confused when Yoko just smiled. "You must eat it all by the end of the day. You don't want to feel starved, do you?"

"No, mommy," Asami responded, then glanced at her mother suspiciously when the woman was not looking before the tub's lid was opened. Asami dipped the scoop into the fudge and felt the fat hanging from her arms jiggle as she stuffed her mouth with the scoop. Her eyes wet wild!

"This is good, mommy!"

Before Yoko could respond, the chunky girl scooped another ball of chocolate ice cream into her mouth. And another one.

"You are welcome, Asami. Bring the tub with you, now. That will be your snack throughout the day."

Eager to eat the delicious treat, Asami only responded with a grunt as her jello-like flesh wiggled out of her chair and onto the floor. Yoko, meanwhile, took out a handheld vacuum from a nearby closet before she started to vacuum the crumb-ridden sofas of all significant particles.

It was hard work. cleaning the swimming pool but Yoko knew Asami would have fun in it. She would't be the only one. This way she might get the muscles to carry her daughter.

"Ah cleaning the pool I see." A voice suddenly said.

"Hello. Yeah I was cleaning the swimming pool." Yoko said and bend a bit closer to her and whispered. "Also trying to get some muscle. I hardly can carry her anymore."

"Hm You know I have some weights at home. Perhaps you can use those to grow some muscle. They were from my niece. But she left them about five years ago and never asked for them so I don't think she will miss them."

"Well that would be nice, and if you niece does ask about them you can have them back."

Yoko looked at Asami and noticed her soft breathing. She fell asleep."Then she looked at her watch.

"Oh it's almost time for lunch. would you mind stay here to keep a eye on her while I go get some food for her?"

"Not at all. I would love that. Take your time."

Yoko fast went in her car and drove to: Jack in the box.

"Same with Yumiko! She can eat three gallons of ice cream in one sitting, and all I see afterward is a cute smile surrounded by her adorable double chin with food trapped between her body's creases. I wouldn't mind, actually..."

Miyuki and Yoko looked at the two girls, who were now whispering and giggling to each other as the movie continued. Miyuki smiled even more.

"If she got even fatter. I mean- she looks cute enough being this size, but I wonder if I can fatten her until she hits 180 or even 200 pounds. Right now, she weighs about one hundred and ten, but I wouldn't mind if she grew too fat..."

Miyuki glanced nervously at Yoko, but her anxiety was blown away by Yoko's sly smile and response.

"That's what I'm trying to do to Asami right now! Right now, I worry that my husband..." Yoko's voice trailed off with a sob. Miyuki frowned.

"Something happened, I presume?"

"Yes. He's in a coma right now after an accident."

"I am so sorry-"

Yoko shook her head and swept a tear away with her index finger. "It is not anyone's fault, but he went out to organize an appointment for Asami when she was getting a potbelly. I hope to make her so fat, my husband will have no choice but to accept her truly marvelous, jiggling form when she waddles to greet him. That is, if he wakes up anytime soon."

"My husband is different: Right now he is working these hours, but when he comes home, both my Yumiko and husband watch movies together. He likes to compliment Yumiko on how her newest rolls are going to make her a big, beautiful girl!"

Yoko smiled weakly and tried to laugh. "I wish my husband was that way. But Asami seems to enjoy her fat rolls and eating even when I am not around. She loves to wear bikinis around the house, and I know that has a positive body image impact when she plays with her own rolls."

"What a blessed daughter you have! I wish Yumiko would embrace her gorgeous, unique obesity to the same degree Asami does!"

Yoko kept her weak smile. "I would start with complimenting her belly, telling her just how beautiful she is getting and rewarding her with ice cream. Keep on finding kids for Yumiko to bond with, and make sure that they admire her courage. Asami has lots of charm which matches nicely with her softening form."

Miyuki gazed at the nearest wall clock.

"The ice cream store opens in twenty-five minutes. Shall we continue to locate our stuff."

"Ah, yes. Asami needs a week's supply of two-piece swimsuits, some more shirts, and some elastic shorts with equally elastic pipes."

"I know where some elastic shirts are." Miyuki gazed over to an opposing aisle, where several racks bulged with shirts. Both women...

1543121211112222221111222112121112111221.content:
"So your daughter likes it that you fatten her?" Miyuki asked.

"Well to be honest... She does't know that. Or at least I did't tell her. Perhaps she suspect something... But I don't know. I would't mind telling her but perhaps if she finds out she does't want to become fat. So I keep it a secret and keep telling her she is't getting fat. But it seems like she does't believe me."

"I see." Miyuki said. "Yumiko knows she's fat. I hope she starts liking it. That would make things much easier."

In the meantime Asami and Yumiko also started talking with each other.

"Hi!" Asami said with a grin. "I'm Asami. What's your name."

"Eh... I'm Yukimo. Nice to meet you."

"Wow you're fat Yumiko." Asami said with a happy smile but stopped smiling when she saw how sad her new friend looked.

"Do you think I'm fat? I don't...." Yumiko said with tears in her eyes.

"No I think it looks good You look fantastic. Look I'm also fat, and I like being fat. What can be wrong about something so soft and squishy? I think it's great to be fat. Why would't it be?"

Yukimo fast wiped her tears away and started thinking. Perhaps this girl was right. If she really liked how fat she was the calling her fat was a compliment and not a insult. Did she hated being fat. What she did't liked was the teasing. There was further noting wrong with being fat.

"Well the bad thing is that kids teasing you with it." Yukimo said.

"All right." But now what if you like being fat. Then if they call you fat you can see it as a compliment. Besides you like eating right?"

"Well yeah. I like eating. I like it to eat a lot... but..."

"You like soft things? Like your belly? A fat belly is soft. You like playing? A huge belly is fun to play with. You don't like it too worry about your eating. If you like to get fat you don't care what you eat as long if it is a lot."

Yukimo did't knew what to think. That all made sense. She grabbed her belly left and right and shook it and watched it jiggle and smiled. It really was a great toy. You also did't had the trouble of losing it like some other toys. She liked eating and if you did't have to care what you ate it was easier. It also did feel so soft. So soft that...

"Asami... Do you mind if I put my head on you belly for a second?"

"Go ahead." Asami said with a smile and lifted her shirt.

Yukimo slowly put her head on Asami's belly and smiled. It felt like a delicious soft pillow to sleep on. After a minute she went sitting up straight.

"That felt fantastic. I think I like being fat. Sure why not. I like eating without caring what it is, I like soft things and I like playing with it!"

Both girls started to giggle and were still giggling when their mother's returned.
1543121211112222221111222112121112111221.title: It's good to be fat

1543121211112222221111222112121112111221.content:
Later they were all four at the ice cream store. Both mothers with a cup of coffee and both girls with a huge ice cream. It really was a huge ice cream. So big even most fat adults would be having trouble finish it all. But with all the food Asami was fed to past time stretched her stomach enough to eat such a big ice cream with no problem, and Yukimo was used to eating huge meals.
Some people looked surprised at two little girls having such a big ice cream but the girls did't care.

"Careful Asami. Don't eat you ice cream to fast." Yoko said.

"Why not?' Asami asked. "I need to eat my ice cream before it melts."

"But if you eat ice cream too fast you get a terrible head ache. Besides what does it matter if it melts. Then you can drink it.

"She's right you know?" Yukimo said. "I did that once. Eating a ice cream too fast, and… Oh men that hurt."

Asami started to slow down eating her ice cream. She did't want to be in pain. Except pain from a full belly.

"If you still hungry after this we can go to Jack in the box or burger king."

"Mommy… why are you fattening me up?"

Yoko froze for a second but soon recovered.

"What do you mean?" She asked calmly.

"Mom I'm fat. Not stupid. Since we moved you're fattening me up. Before, whenever we went too Mc Donalds I just got a happy meal. But now you buy several burgers with fries, chicken mc nuggets and milkshakes. Did you think I did't know how much you bought? I can count mommy. You feed me enough for several adults. Mc Donalds, Jack in the box, burger King. Those at not known to have healthy meals." Asami went standing on her bench, and grabbed her belly left and right and shook it. "I did't had this before. But from all the food you gave me I became fat. Not only you, Patricia helped you obvious. She wants to fatten me up just as much if you. But you keep telling me I'm not fat. Well I am fat! I know that! You must be blind not to see that. I love being fat. It's cool, it's fantastic. I would like it to become fatter. But why are you keeping it a secret from me?"

Yoko did't knew what to say until she suddenly realized what Asami just said.

"You… you like being fat?"

"Yeah duh. Of course I do. Why would't I? I can eat lots of tasty foods and being fat feels great!"

Yoko hugged Asami tight.

"It's true I did try to fatten you up. I always wanted you to be fat. And yes Patricia did help. You were right about that too. But I was scared that if you realized you got fat you did't liked it a would try to lose weight. So that's why I kept it a secret from you."

"Well you did't have to worry about that mommy. But from now on no more lies."

"How about you mommy?" Yukimo asked her mother. "I know you trying to fatten me too."

"Well yes I did because it made you look so adorable and cute with such a fat belly. Do you like it?"

"Well I guess I like being so fat, and eating lots of delicious food. I also like gaining but... Idon't like the teasing. But thanks to an idea of Asami I think I can handle the teasing."

Both mothers looked with faces glowing from happiness at the two fat girls.

"But now I started to eat my ice cream before it's totally melted!" Asami said.

choices: On the way to the hospital
1543121211112222221111222112121112111221.content:
The next three days were fantastic for mother and daughter. Yoko could now feed Asami without any problem. She did't have to fool Asami she was thin since she obvious was't. However she did sometimes gave Asami compliments about how fat she was getting what was totally true. Weighing her was now easy. Asami stept on the scale. However Yoko need to bend over to see the numbers. Asami could't see them because her belly was in the way. Mother and daughter were both happy with every pound she gained. She also often liked it to show her belly to her mother showing how big it had gotten.
At the same time Asami loved how much she could eat now. How happy it made her mother and also herself since she loved being fat and getting fatter.
Of course Yoko told Patricia when they got home. She was happy she could now feed her without problem. Since all three of them wanted her to get fatter.
Yoko also had felt a drawer with candy, chocolate, cookies and other sweet stuff. Every time Asami wanted a bite she could take something, and Asami often wanted a bite. You could see her often with something in her mouth. And Yoko kept buying huge meals at Jack in the box, Mc Donalds and Burger king. Asami loved all their food. The greasier the better. For the both of them it was Paradise.
Yukimo and her mother appeared to be living very close. Both mothers wanted to make a play date for the two fatties with of course a lot of food for both of them.

Asami was sitting on the couch munching on some donuts. Yoko just stared a it on the air. Thinking about what the future would bring.

"Mommy," Asami said, waking Yoko up from her day dream. "You wanted me to become fat. I still want that. Don't worry. But I wondered… what about daddy? Did he want me fatter too?"

Yoko was surprised. She did't think about her husband for some time. She also did't went to the hospital for some time. Perhaps she and Asami should go again. But how long would he stay in a coma? Weeks? Months? Years? ...Forever? Suddenly she realized Asami asked her something.

"No. Or at least he did't knew anything about the plan to fatten you up. I don't think he minded it if you got a little chubby, but I don't think he wanted you to get fat. He wanted to make a appointment with the doctor to check your weight. Then… well then came the accident. Terrible of course... but I must admit… this did make fattening you up more easy."

"Was it really an accident" Asami suddenly asked suspicious.

"What? Asami how could you say that? Of course it was an accident. I love your father. I don't want anything bad to happen. But if he did make the appointment with the doctor... well no doctor would have thought you were healthy. I can tell you that. But maybe we should visit your father. Would you like that?"

Asami nodded but looked suddenly wit a grin at her mother.

"But can we first get something to eat. I'm starving."

"Of course." Yoko said with a smile.

But when they went outside in public she always gave Ami a dress and it was slowly always getting harder to find one since she outgrow them very fast.

She climbed on the table to grab the carton of milk and with that she waddled over to the T.V with rubbing thighs and jiggling rolls of fat.

Caroline's smile faded when a teenager, Sofia, opened the door and squinted her eyes at both the slender woman and her obese progeny. "Who're you?"
'I am Ami's mother," Caroline forced a smile as she held onto the fluffy wrists of Ami, who happened to be peering through the doorway.
"Well, I came to speak with that woman about a debt she owed my mother..." Glancing nervously at Ami, the teenage girl merely walked around and brushed past Ami as she proceeded down the street. "That fat pig and her granny," Sofia muttered under her breath as she walked away, not to be s.

As Caroline walked in, Ami's thigh-sized arms struggled to pass through the cuffs of her dress as the chunky little girl waddled into the wooden-floored tract home of her grandmother's home. "Here, baby. Let me help you," Caroline whispered as she lifted the lower flap of Ami's dress and inverted it over Ami's head, exposing the well-fed blubber of the four-year old and giving her plenty of room to crawl with. "Thank you, mommy," Ami giggled as she lowered herself onto the floor to crawl. Before Ami's hands reached the floor, though, her gut slapped against the wooden floor to Ami's glee. "I'm so soft! So fat!" The girl giggled as she dragged her flabby-belly across the wooden floor to the living room, her pillow-like arms serving to cushion Ami's girth along its sides.. Caroline couldn't help but smile at her beautiful daughter "struggling" with her weight: She looked so cute when her belly touched the floor, and-

"Carol!"

The voice of an elderly woman disrupted Caroline's distraction before the woman peered off down the corridor. "Mom! We're here!" Caroline announced as she started down the hallway to her parents' master bedroom.

"I think someone needs a bath. What do you think Ami? Is it all right if grandma gives you a bath?"

Ami nodded and got up to go to the bathroom with grandma.

"Oh and you be a dear and go to her house and get some clean clothes for her." She said to Ami's grandfather.

The grandparents had a key for Caroline's house. Always handy for if Caroline forget the key again but also if Ami stayed over there and they forget something like clean clothes or her favorite stuffed animal. A round piggy. She could't go to sleep without it. Also if Caroline went on vacation they could water the plants.

Grandma fast undressed Ami and noticed that even those things started to get tight on her granddaughters frame. This did't made her worried but even some sort of... proud.
She filled the bath tub with water and she soaped in Ami's body and must admit she was surprised when she noticed how much soap she needed for that. She liked taking care of Ami. It reminded her of the time Caroline and her sister were still little.

"Hee Ami I heard you are going to daycare." Grandma said.

"Yeah. Tomorrow mommy is taking me to daycare to play with some other kids. I would like a few more friends."

She must admit she was a bit worried. Ami was morbidly obese and she knew for sure that some other kids would tease her with that, just like they teased her when she was young. The teasing back then was terrible and she sure hoped Ami did't need to go through the same pain she did. But she did't tell Ami or else she might get scared and don't want to go to daycare in the first place.

"Now keep the wash cloth tight against your eyes." Her grandmother said.

Ami did while her grandmother washed the shampoo out of her long black hair. Caroline always liked her daughters long black straight hair. She thought it was beautiful.

"And she was right." Grandma must admit.

She took a towel and started to rub Ami dry while her grandfather handed some new panties and bra for her to wear. While Grandma dressed Ami she must admit that also these were getting pretty tight.

"So all nice clean so that mommy can be proud for having such a beautiful and nice daughter."

Ami nodded and slowly waddled back to the living room and climbed on the couch. She yawned on time and after that she leaned back and fell asleep right on the couch.

Hours passed. The sun completed its cycle across the sky and disappeared beneath the hills beyond. Through this all, Ami slept, and dreamed of food. Succulent, savory treats, and they were all hers...

She awoke with a start. The lights were off, and nothing moved. She scratched idly at her expansive belly, and wiped away the thin streamer of drool that had formed as she slept. She vaguely wondered where everyone was, but soon more pressing concerns revealed themselves- hunger pangs.

She hurriedly heaved herself off the couch and waddled for the kitchen, hoping to find something to satisfy her cravings. When she arrived, a note was waiting for on the kitchen counter. It read:

DEAREST AMI-

Your grandfather and I had to run a few errrands. Your mother asked if we could have you for the night, so don't be alarmed and don't fret. The kitchen is yours tonight.

Love,
Grandma.

Ami clapped her hands with glee, and immediately...
15432111122112.title: She wakes up later

154321111221121.content:
Ami looked around. She liked it to eat. It was her biggest hobby. However not all people agreed that it was a hobby but anyway, Ami looked to do it.
She first opened the cupboard. She grabbed the two boxes of cookies and the three bags of pretzels inside. She tore the boxes open and started to stuff them inside like if she was't fed in days. She hardly took time to chew them. All what she wanted to do was eat. Just eat and eat until she could't eat another bite. Maybe even more after that. Soon all the cookies disappeared in Ami's huge paunch.
Then she ripped open the bags of pretzels and the soon vanished the same way like the cookies.
If anyone would have seen her they would be surprised how fast the pretzels were gone.
After all that salt she became thirsty. She crawled over to the refrigerator. While her belly dragged over the floor. She liked the slippery floor. It was easier to drag her belly over it. However it felt a bit cold.
She opened the refrigerator and she did't remembered much more after that. She just knew her hands first grabbed a bottle of milk that she drank in one go. Then her hands started to grab things and stuff them in her mouth,. She just ate it without even tasting it. It did't matter as long if it ended in her belly. Everything edible she could find were fast gone inside her belly. She suddenly noticed the fridge was empty. But in the freezer she found two gallon of ice cream and a loaf of bread. She started to stuff the ice cream in her mouth with her hands. Making them all cold and sticky bit she did't cared. Not even the pieces of ice cream that fell on her bra, belly and legs and slowly melted.
After the ice cream was gone she ate the still frozen loaf of bread. She did't mind how it tasted She just wanted to eat. Nothing else. As long if it was edible.
She looked further. She opened all doors and looked inside. It she could eat it was gone. Even stuff like a two pound bag of Sugar, a whole box of crackers.
Finally the last edible stuff were two bags of pasta. She looked a few seconds at them and opened them and stuff them in her mouth. Crushing the hard stuff between her teeth. She did't cared it needed to be boiled first. All that mattered was that she ate it.
When the last hand full of pasta went past her lips she slowly looked around. All doors were open. The floor was covered with empty boxes, bags, cans and wrappers. A proof the kitchen once had been full. But all the food was gone in the huge belly of this little girl. She did't leave a single crumb.She must admit she felt bloated but felt so good. It felt so good having all this food inside her. She felt a bit sad there was't anymore food. Not that she thought she could eat more. She was pretty stuffed. But still it felt so good to eat.
She blinked a few times. Then she passed out in the middle of the kitchen . Her belly sticking up in the air.

She rubbed it gently, exulting in its largeness, when she realized that, against all odds, she was still hungry- and there was nothing left in the kitchen to stuff into her fat self. This sent a few worried thoughts bouncing through her mind, but she was not to be daunted. She rolled over on her side (she had long ago become too fat for sit-ups) and, with a chair as support, laboriously pulled herself to her fat feet. All this motion sent her enormous figure jiggling like mad, and she hadn't even started moving for real yet! In fact, standing up was so exhausting that she considered going back to sleep on the floor. However, an angry groan from her belly put those thoughts out of her head. She waddled to the window, making sure her grandparents weren't home, and then jiggled away to look for something else to eat.

15432111122112111.content:
Ami knew there was no food left in the house of her grandparents. It was all inside of her. But her house was just next door. She also knew her mother went shopping today so their must be food there. She slowly waddled to the front door. Her thighs rubbing, her belly jiggling and her butt wobbling.

"Why was't there more food in the kitchen?" Ami mumbled. "I mean come on, grandma also needs to eat. She has a big belly to fill."

Some people sometimes said that her grandmothers genes skipped one generation and were send straight to her. Well she was fat just like her grandmother. Since her grandmother liked it so much and she too her mother saw no problem with it. Besides it never hurt her mother.
Slowly Ami opened the front door. She shivered. It was freezing outside. She put one feet outside and immediately pulled it back in. The ground was ice cold. But there was no other way. She took a deep breath and waddled as fast if her fat feet could carry her too her house. Lucky she had a layer of fat to keep her warm. She reached the front door but noticed it was locked. But Lucky for her she knew where her mother hide an extra key. Just under the door mat. She grabbed the key and opened the door and fast stepped inside. Happy her feet were of the frozen ground. She closed the front door and waddled inside.

"Oh I'm still hungry. You should think I would be full after that snack at grandma's house." She let out a small girlie burp and patted her big belly. "Don't worry my girl. You will be fed soon."

When she finally reached the kitchen she was exhausted from the walk over there. She fell on her fat behind in front of the cupboard. She took a minute or two to rub her cold feet warm. The she opened the cupboard.

"Jackpot." She whispered.

The cupboard was filled with cookies, pasta, pretzels, chocolate flakes and other stuff.
Her chubby hands first grabbed a bag of pretzels. She stuffed them in her mouth with both hands like if she had't been fed in days. When the bag was empty she pulled herself up with help of a chair. It was very exhausting for her but she knew her mother kept milk in the fridge. Her desire for milk was so big she thought it was worth the effort. She opened the fridge and took out a carton of milk.
She fell on her fat butt again and started to stuff her face. She took a box of cookies, a cake and another bag of pretzels. She stuffed the things in her mouth. A cookie then a lump of cake a hand full of pretzels and a few gulps of milk between.

Ami continued to eat and eat and eat. She stuffed her face with cookies, pretzels, and snack cakes from the cupboard and downed them all with huge gulps of milk. When Ami ran out of snacks, she then stood back up, grab more bags of snack food from the cupboard, and then sat down outside the cupboard with a large THUD before she resumed back to eating. As Ami binged to her heart's content, her belly grew larger, rounder, and more distended as her stomach was filled with continuously more and more food from the cupboard. This continued until the cupboard was empty of all the food within Ami's reach. Her belly was filled with all of the reachable food from the cupboard, large and round as a beach ball. And yet, Ami is still hungry!

"Ugh, come on, I need more food for my poor tummy," Ami said as she tried to shake a bag of cookies off one of the top shelves. However, as Ami struggled to get more food off the cupboard, she began to feel her throat become dry. Ami ate so much food that she forgot to drink.

"Oh, I forgot to leave room for milk," Ami said to herself as thoughts of milk entered her mind. She picked up her milk carton, finding out that it was empty. She waddled to the fridge, but she was saddened that there were no cartons of milk left in the fridge, just vegetables, fruits, and a small slice of cheesecakefar from her reach. However, the light from the fridge illuminated a part of the kitchen that held an even larger fridge.

"I haven't checked this fridge before," Ami wondered as she waddled to the larger fridge. As Ami opened both doors of the fridge, she squealed in delight. The fridge was filled to the brim with milk. Seemingly endless gallon-sized milk jugs lined the inside of the fridge, with no other food in sight. One half of the jugs were filled with whole milk, while the other half of the jugs is filled with Dutch chocolate milk. The freezer half of the fridge was filled to the brim with large tubs of ice cream with a multitude of Ami's favorite flavors. It was as if this was Ami's dream fridge.

"Ah! There's so much milk!" Ami squealed. She took a gallon of whole milk from the fridge and sat down on her huge bottom, making yet another THUD. She brought the jug to her mouth and chugged down the milk in the jug like a big fat baby, not even taking the time to pause for breath. As the milk went down to her stomach, the dry food in her stomach became drenched in milk, causing her belly to expand even larger. After some time, Ami depleted the entire gallon of milk, yet she was still craving for more!

"Still thirsty..." Ami moaned as she took a gallon of chocolate milk out of the fridge. She gulped down the gallon of chocolate milk the same way she drank the entire gallon of whole milk, and her belly grew bigger and more distended as it filled with more milk.

She tossed the empty carton away and let out a huge belch and noticed she finally felt full and sleepy. She saw the open refrigerator and lifted her leg just enough to kick it so it closed. The next moments she passed out right on the floor her belly sticking up in the air.


"Ami! Ami wake up! What are you doing here?"

Ami sleepy opened her eyes and saw her mom by her side. She yawned and rubbed with her fists in her eyes. She looked a bit surprised why she was in the kitchen. Then slowly she remembered what happened. However she did't exactly what happened at her grandparents house. That part was bit blurry. But she remembered it included a lot of eating. But she could't even remember what all went through her throat.

"Ami! What are you doing here. You would stay at you grandparents house."

"Yeah well... I did but I got hungry." Ami mumbled.

"Did't grandma and grandpa have any food?"

"Not anymore." Ami mumbled so soft her mother did't hear.

"Fine. I go over there to tell them that you here before the notice you're missing and are worried sick about you."

Ami bend her back. It hurt a bit. She stretched her arms a bit a got a painful look on her face.

"Make a mental note. Don't fall asleep on a hard floor. It's kind of bad for your back and neck."

She took a look at the fridge. It really was her dream fridge. However she wondered why she never saw it before. She could have walked past it for several years without noticing it. according to her mother she always opened closets to look what was in it. See if it was edible. One time she even drank a bottle of methylated spirits. Afterward they went to the hospital to pump her stomach empty. However that did't ruin her appetite or space in her stomach.
A few minutes later her mother came back.

"Well, my grandparents did't noticed you were gone. However It seemed that there was't any food left there. You ate it all. How were you able to eat all that?"

"I don't know. It's all blurry. I just wanted to eat. I was't thinking clearly. The only thing in my mind was eat."

"By the way how did you boil that pasta. You know that you're too young to use the cooker."

"I did't boil anything... I think. But I'm pretty sure I did't."

"You ate all that pasta raw?"

"I do remember I ate something hard. However I don't remember much about it. I don't know why. But since the food there was gone I went over here. By the way, since when did we have this fridge?"

"Of yeah. Do you like it? I bought it especially for you. since all the milk you drink and all the ice cream you eat. Now we have a fridge just for you with enough milk and ice cream for some time. That way I don't have to go to the store so often."

"Thank you mommy. It's wonderful." Ami said and stood up and fast grabbed pants. Thanks to the size of her tummy the elastic broke. "I'm sorry I ate all the food from the cupboard, and that I walked home without telling them, and that I ate all the food at their home. Are they angry at me?"

"Of course not. Grandma I proud that you were able to eat so much for a midnight snack. Well I see you're sorry and it's just some food. No big deal. There are more important things to do. Like day care. Are you still hungry for breakfast?"

Ami thought for a second. Sure she still felt some of the food of her feast in her tummy. She was't hungry but she could eat something, Besides she never turned down a chance to get something to eat.

"Yeah.... perhaps just a small breakfast."
1543211112211211112.title: I was just hungry

15432111122112111122.content:
Of course, with Ami, nothing could be small- her breakfast took up two plates and was far more than enough calories for any other four-year old- even though it left Ami feeling a mite peckish. Nonetheless, she didn't want to bother her mother by asking for even more, so they left soon after. Now, though, she wished she had- she had only been at daycare for 30 minutes, and already her big belly was hungry again.

"Shh!" she said to it, trying to quiet its growling. "We can't eat right now!"

Her belly growled again, sadly, and Ami was truly able to appreciate how massive she had made it.

In a high school, her outfit would be called indecent. Here, though, it was simply out of necessity- she had eaten so much last night that she burst the elastic on her stretchy pants, which kept them riding down her vast body, and her T-Shirt was far too small to contain all of Ami's bigness- so that left her big tummy on display for all to see.

Which, of course, growled again. Much louder. A few feet away, a girl building a block tower looked at her in surprise. Ami turned away, hoping to avoid further embarrassment. Her belly had grown so much that it now touched the floor whenever she crawled, and when she sat on the floor, it did the same. Ami was rather proud of her immensity, all told.

But not when it kept asking for more like this!

The growl it just let out actually was so loud it startled the block-tower girl into misplacing her next block, which in turn collapsed the entire thing! Seeing all her hard work go to waste, the girl began to cry.
