It was recess. Natasja, like always, was sitting on a swing alone. Not doing anything, just sitting there. She was always greatly shy, so making friends seemed impossible. All of the teachers and some of the kids felt sorry for her. Some of the teachers tried to help her make friends, but no luck; none of the kids that were tried had no interest in being her friend...until today.

"Hello", said a voice. Natasja looked up and saw a big fat belly right in front of her face. She looked up more and saw who it was. She didn't know her, but she looked familiar. "Hi", Natasja said "do I know you? You looked very familiar..." "I'm Nikki", said the girl. Natasja shot up off the swing, "Not Nikki Glemcer, the girl who's always hungry!"

"I'm am Nikki Glemcer", she stuck her chunky hand out for a handshake.

Natasja was still shocked from meeting one of the most amazing girls she had ever seen. She took the handshake.

"You were awesome at that eating contest!"

"Oh that thing last year? That was nothing!"

"Really?" Natasja was never so talkative before.

"Yeah, really. What's your name by the way?"

"I'm Natasja Adams".

"I'm used too it and i eat most of the day. That helps a bit. Then i feel a bit less hungry."

Natasja looked admiring at Nikki's big belly. A ball of flesh made by years of constant eating. It must have been a hard job.

The next moment she got as red if she could become. She feared she might have hurt Nikki's feelings. She looked scared at her but Nikki still looked friendly.

"I know i have a big belly! Eating all the time does that but i like it! You also have some extra pounds." She said friendly.

Natasja felt her big belly and let her hands slide down to her pillow like behind. She felt a strange feeling in her chest she never felt before. Slowly it got stronger. She then knew what it was. She felt friendship for Nikki.

"Well i guess i'm also a big eater. My mommy says i'm a pizza monster. But i'm not hungry all the time."

A teacher looked from a distant at the two fat toddlers and smiled.

Natasja was also happy. For the first time she had a friend. It felt good.
Nikki went sitting on another swing. The wood made a few cracking noises but hold.

"Yes i do!" Natasja yelled happy.

She started to hug Nikki what was a bit hard thanks to the big bellies they had.

Natasja let go and went back sitting on her own swing with a smile this time.

155111.title: Finally a friend

1551111.content:
Natasja couldn't be happier. She finally has a friend. Even more so, a friend who thinks of being fat the same way she does.

The tubby two were almost without eachother for the rest of the day. They had so much in common. They talked about favorite food, least favorite food, the great feel of being fat, ect. Natasja had never been so social in her entire life. Probably because Nikki is a lot like her when it comes to food and the concept of being fat, something both of them love.

It was the end of the school day. The two fatties stayed a fair distance from the rest of the kids, who were waiting to be picked up by their parents, as well as Natasja and Nikki.

"You know, you never really told me why you're fat and why you like it", Nikki noted.

"Sorry", Natasja apologized, "You're fat because of constant hunger right?"

"Yeah", said Nikki, patting her gut, "Some people would probably look at it as a curse, but if you ask me, it's a blessing"

Natasja smiled.

"So what's your story?", Nikki asked.

"Oh", said Natasja, "Well, I never really did much of anything other than sit around and eat. I remember back when I was thin, when all this", she placed a hand on her belly, "didn't exist. At some point, because of all of the lazyness and eating, I became a chubby girl, and then later on, became the fat girl I am today. So me being fat was an accident, but hey, it shows good things can come from accidents", she patted her belly, using it as an example.

"Good thing for you that it happened", said Nikki, "I personally think skinny is ugly"

"Yeah, but to skinny people fat is ugly", said Natasja.

"If you ask me", said Nikki, "I think if you want to be thin, you're crazy.

"So do I", said Natasja, "But if they want to be paper, let them. They have their reasons. No one can control others"

Nikki frowned, thinking about her parents having a conversation about her weight that she overheard a while ago. She remembered hearing the phrase that utterly scares her: "...put on a diet".

"What's wrong?", Natasja asked.

Nikki shook her head, "Nothing"

Natasja saw her parents drive up to her. "Goodbye", she said, getting in the car. They drove off.

Nikki's parents picked her up a few minutes later.

15522221222211.title: It's just baby fat

155222212222111.content:
"Let's go on the computer," said Sophie.

So they hopped on the computer and went on YouTube, searching for clips of characters from cartoons and movies gaining weight. The sisters felt a bit envious, watching these people pack on the pounds; just watching them grow made them want to eat more and outgrow them all, despite their very filling breakfast earlier.

"Can we search for that blueberry from the chocolate factory?" asked Sophie eagerly. Melanie smiled. Both of them loved the movie Charlie and the Chocolate Factory, but the scene they loved the most, was Violet Beauregarde swelling up like a blueberry. They never got bored of seeing the girl's skin turn blue, followed by her belly gurgling and swelling up like a massive blueberry; they would often pretend it was happening to them. After Violet finished swelling, both girls were excited to hear the Oompa-Loompa song that followed. Both girls sang along happily to the song, using their bellies as drums, making them jiggle with every beat.

Once the video ended, Sophie wanted to watch it again, so Melanie agreed to play it one more time, and this time they would re-enact the scene as it played; Sophie wanted to be Violet. As the Oompa-Loompa song played, Melanie started rolling Sophie across the floor, like the Oompa-Loompas rolling Violet to the juicing room. It was already making Sophie feel sick, thanks to her earlier massive breakfast binge, that hadn't finished digesting.

Melanie could already tell that Sophie wasn't feeling good from all this rolling and stopped before it got worse, but Sophie was already moaning weakly, one of her hands rubbing her aching tummy, and her other hand covering her mouth, in case she threw up. Melanie also gently rubbed her sister's belly to try and soothe it.

"Next time, let's not do that right after we've stuffed ourselves," Melanie thought to herself.

"Aha!" Melanie said. "This might help."

She took a bottle of sprite and poured it in a glass and handed it to Cindy.

"Sprite help against a upset tummy. Drink this."

Sophie had't a clue or this was true. However she did't care. She was willing to try anything to prevent her from throwing up. Besides she trusted her big sister. She emptied the entire glass in one go. She let out a huge belch. Melanie started to rub her tummy. Did her best to be as gentle as possible. Mumbling encouraging sounds. Sophie slowly started to feel better. She closed her eyes for a second but soon was out like a light.

She woke up some time later. She was still in the kitchen. However there was a blanket over her and a pillow under her head. She wrapped the blanket around her and slowly waddled to the living room. Melanie was watching T.V but looked up when she saw Sophie.

"Oh. You're up. You passed out and you looked so cute. Little kids always look so cute when they're asleep. So I decided to let you stay. But I decided to give you a blanket and a pillow."

"Thanks. But next time also take a mattress. That kitchen floor is hard. But at least that nap give me the time to digest the food. It also preventing me from throwing up."

"I'm sorry about that Sophie. I did't knew it would make you feel sick."

"Come on sis! Stop it! You're acting like it was all your fault! I was on in this too! I wanted to play Violet too! I wanted that you rolled me around! Well until I felt sick. But what I try to say is that you can't take all the blame. I'm just as much responsible for it as you."

"But I'm you big sister. I'm suppose to look out for you. I should have known better."

"Come on. You can't know everything. No one can. There are things no one know's about. Like do parallel universe exist? Why do boats and airplanes disappear around Bermuda triangle? Is there live on other planets?"

"Are you sure your tummy is feeling better?" Melanie asked, just to be sure. Sophie's belly suddenly gave a familiar-sounding gurgle, that pretty much screamed, "FEED ME!" "Pretty please?" Sophie begged, holding her hungry belly in her hands while using puppy eyes. Melanie couldn't say no to a face like that, even though she would gladly feed Sophie regardless. "Right away, Violet," she replied, patting her younger sister's rumbling tummy.

Melanie looked around the kitchen and found two boxes of cookies, along with a 2-liter bottle of Coke. When Melanie returned with the snacks, Sophie eagerly laid on her back with her mouth wide open, both her hands on her jiggly dome.

"Here we go, blueberry," Melanie quickly opened the first box of cookies and stuffed two into her sister's mouth. While Melanie stuffed two cookies into her own mouth, Sophie quickly chewed both her cookies and swallowed, opening her mouth for the next batch. Melanie quickly finished chewing and swallowing her cookies and fed Sophie two more cookies. And so it went, back and forth, until they finished the first box. Before Melanie could open the second box, Sophie interrupted, "I'm thirsty."

Melanie quickly opened the Coke bottle and began pouring the drink down Sophie's mouth. Sophie drank it down like there was no tomorrow, feeling her tummy expand with each gulp. Melanie also saw her sister bloating with each gulp she took. Sophie had finished half the drink, and Melanie finished it off in large gulps, one hand on her expanding belly. After Melanie drank the last drop, both girls let out enormous belches, causing them to blush.

1552311111221211.content:
As they drove home, the two "little" girls sat in the back seats, and let their breakfasts digest. Their tummies were now swollen with all the food they ate; Taylor looked like she had eaten a watermelon, and Sam was easily twice as lare as she was before.

Judy was still surprised as she was driving. How could two little girls manage to eat so much food? It was like they didn't know the meaning of the word "full"! She smiled, though; for some reason, she felt relieved that she didn't have to deal with another child that was scared if they saw any form of junk food.

She focused back on the road. In a few minutes, the house came into view. Judy turned to the girls; Taylor was fast asleep, but Sam was just now waking up. Judy smiled and said, "You might want to wake up your sister. We're home now."
Sam nodded and gently shook her sister awake as Judy got out of the car. "Wake up, sis," she said to Taylor. "We're home now." Taylor woke up and stretched her arms out, making her shirt ride up and show her stuffed belly. Judy helped Taylor get out of the car and walk into the house.

Once they went inside, Taylor went to the couch and laid back, still letting the food digest. Sam smiled, and hugged her sister. Judy went into the kitchen to put up her purse. Sam thought; if she wanted to, she could rub her sister's belly, so she'd be hungrier when she woke up.....whenever that would be. On the other hand, she still had a little room - she could ask Judy if she would make some more food for her to eat. But which would be better: rubbing her sisters fat belly, or stuffing her own with more food?

A deep growl from her stomach made the decision for her and as much as she loved stuffing her sister he also liked to pig out.

She waddled into the kitchen still not used to the added weight in her belly and saw Judy reading the calendar mounted on the wall. She looked up and noticed Sam.

"Do you need something Sam?"

Before Sam could open her mouth to answer her belly growled long and loud.

Judy stared at her bewildered.

"You're still hungry?"

Sam blushed.

"Well I just had a little room left when we came back and then all of a sudden by tummy started making lots of noise and now I'm really hungry again. So I was wondering if you could make me some food."

Judy smiled.

"Sure. I'll make you something but I'll give you something to munch on first."

Judy went over to the pantry and took out several cookie packages and put them on the table.

Sam climbed onto the chair and tore open the first package as Judy started cooking.

Sam slid one cookie at a time into her mouth munching them briefly before swallowing. She now began shoving two cookies in her mouth at once and quickened her pace.

Out of the corner of her eye Judy watched as Sam finished the first package and then move on to the next now shoving whole handfulls into her mouth greedily speeding through the package in record time before prompting Judy to hurry and finish cooking but my the time she had put the food in the oven Sam was finished.

"How long"? Sam asked.

"About fifteen minutes."

"Okay".

Judy noticed that Sam was much more patient than her younger sister. Was it because she was older?

She witnessed her mother die at the hands of her drunk father. Not only was she scared to the core of her being, life without her mother completely changed her. Originally, she always spoke, and was always a part of everything. Now she almost never says a word, and is always that one person outside of the croud. She never did, however, abandon her kindness. Because their her little sisters, Mandy's always there for them, no matter who it is. Not only is she always protecting them because their her sisters, but if she wanted to die, it would be protecting those she love, like her mother. But the main reason she protects them is because she learned of death very quick. Someone dies, they're never seen again. And Mandy doesn't want anymore of her family dead, not after seeing her mother die.

1552322222222.title: Another combo

choices: The girls continue their reckless eating over the next few weeks
15523222222221.content:
Zoe and Stella giggled and whispered to each other as they sat waiting for their mum to pick them up from school. This was their first day at their new school. In fact recent days had seen the girls experience a lot of firsts. That Monday had been their first house move as their mother had called to another job in another city. Then they had been bought they’re first gaming console, a PlayStation 4, on Tuesday so they would keep quite while their mother unpacked. Their mother had been incredibly busy between unpacking and settling in to her new work, and had bought them McDonalds for breakfast on Wednesday morning, getting back from an incredibly early meeting and not having time to cook the twin’s breakfast before leaving again.

This had been an amazing discovery for the twins, and they’d instantly fallen in love with the greasy and filling food they’d gotten. They’d never had take-away before, their mother instead showing her love and devotion for them by hand cooking meals. Each twin had gotten a Mighty McMuffin and a medium orange juice as well as two hash browns, and they had both scarfed their meals down as quick as possible, loving every bite. Their mother was so happy she didn’t have to feel guilty about cooking them breakfast that she’d quickly promised them they could have McDonalds, and any other fast food, very often.

This fairly large meal had left the twins stuffed and happy, and they’d spent the next few hours lying on the couch playing games together while their small bellies got to digesting the fatty food. The rest of the day was fairly uneventful, snacking on biscuits and fruit as they waited for their mum to get home and cooked dinner.

Thursday then was their first time eating take-away for dinner, their mum ordering in 2 large pizzas and two servings of brownies with the intent of there being enough left for the girls to take to school for lunch the next day. The girls however made a serious dent, eating one of the pizzas between them, which was as much as their mother ate. This again left them quite gassy and stuffed and they lazed around and played their PlayStation again before eating the brownies for dessert and collapsing in bed.

Their Friday had also been uneventful, going to their first day at their new school although they kept mainly to themselves. They were currently whispering and conspiring about what they should get their mum to buy on the way home that afternoon, seeing as they’d only had a quarter of a pizza each for lunch. They also had their first swimming lesson at the indoor pool in their new town and while swimming used to be their favourite activity, they were now looking forward to their afternoon binge far more.

“Come on, donuts would be best!” Zoe whispered, “Stacy used to say they were her favourite and I want to try them.”

“But McDonalds would be so good,” Stella replied, “I really want to try a big Mac.”

“Mm, that would be nice.” Zoe said thoughtfully, the image of a huge greasy burger just for her making her mouth water, “But we had pizza for lunch I want something sweet.”

Just then their mum pulled up in their car.

“Come on girls get in, we’ve got to go pick up your swimming stuff from home!” Their mum shouted from the car.

As the twins got in the car they found a McDonald’s bag each on the back seat.

“I thought you girls might be hungry after your small lunch so I got you each a snack.”

Both girls ripped open their paper bags to find a small burger meal, not much food but enough to last them for a bit.

Suddenly Zoe stopped and turned to her mum, “Thanks mum but can we get donuts?” She pleaded, “I’ve been looking forward to getting some all day.” She finished, putting on her biggest puppy dog eyes.

Their mum turned to look at Zoe and instantly fell for the puppy dog eyes, “Well alright, I’m sure we can pick up a box. You can finish it for dessert too.”
Zoe cheered and Stella smiled through her mouthful of fries.

The girls finished their McDonald meals as they drove home and their mum rushed inside to get their swimming suits, and then talked excitedly between themselves about the donuts they’d soon be eating.

As they arrived at the local crispy crème their mum turned to the twins and said:

“Alright girls, you can get two donuts each, one for now and one for after dinner.”

Zoe pouted, “Aw but mum, I’m still hungry. You didn’t give us much lunch and that snack was pretty small too.”

Their mum felt a wave of guilt at her children’s hunger, feeling as though her inability to feed them enough was a sign of her failing as a parent.

“Well alright then, we can get a mixed dozen, but I don’t want you two eating too much now or you won’t want to swim!” She finished sternly.

The girls cheered at this and waited excitedly as their mum made the purchase.

The twins took a donut each and Zoe clutched the box protectively as they walked back to the car.

As they drove to the pool their mum made the mistake of not checking just how many of the donuts the girls were eating, instead revelling in the silence that permeated the car while they didn’t talk.

However that silence was broken as they pulled into the swimming pool carpark and a huge belch erupted from the back seat. And before their mum could reprimand Zoe’s manners, Stella let out her own loud belch, rivalling her sisters.

“Girls!” Their mum said sternly, “Manners!”

The girls replied “Sorry mum.” In unison.

Their mother got out of the car with a sigh and went around to the back of the car to get out the bag with all their swimming stuff in it. After she was done she was surprised to find the rear doors to their car still closed. The girls loved swimming, usually she could barely keep up as they ran to the water, so why were they still sitting in the car?

She went to Zoe’s door and opened it, only to find her daughters still sitting in their seats, burping and rubbing their stuffed bellies, the messy remains of their meal still stuck on their faces and their eyes glazed over as they digested their meals. Their bellies weren’t very big but they looked pretty obvious on their otherwise skinny bodies.

“Come on girls, what’re you doing?” She asked, more than slightly confused, “We’re here.”

"Well, urp, we don’t really feel like, urp, swimming after those, urp donuts.” Zoe said, struggling to keep her gas down as she rubbed her own belly.

“What?” They’re mum asked confused, before seeing the completely empty donut box sitting between the girls.

“You ate them all?” She said, more shocked than angry.

“Yeah! Urp, they were delic-urp-ous.” Stella said, her hands also rubbing her own swollen belly.

“I told you if you ate too many you wouldn’t want to swim!” Their mum said in frustration, “Come on, we’ve driven all the way here so I think you should at least try to swim for a bit.”

Both girls groaned out loud, but went to get themselves out of the car.

The girls walked into the changing rooms with an exaggerated slowness, each still using both their hands to rub their bubbly bellies, letting out burps the whole way. Their mum was slightly embarrassed by their constant gas, messy faces and exaggerated belly rubbing, avoiding eye contact with the other parents who’d brought their children to the swimming pool after school. Luckily, due to their snack brake all the other kids were already in the pool and the changing room was empty.

The girls got to taking their school uniforms off, stripping down so they could get their swimsuits on. Their mum opened the bag with all the swimming gear in it and quickly handed each girl a swimsuit, Zoe getting a pink one and Stella getting a blue one. They were simple one piece swimmers, basically just a square of fabric with holes cut out of the bottom with straps on top to go over the girl’s shoulders.

The girls stepped into their swimsuits and pulled them up, being very careful to not bend too much and put undue pressure on their stuffed bellies. When they had finally put their swimsuits on they stood there, burping still and rubbing their bellies.

Their mum was slightly shocked at the sight of them, their faces were messy and their usually very form fitting swimsuits now looked even more so as the tight plastic outfits hugged their swollen bellies, accentuating just how much they had managed to stuff in there. They looked a few months pregnant.

With a sigh, their mum asked “Alright, now that you’re dressed are you two still sure you don’t want to swim.”

“Yes” the twins replied in unison.

“Well, I guess there’s no point in making you.” Their mum said, trying to keep her frustration down. The girls were a mess and maybe it was best she didn’t force the issue right now, she could always bring them next week.

Both girls sat their burping, still waiting for their mum to make a move.

With a sigh their mum went to pack up the bag, putting the girl’s school uniforms in it. “Alright girls let’s go. There’s no point in you changing out of your swimsuits again yet, you can do that at home.”

The girls grunted in agreement and followed their mum back to the car, and sat quietly, except for the burping, the entire trip home, their usual energy quelled by their full bellies.

The girls collapsed on the couch as soon as they got home and just sat there watching tv, not even bothering to play games. Their mum gave them a sandwich each for dinner to top them up so they wouldn't get hungry during the night, and then sent them to bed.

Mary cleaned her plate and ate the remaining lasagna and wolfed it down fast. When the two girls were both done they were sitting in their chairs with round tummies.

"Can we leave the table mommy?" Mary asked.

"Sure you two can. I'll clean the table." Their mother said.

Mary and Rachel waddled to the T.V in the other room. But Mary noticed Rachel's painful moans and the fact she was holding her tummy. She fell down on the couch. still moaning.

Mary sighed. She knew what was coming now. The mean insults she heard everyday. She got so tired of it. Why did they do it. The mean jokes they made were't even funny. She did like her fat but disliked the teasing that came with it. But she had friends who did't mind how fat she was. With them she could deal with the teasing.

"I did't knew hippo's were allowed at school!" A girl yelled.

Mary knew that it was best to ignore them. Besides she was pretty slow thanks to her weight and they were thin and pretty fast so she could't catch them. She sighed and walked to her class. It was a comforting thing to knew that her sister did't have to go through this. At least not yet. She wished she did find a way to fatten her sister up fast.

"I feel sorry for your chair!" A girl said who walked by.

Mary looked angry at her. When they started teasing some years ago she started crying. But after some years she was used to it. She could't do anything about it. After all it were just words. However... there were some girls who were more mean. Who also really hurt her, Like mean redhead Daisy, or slimy Susan. They were real mean who also really hurt you. And she was an easy target. She walked in her class room.

"Oh I thought there was a earthquake but it was just you!" A boy yelled.

"If you stand on a scale it read: People, people, please one at a time!" A girl yelled.

"Don't listen to them. They're stupid."

Mary looked up and smiled when she saw her friend Diana. Fast she went sitting on the desk next to her. Diana was tall but pretty chubby with bright red hair a almond shaped green eyes. Mary believed she would once be a real beautiful girl were all boys would be drooling about.

Like I said don't listen to them. I like your big belly. I have also a nice jelly belly." Diana said while pointing at her belly, however it was smaller then Mary's. "Besides you're planning to gain more weight right. It's fine. I support you. I think it looks good at you."

"So do I." A voice said.

Mary looked over her shoulder and saw Virgina. Bit of a tomboy with her short blond hair and dungarees with a few stains on it. A girl who was't worried to get dirty and liked cars and motor's.
Suddenly she saw Jennifer walk over to them. Jennifer was kind of small and thin as a rail. She had dark brown hair till her shoulders and a pinched face with a tiny cute nose and beautiful big brown friendly eyes. She went sitting on the spot next to Susan.
Mary smiled. Her three best friends. All three knew about her desire to gain and supported her in it.

"So it seemed like you gained some more." Susan said.

"Yeah... but I feel a bit bad for Rachel. She does't seem to be able to gain."

"Well I know what we can do to help her gain!" Diana said.

"Yeah. And knowing Mary it probably will get even bigger. But I'm not worried. I only want you two to be happy. As long if you're happy I don't care how big your bellies are. Your happiness is the mos important thing to me. Now come on I'll carry you too the car."

He picked her up like if she weighed nothing more the rag doll. All the training in the army made her dad very strong. Rachel liked being carried in his big strong arms. He put her in the car and left a note for his wife so she would't worry and drove of to Mc Donalds.

"So how is it going at school?" He asked.

"Not so good." Rachel mumbled. "I don't have any friends. Yesterday the kids started teasing me. They called me a piglet because... because they said that... Mary is a fat pig. And since she's a pig and I'm her little sister I'm a little piglet."

"Really. Well don't listen to them. You and your sister are both two beautiful girls. You're surely no piggies. Mary perhaps does have a big appetite but there's nothing wrong with that."

Rachel smiled weakly. What her dad say did cheer her up. But Mary had a big appetite and she did't. How could she become fat with such a small appetite. She sighed. Mary was so confident all fat. She wanted to be like that too. But gaining weight was hard with a small appetite.

"Ah here we are. Burger King. One of the three things that made our country fat. Together with KFC and Mc Donalds. With a M that looks like two hills. They call that the fat tits of the USA!"

Rachel wanted to get out of the car but her dad stopped her.

"I'll carry you Rachel. You better don't use that ankle too much. Did't the doctor said that you should give that ankle some rest?"

"Yeah he did." Rachel said while her dad picked her up.

A few minutes later they stood in line. Rachel smiled laying in her father's arms.

"What do you want sweet hart?" Her father asked.

Rachel thought what too take. She did want to gain but she was't sure she could eat too much. But at the other hand she did love burger King and perhaps this was a good opportunity to stuff herself a bit. But could she really eat so much.
15523222222222112211111121221222112.title: Going Burger King

155232222222221122111111212212221121.content:
Rachel's dad ordered three burgers for his daughter and a burger and fries for himself. They then sat at a table and began eating their lunches. After eating her first burger Rachel immediately started eating her second burger. After eating her second burger Rachel's belly started feeling a little tight and she started to rub her belly and was moaning and her father noticed.

"Are you alright Rachel?" asked her dad.

"Yeah, it's just I think that I may have ordered a burger too many" said Rachel.

"Would it be alright if we went home now and save that burger for another day?" asked her dad.

"Yeah I think so" said Rachel.

Rachel was upset since she wanted to gain weight but unfortunately she has such a small appetite especially when compared to Mary who she has seen eating more than double then what she ordered and still have room for more. So they went to their car and drove home and when they arrived they saw that Rachel's mom was back.

"Hey Alice" said Rachel's dad.

"Hey Robert, so how did you and Rachel enjoyed Burger King?" asked Alice.

"It was great, but I ordered a burger too many and I didn't eat it" said Rachel.

"Oh well that's okay, we'll just put it in the fridge and you can eat it another day" said Alice as she put the burger in the fridge.

"Hey dad can you take me to the living room so I can watch the?" asked Rachel.

"Sure thing sweetheart" said Robert.

After taking Rachel and putting her on the couch Rachel watched tv while her parents were in the kitchen talking and from the laughter she heard it must have been a pleasant talk. After watching tv for a while her mother came from upstairs with two bags in her hands.

"Alright I packed you both your pajamas, some clean clothes, your toothbrushes and your sleeping bags" said Alice.

"Don't forget Wolfie for Mary" said Rachel.

"Don't worry I made sure to pack Wolfie. Now just to let you know your father will be driving you instead of me" said Alice.

With that said Rachel's dad put her in the car and drove to Mary's school. When they arrived he called out to Mary who was surprised at first but when she recognized him she went up to hug him and after that she got into the car and they went to Diana's house.

1552322222222211221111112122122211211.content:
"So here we are. Will you two be all right." Their dad asked.

"Of course dad. Don't worry. They're my friends." Mary said.

Their dad bent over to Mary and whispered: "Keep an eye on Rachel okay."

While their dad drove away Mary rang the doorbell. Diana opened the door with a bright smile.

"Mary! Rachel. I'm so happy you could come. Come right in. Virginia and Jennifer are already here."

Rachel was surprised when she saw the room. It was obvious this room was made for kids. There were some chairs and tables but they were kind of small. Easy to sit on or use when you're a little kid. There were boxes full of toys. The closets were filled with toys and boardgames and drawing stuff. There was also a computer with lots of games but also... a big T.V with DVD player and a lot of movies for kids next too it. Two couches were standing for the T.V so the kids could easily watch. There were two mattresses on the floor. Virginia and Jennifer were talking.

"But He really likes Ronnie .N. I'm sure of it. They just don't want that everybody else to know." Virginia said.

"Why would't they? Love is a beautiful thing." Jennifer said.

"Yeah. On high school. If you're in love in elementary school all class mates tease you. Oh hi Mary... Rachel." Said Virginia

"Hello girls." Mary said. "Ready for a sleepover?"

They all cheered.
The next hours were filled with talking about what happened on school, funny things they saw on T.V or on the computer and watching T.V. Rachel must admit she did had fun. The other four girls really tried to take her up in their conversations. Perhaps they only did it to do her and Mary a favor but she had fun.
A moment when Rachel was talking with Virginia and Jennifer Diana tapped Mary on the shoulder.

"Time to start. My mom ordered pizza's. I made sure she ordered enough since you and I eat a bit more then a normal girl. But also because tonight we're gonna force your sister to eat more. If she eats more after she thinks she's full her stomach will stretch. If we do that on a daily basis she'll be able to eat more in the future. I already told Virginia and Jennifer"

"Yeah all right... but eh.... If we feed her way too much... it comes all back out again right. I remember I once tried to eat without paying attention to my complaining tummy. Finally it all came back out again."

"We just need to be careful that does't happen. Sure it will hurt in the beginning... but we do this to help her. We wanna give her the chance to become fat."

"Well I guess that's true. No pain no gain. Right."

Some time later they heard the door bell. Diana walked too the door and returned with several pizza's.

"Oh great I love pizza!" Virgina said.

All girl grabbed slices from several pizza's. Trying different flavors. Diana and Mary showed the could eat but noticed that Rachel was full after a half pizza and one slice.

"Oh I'm full." Rachel mumbled.

"Oh no you're not little Rachel." Diana said. "You see... I like you. You're the little sister from of one my best friends. You have a nice personalty. You're fun to hang out with. That's why we also invited you. But we know you want to gain. But you don't seem able to gain thanks to a small appetite. So we made a plan to help you gain."

"Really?" Rachel asked.

"Yeah. However it might hurt a bit. We just need to stretch your stomach by pushing more food in it." Virginia said.

"What. But girls I'm full already." Rachel said.

"You just need to eat more." Diana said and brought a slice to Rachel's face who held her mouth shut.

"Come on Rachel." Mary said. "We're only doing this to help you. You know I would never hurt you on purpose. Now just cooperate and eat or else we have to force it down your throat."

Rachel looked at Mary, at the slice and at the others. She felt so full. But she wanted to get fat. This could help her. What should she do?
1552322222222211221111112122122211211.title: Time to start

Rachel thought about it for a while, on one hand she would like to get fat on the other hand she was already full. The last time she ate even though she was already full her belly hurt and she threw up all over the floor. But she always trust Mary so if she says that this is the best way to get fat she'll trust her.

"Well if it'll help me get fat, sure why not" said Rachel.

"All righty then let's get this started" said Diana.

The girls then started shoving slices of pizza into Rachel's mouth. As expected it started to hurt belly but she kept eating anyway because she's always wanted to be fat like Mary. Soon all the slices of pizza were gone and all in Rachel's belly.

"How are you doing Rachel?" asked Mary while she was rubbing Rachel's belly.

"A little bit sick but I think I'll be fine" said Rachel.

"Good cause it's time for round two" said Diana.

"Round two?" asked Rachel a bit worried.

"Yeah the dessert part of your feeding. We got chocolate chip cookies, chocolate cake, chocolate ice cream and just regular chocolate" said Diana.

Rachel was torn, she really loved anything chocolate but she felt like if she kept eating she'll either explode or throw up.

"I think I have a little room for more" said Rachel.

The girls then fed Rachel the entire chocolate cake which made her extremely full but before she could say anything they started feeding her the ice cream and the cookies. None of them could imagine the pain in Rachel's stomach and none of them knew as they were too busy feeding her cookies and ice cream. However Mary then noticed a tear on Rachel's face.

"Guys I think we should stop now" said Mary as they all started to notice the tear on Rachel's face.

Rachel was feeling pretty sick and she didn't know if she could keep it all in or not.

155232222222221122111111212212221121111.content:
Rachel felt terrible. Her belly was swollen and hard like a rock. She never had eaten so much in her life. At least not that she could remember. But just a tiny bit of her liked the feeling of being this over stuffed. But she was in so much pain. Suddenly she felt the pizza crawling back up but she swallowed it down. She laid back her belly sticking up in the air.

"Well I think she surely gained a few pounds." Virginia said.

"We'll just have to wait until it has digested." Jennifer sad who softly pinched Rachel's belly. "All the food is now in her belly. After it digest it turns into fat."

"It hurts so much." Rachel moaned.

"Oh I don't like seeing her in so much pain." Mary said. "Can't we do something to help her ease the pain a bit?"

"Well... the pain is just something she needs to go through. Several times. but your belly get's used to hold more food this way. But I guess we can give her some belly rubs. That will take away the stuffed feeling."

Mary and Jennifer started right away rubbing the round swollen belly of Rachel. Rachel must admit that it felt good. But she wondered if there was't another way to get fat. But she liked the belly rubs. She felt again pizza coming up but swallowed it down again.

"Wow. Her belly is really hard. Like a solid rock." Jennifer said.

"That's what happens after you stuffed yourself to the brim. I have done it several times. My belly was always hard after wards." Mary said.

"I'm sorry Rachel. But if you wants to get fat you need to eat more. This way we're gonna stretch your stomach. See it like a t-shirt. You know that if you pull long enough at a T-shirt it stretches. We're doing the same witch your stomach. Or see it like a balloon. Blowing a balloon up the first time it's kind of hard. But if you blow it up once it's easier blowing it up a second time."

"But balloons... can... explode. " Rachel mumbled.

"Yeah but I don't think that's true. I never heard a human explode from eating too much food. Sure there are some silly kid stories about it but I never heard somebody really explode." Diana said.

"Touch me with a sharp object and I will proof you I can." Rachel whispered so soft only Mary and Jennifer heard it.

"Correct me if I'm wrong, but my mother always tells my fat little sister that it does't matter so much how much you eat but what you eat. Fatty stuff makes you fat while you should stay way from fruit and vegetables. However we fed you a lot of fattening stuff so..." Virginia said slowly.

"True." Diana said. "But that's just part of it. Getting fat is part what you eat and part how much you eat. Like you get way more calories from a huge bar of chocolate then from a apple. But you get really fat if you combine eating more and fattening stuff. And seeing Rachel she really needed it. Sorry for that Rachel but don't worry. You'll will get used to it."

"Yeah and I will help you all the way." Mary said. "You're my little sister. I won't let you do this alone."

Rachel felt again pizza coming up but she swallowed it down again and this time for good.

"Also don't do to much exercise." Virginia said. "That's a way to lose weight."

"Well they did't have to worry about that." Mary thought. "Jennifer never really was an active kid."

1552322222222211221111112122122211211112.title: Continue the sleepover

1552322222222211221111112122122211211112.content:
Rachel woke up with a shock. She was sweating. She had a terrible nightmare. She did't remember exactly what happened. But it had been terrible but the dream already started to fade away like it mostly does. Sometimes you're able to remember a dream but mostly you forget them as soon if you wake up. Sometimes you remember a few parts but mostly you totally forget what the dream was about. Rachel did her best to remember. She remembered it included a lot of food, pain and weight gain but that was all.
However there was one good part. She was't sure if it was because of the nightmare but she felt pretty good. The pain of pizza stuffing was gone. Sure the pain had been terrible but if this was the way to get fat like her sister she would do it. She rubbed her belly and realized she could eat something.
All others were still asleep. She could clearly see her sister. The shape of her huge belly was clearly visible.
She remembered a fairy tale about a man who had six servants. One had such a huge eye that everything he looked at exploded. One could stick out his neck very far, one got it cold while it was warm for everybody else. But one of them was very fat. When he slept other people thought you saw a mountain. Just like she now saw the belly of her sister. However her sisters belly was nowhere near a mountain. She did't believe anybody could reach that size. It was a fairytale after all.
She looked around and saw the small shape of Jennifer and Virginia. She looked further and saw the chubby form of Diana. Suddenly she noticed something. The eyes of Diana opened.

"Oh. Hi Rachel." She said and smiled.

"Hi Diana. Did I wake you up?"

"No don't worry. Anyway I'm sorry for stuffing you with that pizza. It was't fun for you. But you got to believe me. I just want to help you get fat. That's what you want right. Else I will stop right now."

"I do want to get fat just like Mary. But it was so painful. But I guess no pain no weight gain. (giggle) Anyway... it's strange but I could eat something."

"Really? Does it already has effect?" Diana asked and looked around.

"Hm. I think it's better of we let the others sleep. We go to the kitchen."

The two girl slowly slept barefooted too the kitchen. Diana opened the refrigerator and suddenly smiled.

"Rachel Eat this!"

She threw two pounds of butter and looked with a smile at Rachel.

"Eat Rachel. Believe me. Butter is one of the most fattening things in the world. It's about 80 % fat. Believe me. You can't go wrong with butter!"

Rachel smiled. She did't knew this but thought Diana was right. But she never ate butter. Sure she had eaten bread with butter before. But just eating butter without anything else was different. She took one huge bite of better but suddenly realized she liked the taste of butter. She started to stuff her face with it. Soon two entire pounds of Butter were in Rachel's belly.

Diana's dad. He was a big man. Not fat but very tall and muscled, but at the same time very nice and friendly. A few wrinkles at his eyes told her he laughed often. Rachel understood why Diana's mom married him.

"Hello there tiny. You're... Rachel. Mary's little sister is that right. The one with the appetite of a mice."

"Ooooh! I'm just trying to gain weight. I want to be like my big sister. I wanna be fat. Have a huge big belly. Bigger butt and thighs. I wanna be fat but... at the same time... I don't want that they tease me with it. I know some kids tease Mary with her size. However she's very confident being fat. I'm not sure if I am if I'm fat.

"Confidence can come from many things. Weight, muscle, clothes and other stuff. But I guess you gotta choose. Being fat and be teased with it or stay thin and not... or well not be teased about your size. But you probably get teased anyway. Bully's pick out a easy target. If it''s not about your weight they do it about clothes or hair or freckles. So that really does't matter."

"Well then I do wanna be fat. Just like my sister. I already started by over stuffing me.. Yesterday and during a midnight snack. It worked. I ate more during breakfast."

"Rachel do you know what I do for work?"

"Eh... I know your wife is a teacher in kindergarten." Rachel mumbled.

"Yeah and she's good with kids. But I'm not. Well I'm also good with kids... I think but I'm no teacher. I'm a scientist. I'm creating new things that can help the world. Help people. Perhaps I have something that can help you."

He reached in his pocket and took out a little box. He opened it. Inside were seven white pills. Rachel looked at them and then back at Diana's father. Not really knowing what to do.

"I invented those pills. What you need to do is: take a glass of water and put the pill in it. It soon dissolves. Then you drink it. Don't worry it tastes sweet. Now the pill makes you hungry. It also makes you able to eat more, slows down your metabolism and makes almost anything you eat turn into fat. It has't been tested on humans yet, so we don't know if it has any side effects. But if you really want this... I can make you our guinea pig. So take one of those pills each morning. I'm sure you'll soon see results. Now don't tell anyone about this all right. It's just our secret."

Rachel put on big eyes. She was't really sure. But why would Diana's father do anything bad to her. She wanted to gain weight. So why not.

"All right I'll do it."

"Great. wait here. He returned a few seconds later wit a glass with water and put on pill in it. It soon started to dissolve. It did't looked much different. Rachel took the glass and took one sip. It tasted delicious. She drank the rest of the glass in one go. She waited. One minute... two minutes and after three minutes Rachel felt something in her belly gurgling.

"Oh men I'm hungry. I better get back to the kitchen. See if the have some waffles left."

"Don't forget the pills. One each morning in a glass of water and don't tell anyone."

Rachel put the box with pills in her pocket and ran back to the kitchen.

"For a big girl Mary sure is hard to find. Are there any other places Mary could hide?" asked Diana to Rachel.

"Well the only place we haven't checked yet is the basement" said Rachel.

Rachel then showed Diana the basement which was pretty dark even after Diana turn on the light switch. Both Rachel and Diana were walking with their arms in front of them trying to find Mary. They did this for a while until Rachel could felt something squishy in her hands and after she gave it a pinch she heard giggling.

"Diana I found Mary" said Rachel.

"Hi Mickey. Nice to see you again. I'm looking forward to the sleepover. By the way this is Mary, my big sister."

"I did't mean that like a bad thing. I mean my entire family is fat and I'm fine with that. To be honest I like fat girls. And I think you look very good being so fat. Just like your sister. You would't look good if you were skinny!"

Mary's frown slide of her face and she smiled friendly at him.

"You sister can be a bit scary sometimes. You know that?"

"Nah. She's just a bit protective about me. That's all.

"Hi Rachel. Can I sit here?" A voice suddenly asked.

Rachel looked up and smiled when she saw it was Mickey who looked smiling at her.

"Sure go ahead. I would like that. Mary went over to your sister. Your sister wanted to ask her something. Do you by any chance know what she might wanna ask?"

"Well since it is Alex I think I know," Mickey said. "You saw my sister. You know she's fat. Not just a bit chubby but fat. Really fat. Even fatter then you sister. Compared to height and age she's even fatter then my other sisters. Anyway Alex is proud at how fat she is and about how much she can eat. But well she wants to proof how big and fat she is and how much she can eat. Especially against another far person. A person like your sister. No offense. So she's probably gonna challenge her to a eating contest. But let me tell you… I never saw her loose a eating contest."

"Wow. Mary can eat a lot but... I'm not sure if she can beat your sister. I mean I saw her eat. She has a huge belly so she can stuff a lot of food in there."

"She sure can. Alex thinks: Being full is no reason to stop eating. Or in her case, stop stuffing her face. She has eaten herself sick more then once just so she could keep eating. Other kids are happy with a new doll, or I Phone, or tablet. But Alex likes food, eating and gaining. That are her hobbies. I'm sorry Rachel, but your sister does't have a chance."

"Well it is't over till the fat lady sings right. But I think you're right. Mary can eat a lot but not as much if Alex. But well that does't matter. I mean it's just a eating contest. In life you win some you lose some. I mean it;s just for fun."

"Perhaps. But my sister takes this very serious. Some people hate losing. Well my sister does't mind it if she loses a board or a card game, but I knew for sure she won't be happy if she loses a eating contest. So your sister is gonna lose a eating contest. I guess for a gainer like your sister that's no fun. But you're right. It's just a eating contest. It's for fun."

"Well I'm happy to hear that. But who knows. If I get really fat perhaps your sister can challenge me once."

"I'm sorry to say this Rachel but There's no chance you beat my sister."

"Well no not with this stupid, skinny, toothpick body. But when I stuffed it full with lots of junk food, sweets and chocolate and other stuff for several years who knows?"

"I understand then you will be fat, but Alex will gain too while you gain. And she has a bigger appetite then you. So she will gain even more then you gain. Sorry but there's no way you gonna beat my sister. Not now, not ever."

"Well perhaps not but still… I wanna become fat. Perhaps I'm never gonna get fatter then your sister or my sister but well I can be a good third fattest girl. Would you still like me if I'm fat?"

"Of course I will I also like my sisters and mother and they're fat. If you wanna get fat I'm gonna help you."

Rachel smiled.

"Ha Ha looks like they let a bunch of hippos go to school today" said a bully.

The others looked up and saw a boy a year younger than them. He was wearing a t-shirt with a skull on it, a baseball cap and some camouflage jeans. Mary and her friends were used to the bullying and usually just try to ignore it. However Alex got up.

"What did you say punk" said Alex clearly mad.

"I called you a hippo, but that's a little harsh you're more like elephants ha ha ha" said the bully laughing.

"Yeah Yeah you probably said this hopping that we would go home and cry to mommy. Once upon a time that's exactly what I did. People would call me 'hippo', 'elephant girl', 'fatty fat fat', 'Alex two tons' and every time they did I would cry home to my mommy. Eventually I stopped caring what people think and a few years ago I learned something" said Alex as she was approaching the bully clearly shorter than her."I'm bigger than you".

Alex then bumps her large belly into him knocking him to the ground. And then Alex turned around and sat on him. As she sat on him she placed both her hands on her belly rubbing it lovingly.

"Get off me" said the bully.

"No I don't think so, and you know another thing I learned you taste like chicken" said Alex licking her lips and shocking the bully and Mary.

"W-w-what?" said the bully frightened.

"Oh come on you didn't think I got fat by just eating food. The first girl who ever bullied me I stuck her head in my mouth and finished her off in just three gulps. The next guy my dad barbecued him and ate until he was nothing but bones. The next one my boiled him and made into soup. Anyway what I'm trying to say is that anybody that even though about teasing me went straight to my belly" said Alex as she patted her belly making it jiggle.

"Please don't eat me, I'll never make fun of you again I promise" said the bully now crying.

"Good also don't make fun of my pal Mary or I'm going to introduce you to your new home" said Alex rubbing her belly. Alex got off the bully and as soon as she did the bully ran away. When the bully was far away Alex started laughing.

"Did you see the look on his face? He actually thought I was going to eat him" said Alex as she was laughing.

"So you don't eat people?" asked Mary.

"EWW of course not. But at least he won't bully you or me ever again" said Alex.

The school bell rang and the children made their way to their next class.

At the end of the school day Rachel ran over to her sister but suddenly saw how worried she looked. Slowly she walked over to her.

"Eh Mary. Is everything All right with you."

"Huh? Oh it's you Rachel. No not really. Remember You gave me a message from Alex?".

"Of course I do. But according to Mickey it's just a eating contest. But I don't think you can beat Alex. She is fatter then you and I saw her eating a lot. Also she has done this before so she has experience. So I'm sorry but I don't think you gonna win this one. But don't worry. It's just for fun."

"That's the point. It's not. If it was just for fun I would't mind so much loosing but... See I went over there with Diana. Jennifer and Virginia. Anyway when she asked me for that eating contest Virgina said I could easily beat her and…"

"Might of habit. Anyway she said I should do it. So I did. But then came the question if there's a prize and Virginia suggested that the loser should pay for all lunches of the winner for the next year."

"What? Mary you can't be serious. You maybe get more allowance then me because your older but what Alex eats in one day. I mean all your allowance in a whole year would't be enough to feed her for a month, Perhaps not even a week. Then what?"

"I know. I know I just did't knew she could eat that… much."

"What were you thinking. Mom told us never bet about money."

"You mean never bet with money. Does't matter I guess. If I need to buy lunches for a whole year… I guess I need to sell some of my stuff. Perhaps I can…"

"Man that's really mean of her."

"I never be able to beat her anyway."

She smiled and said: "I'm still a bit hungry."

"I hope so. You need to eat a lot more if you want to beat Alex. Men she's fat!" Virginia said.

"Hee! I know she's fat, but apart from being a bit competitive with a eating contest she's pretty nice." Mary said.

"Nice? You think she's nice?" Virginia asked. "If you lose you need to pay for all her lunches for a year, and her lunches are BIG. Really big. Even bigger then yours. That will cost a lot of money. How is that nice?

"Well to be totally honest… she did't said that," Jennifer said. "You did. Alex just asked if Mary wanted to have a eating contest with her. You said she should do it, and after the question if there would be a price you suggested that buying lunch for the other."

"True," Diana said. "I remember it that way too. So it's your fault. Now we need to stretch the stomach of Mary so enough food will fit in."

"Mary we are best friends since kindergarten," Jennifer said. "You're my friend and I will help you, but to be honest… I don't think this is gonna work. I mean you can train all you want but I doubt you get as fat if Alex, or eat as much if her."

"That's why we train her," Virginia said.

"No matter how hard she trains… she won't be able to beat Alex. All this training is useless. Look at the food we have. Do you think Alex eats that much?"

"Nope!" Rachel said. "Way more. That's just a snack for her. I was at their house. Mary you helped me stretch my stomach and it helped but it's a slow progress."

"Yeah she's right. I don't think we can make you so fat before Saturday. Besides perhaps Alex is training too. Then she's even fatter then she was yesterday," Diana said.

"You should have said: "No!" to the bet," Virginia said.

"Well that's helpful! I was't even sure I wanted to compete in a eating contest against her but you said that I could totally beat her. But I should have said: No? Now you tell me?" Mary said.

"She's gotta point there," Rachel said. "You might sometimes try to keep your big mouth shut."

"My mouth is not big," Virginia mumbled grumpy.

"No she's right. Your mouth is big enough to get a airplane in," Jennifer said

"All right but what are we gonna do now?" Diana asked.

"Well.... you brought all that food. It would be a waste not to use it. Maybe I can't get fatter then Alex, or eat more then her, or win the eating contest… but I can give her some competition!"

"So we continue training you… even when you have no chance in winning?" Jennifer said.

"You know what they say. Winning is't important, it's doing your best. Besides I want to gain weight anyway sooooo…."

Mary unbuttoned her pants making her belly spill out. went lying on her back and looked at her friends.

"Feed me all you brought and if that's gone feed me more until I'm stuffed over my limit. Perhaps I can't win but I can put up a fight!"
1552322222222211221111112122122211211112.title: You can't win!

1552322222222211221111112122122211211112.content:
The day had finally come. Between Wednesday and Saturday Jennifer, Diana, Virginia and Rachel trained Mary by stuffing her with lots and lots of food even when she was already full. The training paid off as her belly was noticeably bigger than it was a few days ago. Mary's mom also noticed as Mary's clothes were getting a little too tight for her and said that after Mary hang out with Alex she would take them clothes shopping(I say them because she also noticed that Rachel's clothes were a little tight).

On Friday at lunch Alex told them to come at her house at 10:00AM and I'm bring their swimsuits tomorrow to go swimming in their swimming pool after the eating contest. They arrived at Alex's house with Mary's mom saying that she'll pick Mary and Rachel up at 2:00PM. They rung the doorbell and Alex answered in her two piece bikini.

"Oh hey guys you made it, come in" said Alex.

"Why are you in a bikini?" asked Mary.

"To give more room for my belly. Speaking of which you should probably change into your swimsuits now this contest shouldn't take long" said Alex.

The girls all went into the bathroom to change into their swimsuits Mary and Jennifer both had two piece bikinis while Diana, Virginia and Rachel all had one piece swimsuits. When they got out they followed Alex into the kitchen where they saw Alex's big sisters Betty and Sally in their two piece bikinis, her little brother Mickey in his swimming trunks, her dad outside grilling on the barbecue and her mom who offered them some lemonade.

"Is your sister ready for this?" asked Mickey to Rachel.

"She should be, she didn't eat anything this morning to make room for this" said Rachel.

"That must have been hard for her. But still I don't think it'll help her against Alex" said Mickey.

Alex's dad came into the kitchen and brought two platters that had enough hamburgers and hot dogs to feed at least three families. Alex and Mary both sat at the kitchen table.

"Hey Mary before we start I just want to ask. Win or lose, can we be friends?" asked Alex.

"Of course we can" said Mary.

"Good now let's dig in" said Alex.

Alex and Mary both dug in and started eating the hamburgers and while they were doing that Betty, Sally and Mickey were cheering for Alex. While Rachel, Diana, Jennifer and Virginia were cheering for Mary. After about fifteen minutes the platters were empty.

"Are both of you full?" asked Alex's mom.

"Ha! Not even close" said Alex.

"M-m-me neither" said Mary with some discomfort in her voice.

"Then the contest is still on! Although we should take a little break besides it'll take your father a while before the next batch to be ready" said Alex's mom. Mary excused herself to go to the bathroom while Mickey went to go talk to Rachel.

"Wow I'm impressed. Nobody's ever lasted this long against Alex" said Mickey.

"She's just getting started" said Rachel. After a few minutes everyone was talking to each other and Rachel went to go check on Mary but not before she got something out of her bag. Rachel knocked on the door and Mary told her to come in.

"I don't think I can do this Rachel, I'm more full than I've been in my life" said Mary.

"Yeah you're packed" said Rachel as she touched the normally squishy belly of her sister which is now as hard as a rock.

"But I got a solution" said Rachel as she showed Mary what she got out of her bag.

"Are those the pills you take to make yourself hungry?" asked Mary.

"Yeah I figured that I should bring them just in case you needed them and right now it looks like you need them" said Rachel as she put a pill in her lemonade and it dissolves.

"I don't know, isn't this cheating?" asked Mary.

"It's ether this or you have to sell your stuff in order to pay for Alex's lunches for the year" said Rachel.

"Hmm good point" said Mary as she drank the glass of lemonade.

"How do you feel now?" asked Rachel as Mary's belly growl.

"Hungry" said Mary.

Mary and Rachel went back to the kitchen as Alex's dad came back in with a second batch of hamburgers and hot dogs.

"Are you ready for round two?" asked Mary.

"I was about to ask you the same thing" said Alex.

Mary and Alex then ate.

1552322222222211221111112122122211211112.content:
Both girls were stuffing Hamburgers and hot dogs in their mouth. Grease dripping over their chins. More burgers and hot dogs went past each pair of lips.
Mickey, Betty and Sally were all impressed. Their little sister had competed more times against other fat kids and never lost. They knew for sure she did't want to lose this competition either.
Finally both plates were empty and both rubbed their swollen bellies.

"Seems like it's a tie." Jennifer said.

"No we're not done," Alex said. "There's more food. But after all those hot dogs and hamburgers I'm looking forward to something sweet. Sally, Betty, can you two be a dear and make two of my favorite ice creams?"

Sally and Betty smiled in a sinister way and waddled to the kitchen.

"A delicious ice cream," Alex said. "How does that sound? Delicious right. I must say I'm impressed. No one has ever gotten this far. And believe I had plenty of eating competitions."

Mary rubbed her swollen belly. Sure the pills helped but they also they had their limit. Mary was starting to feel full. She wondered how Alex was doing. Perhaps she also was a bit full. She was worried that she perhaps could't beat Alex. Not that she minded that so much but buying lunches for Alex for a entire year… that would cost a lot of money.

"Your sister can really eat a lot," Mickey said. "I thought she would have given up by now."

"Then you don't know my sister yet!" Rachel said.

A few minutes later Sally and Betty returned with a bowl with each five different kinds of ice cream with a warm sauce of red fruit like strawberry's, raspberry and some other red fruit. On top whipped cream with some sprinkles.

"Can she really still eat all that?" Diana asked in disbelief.

Both girls grabbed their spoon and started to eat.
Mary must admit that it tasted fantastic. They made good ice creams. But no matter how good it tasted, her belly was almost full. But she kept eating. Just a bit more that would stretch her stomach even more. But finally she could't eat another bite. Not without exploding. Her belly was tight and hard like a drum. She belched loudly
Alex looked at her smiling and kept stuffing her face and finished her ice cream. Her sibling burst out in applause.

"Thank you! Thank you!" Alex said. "Eh Mary if you can't finish your ice cream... can I..."

"Sure go Ahead," Mary answered.

"Well we go swimming!" Virginia said.

"Sure go ahead. I need to sit down for a bit," Mary moaned.

Six girls and one boy ran or waddled to the swimming pool. The other two girls heard loud splashes.

"You know, some people call me the walking garbage bin. Guess I'm sort of am. At least I eat leftovers from my friends. If they agree of course. Guess they call you names too."

"Yeah they do but well, I'm fat and I'm a gainer so…"

"Yeah me too. I like you. I think we can be good friends."

"I think so too. But now I need to sell my stuff to buy lunch for you for a entire year."

"Do you really mean that?" asked Mary.

"Of course I do, I wouldn't be a good friend if I let you go broke over you paying for my lunches" said Alex as she put an arm over the shoulders of Mary.

"Yeah, but if you ask me Virginia should be the one to pay for both our lunches" said Mary.

"Isn't a bit cruel to have your friend pay for both our lunches?" asked Alex.

Mary and Alex joined the others in the swimming pool both of them doing a cannonball. The eight girls and one boy splashed around and played pool games until at least 1:50PM. Diana, Virginia, Jennifer, Rachel and Mary got out of the pool, went to the bathroom to dry themselves and put on their regular clothes. They said their goodbyes and wait outside for their parents. Mary's mom came first.

"So Mary how are you going to pay for Alex's lunches?" asked Virginia.

"Actually while you were swimming, me and Alex agreed that you should pay for both our lunches" said Mary as she entered her mother's car.

But before Virginia could say anything else Mary shut the door.

"So is that true?" Rachel asked curious.

"What? Oh you mean that Virginia should pay for our lunches? No of course not but now she has something to think about over the weekend. And the bright side is Alex and I are friends now and she said I don't have to pay for her lunches. She would't be a good friend if I needed to pay for her lunches for a whole year."

"That's nice of her. Besides paying all lunches for her for a entire year, how much would that cost? So much money that would be a real prize."

"What are you two talking about?" Their mother suddenly asked. "I hear some things about money and paying. I want you girls to be careful with money. You can get in serious problems. Remember aunt Gina?"

"You mean gambling Gina?" Mary asked. "I do remember her. But we did't saw her that often for some reason."

"Well the reason was that she had a gambling addiction. That's terrible. You play games so you can win money but... You don't win or barely. Anyway you lose more money then you make. Way more. Some people lose a lot of money or their stuff, their car and even their house. That's what happened to Gina. And she still wants more money to play hoping she's gonna win. So that's why we rather don't want you two seeing her. To be honest I hope she gets caught and get's help. Problem is you need to accept help since they can't force you to get help. So be careful you two.
Anyway back to more fun things. Buying clothes. You both need new clothes. Now that's nothing new for you Mary. Since I need to buy new clothes for you about every month. However for you Rachel... I noticed your clothes are getting tight. Seems like you're gaining weight."

"Well I do. It that… eh... a problem?" Rachel asked.

"A problem. Rachel how can I have a problem with your weight while I have to buy new clothes for your sister every month because she gains so much weight so fast she outgrows them?"

Rachel smiled. It seemed like her mother would't bother her in her way becoming a fat girl.

"But mom did you see Alex?" Mary asked. "She's fat."

"Mary Alex is not fat. She's morbidly obese! I saw her and I never saw such a fat girl. But I guess that's not her fault. At least not completely. I also saw her sisters and mother. Well they're also fat. She comes from a fat family so it's normally she's also fat. That are just bad eating habits. A young kid eats what her parents give her or him and she gives them fattening food... well then."

"But Mickey is not fat. And what's up with me. You and dad are't fat."

"Well I don't know how Mickey was able to stay thin but as for you you just had a very big appetite and a taste for fatty food. And when you could finally crawl you always crawled around looking for food Crawled to the kitchen and looking through the cupboard or when we had guests you grabbed their cookies. Also sometimes you tried to eat something that was't food like a cigarette from a friend of us. Soon you could get out of bed and went to the kitchen and sneak food and well you here now. That's how you got so fat. oh... eh sorry Mary I..."

"Don't worry mommy I'm fine. I'm: Fatty Mary. That sound nice does't it? It's catching."

"Well here we are. This store has clothes for normal sized kids but also has a plus size section for you Mary. Lets go."

Mary, Rachel and their mom went into the store to shop for some new clothes for Mary and Rachel. They went into the plus size section of the store where they bought some clothes that fit well. After they left the store Mary and Rachel's bellies were growling.

"Hey mom can we get something to eat?" asked Mary.

"Sure, what do you want?" asked Mary and Rachel's mom.

"Ice Cream!" yelled Rachel.

"There's an ice cream place near here so we'll go there. Also we're going to have to eat it inside so the ice cream doesn't melt in the car" said their mom.

They got into the car and drove to the ice cream place. They went inside where Rachel ordered a chocolate sundae and Mary ordered three banana splits. Mary finished her first banana split when her mom got up.

"I have to go to the bathroom so can you keep an eye on your sister?" asked their mom.

"Sure mom" said Mary as her mother got up to go to the bathroom.

"I gotta say Mary, I was surprised that you were still hungry after that eating contest with Alex" said Rachel.

"Must be a side effect of those pills" said Mary as she finished her second banana split.

"Still I feel kinda bad about Virginia right now" said Rachel.

"Yeah me too, but it's her own fault" said Mary as she finished her third banana split.

Mary and Rachel's mom got out of the bathroom and she saw that both Mary and Rachel finished their ice cream so they got in their car and drove home.
1552322222222211221111112122122211211112.title: Ice Cream

1552322222222211221111112122122211211112.content:
Mickey and Alex were sitting at the edge of the swimming pool while Betty and Sally were still swimming.

"So, you won," Mickey said. "No surprise. You never lost a eating contest. And you had some."

"I only have eating contest against other fat kids. To proof I can eat more and I become the fattest. Besides it's more fun if the other has a chance. Even if it's a small chance. Besides I must admit she did better then the others. I mean no body came past the second plate."

"I would't even come past the first plate," Mickey mumbled. "But I feel sorry for Mary. Now she has to pay for your…"

"No she does't. She's pretty nice. We're friends now. So I decided that she does't have to pay for my lunches. We get enough allowance already. It would be mean to eat away all her allowance."

"So you and Mary are friends? And I like Rachel. Is't that funny? Now they can come together!"

"Yeah I must admit it is kind of funny that you like the youngest sister and I like the oldest. The skinnies and the fatties."

"Well Rachel want to become fat," Mickey said. "She is't fat but she tries to eat more and become fat. Just like her big sister. By the way pretty nice of you that you did't take her allowance. So under all that fat is a beating hart. In reality you're a softy."

Alex grabbed her brother and pushed him against her blubber.

"Of course I'm soft little brother. Don't you feel how soft I am? Soft and squishy like a nice pillow."

"Hee Alex!" Sally yelled. "We found a way to make a even bigger cannon ball!"

"That is gaining more weight so you have a bigger butt sister!" Alex yelled back.

"No! Like this!" Sally yelled.

She and Betty grabbed each other and jumped in the pool together. The force of both of their fat bodies caused a mini tsunami that came right on top of their younger siblings.

"Oh yeah. A fun day at the pool," Alex mumbled.
1552322222222211221111112122122211211112.title: Alex and Mickey

1552322222222211221111112122122211211112.content:
The rest of the weekend was pretty uneventful. On Monday morning Mary and Rachel woke up, got dressed and ate breakfast. After breakfast their mother drove them to school. When Mary got to school she noticed that her friends weren't around. When she got to class she found out that Diana, Jennifer and Virginia were all sick which bummed her out since being around her friends was the only thing that made the teasing bearable. A skinny girl named Susan then walked up to Mary.

"Hey piggy you look bigger than usual, what'd you do? Eat a horse?" asked Susan as she laughed at her own joke.

Mary tried her best to ignore her but without her friends around it was pretty hard. It was soon lunchtime and Mary made her way to the cafeteria where she bumped into the belly of Alex.

"Hey Mary, why are you so glum?" asked Alex.

"I've been having a bad day" said Mary.

"Want to talk about it?" asked Alex.

"Sure" said Mary.

Mary and Alex sat at the table and Mary was talking about how all her friends(except Alex) were sick and how Susan kept teasing her all day.

"Usually I just ignore her or one of my friends tell her off, but since they're all sick she's just not stopping" said Mary.

"Well sounds to me like you always let your friends fight your battles for you so it's no wonder that she's been teasing you all day" said Alex.

"Sand what?" asked Mary.

"Sandwiching. It's when two fat people have a somebody between their bellies. My big sister Sally told me about it" said Alex.

"Have you ever sandwiched someone?" asked Mary.

"Oh yeah. A couple years ago this skinny girl was bullying me for weeks then one day I told Sally about and she suggested that we sandwiched her, so we sandwiched her between our bellies and we wouldn't let her go until she agreed to stop bullying me" said Alex.

"Well alright if you think it'll work" said Mary.

"Of course it'll work. Now where do you think she is?" asked Alex.

"Well gym class is next and whenever we get gym class after lunch she's usually 10 minutes early" said Mary.

"Great, let's go" said Alex as she and Mary made their way to gym class.

They entered the locker room and saw Susan putting on her gym clothes. After she was done Mary and Alex made their move, Alex was behind her while Mary was in front, they then sandwiched her between their bellies.

"Let me out of this you whales!" said Susan.

"Not until you agree to stop bullying me" said Mary.

Mary didn't think this was going to work. Then she remembered the time that Alex was able to scare that off a bully by pretending that she was going to eat him. So she.....

"Hmmm," Mary said and licked her lips. "That tasted pretty good. If there's no chance she'll stop teasing we might as well eat her. That's the only way we can be sure she stops."

"Wait! What? Eat me?" Susan asked nervous.

"Sure why not. If the rest of your body taste just as good if your hand."

"You eat people?" Susan asked.

"How do you think I get such a huge beautiful belly? From eating nothing but salad like you? No. I found a lot tastier food to satisfy my belly. So come here. into my tummy," Mary said and pointed into her mouth.

"So how are we gonna do this?" Alex asked. "Do you just wanna eat her raw? I mean you can do other stuff with her. Bake her or roast her."

"Maybe rub her in breadcrumbs and fry her. I think that will taste really good."

"That sounds like fun. But that idea from the breadcrumbs and frying her sounds more tasty," Alex said.

Susan curled up to a little ball.

"I... I don't… wanna be.. ea… eaten. I'm… still so young. I'm too… too pretty to… get eaten."

"Too pretty to get eaten?" Mary asked. "You wished. You're nothing but dinner."

"No! No please! I don't wanna get eaten!" Susan screamed in fear, she was really crying. "What now if I promise I won't tease you again! Mary I will never tease you again. I promise!"

"Hmmm," Alex said. "That works for her... but what about me. What's in it for me. I was just looking forward to a tasty meal."

"Well I won't tease you either. Tell you what. I promise I will never tease a fat person anymore for as long if I live!" Susan yelled while tears were running down her face.

"Well I guess so. To bad for that tasty meal. But well you promised never to tease fat persons gain so… go ahead."

Susan ran away crying to the nearest girls bathroom.

"Wow... I almost feel bad for her. Almost. She was really scared. But she deserved it," Mary said.

"Well, she won't tease you anymore," Alex said with a grin.
