1552322222222211221111112122122211211112.content:
Rachel was sitting down eating lunch when Mickey sat next to her.

"Hey Mickey how was your weekend" said Rachel.

"To be honest after the eating contest between Mary and Alex the rest of the weekend was pretty uneventful" said Mickey.

"Yeah same here" said Rachel.

They kept talking for a while until they had to go back to class. The rest of the day went by pretty quick, the children went outside to wait for their parents. Rachel's mom arrived so she and Mickey said goodbye to each other. As Rachel entered the car she noticed that Mary had more stuff than usual.

"Did your teachers give you extra homework?" asked Rachel.

"Actually my friends were sick today so my teachers asked to bring their homework to them, so we're going to stop by their houses before we go to ours" said Mary.

"Hey Mary, is it okay if I come see your friends with you?" asked Alex outside the window.

"Sure the more the merrier" said Mary.

So Alex went into her moms car and they went to the houses of Diana and Jennifer first and every time she would knock on the door their mothers would answer tell and thank them for bringing them their homework. Mary would then ask their mothers if they could visit them for a while and they said yes. So Mary would visit her friends for a while and she saw how sick they were but also how happy they were when Mary and Alex visited them. Virginia's house was the last stop. Mary knocked on the door and Virginia's mom answered.

"Hello there Mary" said Virginia's mom.

"Hello ma'am, we brought Virginia's homework for her, is it okay if we see her for a while?" asked Mary.

"How nice of you and of course you can see her" said Virginia's mom.

Mary and Alex made their way to Virginia's room and they heard a bunch of thumping sounds coming from her room. They opened the door and saw Virginia in her pajamas dancing wildly and listening to music as if she wasn't sick at all. It took a while for Virginia to notice that they were here.

"Oh hi Mary (cough) Alex (cough). What you saw was a symptom of the disease that I have (cough) it makes me do a lot of dancing (cough)" said Virginia.

Virginia was obviously lying and Mary and Alex were not buying it for a second. They wanted to get the truth out of her and they did this by....
1552322222222211221111112122122211211112.title: Switch to Rachel

1552322222222211221111112122122211211112.content:
"Okay Rachel we both know that she's lying. But how do we get the truth out of her?"

"Hmmm. How about the tickle sisters?" Rachel suggested.

"Perfect idea," Mary said with a mean smile.

"Oh no. Please no. Not the tickle sisters. Don't do that. I'm sick!"

But the next moment Mary and Rachel jumped at her and tickled every piece of her they could find.

"Hahahaa! Stop, Hahahahahahaa! It! Hahahahahahaa! Please! Hahahahahahaa! Stop, hahahahaa! It, hahahaa! I tell Hahahahaa! You Hahaha! But, hahahahaa! Stop! Hahaha!"

Mary and Rachel decided to stop. Virgina said she would tell and it seemed like she would choke if they would't stop. Virgina kept lying on bed catching her breath for a few seconds and looked at the two sisters.

"Fine. So I'm not sick. But don't tell my mom. Else she gets angry. Reason that I faked being sick was because I did't want to go to school ... because… I don't wanna buy lunches for you an Alex. You will eat all my allowance for a year in a few days. I don't get that many allowance!"

"Oh that. Don't worry silly. You don't need to pay for our lunches."

"I... I don't?" Virginia asked

"You may if you want!" Rachel said with a mean smile.

"But you said… that you and Alex..." Virginia mumbled.

"That was just something to let you think about during the weekend. I and Alex are friends now. Everyone buys his own lunch. No one needs to pay for someone else his lunch. However, Rachel is right. If you want to pay for my lunch, go ahead."

"In your dreams fatty. But that was why I faked being sick. I know some tricks. But tell me, how was school?"

"Not so good. Diana and Jennifer are sick. They are really sick. Not like you. So I did't had any help. I got teased… a lot. But I got help from Alex. So that was't so bad. She's a good friend, and pretty nice when you get to know her. Oh I got your homework here."

"Oh thanks. Not that I like home work, but nice of you to drop it of."

"But what about you now? What are you going to do tomorrow?"

"Guess by a miracle I suddenly get better. However my mom probably let me stay home tomorrow to make sure I'm really better. Guess I see you the day after tomorrow!"

"All right then. Guess I see you tomorrow. With some more homework," Mary said.

"You can keep the homework! But I like it to see you again," Virginia said.

Mary and Rachel said goodbye and waddled out side.

Mary and Rachel didn't want their mom to know that Virginia was pretending to be sick on the off chance that she would talk to Virginia's mom later. On the ride home Mary's belly growled.

They went to the drive-thru of their local McDonald's where they ordered two cheeseburgers and large fries for Mary and she ate them in no time. The next moment she heard the school bell and fast walked to her class. Bumped to some other kids with her big belly but happened every day. Suddenly she saw...

"Of course. Silly me. Anyway still want I show you to your class?"

Mary might just met Cassandra but she seemed she could become a new friend. She had made two new good friends in just a few days. Also the fact that they were both fat. 1552322222222211221111112122122211211112.title: Casandra

After math class they went to history class and after history class it was lunchtime so Mary and Cassandra went to the cafeteria.

"So Mary you said that you would introduce me to your friend Alex" said Cassandra.

"Yeah and she should be... Oh there she is" said Mary as she pointed to Alex.

Cassandra was surprised that there was not one but two fat girls in this school and this one is fatter than Mary.

"Hey Mary, who's she?" asked Alex.

"It's nice to meet you too" said Cassandra.

Mary and Cassandra sat down and started eating lunch. When Cassandra got out her lunch it was smaller than both Mary and Alex.

"Is that really all you're eating?" asked Alex.

"Yes because my mother is putting me on a diet. Are your mothers like that?" asked Cassandra.

"Actually my mom doesn't care if I get fat as long as I'm happy" said Mary.

1552322222222211221111112122122211211112.content:
"... gym. Oh men I really hate gym."

"Join the club," Alex said. "I also really do hate gym. It's hard to move such a beautiful but big body like I have."

"Well I guess there's no way out of it," Cassandra said. "The only way to get out of gym is when you have a note from your parents or doctor that you don't have to go. But well my mom would never write such a note since she wants me to lose weight.

"Well my mom does't care about my weight but I'm pretty sure also she won't write a note. Every kid has gym at school so why would it be bad for me. Guess you just have to do it. Like math, history and all other classes."

"Even my mom won't write such a note," Alex said. "She encourages me and my sisters to get fat. But she also thinks a bit training is important. So you muscles can support your body. That's why we have a swimming pool. I like being fat but it's nice to be in the water and feeling weight less once in a while."

"Yeah I like that too," Mary said. "Being in the water makes it easier to move."

"I like swimming too," Cassandra said. "Can I come over again to swim? It's so hot the past days."

"Hmmm. You can come over..." Alex started. "but... before we go swimming… I want to have a eating contest against you."

"Wait what? You want to have a eating contest? Me against you? Well I don't think I will be able to beat you."

"Why don't you do it?" Mary asked. "It's just for fun. It's not like you're gonna lose your allowance or anything. It's just for fun. Besides you can pig out again without worrying about your diet."

"Well that's a good idea," Cassandra said. "I like it to pig out on tasty food. But my mom don't like it. So sure. I do it!"

"I feel bad for you that you mother is so mean she puts you on a diet," Alex said and looked at her wrist watch."Oh I need to go or I gonna be late for next class." Alex said.

Uneasy she got up on her feet and waddled out bumping to other people with her big belly.

"Nice girl," Cassandra said. "I'm so happy I'm not the only fat girl here."

"Yeah but we can better go now or else we be late for gym, and believe me... our gym teacher hates it when someone's late."

Fast (or as fast if two girl of their size could be) the two fat girls waddled to the dressing room to get changed in their gym suit.

choices: Rachel has trouble fitting in her car seat!
1552322222222211221111112122122211211112.content:
After the heavy girls jumped on that squeaky trampoline for a while, in no time at all, Rachel and Mary’s Dad showed up to take them home. Happily, Diana’s mom had those kids lined up in the living room, ready to go, by the time he’d arrived.

Rachel seemed fuller than before he noticed, looking at his daughter. Most of her recent gain was situated around her middle, which was worrying trouble for her clothes and, more importantly, her car seat. Would she outgrow those things soon? Only time would tell it seemed. He smiled ruefully, picking up on the fact that she’s caught her sister's appetite and started gaining weight. That belly got awfully big overnight, he thought.

Soon, though, Dad was filled with worry. “Rachel, honey, should you be walking? What did the doctor say yesterday?” he quizzed. When Rachel shrugged it off as no big deal, he answered his own question next. “You’re supposed to stay off that ankle. Come on, I’ll carry you out to the car.”

Rachel was excited to hear that but was too fat to leap into his arms. Instead, Dad had to heave her up like a sack of potatoes. He grunted softly as he lifted.

Rachel’s belly rumbles constantly along the way. He gets her all nice and snug in the car along with Mary, and then probes, “You hungry, sport? What d’you want?”

“Burger King again!” cheers Rachel. Mary approves.

“You wanna order for yourself, like a big girl?” he asks. When Rachel enthusiastically says she wants to, he pokes her belly. His finger goes in surprisingly deep. “You’re just saying that so I have to carry you in the store~” It was gentle teasing. He smiles and messes with her some more, stealing her nose and stuff, before he gets in the driver's seat and takes off.

Now they were in line ordering.

“I want three whoppers again,” Rachel says. “I think I can eat it all this time.”

Dad whispers to himself, “Feels like you can…”

Mary’s order was similarly impressive: two double whopper meals, but Mary always ate. No one else knew about the pills yet. Rachel smiles greedily, eager to show everyone her drastically improved appetite. She chomps on her burgers, filling every bit of her mouth with the meat bun and extras. Like this, she ate her first two.

Dad and Mary stared at the third burger, with Dad in particular wondering if she would finish this time.

Rachel’s tummy growled a bit, and the poor burger was doomed. She ate this one at a normal pace so she could finish with her family. But lo and behold, little Rachel’s little appetite was growing.

Her Dad’s arms were a little sore just from thinking about picking up the hefty runt again and packing her in the car. He hoped it wasn’t one of those slow-to-heal, nagging injuries.
1552322222222211221111112122122211211112.title: Dad came to pick them up

"Oops." Rachel mumbled. "That has never happened to me before."

Mary rolled with her eyes. True in had never before happened to Rachel. But at the other it happened to her more the once. Since she was pretty fat it happened sometimes that her pants button popped of or just was't able to close. Of course Rachel's belly was swollen from the waffles and the burgers. Also the fact thanks to the pills all the food turned into fat. Also the pants she wore were mend for very skinny girls. Like Rachel used to be not too long ago. But Mary seemed very happy. She did't understood how it came but it seemed like her sister appetite really did grow. First the waffle breakfast and now the food at burger king. If this went on she soon would be round if a barrel. Anyway she liked her sister planned to follow in her deep footprints. However she wondered if this was all just because she overstuffed her sister two times. She thought it should be several times before she really saw some result. Stretching the stomach was a slow process. You also need to be careful because if you overstuffed her too much she would barf it all out and then it would't have any effect. But Rachel seemed to be totally fine.

"Well Rachel I must say I'm impressed." Mary said while chewing. "I did't thought you would be able to finish them all."

"Me too." Her father said. "It's way more the you normally eat. If you keep this up you're gonna look like your big sister."

Rachel doubted that. Sure they looked a bit alike but Mary was very confident, and could easily stand up to others, and could handle being teased. That were things Rachel was't, or could't do like her sister.

Rachel laid back and looked at how Mary stuffed her face. Well it seemed fun to be so fat. You could eat all you want and as much if you want. She did't want to be such a girl that counted every calorie she consumed. Mary enjoyed life. he just what she wanted and how much she wanted. In Mary's case that was a lot

"I can't remember. when it was the last time I ate three burgers." Rachel mumbled and rubbed her stuffed belly.

"I know. Never. You never have eaten burgers on a row." Mary said.

Rachel patted her belly and must admit the idea she was gaining turned her on. Finally she would no longer be know as the skinny twig. However she was seen if the girl with the fat sister. If she would became fat as well they would probably tease her also. At the other hand they teased her already so it did't really matter.
A loud belch told them that Mary was done eating.

"That was delicious. But they could make those meals a bit bigger." Mary said with a grin.

"Come on sweet hart." Their father begged, "You cant still be hungry."

Mary looked at her dad. True she was't really hungry but she could still eat a bit more, but seeing the look on her fathers face she decided that she had enough for now."

"True I'm not really hungry." Mary said and got up and waddled to the car.

Rachel stuck her hands out to her father who picked her up but noticed she seemed to be heavier then yesterday. She could't have gained that much in just one day. Or could she?

"Come on! No fair. Give me the remote. I wanna see Kim possible! "Robin screamed while she tried to get the remote from her sister.

"No way. I wanna watch MTV. There are some cool clips on!" Christie yelled.

Robin tried one more time to get the remote from her sister. Pointless since Christie was a lot older ,bigger and stronger then Robin. Robin gave up and angry stomped to the hall.
Just then the door opened and her mother walked in.

"Oh hello Robin honey. Can you do me a favor?"

"Sure!" Robin was very helpful. Something most people liked about her.

A small figure appeared behind her mother.

"Well this is Kathrin. She is the daughter of friend of me at work. He asked me if i could watch her for a couple of hours. Kathrin is also new at your school. She starts tomorrow."

Robin looked interested at the new girl. A big belly and chunky arms an legs, just like herself. Tight clothes. Robin also wore mostly tight clothes. Not because she liked tight clothes but because she outgrew her clothes very fast.
Kathrin at the other hand looked at Robin and suddenly started to laugh, and a second later Robin also started to laugh. They both did't really knew why. Robins mother looked confused at the two girls.

"Great. It seems like you two like the other already. Now i have some work too do." Her mother walked to the computer room.

"Well hello so i'm Robin and you're Kathrin right."

The girl nodded with a friendly smile.

"Wanna see my room?"

"All right. sure. Seems like fun." Kathrin said happy.

Robin's room was full of stuffed animals. Robin liked animals. Some of her books had pictures of animals. Robin had one cat who was mostly sleeping in her basket. They also had some fish but they were a bit boring since you could't cuddle up with them or stroke them and they never said a word.

"This is my room." Robin said with a smile and went sitting on her bed.

"Nice room you have."

"Thanks. What do you like too do?"

"Eh wearing tight clothes."

"Really? I like it to wear wide clothes. tight clothes always gave marks around my tummy. What do you like more?"

"Eh eating, playing with my fat."

"What. I also like eating but what was that other thing? Playing with your fat?"

"Yeah."

Kathrin pulled of her tight shirt and showed her big belly to robin and started to push and pull at her fat. Robin smiled she also pulled of her T-shirt and started to play with her own fat. She must admit she liked it. Suddenly she felt another hand on her fat. Kathrin looked smiling at her.

"Eh can i play with your fat?"

"Eh all right but only if i can play with your fat then."

Both girls started to play with their fat for the next minutes.

"I never realized how much fun it is to play with your fat." Robin said.

"I never had someone else to share it with or who also had fat too play with. Your the first fat friend i have. All other girls i hang out are stick figures."

"Wanna do something else now?"
15531.title: First meeting

choices: "Let's play with our fat first. We'll have an eating contest tomarrow"
155311.content:
Kathrin's belly growled.

"Hungry?" Robin asked her

"Yep. You?" Kathrin asked

"Yeah. Let's eat" Robin said, patting her belly.




"Woah. You sure are a fast eater" Kathrin said, munching on a PBJ sandwich

"Big eater too" Robin said, gorging on her sandwich. "What's your favorite food?"

Kathrin had a sad look on her face. "I don't have a favorite"

"So you eat the food so fast you can't taste it?"

"No. I can't taste food anyway. I was born without a sense of taste"

"That's terrible. That means you'll never know how good most food taste like"

"Yeah, but in return, since everything is the same to me, I don't have to be picky. Heck, I could eat grass and I'd still call it food"

"Well that's good. There are many things I wouldn't eat just because of how gross they taste"

"See what I mean?"

"Yeah. Wait. Doesn't that mean your parents don't feed you fattening foods because it wouldn't matter to your toungue?"

"My parents don't feed me fattening food"

"Then what's with the belly?"

"You don't get fat from just eating fatty foods; you get fat from eating fatty foods and doing nothing, or eating a lot of any kind of food and doing nothing. The only difference is that fatty foods make you fat faster. So I basically eat a LOT of their celery (selery?), carrots, lettuce, and all the other vegitables they feed me, and I basically sit on my butt. No excersise whatsoever. The result was the gift of fat. Lots and lots of fat"

"That's really cool. If only I didn't have a sense of taste. Do you have any clue how much bigger this belly would be if I didn't care wether food tasted good or not?" Robin said, rubbing her belly

Kathrin giggled. "I'm sure you'd be quite a fatty!"

"Yeah!"

They broke into loud laugher, making themselves jiggle.

Kathrin's belly growled just as loud.

"Oop. My belly's hungry" she said

"Not as much as mine" Robin said

"I'm sure. I enjoy playing with my fat more than eating. Which says a lot because I love eating"

"Would you like to see who's belly could hold more food, or play with our fat again?" Robin asked

"Hmm...Can't we do both?"

"Well, after the contest, our bellies would be so full they wouldn't jiggle or bounce well, so there would be no fun"

Kathrin thought about it.

"Well i'm still hungry and i never before had someone who liked it so much too eat. I would like too see who can eat more. Besides i see you tomorrow at school. Then our bellies will be bigger and softer and we can play with them then."

"Great! My parents let me eat what i want most of the time. They say a growing girl needs to eat!"

"Oh you do grow. But in which size is another question."

Robin looked at her new friend. She just met this girl but felt now like if she knew her very good. Like something connected them.
She opened the cupboard and took out two bags of chips.

"Which do you like more... oh sorry. That does't matter too you of course."

"Don't worry. I'm used people ask me before they remember that i don't have taste. Most people talk before they think."

Robin and Kathrin both ripped open their bag and started to stuff their faces. They almost finished at the same time. Robin took two boxes of cookies. They both finished them up just as fast.
Robin showed her new friend a grin. She liked this new girl but that did't mean she would just let her win. She always eat more then her friends and she was't planning at stopping now. But neither was Kathrin.
Robin pulled out a big box of muffins. Both grabbed one muffin at a time and eat them this continued until the whole box was empty.
Robin's belly started to feel a bit full but also Kathrin's belly felt a bit full.

"Do you give up Kathy?"

"Not a chance Ro."

They both giggled at the short versions of their name.
Robin bend deeper in the cupboard and pulled out four bags of licorice. Both girls started to stuff the candy in their mouths until it seemed their cheeks were almost snapping.
Robin like licorice and almost any other kind of candy but now she just ate for food Just like Kathrin. Finally the bags were empty. But none of the girls wanted to give up. Robin waddled too one of the chairs and pushed it too the refrigerator and climbed on it and opened it. At the top she saw what she looked for. An apple pie.

"Is she still goes after this i'll give up." Robin thought.

She took the pie out and placed it between her and Kathrin.

"All right each one half!"

Both started to eat a piece but slowly since they both felt full but both grabbed a second piece. Almost strangle it down. But after that the second piece of pie was gone.
Finally Kathrin said: "All... right... fine enough.... One more... bite and i'll... explode."

Robin took one last bite of pie and threw her hands in the air. Robins shirt rode up showing her round belly and the button of her pants had trouble keeping her belly in. The next moment Robins button popped of and forced her zipper all the way down, but the a few seconds later also Kathrins button popped of and forced her zipper also all the way down, and she laughed.

"Alway's likes it when that happens. All right Robin you beat me this time but i'll win next time."

"We'll see about that."

Both girls started to laugh.

"Now what do you wanna do?"

Just then Robin heard her older sister leaving the T.V room and she looked at Kathrin.

"Wanna watch T.V?"

"Sure." Kathrin said.

The both went to the T.V room and smiled when they both sat lazy on the couch while their body's digested all the food turning it all in too more fat!

Daisy was sitting alone in her room eating chips and reading a braille copy of Harry Potter and the chamber of secrets. Why was she reading in braille you ask? Well that's because Daisy was born blind but don't think she is weak. Her hearing is very sharp. She can hear the softest sound and can feel the smallest movement in the air or floor. She also has a perfect nose for the smell of food. She also don't likes it if people think they need to be around her the whole time because she is blind. Her parents are a bit concerned about her but know she can do a lot on her own. She normally wears dark glasses and a white stick with red stripes. On top of being blind she's also pretty fat with a little big belly. She suddenly heard a knock on the door.

"Come in" said Daisy

The door opened and it was her mother. She's kind of normal height and weight with black hair and a nice smile.

"Daisy honey dinners ready" said Daisy's mom.

"Ok mom " said Daisy as she put down her book and walked out of her room.

In spite being blind Daisy knew her house like the back of her hand. Whenever she would go down or up the stairs she would always count the stairs to indicate when she would arrive upstairs or downstairs. She could also tell which room she would be in by felling the floors with her bare feet for example the kitchen floor was made of wood and the living room has a carpet floor.

As Daisy entered the kitchen she sat on her chair and with her sense of smell she could tell that they were having roast beef with corn, mashed potatoes and pees. And also at the table was her father who is also kind of normal height and weight with dark brown hair like his daughter.

"So Daisy your about to start school tomorrow" said Daisy's dad.

"Not just any school but a school for children with disabilities" said Daisy's mom.

"Yeah a school where kids like me are reminded how much different they are from other children" said Daisy unenthusiastically.

"Oh come on Daisy don't be like that this school is supposed to help children like you further their education to help them in the future" said Daisy's dad.

"And who knows you might be able to make friends with some of the students there who understand what you're going through so give it a chance" said Daisy's mom.

Daisy always did have trouble making friends. It was usually one of two things. One someone would make fun of the fact that she's blind and she in turn would be mean to the person who made fun of her and two because she was fat and most people consider fat to be ugly.

"Sight ok I'll give it a chance" said Daisy

"Wonderful"said Daisy's mom "oh and I want you to wear shoes"

"But mom you know I feel better when I'm barefooted"said Daisy

"I know but this school has a very strict dress code and that includes wearing shoes" said Daisy's mom

After hearing that Daisy frustratingly just kept eating her dinner.

155331211121.title: In the forest

1553312111212.content:
Daisy and Becky turned to walk back to the house, but heard the sound of kids playing.

"Sounds like my friends!" said Daisy, excitedly, "Perfect timeing, you'll get to meet my friends. Come on!"

Daisy turned around and walked towards the noise. Becky followed. They stopped when they - oops - when Becky saw some kids tossing water balloons at eachother. Three boys and one girl.

"Are those your friends?" asked Becky.

"Hi!" shouted Daisy, waving her cane in the air. The kids stopped.

"Hey Daisy." said one of the boys. The boy looked fairly tall for his age and his hair was a little long and brown.

"Hi Joey." replied Daisy.

"Sup Dais?" asked another boy. He was slightly smaller than Joey and had a matching hairstyle and color.

"How's it going, Justin?" asked Daisy.

"Hi Daisy." said the girl. She was fairly short, slim, and had long, black hair.

"Hi Sasha." said Daisy.

"Who's your new friend?" asked the last boy.

"Ned, Joey, Justin, Sasha," said Daisy, "this is Becky."

"Hi Becky!" said all five kids simultaniously.

"Uh...hi." said Becky.

A woman's voice called out "Joey! Justin! It's time!"

"Aww...dang it!" said Joey. He turned around and started walking. Justin followed.

Sasha looked at her watch, "Oh snap! It's almost five o' clock! Nice meeting you Becky." said Sasha before she ran off.

Ned looked around, "So I guess I'll be seeing you later. Bye." He turned around and walked away.

"So those are your friends?" asked Becky.

"Yes." said Daisy, "They're nice kids. A little active for me, but they're still nice. But..."

"What?" asked Becky.

"There was six of us before..." said Daisy, "Three girls and three boys."

"Where's the other girl?" asked Becky.

"Her name is Kathrin," said Daisy, "she was my closest friend. Closer than Joey, Justin, Ned, and Sasha. She is like me."

"How so?" asked Becky.

"We are both missing something we should have." said Daisy, "An average person should have five senses, sight, hear, touch, taste, and smell. I obviously can't see, but Kathrin can't taste food. She doesn't have a sense of taste."

"That must stink!" exclaimed Becky, "I mean, if you can't taste the food, how will you ever know how good it is?"

"Well, we all have a favorite food and food we just can't bear to eat." said Daisy, "She doesn't have either one. All food tastes the same to her."

"Is there anything good about that?" asked Becky.

"Well, she has an eating disorder." said Daisy, "She eats more than the average girl. If all food tastes the same to her, then she doesn't have to worry about not liking any kind of food. She never says no to food. Ever. Tell her it's food, and she'll eat it."

"When was the last time you saw her?" asked Becky.

"A couple weeks ago." said Daisy, "She moved. She's not even in the same city anymore."

"Hm...I would like to meet her." said Becky.

"You really would." said Daisy, "She's just like you and me."

"Big and fat and loves to eat?" asked Becky.

"Big and fat and loves to eat." repeated Daisy. She began walking back to the direction of her house, "I think we should go back to my house."

"Good idea." said Becky.

He acts like this around anyone."

155331221.title: Daisy and Nikki

1553312211.content:
"Hee mom I met a girl in the sandbox." Nikki said to her mother.

"Oh really. How nice." Linda said. "How was she?"

"Eh also kind of fat. Not as fat as me of course but her fat was more all over her body. However a bit more in the belly. Dark brown hair and eh blind."

"Hold on a second. She was blind?" Linda asked.

"Yeah. Her eyes where white. But she was pretty nice. She said I was the fattest girl she had ever met."

"How could she know that if she could't see you?" Linda asked.

"I told her she could feel my belly."

"I once knew a blind girl. It sounds strange but those blind people can do a lot of things on their own. You would't expect that. But they can hear way better and can also feel better. Very sensitive. They can even smell better. That way they can do a lot of their own. However there are of course still a few things that they can't do. But they can do most things. A lot of things you would think are impossible to them. We could't do it if we should do it with our eyes closed."

"She said she could feel vibrations. That was why she was barefooted. Do you think there's a chance I will see her at school?" Nikki asked.

"Well I don't think so. She goes to her own school of course. She can't read your textbooks. That's one of the things they can't do. reading. However I know they can read but not with words. Their books have pages with small little lumps on it. They feel them and that way they can read. By feeling instead of reading words. I guess she learns that at her school."

Nikki thought about Daisy. She seemed pretty nice. She wondered if she cared about her size. Of course she could't see how she looked but she could feel how she looked right. Would she ever meet her again? The village were they lived was't that big. But that did't want to say she would ever see her again. But who knew. Perhaps. If she was just at the right time at the right place.

"Oh look. There are the new people who bought that old house." Linda said and started to drive very slowly.

Nikki looked outside and suddenly saw Daisy. She said she just moved. But it appeared she moved to her street. Only three houses away from her. She looked again and there was no doubt it was her. Barefooted, brown hair, big belly but now she wore some black glasses.

"Hee mom. That's her. That's Daisy." Nikki whispered.

"Really? Well that's a coincidence. Hm perhaps we should visit and call them welcome in the neighborhood. Would't that be nice?"

"Yeah I guess it would." Nikki said.

"Also nice that they have a kid about your age." Linda said and parked her car.
